21b2(rgyud): nas rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar rkang pa gcig gis ma tshang ba brjod pas/ thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa'i a las mtshan don gyi yi ge brgya brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'phros te/ de dag kyang rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha
21b3(rgyud): tshogs su gyur te/ 'gro ba'i don byas rnam par snang mdzad chen po la bskor bar bsam mo/ de nas/ rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed nas/ sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcur rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa brjod pas/ ye shes
21b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i thugs ka'i a las mtshan don gyi yi ge rnams spros pas 'jig rten gyi gdug pa can rnams btul nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su 'khor par bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid nas/ /ye shes me lce 'od
21b5(rgyud): rab gsal/ /zhes pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i yi ge a las mtshan don gyi yi ge nyis brgya sum cu rtsa lnga byung ste spros pas/ sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprul pas 'gro don
21b6(rgyud): byas nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i nub phyogs su bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas/ 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /zhes pa nas/ nor bu chen po rin chen tog /ces pa'i bar gyis tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs
21b7(rgyud): ka'i a las mtshan don gyi yi ge brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi spros te/ sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprul pas 'gro ba'i don byas nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho phyogs su bzhugs par bsam mo/ /de nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba/ /zhes pa
22a1(rgyud): nas/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga brjod pas/ ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i a las mtshan don dgu bcu rtsa dgu spros te/ sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprul
22a2(rgyud): pas sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su grub par byas nas slar 'dus te dkyil 'khor chen po'i byang phyogs su bzhugs par bsgom mo/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po drug po de las/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan
22a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog / ces pa la sogs pas bstod cing mchod par bsams la gdon to/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po de la spyir 'dud nyi shus yang dag par bstod do/ /de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu
22a4(rgyud): bsngos te/ oM swa b+hA ba'i sngags kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing spros pa dang bral bar 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ngo bo nam mkha' ltar dri ma med par yongs su dag par bsgoms te spyod lam gyi bya ba gzhan bya'o/ /de ltar rigs bsdus pa'i dbang
22a5(rgyud): du byas nas mtshan brjod cing bsdus pa la tshigs bcad nyis brgya drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis bstan to/ /de'i yon tan gyi gzhung tshigs bcad brgya lnga bcu'o/ /de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan brjod pa yon tan dang bcas pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyi mtshan gdon pa'i man ngag /
22a6(rgyud): slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'phags 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba/ mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba dang / mi mkhas pa
22a7(rgyud): gzhan gyi bsngo ba'o/ /de la mkhas pa rang gi bsngo ba ni mi dmigs pa gsum gyis zin pas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsngo ba'o/ /mi mkhas pa gzhan gyi bsngo ba ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar bsngo ba ltar bdag gis kyang bsngo ba'o/ /
22b1(rgyud): mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi rtag pa la
22b2(rgyud): sogs pa bsgom pa ste/ kye ma 'di ltar snang ba'i phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung ba chen po bzhis 'dus byas pa 'di rdul phra mo 'dus pa las grub pas/ rdul phra mo de yang rang bzhin mi rtag pa/ ther zug pa dang / glo bur ba dang / yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / yang
22b3(rgyud): dag pa'i don byed mi nus pas brtags na dben pa slu ba'i chos can/ 'gyur ba'i rnam pa'o/ /nges pa med pa bdag gi med pa/ 'jig pa'i chos can/ sgyu ma lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu/ chu zla lta bu/ gzugs
22b4(rgyud): brnyan lta bu/ na bun lta bu/ 'ja' tshon lta bu sdug bsngal ba bdag med pa/ stong pa'o/ de ltar na phyi gzung ba'i yul la bdag med pa'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mi rtag pa bsgom pa/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis/
22b5(rgyud): mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'khor ba las yid byung ba ni de bzhin du nang bcud kyi sems can dang / bdag gi gzugs kyi phung po yang spyi bo nas rkang pa'i mthil yan chad du brtags
22b6(rgyud): pas mi gtsang ba'i ngo bo yin te/ chu ser dang / bad kan dang / klad pa dang / bshang gci dang / rnag khrag dang / snabs lud dang / keng rus la sogs pas yongs su gang ba/ de yang 'gyur ba'i chos can/ de yang yid brtan du mi rung ba/
22b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba/ mi rtag pa bdag med pa/ stong pa'o/ /de lta bur shes par byas nas gzung 'dzin gnyis las log ste/ sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang gzugs med pa/ kha dog med pa ngo bo med pa/ rnam pa med pa bltar med pa/ gzung du med pa rtog pa
23a1(rgyud): med pa/ spros pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rang rig pa rang gsal ba tsam du yang grub pa yin te/ de ltar na 'khor ba na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags pa ni slu ba'i chos can yin no/ /'khor ba las yid byung ba 'di yang rang bzo ma yin te/ lus med
23a2(rgyud): lus te lus kyi mchog/ /lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po/ /zhes pa dang / 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa/ /bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas/ /zhes pa'i bka' rgyud la brten nas byas so/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mi rtag pa 'khor ba las yid byung ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal
23a3(rgyud): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas shes pa dug gsum las bzlog pa'i man ngag ni/ de yang rig pa byang chub kyi sems 'od gsal stong pa gnyis
23a4(rgyud): med de ma rig ste ma shes pa'o/ /sems can sangs rgyas kyi snying po can yin pa la sangs rgyas kyi rgyu bor te ngan song gi rgyu bsags pa ni gti mug go/ /de ltar khams gsum gyi 'khor ba sdug bsngal yin par ma shes pas/ sdug bsngal de la mngon par sred cing chags pa ni
23a5(rgyud): 'dod chags so/ /de ltar chags pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi nying srog nying gis bcad de nying sha nying gis zos nas gnod pa byas pa ni zhe sdang ngo / /de ltar rgyu dug gsum las 'bras bu ngan song gsum du smin no/ /de'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i chu bo bzhi 'khor
23a6(rgyud): ba'i rgya mtshor 'bab pa ni 'di lta ste/ rtog pa'i chu bo dang / las kyi chu bo dang / 'khor ba'i chu bo dang / sdug bsngal gyi chu bo'o/ /de la rtog pa'i chu bo gang zhe na/ rtog pa'i chu bo snga ma la brten nas/ phyi ma byed pa 'chad pa'o/ /las kyi chu bo gang zhe na/ rtog pa snga ma
23a7(rgyud): de'i dbang gis las dge sdig yod pas sdig pa spyad pa'i dbang gis las kyi rnam smin gyi 'bras bu zad pa med par 'byung ba'o/ /'khor ba'i chu bo gang zhe na/ las de ma zad pa'i bar du sreg pa yang rgyun mi chad par 'byung bas so/ /sdug bsngal gyi chu bo gang zhe na/ de ltar srid
23b1(rgyud): pa gsum du 'khor bas 'bras bu sdug bsngal gsum dang rgyun mi 'chad par nyams su myong ba'o/ /de bas na de ltar smin par byed pa'i rgyu dug gsum las bzlog na chu bo bzhi yang rang log tu 'gyur ro/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i shes pa dug gsum las bzlog pa'i man ngag slob dpon
23b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la skyabs su 'gro ba ni maN+Dal dang mchod pa bshams te/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rang gi mdun du dmigs la 'di skad
23b3(rgyud): brjod do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge
23b4(rgyud): 'dun dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir yon chab dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / dri chab dang / bshos gtsang dang / sil snyan la sogs pa dngos su 'byor pa dang / yid kyis sprul te dbul bar bgyi'o/ /de nas
23b5(rgyud): 'di skad brjod do/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub ma thob kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams
23b6(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa/ gzigs pa skyes bu'i khyu mchog sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na med pa'i sku mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos 'dod chags dang bral ba la skyabs su mchi ste/ bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ba/ zhi ba chos kyi sku so sor yang dag par rig pa la
23b7(rgyud): skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gtso bo la skyabs su mchi ste/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun sa chen por chud pa'i phyir mi ldog pa rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //
24a1(rgyud): @##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar skyabs 'gro khyad par can byas nas sems bskyed pa ni/ thal mo sbyar la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa'i las byas la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad brjod do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin
24a2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog tu rin po cher bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
24a3(rgyud): pa'i sbyin pa rin po cher gzung du gsol zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas 'di skad brjod do/ /phyogs bcu na bzhug pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba thog ma dang / skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu
24a4(rgyud): sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
24a5(rgyud): dang / sa chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog rin po cher sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang sems can ma smin pa rnams smin par bya ba dang / ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyid pa dang / dbugs ma phyung ba
24a6(rgyud): rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes gsol ba gdab po/
24a7(rgyud): de nas 'di skad brjod de/ bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/ /thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ /rga nad 'chi ba'i rba klong 'khrugs pa yi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'dren par shog /dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags
24b1(rgyud): te/ /bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i/ /dam pa gnyis ni thob par shog /sa'am chu'am me'am rlung / /dgon pa shing gi sman lta bur/ /bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi/ /nad do cog gi gsos su shog /mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang / /dran pa dang ni reg pas kyang / /bdag
24b2(rgyud): ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /gru dang zam pa lta bur shog /byang chub sems dpa' su dag gang bzhugs pa'i/ /de dag kun gyi smon lam grub gyur nas/ /sems can thams cad gtan du bde ba dang / /ngan song rnams ni rtag tu stongs par shog /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi
24b3(rgyud): mchog rnams la/ /byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag gis sbyin sogs bgyis pa 'di dag gis/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo'o/ /sems bskyed pa'i cho ga slob dpon 'jam dpal
24b4(rgyud): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ni rang gi yi dam gang yin par bsams la/ de'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
24b5(rgyud): 'jam klas pa cig bsgom/ de'i lte ba la a dkar po cig bsams la de la dmigs pa gtad de spros bral du bsgom mo/ /byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man dang / /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
24b6(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni/ gong gi snying ga'i zla ba dang rdo rje'i a de las 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par byed pa'i 'od zer kha dog dkar po byung ba des sems can thams cad la reg pa dang sdug
24b7(rgyud): bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang ldan pa dang / bde ba la yun ring bar gnas pa dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don du yun ring du bsgom mo/ /'od zer de'i phung po slar snying gar thim par bya'o/ /tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon
25a1(rgyud): nur gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dus gsum sangs rgyas la blta ba ni/ /snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje las 'od zer kha dog lnga 'ja' tshon lta bu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa thams cad snang bas khyab pas gsal bar byas la blta ba dang / /
25a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams nang la rgya che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa mdzad pa bcu gnyis mdzad pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /mnyam par gzhag pa dang / /de las langs pa dang / /byang chub sems dpas bskor ba dang / /'khor
25a3(rgyud): rnam bzhis bskor ba dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sems gtad la blta bar bya'o/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la blta ba rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
25a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /dbang po tha mas rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o/ /de yang 'di lta ste/ de rnams
25a5(rgyud): kyi yon tan dran pa'i sgo nas gus pa bskyed cing bdag gis kyang de'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ yang dag pa'i
25a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya'o/ /de lta bu'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rtogs shing dran pa nyid ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /chos rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa yang dag par mthong ba/ dus tshod mkhyen pa/ 'di mthong ba la nye bar
25a7(rgyud): gtod pa/ mkhas pa so sor yang dag par rig pa/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ /thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ ma 'dres pa yongs su gsal ba'o/ /de lta bu la dmigs shing yon tan dran par bya'o/ /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
25b1(rgyud): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs/ rigs par zhugs pa/ mthun par zhugs pa/ kun du sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ rab tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ sbyor ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa'o/ /de'i yon tan rjes su dran par bya'o/ /gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni
25b2(rgyud): kye ma skyes bu ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa'i nang nas ser sna dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos sbyin 'khor mor byed pa/ lag rkyong ba rnams gtong ba la dga' ba/ 'di ni bdag gis legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /de ltar rjes su dran par bya'o/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan
25b3(rgyud): thos kyi dge 'dun ni tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ skyon med pa ma 'dres pa ma gos pa/ rang gtsang yod pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ ting nge 'dzin shes pa'o zhes de lta bur dran par bya'o/ /lha rjes su dran pa ni lha rnams ni che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ lhar skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa/
25b4(rgyud): tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bdag nyid dang / lha'i yon tan mtshungs par byas nas lha'i yon tan dang sbyar nas rjes su dran par bya'o/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rjes su dran pa drug bsgom pa'i
25b5(rgyud): man ngag rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po 'bring gis/ rten 'brel bcu gnyis bsgom pa ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis gsungs te/ phyi
25b6(rgyud): rten cing 'brel pa'i 'byung ba sa bon skye bo nad med pas 'bras bu'i bar du yan lag brgyad kyi tshul du 'byung ba 'bras bu ljang bu la gzigs nas/ nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du yan lag bcu gnyis gsungs te/ nang gi chos rnams ji ltar skye ba'i rgyu dang 'bras
25b7(rgyud): bu rnams bstan pa'o/ /de la ma rig pa ni mi shes pa las byung ste/ de kho na nyid la gti mug pa dang / las rgyu dang 'bras bu la gti mug pa'o/ /de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa 'byung ste/ de la ci'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya zhe na/ mun pa chen po'i phyir na ma rig pa ste/ dper na mun pas
26a1(rgyud): bsgribs nas rdzas kyi dngos po mi mthong ba dang 'dra bar ma rig pas kyang las dang las kyi 'bras bu yod pa dang / bden pa dang dkon mchog yon tan can dang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid stong pa nyid du mthong bar bya ba bsgribs te ma mthong bas mun pa zhes bya ste/ kha cig
26a2(rgyud): gis dge sdig ngo ma shes/ kha cig gis dge sdig yod par yid ches kyang don la rmongs pas ma rig pa zhes bya'o/ /de'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung ste/ bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin da dang / mi g.yo ba gsum gyis 'du byed pa'o/ /mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir
26a3(rgyud): na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ste/ las su ma bstan pa rnams pa sna tshogs pa 'du byed do/ /des byas pas kun gzhi la bag chags sogs te/ rgyu des rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo / /des khams gsum du las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i las kyi 'du
26a4(rgyud): byed do/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed gnyis ni tshe snga ma dang sbyar ro/ /'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs pa yul tha dad pa rnams la mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pas so sor rig
26a5(rgyud): cing shes pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste/ kun gzhi la bag chags gzhag pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu des 'phangs nas/ pha rol du skad cig ma'i tshul gyis ma'i mngal du chags pa las ming dang gzugs su gyur ba'o/ /rnam par shes pa man chad da lta'i tshe ste/ de yan chad gsum ni
26a6(rgyud): 'phen pa'i yan lag go/ /de'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs te ci'i phyir na/ brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste/ dper na shing gsum rtse sprad na mdung khyim du rung ba dang 'dra ba'i ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po gnyis kyang gcig la gcig brten pas na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste/
26a7(rgyud): rnam par shes pa ma'i mngal du 'ongs nas ming bzhi'i phung po dang gzugs kyi phung po mer mer po dang / nur nur po dang / gor gor po dang / yan lag tu gyur/ 'phrad 'gyur la sogs pa mngal gyi chos drug dang ldan no/ /de'i rkyen gyis skye mched drug 'byung ste/ sems dang sems
26b1(rgyud): las byung ba rnams skye ba'am 'byung ba'i sgo byed pas sgo zhes bya ste/ dngos su na ming dang gzugs mer mer po la sogs pa brtan nas de'i rkyen gyis nang gi dbang po drug dod pa las yul drug la rnam shes skye shing mched pas so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ste/ yul dang dbang
26b2(rgyud): po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pas yul yid du 'ong ba dang / mi 'ong ba dang / gnyi ga ma yin pa dang gang dang gang la reg pa'i rgyu tshor ba zhes bya ste/ reg pa 'byung ba'i rgyu tshor ba ste nyams su myong ba'o/ /'di man chad bzhi ni 'phangs pa'i lam gyi yan lag go/ /tshor ba'i rkyen gyis
26b3(rgyud): sred pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir na skom pa'i phyir na sred pa zhes bya ste/ skom gyis gdungs pa dang 'dra bar tshor ba sdug bsngal dang bral nas bde ba dang phrad par 'dod pas sred pa'o/ /bde ba tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa chang 'thung ste/ yang dang yang du 'dod pa'i phyir sred pa'o/ /'di kun
26b4(rgyud): gyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa las byung ba'o/ /srid pa sred pa len pa gsum da ltar gyi tshe dang sbyar ro/ /sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ste/ len pa la bzhi ste 'dod pa'i len pa dang / lta ba'i len pa dang tshul khrims dang brtul
26b5(rgyud): zhugs bsnyems pa'i len pa dang / bdag tu lta ba'i len pa'o/ /srid pa'i rgyu yang dang yang du len par byed de/ 'di yang rtsa ba ma rig pa'o/ /len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid par skye ba'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ste/ khams gsum du skye ba'i phyir ro/ /
26b6(rgyud): der skye ba'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags brtas nas tshe phyi ma'i skye ba ni sred pa zhes bya ste/ len pa'i rgyu las dge ba dang / mi dge ba bsags pas tshe phyi ma len pas srid pa'o/ /'di man chad gsum ni grub pa'i yan lag go/ /srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po
26b7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ste/ lam rgyud lnga nyid du lta dang mi la sogs pa'i lus kyi phung po sngon med pa 'byung bas na skye ba'o/ /de yang srid par skye ba'i las byas pa'i rgyus skye ba'o/ /skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi 'byung ste/ ci'i phyir rgas pa zhe na/ phung po smin pa'i phyir rgas pa zhes bya ste/
27a1(rgyud): dper na shing thog smin pa de rgas pa dang 'dra bar skra dkar dang gnyer ma can du gyur te/ lus ni bshang khung bzhin du song / /kha brag phug stong pa dang 'dra/ skra spra ba'i me tog dang 'dra/ dpral ba dras stan rnying pa dang 'dra bar song ba ni rgas pa'o/ /rgas pa'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba 'byung ste/ ci'i
27a2(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba zhes bya ste/ lus kyi phung po gnas pa'i dus zad de drod dang rnam par shes pas btang ba'i phyir shi ba'o/ /skye ba yong na rga shi 'byung ngo / /skye ba dang rga shi gnyis te gsum ni tshe phyi ma dang sbyar ro/ /rgas pa dang shi ba gnyis ni nyes dmigs kyi yan lag
27a3(rgyud): go/ /rten 'brel bcu gnyis dum bu lngas 'chad de/ tshe snga ma'i rgyu'i sgo nas gzhag go/ /da ltar gyi tshe ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i sgo nas gzhag go/ /de ltar ci'i phyir bstan ce na/ de yang tshe snga ma'i rgyus 'di bskyed/ 'di'i rgyus phyi ma skyed pa'o/ /de ltar yan lag bcu
27a4(rgyud): gnyis lugs su 'byung ba ni 'jug rga shi 'byung / ci las byung rtsad bcad pas skye ba las byung / de nas khad kyis gcig gi rkyen gyis gcig bskyed de/ mjug ma rig pa la rtsa ba thug pa dang / ma rig pa de yang med par 'gags pa ma yin te/ ma yin pa'am mi dmigs par
27a5(rgyud): 'gags pas 'du byed nas rga shi'i bar du 'gags te/ lugs las bzlog par shes par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar bdag gis 'di byas pa rang bzo lta bu ma yin te/ yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/ /dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang / /zhes gsungs
27a6(rgyud): pa la brten nas byas pa'o/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgom pa'i man ngag rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
27a7(rgyud): lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni/ lhar bskyed pa stong pa nyid bcug nas sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed pas/ rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'jig /zhe 'dod thams cad dang
27b1(rgyud): bral ba'i stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i shes pa de kho na la gnas pa ni chos kyi sku'o/ /shes pa'i ngo bo ma grub cing rig pa rang gsal gyi nyams myong dang ma bral ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /shes pa gsal ba de nyid snang la rang bzhin med pas sprul pa'i sku'o/ /rgyu'i gnas skabs su sku gsum dbyer
27b2(rgyud): med bsgoms pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob ste/ spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ rigs drug gi sems can gyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te/ 'bras bu sku gsum thob pa'o/ /dbang po rab kyis
27b3(rgyud): de kho na nyid bsgom pa slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI ti bo d+hi ma hA sha rI raM bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i byang chub chen po'i sku gdung gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ sangs
27b4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa can gang zhig gis mchod rten byed par 'dod pas sa chog tshul dang mthun par bya/ srog chags med pa'i sa legs par blangs te/ rin po che'i phye ma yang mang du btab nas/ dri zhim po'i
27b5(rgyud): chus bran te/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas 'jim pa'i gong bu de 'od kyi phung por byas te/ 'od phung de nyid d+hIHser po las dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga phyag brgyad par bsams te/ ye shes sems dpa'i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags la rdo rje bsdu ba dang bcas pas rig sngags kyis sangs
27b6(rgyud): rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa bsdus te/ byon pa thams cad dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal lnga po de nyid du thams cad thim par byas te/ de la thugs ka nas sprul pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod la/ 'od kha dog lnga'i phung po 'ja' tshon lta bur mos pa byas la/ de la 'bi 'bi bya zhing skol phor chos
27b7(rgyud): kyi 'byung gnas su bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i sku'i phreng ba'i sngags 'di zlos shing gdab bo/ /oM a AH sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti/ wA gI shwa ra ma hA wa tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la
28a1(rgyud): su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH zhes bzlas shing skol phor nas gdon pa dang / phyi gzhal yas khang du rdzogs pa la nang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rigs thams cad bsdus pa la lha drug cu rtsa gsum grub par byas la bzhugs par bsams te/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis de
28a2(rgyud): dang mthun pa'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs te bcug la yang dag par mchod de/ lhag pa dang ma tshang ba kha bskang pa'i phyir yi ge brgya pa gdon par bya'o/ /sngags 'dis rab tu gnas par byas te/ ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA ba he tun+te ShAn tA thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH / de yang
28a3(rgyud): bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sarba ar+tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na ye swA hA zhes bzlas so/ /sngags 'dis sa dkar byug par bya'o/ /oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ zhes brjod do oM ar+ya ye swA hA/ zhes pas bre gzugs so/ /oM tsakra brta na ye swA hA/ zhes pas 'khor
28a4(rgyud): lo gzugs so/ /oMts+tsha tra ne ra ya swA hA zhes pas gdugs dbul lo/ /oM kuM bi ra d+h+wa dza ye swA hA zhes pas rgyal mtshan nam tog gzhag go/ /oM bA ta ka ta dza ye swA hA zhes pas ba dan phyar ro/ /oM pa Ta dA ma ye swA hAHzhes pas dar dpyangs gdags so/ /oM puSh+pa mA la ye swA hA zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba
28a5(rgyud): gdags so/ /de ltar rdzogs par byas nas slar yang mchod pas yang dag par mchod do/ /bkra shis brjod la brtan par bzhugs su gsol lo/ /dad can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /tsha tsha'i cho ga 'di byas pas/ /de las byung ba'i dge ba des/ /'gro ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog/ /slob dpon
28a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i tsha tsha'i cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI ti ho ma bi d+hi saM gra ha ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus
28a7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang po sngags pa ni/ /rang lus 'jig kyang gzhan phan brtson/ /rnyed dang bkur sti la ma chags/ /sems can don du sbyin sreg bya/ /dang po sa'i cho ga dang sta gon gyi cho ga byas la/ yid du
28b1(rgyud): 'ong ba'i sa'i char thig btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thag bung khru gang ba/ zabs su de'i phyed la/ kha khyer sor bzhi phyir dor ba/ de'i steng du sor bzhi ba'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ nang du pad+ma dang rdo rjes mtshan pa/ byug pa dri zhim po dang / me tog dkar pos brgyan pa/ mtshams
28b2(rgyud): su rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / kha khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o/ /shin tu sar pa'i ras kyis g.yogs par bya'o/ /de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas dang / yam shing dang bud shing dang / dgang gzar dang blugs gzar rnams bshams te/ mchod rdzas ni g.yon du gzhag/ /sreg rdzas ni
28b3(rgyud): g.yas su gzhag go/ /de nas khrus dang byug pa byas la stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang / rgyan thams cad gon te/ srod la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis kha shar du bltas te blos bsgrub par bya ba de dmigs te/ las rnams brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas lce lag byin gyis brlabs te/
28b4(rgyud): skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas ra ba dang drA ba dang bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang badzra tsakra bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum lta bur dmigs te/ phyag rgya bzhi byas la rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te/ thun
28b5(rgyud): mong gi mchod pa lnga dang / khyad par sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang / mchod pa nyi shus kyang yang dag par mchod de/ sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags/ oM
28b6(rgyud): badzra yak+Sha hUM/ zhes bya bas bgegs bsal bar bya'o/ /badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta zhes bya bas rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis bdag dang thab dang rdzas dang mchod pa rnams bsang bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lhar bskyed de/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba mdun du
28b7(rgyud): spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pa byas te/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bdag nyid gnyis su med par byas te phyag rgya chen po bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba yang blang ngo / /de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis thab khung mi dmigs par byas la muM las dkar ba dang 'tsher ba dang rnam pa thams
29a1(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i shin tu che ba'i thab bskyed do/ /de yang phyi rol gzhal yas khang rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang du chud pa'o/ /de yang 'o ma can gyi shing gi bud shing ngam/ dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas thab bas cung zad dma' ba tsam gyi bud shing brtsigs la rgyun bzhag gi me 'am/
29a2(rgyud): yon bdag dka' thub la dga' ba'i khyim nas blangs pa'i me yam shing gis spar te/ rlung yab kyis g.yab cing / badzra dz+wa la raM zhes me'i snying po yang brjod do/ de nas me'i spra brtag ste/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la rang gi chos kyi yi ger bkod de/ oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ zhes snying po bzlas
29a3(rgyud): te/ shin tu gang ba'i mar gyis dgang blugs dang sreg blugs sbyin no/ /de nas rtags bzang po mthong ba dang / de nas me thab tu raM sum mdo ris mtshan can la/ a las pad+ma'i gdan/ de'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ a las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du raM dkar po las me lha zhi ba
29a4(rgyud): dung dang ku mu da ltar dkar ba/ mig gnyis pa ral ba'i thor tshugs dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa skyabs sbyin dang / dbyug to dang / bgrang phreng dang / gun+d+he rnams g.yas dang g.yon na 'dzin pa'o/ /mchod phyir thogs dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/
29a5(rgyud): rin po ches dbu brgyan pa/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag cing shin tu zhi ba'o/ /de nas phyogs skyong dang / sprul pa'i me bde bar byas te/ lag pa g.yas skyabs sbyin du bzhag la/ mthe bo srin lag gi rtsar g.yab cing / e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ag+ni b+ha ba aM ku sha dzaH
29a6(rgyud): snying ga'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs la phyag btsal ba dang / mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gnyis su med par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhis gdab par bya ste/ rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang / badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas rdzas thams cad
29a7(rgyud): bsags nas snying ga'i 'od zer dang ye shes kyi bdud rtsis rdzas thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs te/ byams pa'i sems kyis ag+na ye b+ha ba che ge mo'i sdig pa sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya shAn+tiM ku ru ye swA hA zhes pas yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil
29b1(rgyud): 'khor du'o/ /mar me la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo/ /de nas til dang 'bras chan la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o/ /me tog ni dbu la'o/ /dri dang byug pa ni thugs kar ro/ /ku sha dang dUr ba'i myu gu ni 'od kyi dkyil du'o/ /mchod yon ni mdun du'o/ /
29b2(rgyud): zhal bsil ni phyag tu'o/ /de nas sdig pa sbyar bar 'dod na lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du til nag po la sdig pa'i gzugs su bya ste/ 'od zer gyis sdig pa bsdus te/ bskul tshig dang bcas pas ji srid bde ba tha mthong gi bar du bsreg par bya'o/ /nad zhi bar byed pa rnams kyis ni snying
29b3(rgyud): ga'i bya nag po la 'od zer bsdus pa'i sbyor ba byas nas bsdus te/ bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsregs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bsreg bya legs par bskul te/ de'i 'od zer gyis nad blangs la bdud rtsi'i chus bkrus te bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsreg go/ /tshe spel
29b4(rgyud): ba la sogs pa yang tshul 'di nyid kyis 'grub par bya'o/ /de nas zhabs bsil phul la bstod de/ las dang rjes su mthun pa'i phrin las bcol la/ me rang gi gzugs kyis de nyid du bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thab dang rdzas bsangs te/ me
29b5(rgyud): tog thab tu bor la de lta bu'i thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed la/ de'i steng du muM dmar skya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro 'du dang bcas pa/ de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal sku mdog zla ba nya ba lta bu rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas
29b6(rgyud): ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ /g.yon po ti dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang khro mo'i tshogs rnams 'dus shing 'phro ba ste/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje dang
29b7(rgyud): snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / dpral ba dang / spyi bo rnams su bkod pa'i yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab po/ /many+dzu shrI sa ma ya s+t+waM haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su hrIHdang a las zla ba'i gdan bskyed de/ snying ga'i 'od zer
30a1(rgyud): gyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas te/ phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ snying ga'i 'od zer gyis thab kyi gzugs dang gnyis su med par bsre/ de nas rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag
30a2(rgyud): rgya bcas te/ sa ma ya dzaHbsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de nas oM wA gI shwa ri muM many+dzu shrI hUM/ sarba pA baM dA ha na badzrA ya che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru ye swA hA/ zhes bya bas yam shing dang mar la sogs pa thams cad dang cho ga gong mas dbul lo/ /sdig pa sbyang ba
30a3(rgyud): dang nad sbyang pa yang cho ga gong mas so/ /de nas gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin par bya'o/ /tshul des brgya rtsa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas zhal bsil te/ yang dag par mchod pa dang / 'dud nyi shus bstod do/ /de nas dge ba bsngo ste/ las dang rjes
30a4(rgyud): su mthun pa'i smon lam btab ste/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /ces pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu'o/ /de nas rdzas thams cad bsangs te me rang gi gzugs su bsam par byas te/
30a5(rgyud): cho ga gong ma nyid kyis sreg blugs lhag ma sbyin no/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bsngo ba dang / smon lam bya ste/ oM e h+ye hi zhes gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig pa bdag la bsdu'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs pas sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma bsdus te/
30a6(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin no/ /cho ga nyams pa dang ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i phyir yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg las rnams gsal bsdus pas/ /bdag gis dge ba gang thob des/ /ma lus sdug bsngal grol gyur te/ /'gro kun 'jam dpal thob par
30a7(rgyud): shog / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul gyi spyod pa bsdus pa las/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te
30b1(rgyud): gtan la phab pa'o/ [ ]@/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag bzhugs/ @##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ nam gyi cha smad rang gi rgyud la brtag pa ni rang nyid lha'i phyag rgya chen por
30b2(rgyud): gsal bar byas la/ snang ba thams cad dkyil 'khor la bsdus te/ dkyil 'khor yang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams gtso bo la bsdus te/ gtso bo yang dang po'i sangs rgyas la bsdu/ de yang shes rab 'khor lo la bsdu/ de yang zla ba la de yang a la bsdu/ a yang nam mkha'i khams su 'phel te/ a A i I u U/ e ai
30b3(rgyud): o au i aHhUM oM hrIHaHde rnams su gyur te/ skar ma lta bur gsal ba dang / de rnams kyang gcig la gcig thim ste/ stong pa chen po yi ge lngar gnas pa dang / de'i ngang las stong pa chen po yi ge brgyar langs pa dang / de'i ngang las yi ge'i phreng ba bcu drug tu gyur te gnas/ de'i ngang las
30b4(rgyud): brgyad du gnas/ de'i ngang las yi ge bzhir gyur te gnas pa las/ bdag gi lus sgyu ma lta bur langs te 'khor lo bzhi dran par byas la/ spyi bor oM dkar po kha thur du 'phyang ba dang mgrin par hrIHdmar po kha gyen du gdengs pa dang / snying gar hUM sngon po mgo thur du 'dzag pa dang /
30b5(rgyud): lte bar a dkar po thig le dmar po 'od zer gyen du 'phro ba la bltas la/ a dkar po de las 'od zer rno la myur ba/ drag la grims pa/ phra zhing ring ba cig langs pas khrag gi thig le la 'od zer phog pa dang / thig le las 'od zer phra la ring ba/ rno la myur ba/ dmar la dang ba/
30b6(rgyud): drang la gsal ba cig spyi bo'i oM gyi thig le dkar po la reg par gsal ba dang / oM de las yi ge brgya ba'i tshul du byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i rang bzhin thig le dkar po'i tshul du khu 'phang lta bu dkar tsa ra ra 'bab par bsams la rang gi khrag gi thig le la phog pa dang lus thams cad bde bas rgyas
30b7(rgyud): te shin tu bde bas gang bar gyur pa dang / de la sems gtad pa ni bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/ /zhes bya'o/ /de yang stong pa nyid du shes par byas nas bde stong dbyer med du bsgom mo/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/ /zhes pa dang / thig le
31a1(rgyud): stong pa yi ge brgya/ /zhes bya ste/ de lta bu'i ngang las stong pa 'od gsal chos kyi skur thim pa ni mnyam gzhag gi tshe rnam rtog gi dba' rlabs kyis kyang bskyod pa med par nam mkha' la sprin dengs pa'am/ mar me la rlung gis ma bskyod pa'am rgya mtsho dang ba la rlung gis ma bskyod pa
31a2(rgyud): bzhin du zhe 'dod thams cad dang bral ba/ stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa/ 'od gsal chos kyi sku la tsen ne yer re wa re khyug ge ldem me mer re ha re phyal le/ yid la mi byed thom me/ yor re sim me ting nge mugs se thibs se/ yid la mi byed spros bral mi rtog pa gang yin pa de 'di'o snyam pa med pa
31a3(rgyud): lta bu mi 'gyur ba so ma rang thag lhug pa lta bu yin la/ sems gsal la rtog pa med pa 'di'o snyam pa dang bral ba'o/ /gnyis 'dzin dang gnyis 'dzin ma yin pa'i shes pa gang dang yang bral ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/ /de
31a4(rgyud): lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na ting nge 'dzin brgya la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /rjes thob kyi shes pa la ni stong pa chen po yi ge lngar gyur pa dang / de'i ngang las stong pa chen po yi ge brgyar langs pa dang / de'i ngang las
31a5(rgyud): yi ge'i phreng ba bcu drug tu 'gyur te/ gnas pa las ni bar snang gi khams su A li kA li'i phreng bar bltas la/ de la sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul par bya'o/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang
31a6(rgyud): dag par brjod pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i rim pa'i man ngag rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@/ /'jam dpal dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs// @#/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal
31a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye ba mi lus thob pa rnams/ /mi lus thob pa shin tu dka'/ /de bas dam chos rnyed par dka'/ /des na sgrub la brtson par bya/ /sang tsam 'chi'am sus shes na/ /da lta nyid du bsnun te bya/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /
31b1(rgyud): skad cig tsam gyis lha ru dmigs/ /snying ga'i muM las 'od zer 'phros/ /bla ma dang ni yi dam lha/ /mdun du bsam par byas pa las/ /dngos po kun gyis phyag byas pas/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod/ /sdig pa bshags dang rjes yi rang / /skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed bya/ /dge
31b2(rgyud): ba bsngo dang gshegs su gsol/ /de dag yid kyis bya bar bshad/ /de nas tshad med bzhi bsgoms la/ /stong pa nyid la goms par bya/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma kou0f85haM/ stong nyid brtan par bya ba'o/ /de nas muM dang ut+pal las/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' b
31b3(rgyud): sam/ /sku mdog gser mdog ldem bag can/ /rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang / /snyan cha gdu bu dpung rgyan dang / /'og bag dang ni zhabs gdub dang / /rin chen rnams kyis mdzes par brgyan/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhin du bzhugs/ /g.yas na ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /g.yon ni
31b4(rgyud): chos 'chad phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol ba la/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pa bya/ /gnyis su med par bdag la bstim/ /mi phyed pa ru rgyas par bsgom/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /de nas ting 'dzin sems dpa' ste/ /pad+ma'i gdan la
31b5(rgyud): rab bzhugs pa/ /yi ge drug gis bskor ba ste/ /oM wA gI shwa ri muM/ /dmigs pa gtad la bzlas pa bya/ /skyo zhing gtong bar 'dod pa na/ /spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang / /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /rnam pa kun dang dus kun du/ /lha ru gsal bas 'grub
31b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya/ /dkar nag dmar dang ser dang ljang / /gsal ba dag tu dmigs pa las/ /thugs kar yi ge lnga bkod de/ /'od zer 'phros pas dgug par bya/ /phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod/ /mtshan gyi bstod pa dag bya'o/ /yang na mdun
31b7(rgyud): du dmigs par bya/ /bstod pa rang bzhin med par bsam/ /bstod pa zin nas gshegs su gsol/ /de nas mtshan med bsgom pa la/ /tha ma nas bsdu dang por bsdu/ /bdag bsdu ye shes sems dpa' la/ /ye shes sems dpa' a la bsdu/ /de yang rang bzhin dmigs med de/ /
32a1(rgyud): de la brtan pa thob pa ni/ /chos sku skye med thob ces bya/ /tshigs bcad bcu drug ldan pa 'di/ /ye shes zhal mthong gnyis med rtogs/ /'jam mgon sgrub thabs 'di brtsams te/ /mkhas rnams gus par blang bar bgyi/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /
32a2(rgyud): bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ /snod bcud sgrib pa byang nas su/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes
32a3(rgyud): rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi sU tra pi tri tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes
32a4(rgyud): lus can gtsug gi nor bus mtshan/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas gzugs gnas kun la khyab/ /lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog /sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te/ /mtshan brjod bdud rtsi gsang spyod rtogs dka' ba/ /bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar
32a5(rgyud): mi nus kyang / /dad pas phyogs bzung thigs par nor bu cig /lung dang man ngag dag la brten nas bshad/ /theg mchog rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa/ /dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni/ /slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis/ /theg pa sna tshogs
32a6(rgyud): thabs tshul gyis/ /dpag bsam shing chen phyogs 'di brtsam/ /ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gcig pu sgrub/ /mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga'i rim pa ste/ de la dang po sgrub pa po rigs dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yon tan las/ gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin zhes pas
32a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang dbang thob pa ston to/ /gzhan yang / gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/ /zhes pa dang / bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /ces pas sgrub pa po snod du rung bar ston to/ /yon tan las ri dang klung nags tshal tshang tshing nang na 'dug
32b1(rgyud): kyang rung zhes pas gnas rigs dang mthun pa'am yid dga' ba ston to/ /bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa/ /zhes pas/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa ston to/ /dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa/ /zhes pa sgrub pa po'i rdzas don rab tu gnas par bya ba dang / maN+Dal
32b2(rgyud): gsum dang / me tog dang dri dang byug pa dang / mchod pa'i khyad par mang po dang / glod gdan dang / yo byad kyi tshogs bya ba'i rim pa ston to/ /yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang / gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa hUM gis
32b3(rgyud): mtshan pa las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbyug to dang sdigs mdzub byed pa/ sbrul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la/ ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ ces pas mig tu ma dang Ta bkod de/ 'od zer gyis rdo rje'i rab dang dra ba bya bar bstan to/ /
32b4(rgyud): snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /ces pa dang / phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa/ /zhes pas sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed pa bstan to/ /gnyis med gnyis su med par ston/ /zhes pa dang / a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
32b5(rgyud): ces pas thogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'am snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya ba bstan to/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /ces pa dang / mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os/ /bkur 'os rjed
32b6(rgyud): par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab/ /ces pas 'di ston to/ /bdag gi snying gar a 'am hUM bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum dang / rje btsun 'jam dpal dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas bdag gis bltas te/ lus kyi
32b7(rgyud): bkod pas lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /ces pa dang / dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgrubs la snying ga'i lha mos dbul lo zhes ston to/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso
33a1(rgyud): bo ste/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin/ /zhes pas 'di ston to/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas bdag gi snying ga nas lha mo bzhi spros te gnas rnams su mchod par bya'o/ /de bas na/
33a2(rgyud): dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ /bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs/ /zhes pas bstan to/ /bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas/ /zhes pa nas/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ /zhes pa'i bar dang / byang chub yan lag me tog spos/
33a3(rgyud): zhes bya bas phyi'i lha mo bzhi dang / snying ga nas gong gi tshul du sngags dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su dbul lo/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /zhes pa nas/ dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis gsang ba'i lha mo bzhis mchod par bstan to/ /
33a4(rgyud): oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa/ /rdo rje las kun byed par shog /ces bya ba 'di rkang pa dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed pa'i dus su sgeg mo la sogs pa dang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rkang pa bzhi glur blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang mchog tu
33a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / chags pa la sogs pas dbul te rgyas par ma phye'o zhes bstan to/ /de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de/ yang na ni thams cad kyis bstod par shes par bya'o/ /de nas sdom pa bzung ba'i bar de nyid kyis shes par bya'o/ /byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar
33a6(rgyud): ston par tshad med pa bzhi bsgom zhes so/ /rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad/ /chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med/ /ces pa'i don bsgom pa ni rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod de/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po
33a7(rgyud): stong par bsgom zhes bstan to/ /stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/ /zhes pas pad+ma'i steng na chos kyi 'byung gnas/ de'i mtha' 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du muM dmar skya'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng ba de gyur pa las/
33b1(rgyud): sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/ /'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ /cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa/ /nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /
33b2(rgyud): zur phud lnga ba me tog thod/ /sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ /zhes pa la sogs pa rnams
33b3(rgyud): kyis rje btsun gyi sku sprul pa'i cha lugs su bstan pa yin no/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa/ /zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs bstan pa yin no/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang khro
33b4(rgyud): mo dang lha mo rnams thugs ka nas spro zhes pa'o/ /de nas mdun du pad+ma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang / bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye shes sems dpa' de la bltas la/ dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par bsgom zhes pas
33b5(rgyud): gnyis su med par byas te/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can/ /zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te/ bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang / /zhes
33b6(rgyud): pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la sngags dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs rgyas thams cad sprul lo zhes bstan to/ /de'i don ni 'og nas 'chad do/ /bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /ces pas thams cad sems kyi
33b7(rgyud): sprul par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshan sngags bzlas shing mtshan bklag par bya'o/ /de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la gsang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa gang la la/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
34a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang / yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang
34a2(rgyud): ba dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang / rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang yon tan las/
34a3(rgyud): nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam/ glegs bam du byas pa la kha ton du klog cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed pa ni 'dul ba'i
34a4(rgyud): dbang gi phyir ring por mi thogs pas de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin te/ mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la/ many+dzu shrI d+hIHoM wA gI shwa ri muM/ maN+Da la tsakra hUM/ zhes
34a5(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la/ phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas bdag cag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te/ mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod la yon tan rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan la dpag tu med pa 'byung bar
34a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thungs/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir gyur la/ /dus gsum sangs
34a7(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad/ /'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan gyur nas/ /mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
34b1(rgyud): rgyud le'u khri drug stong pa las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo dang bsres pa/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/
34b2(rgyud): Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti tsak+Shu bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i skam sar
34b3(rgyud): byon/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan la phan pa'i blo mchog gis/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gzugs brnyan rnams/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni/ /bzang zhing dge ba bshad par bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon
34b4(rgyud): blo gros dang ldan pas gtsug lag khang ngam sku gzugs la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan nam glegs bam dang mchod rten la sogs pa rab tu gnas par bya bar 'dod pas/ ri bo'am nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su bsnyen pa rgyas par
34b5(rgyud): byas la/ 'bad pa thams cad kyis bsgom bzlas bya'o/ /de la 'dir gang rab tu gnas pa bya bar 'dod pa de rnams sta gon du bya ste/ bdag tu gzung ba'i bgegs thams cad bskrad do/ /gu gul gyis bdug cing bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga shas cher bya'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'di skad
34b6(rgyud): ces snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ ji ltar dga' ldan gnas mchog na/ /bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa de/ /sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i lhums zhugs ltar/ /deng nub bde gshegs thams cad ni/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'di la ni/ /'jug par shin tu mdzad du gsol/ /'di la sangs rgyas
34b7(rgyud): rtag tu bzhugs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /yon bdag rnams kyi don bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis sbyor ba 'di bgyis na/ /ci 'byor ba yi mchod pa rnams/ /me tog la sogs bzhes su gsol/ /bdag dang yon bdag bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs bcas nas/ /
35a1(rgyud): kun gyis 'di deng byin rlob cing / /'di nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs/ /zhes brjod la/ sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa gang byed pa de gshin rje gshed kyis bsrung zhing / AHhUM oM hrIHa zhes bya bas rgyas btab la gzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
35a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rigs thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba bris la/ der bum pa thams cad bcug la dkyil 'khor de'i byang ngos su khrus kyi khang pa shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba/ gser gyi ka ba bzhi dang mu tig gi chun 'phyang 'phyang ba/ dri zhim po tsan+dan la
35a3(rgyud): sogs pa srog chags las ma byung ba'i dris chag chag btab la/ rin po ches spras shing gcal du bkram pa byas la/ khrus kyi khang pa gang yin pa de nyid rab tu gnas par 'dod pa'i lha rnams gang yin pa spyan drangs la tshul dang mthun par gzhag la/ sku khrus gsol ba ni bkra shis
35a4(rgyud): kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas khrus byas te/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu/ /dag pa yis ni sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye
35a5(rgyud): hUM/ lugs ma yin na dngos su khrus bya/ de las gzhan pa gang yin yang me long gi ngos la sran phye dang / bag phye dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / til mar dang / 'o ma dang / tsan+dan dang / ga pur btab la/ me tog dang bcas te ku sha'i pir gyis bkru
35a6(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /de yang 'di skad du/ ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas/ /lha mdzes lhums zhugs bltams la khrus gsol ltar/ sku gdung ring bsrel dri ma med par byas/ /sprul sku yid 'ong rnams la sku khrus gsol/ /phyogs bcu bdud rtsi dam pa'i char 'bebs
35a7(rgyud): pa/ /rgyal ba dam chos rnams la sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu R+N+'a di pa kro d+ha ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / de nas sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i bum pa lha'i chus bkang la slob dpon gyis bzung nas me long la dri'i thig le lnga dang / me tog gi tshom bu lnga dang bcas pa la 'di skad brjod
35b1(rgyud): de sku khrus gsol ba ni/ gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa/ /gti mug dri ma sbyong byed pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan sku yi sku khrus gsol/ /tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /nga rgyal dri ma sbyong byed pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan
35b2(rgyud): yon tan sku khrus gsol/ /'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /'dod chags dri ma sbyong byed pa'i/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan gsung gi sku khrus gsol/ /'du byed phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /phrag dog dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan phrin
35b3(rgyud): las sku khrus gsol/ /rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'i/ /zhe sdang dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha badzra rat+na pad+ma kar+m+ma a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ de'i rjes la ras gtsang ma dris bskus pas sku phyis te/ rgyal ba'i
35b4(rgyud): sku ni mkha' la zla bzhin gsal/ /sangs rgyas sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang / /'gro ba'i bag chags ma lus bsal bya'i phyir/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis sku phyis pas/ /sems can bag chags ma lus byang gyur cig/ /ni rmA kA ya shud+d+hou0f85haM zhes pas sku phyis la/ rigs dang mthun pa'i na bza' r
35b5(rgyud): nams kyang dbul zhing bkra shis kyang brjod do/ /oM dI pa na pa ye swA hA/ dris bsgo'o/ /oM gan+d+hA ya swA hA/ zhes pas na bza' dbul/ oM A b+hA ra Ni pi b+hU Sh+'a ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyan dbul te/ 'gro kun yun du bskyang ba'i phyir/ /lha yin bza'
35b6(rgyud): dam pa ni/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /zhes pa dang / byang chub yan lag rgyan gyur cing / /'gro bas bsod nams thob bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sras la rgyan mchog dbul/ /ce bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /zhes pas rgyan gdags
35b7(rgyud): so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bdag nyid dkyil 'khor sgrub ste/ bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo la mchod pa rdzogs pa'i rjes la rab gnas kyi lha shin tu gsal bar byas te/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo bar snang la bsdus te/ spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstims te dbang
36a1(rgyud): bskur rgyas btab la/ mchod pa shin tu rgyas par dbul ba ni dngos su 'byor ba'i mchod pa lnga dang / yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang sgra dang rol mo'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /
36a2(rgyud): de ltar legs par mchod cing sbyin sreg gi las kyang brtsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gtor ma rgya chen po yang bshams la gzhag go/ /de ltar ye shes sems dpa' bcug la nang bar nyi ma shar kar spyan dbye bar bya ste/ bdag nyid rnam snang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas des gser las
36a3(rgyud): byas pa'i thur ma thogs la/ rgyal ba mkha' la byon pa'i thugs rje can/ /sangs rgyas spyan la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang / /sems can rnams kyi bag chags sbyang slad du/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi spyan ni dbye bar bgyi/ /sems can ldongs pa thams cad bsal gyur cig /oM
36a4(rgyud): nirmA kA ya badzra tsak+Shu pra be+e sha bi shod+ha na swA hA/ gser gyi snyan brud pa thogs la/ rgyal ba'i snyan la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang / /sems can thos pas phongs gyur te/ /rgyal ba chos kyi rnga brdungs ltar/ /de bzhin sems can kun don phyir/ /bde gshegs snyan ni dbye
36a5(rgyud): bar bgyi/ /chos kyi sgra rnams thos gyur cig /oM nirmA kA ya ri bya kaR+Na ye swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho u0f85haM/ gser gyi tsher gzungs thogs la/ /rgyal ba'i shangs la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang / /'gro ba'i sems can don gyi phyir/ /zag bcas phung po'i dri ma spangs nas ni/ /rnam par dag p
36a6(rgyud): a dri med skyed byed ltar/ /rgyal ba'i shangs ni bdag gis dbye bar bgyi/ /zag med dri med dam pa tshor gyur cig /oM nirmA kA ya d+ha bya nA sa ye swA hA/ /rin po che'i thur ma thogs la/ /'gro ba chos kyis phongs pa la/ /dam chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir/ /chos
36a7(rgyud): kyi ro ldan dag pa yis/ /'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar/ /ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas rnams/ /dbul phyir zhal ni dbye bar bgyi/ /oM nirmA kA ya id ni bya mu kha ye swA hA/ de nas rab byung gi gzugs yin na spu gri thogs la/ ji ltar rang byung mchod rten du/ /
36b1(rgyud): ston pas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar/ /'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir/ /khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bgyi/ /snam sbyar dang bla gos gsol nas/ /ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ /rgyal ba'i sku la na bza' gsol ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro ba rnams la sman pa'i phyir/ /ngo tsha
36b2(rgyud): khrel yod gos mchog gsol bar bgyi/ /oM nirmA kA ya to byol tra pra na ye swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya zhing dbul lo/ /oM u pa su kA sa pa ri srA ba Na ye swA hA/ zhes pas chu tshags dang lhung bzed la sogs pa dbul lo/ /de nas thugs kar rdo rje dris bsgos pa bzung la/ mtshan dang
36b3(rgyud): dpe byad la sogs pa bskyed de/ dung dang dpal be'u g.yung drung 'khyil pa 'di/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis rnam brgyan pa/ /rgyal ba'i thugs la rnam par rgyal gyur cig /oM nirmA kA ya triM shad ma hA pu ru Sha lak+Sha Na sho d+ha a nu byany+dza ye swA hA/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de 'khor
36b4(rgyud): los sgyur ba'i cha byad yin na de ltar ma yin te/ dung dang so mangs dang ral gri la sogs pa dbul lo/ /dpal be'u la sogs pas brgyan pa ni shes par bya'o/ /glegs bam la rab tu gnas par byed pa yin na/ rdo rje chos kyi ngo bo sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas nges par a las bskyed la ye shes
36b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bcug ste dbang bskur rgyas btab nas glegs bam du bya'o/ /de la na bza' dbul ba ni/ /byang chub yan lag rnam dag pa'i/ /dam chos gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /na bza' dri ma med pa 'di/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bgyi/ /oM d+harma d+he b+h+ya pra ta swA hA/ zhes bya bas
36b6(rgyud): dbul/ de'i rjes la rdo rje thag pa gang yin pa des bsdams te/ mtshal lam sin d+hu ra'i rgya rim pa bdun du btab la/ oM badzra mu dra ban+d+ha ya a d+hi tiSh+Tha swA hA/ zhes brjod do/ /rab tu gnas pa de mchod rten yin na bde bar gshegs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su rdzogs par byas la ye shes
36b7(rgyud): sems dpa' yang nges par bcug nas dbang bskur rgyas btab nas mchod de bkra shis brjod la de rnams las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchod rten du dmigs la/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ zhes pas sa dkar byug /oM ar ma ye swA hA/ zhes pas bre gzugs/ /
37a1(rgyud): oM tsakra brta na ye swA hA/ zhes pas 'khor lo gzugs so/ /oM ts+tshA tra ye swA hA/ zhes pas gdugs dbul lo/ /oM ku bi ra d+hA dza ye swA hA/ zhes pas rgyal mtshan gzugs/ /oM pA ta ka ye swA hA/ zhes pas ba dan gdags/ oM pa Tu dA ma laM pa ye swA hA/ zhes
37a2(rgyud): pas dar dpyangs gdags/ oM puSh+pa mA la ye swA hA/ zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba gdags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yin na khab dang snyung bu dang so mangs dbul/ 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la bslab bya zhes/ /ji ltar thugs
37a3(rgyud): dam rgya che bzhes pa bzhin/ /mkho ba'i yo byad rnams kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /oM u pa su ka la sa pa ri skA ra ye swA hA/ de nas thams cad thun mong du yang mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod la/ gdugs gser gyi yu ba can la sogs pas mchod de/ 'byor pa dang ldan na sbyin sreg kyang
37a4(rgyud): rgyas par bya'o/ /ma 'byor na tsA ru dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol te/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun/ /rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas/ /gang dag cho ga ma
37a5(rgyud): tshang ba/ /de dag bzod par mdzad du gsol/ /kun du zhi dang rgyas pa yi/ /yon bdag ched la rab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gis/ /ji srid bskal pa 'jig bar du/ /sangs
37a6(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi sku gzugs la/ /de srid bcom ldan bsrung bar mdzod/ /thugs bzang yid las byung ba yi/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa la/ /bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas/ /rab gnas de bas gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra muH/ de nas dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bcug nas rab
37a7(rgyud): gnas kyi ye shes sems dpa' brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ slob dpon dang yon bdag gnyis kas gdan khri la 'jus la me tog gi phreng ba dbul te/ de srid me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gi bskal pas 'jig par du/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par
37b1(rgyud): mdzod/ /ces brjod la/ phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa dbul zhing / /sprul sku bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas chos skyong gi srung ma'am phyogs skyong ngam/ ma hA kA la'am/ yang na gang yang rung ba la gtor ma rgya chen po dbul zhing / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sku gzugs
37b2(rgyud): bsrung ba'i las bcol bar bya'o/ /'gro ba sems can don slad du/ /bde gshegs rnams ni bzhugs bgyid bar/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /sprul sku gzugs brnyan mthong bar mdzod/ /ces brjod do/ /gzhan yang yul phyogs de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin pho mo la yang
37b3(rgyud): gtor ma btang la ched cher gtad do/ /gnas brtan dang khyim pa'i gtso bo rnams la yang snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sprul pa'i sku 'di yin gyis/ khyod kyis ma nyams par srungs shig ces brjod la/ sku'am glegs bam mam mchod rten gang yin pa de na bza' gsol te 'gro ba rnams la bstan to/ /
37b4(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i sgrib pa ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yon bdag gang yin pa des glu gar bya zhing bkra shis brjod la sngags kyis btab pa'i zhal zas lhag ma rnams la longs spyod do/ /rab gnas dman pa mi shis phyir/ /rab gnas bzang po 'di byas pas/ /
37b5(rgyud): byas pa gang des 'gro ba kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis sdig byang nas/ /sprul pa'i sku yi zhal mthong shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po
37b6(rgyud): su badzra dang / /bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti tsakra ma ra mA ra ya man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor los gsad pa/ 'jam dpal
37b7(rgyud): gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug po/ /bco brgyad spyan dmar gnyis kyis mdzes/ /gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal te/ /'jam dpal mgon gyis mi 'dul tshe/ /ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor lo brtsam/ /de la dur
38a1(rgyud): khrod chen po rab 'jigs par/ /ma rungs 'dul ba'i blon mchog gis/ /dpal ldan 'byor pa drug rdzas bsog /srid pa'i ri bo pham byas te/ /sems can ngan song rnam par sbyangs/ /don yod 'gro ba'i don byas te/ /gtso bo dkon mchog lhur blang zhing / /bla ma phyag
38a2(rgyud): byar 'os pa la/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni 'bad de bsags/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags rnam spangs te/ /stong pa nyid dga' stong ba'i blos/ /yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag mtha' ste yi ge bral/ /shes rab chen po'i skad cig gis/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid med bya/ /'on
38a3(rgyud): kyang snang ba ma bkag pas/ /chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la/ /ye shes skar ma lam me pa/ /rang sems nyams su myong ba de/ /dgag tu btub pa ma yin pas/ /rang rig sems kyi cho 'phrul du/ /yi ge'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes/ /'od kyi phung po'i 'phro 'du yis/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu
38a4(rgyud): gcig po/ /rim pa bzhi yis dkyil 'khor brtsegs/ /'byung ba 'dus pa'i 'bras bu la/ /mthun 'jug spyod yul bya ba'i phyir/ /ri rab gzhal yas khang yang brtsegs/ /'khor lo rtsibs drug 'bar ba ste/ /dbus su glang chen bsnol ba'i khri/ /nyi zla pad+ma mdangs bskyed de/ /rang
38a5(rgyud): rig sems kyi cho 'phrul 'dus/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon byang chub/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs bcom ldan 'das/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal mnga' ba/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis spras pa ni/ /dung dang kun de'i 'od 'phro ba/ /nyi ma'i snying po'am gser gyi
38a6(rgyud): mdog / phyag bzhi ba la zhi ba'i sku/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu bsams/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo dang / /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /zla ba a yi 'phro 'du yis/ /'og min gnas mchog dam pa nas/ /rnam snang chen po la sogs pa'i/ /dkyil
38a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po drug byon te/ /thugs ka'i zla steng bzhugs pa la/ /bkur sti rim gros mnyes par bya/ /shes rab 'khor lo la blo gtad/ /ye shes phreng sngags bzlas pa brtsam/ /ye shes lnga yi sgo nas bstod/ /gal te zhi bas ma 'dul zhing / /de rnams gzhi dang bcas pa kun/ /chos kyi
38b1(rgyud): dbyings su thim 'gyur te/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa'i/ /ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /chos kyi dbyings las drag por bzhengs/ /yi ge drug po ye shes sgras/ /'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba/ /rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrog /nam mkha'i mtha' yas sgra sgrogs pas/ /hUM las drag
38b2(rgyud): por skyes pa ni/ /gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/ /spyan dmar bco brgyad phyag bcu gnyis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje dang / /pad+ma rin chen rgya gram bsnams/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na legs par bsnams/ /mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa/ /g.yon
38b3(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya dang po ni/ /rdo rje ral gri ma lus gcod/ /g.yon pa'i phyag rgya pha rol bsdigs/ /lhag pa'i phyag rgya gzhan rnams na/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /ha la ha la dug ltar bzhad/ /keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /ral pa gyen brdzes thod phreng la/ /sangs rgyas
38b4(rgyud): lnga yi cod pan 'dzin/ /sprul dang thod rlon phreng bas klubs/ /dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar ba 'phro/ /'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po ni/ /rngam pa chen por bdag nyid gyur/ /thugs kar nyi ma'i steng na hUM/ /de yi byin rlabs ya mtshan ni/ /oM a ra pa tsa na ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM pradz+nyA
38b5(rgyud): dz+nyA na mUrta ye ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM duHkha ts+tshe da ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM wA gI shwa ra ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM hUM hUM sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUrti/ bA gI shwa ri ma hA pA tsa sarba d+harmA ga ga na/ a ma la su ba
38b6(rgyud): ri shud+d+ha d+harmA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+h+ra hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po hUM las byung / /'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs drug las/ /rim pa 'di ltar khros pas gnas/ /mnar med gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis
38b7(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dzin/ /zhe sdang gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dod chags gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma 'dzin/ /nga rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rin chen 'dzin/ phrag dog gshin rje gshed po ni/ /
39a1(rgyud): zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khor lo 'dzin/ /g.yon pas kun kyang 'khor lo bskor/ /sprul dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /dus mtha'i me dpung nang na bzhugs/ /brkyang bskum zhabs kyis gshin rje brdzis/ /re re'i sku la khro bo'i tshogs/ /khro gnyer rim par ldan la
39a2(rgyud): sogs/ /grangs med mtha' yas pa yis bskor/ /lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa/ /de ltar gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ye shes khro bo nye bar bsdu/ /hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM/ hUM badzra kro d+ha sa pa ri wA re badzra sa man+ta e h+ye hi dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams/
39a3(rgyud): khro bor byon nas nye bar byon/ /rgyal ba mchod pas mnyes byas te/ /bdag dang gnyis su med par bzhugs/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos gzi mdangs bskyed/ /'jam dpal mtshan ni khros pas brjod/ /gsang sngags rgyal po khros pas bzlas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo'i sku/ /dbye
39a4(rgyud): ba dpag med skye ba yis/ /khams gsum khro bos bkang byas te/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dmag tshogs kyis/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byas te/ /gsad cing mnan pa kho nar zad/ /sprul pa nye bar bsdu bya ste/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sogs kyis bstod/ /de ltar brtan pa stobs su 'gyur/ /gal te
39a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin mi gsal na/ /dmigs pa rtse gcig cho ga bya/ /dus mtha'i dgra bo gsad pa ni/ /ma rungs 'dul ba'i sems kyis su/ /dur khrod thod pa mi srun gshags/ /nang du gshin rje'i rgyal po bri/ /kha gdangs par ni shin tu gsal/ /'og ma gshin rje'i khang par bcad/ /ya gnag
39a6(rgyud): bcu bdun mun pa'i smag / sgo med sgo nga lta bu'i nang / /yid kyis gzugs brnyan rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /dgra bo'i rnam shes rlung 'dra ba/ /srog dang 'grogs te chud gyur na/ /slar ni thon pa'i skal med do/ /gshin rjes zin pas mi 'chor ro/ /gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i snying gi
39a7(rgyud): dkyil/ /srog pa rtsa yi rang bzhin las/ /ngan sngags byad kyi 'khor lo bca'/ /rtsibs drug la sogs gsang sngags bcas/ /kun la 'chi rkyen spel te bri'o/ /oM a ra pa tsa sha trUM che ge mo mA ra ya/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ya/ sha trUM mA ra ya/ oM duHkhats+tshe da sha trUM mA ra ya/
39b1(rgyud): oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na sha trUM mA ra ya/ oM bA gI shwa ra sha trU mA ra ya/ oM dz+nyA na kA ya sha trUM mA ra ya/ oM hUM hUM hUM sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn dz+nya na mUrti bA gI shwa ra ma hA pA tsa sarba d+har+m+ma ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM/ sha trU mA ra ya hUM phaT ces/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di
39b2(rgyud): dran pas/ gang dmigs gdug pa nye bar 'jig/ /rang rgyud gnas nas gshin rje bkug /thod pa rang byung de la bstim/ /gdug pa'i gnas nas dgra bo dgug /mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan de la bstim/ /bdag nyid snying ga'i sngags 'od kyis/ /dgra bo'i snying ga'i 'khor lo bskor/ /lte ba
39b3(rgyud): 'khor zhing rtsibs kyis gcod/ /gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i tshe srog phral/ /lung stong me mar me ltar 'gyur/ /gzugs de 'khor los dum bur gtub/ /drag po'i gtor mar bcug byas te/ /thod nang gshin rje de la sbyin/ /chos skyong srung mar bsgo bya ste/ /rang gi gnas su ci bder btang / /gtor
39b4(rgyud): ma dag kyang lho phyogs bskyal/ /de nas rang nyid brtan byas te/ /cho ga ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /spyi dang khyad par rim pa yis/ /bsdus rgyas bye brag shes par bya/ /tha ma'i rgyud drag ngang thung che/ /'gro ba log lta 'khrul gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas sgrub la bar gcod cing / /byang chub tshe srog 'phrog
39b5(rgyud): byed la/ /'khor lo 'di yis gcod gyur cig /de yi nus pa bskyed nas ni/ /bdud dgra thams cad pham byas nas/ /phas kyi rgol ba nyer zhi ste/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i ngan sngags kyi byad kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal
39b6(rgyud): bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha na bi d+hi maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam
39b7(rgyud): dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sdig pa sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa'i dra ba rnam bcom nas/ /ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed de/ /sems can ngan song rnam sbyong ba'i/ /'jam dbyangs de la gus btud
40a1(rgyud): nas/ /ma rig 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i/ /phan pa'i cho ga bzang po zhig/ /gzhan gyi don du bri bar bya/ /de la sems can rnams ni gti mug gi mun khung du ye shes kyi snang ba ma shar ba'i dbang gis nying sha nying gis za zhing nying
40a2(rgyud): srog nying gis gcod pa las de'i rnam par smin pa tshe 'pho ba lta bu yang nas yang du 'byung ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu ngan song rnams su smin pa rnams la re zhig phan pa'i sems kyis ma rig pa'i rgya dral te/ nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa las bkrol nas yang dag pa'i thar pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
40a3(rgyud): lam bstan te/ /tshe 'phos pa lta bu de yang de'i gzugs sam rus sam ming ngam/ stod g.yogs la sogs pa sta gon byas la/ dang po kho nar zhe sdang gi gnyen po mi bskyod pa'i bsnyen pa byas la/ rang nyid mi bskyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi bskor ba'i snying ga'i zla ba'i rdo rje dang phreng sngags kyi 'od
40a4(rgyud): zer gyis byin rlabs dang / rang mi bskyod pa rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyi mtshan brjod pa'i byin rlabs las sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku bye ba dpag tu med pa sems can dmyal ba'i gnas su skye na/ sems can dmyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis kyang skad cig gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs nas/
40a5(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba de dag gi las kyi khams zad par byas nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho de las bton te/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa gtan spangs nas sems can de'i yid kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi thugs rig pa lam mtshon pa'i a dkar po
40a6(rgyud): thung ngu lta bur byas te/ sems can de'i gzugs kyi phung po la yid gnas par byas nas/ de dag gi sngar gyi gzugs de'i sems dang mthun par bcug la de la bdag nyid gtso bo dang lha rnams kyi thugs ka'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis de'i bag chags dag par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bum
40a7(rgyud): pa'i chus kyang dri ma bkru ba'i phyir ye shes sems dpa'i phreng sngags dang / rig sngags dang / sarba nA ra dang / sarba pA paM/ sarba kar+m+ma A pa ra Na bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes pas bkru'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/
40b1(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba las grol bar byas te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de dang rjes su mthun pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha nye bar byas la/ ser sna'i gnyen po rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ yi dags kyi gnas ngan las bsgral te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas yang de dang
40b2(rgyud): rjes su mthun pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo skal pa dang ldan pa de byol song gi gnas nas thar bar bya ba'i phyir gti mug gi gnyen por rnam par snang mdzad kyis sbyang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan brjod nas rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas yang de
40b3(rgyud): dang rjes su mthun par phrag dog gi gnyen por don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bris te/ lha ma yin gyi gnas nas thar bar byas la rigs kyi bu de la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la 'dod chags kyi gnyen po snang ba mtha' yas kyis sbyang ste/ lha rnams kyi gnas las thar par byas nas tshe
40b4(rgyud): 'das pa rigs kyi bu de pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la dug gsum cha mnyam pa'i gnyen pos sbyang ste/ tshe las 'das pa mi'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur te nyon mongs pa de las thar bar bya'o/ /
40b5(rgyud): de ltar nyon mongs pa lnga dang bral nas khams gsum gyi 'gro ba rigs drug gi gnas nas thar ba de rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ dbang rnams yang dag par bskur nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la rigs nges pa can du bya'o/ /de ltar na 'di gzhan gyi don du
40b6(rgyud): gsungs pa'i cho ga yin no/ /sems can ngan song rnam sbyong ba/ /cho ga myur du byas pa las/ /bsags pa'i dge bas 'gro ba kun/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal nas/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral te/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal
40b7(rgyud): gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i tshe 'phos pa la phan pa'i bdun tshigs kyi cho ga / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
41a1(rgyud): many+dzu shrI nA ma saM gI ti bi d+hi ho ma pA baM sho d+ha ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sdig pa sbyong ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes dri ma sel mdzad cing / /shes rab
41a2(rgyud): ye shes spyan 'byed pa'i/ /'jam dbyangs de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sems can ngan song rnam sbyong ba'i/ /cho ga tshe 'das la phan pa/ /gzhan gyi don du bshad par bya/ /de la 'dir gza' dang skar ma bzang po bkra shis pa'i nyi ma la tshul dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'brel pa'am ma 'brel
41a3(rgyud): kyang rung ste/ phyogs dang mthun pa'i gnas bzang por sa bslang ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sa'i rgyar khru bcu drug pa la gru bzhir byas te/ dbus su de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis zlum por bskor la khru gang gyen du mtho ba dang / de'i kha khyer yang de'i tshad du byas la/ de nas nang du khru phyed kyi bar du zabs su
41a4(rgyud): rgyar chud par byas la nang gi zabs su yang khru gang thab khung bya'o/ /de la rdo rje dkar po dang / 'khor lo dkar po dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po che ser po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / rgya gram ljang gus bskor bar bya'o/ /de la tsan+dan dang rgya shug la sogs pa dug gi rgyu
