60b3(rgyud): 'dren pa che/ /rdo rje 'gugs byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /rdo rje 'dren byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa che/ /rdo rje sdom byed khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa rnam rgyal zhags/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa khyod la 'dud/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /snying
60b4(rgyud): rje chen po blo yi mchog / shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/ /ye shes cha grub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /stong pa nyid kyi sgor gnas pa/ /bag la nyal ba byang sems ldan/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan la 'dud/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan/ /shugs chen
60b5(rgyud): mgyogs pa chen po ste/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /stobs bcu rdzu 'phrul bzhir ldan pa'i/ /goms shugs ye shes bzhir grags pa/ /stobs po che la bdud dpung 'joms/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud/ /srid pa'i
60b6(rgyud): ri bo chen po 'joms/ /mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'joms/ /drag po chen po mun pa 'joms/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po/ /phung po lnga dag lha chen 'dul/ /mi shes ri 'joms sra ba po/ /mya ngan kun sel drag po ste/ /che bas che ba khyod la 'dud/ /mgon po rigs mchog
60b7(rgyud): chen po che/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /'khor ba mya ngan skyob pa'i mchog /theg pa tshul mchog lam gnas pa'i/ /phyag rgya mchog tu grub byed pa'i/ /pha rol sa bcu gtso la 'dud/ /de ltar
61a1(rgyud): bstod par byed pa de'i/ /'khor lo 'dus pa'i gtso mchog grub/ /de dag mchog gi rgyal po'i sbyor ba'i 'khor lo dang po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rim pa 'dir ldan pas/ /thams cad nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /ma lus mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ /phyag lngas tshom bu lnga
61a2(rgyud): mnyes bya/ /de ltar mnyes byas 'og tu ni/ /yes shes sems dpa' mngon 'dod pas/ /sems can yongs bsgral bsam pa dang / /byang chub dam par smon par bya/ /de nas 'di dag tshig tu brjod/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ji tsam du ni gzung nas su/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su
61a3(rgyud): gsol/ /nam zhig byang chub snying po la/ /yongs su gnas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]bar dag tu/ /bdag gis byang chub mchog gi sems/ /ma lus par ni bskyed par bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i/ /dam pa bdag thugs bskyed par bgyi/ /
61a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung
61a5(rgyud): bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yis/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing du dus drug tu/ /sbyin
61a6(rgyud): pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i
61a7(rgyud): las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung la/ /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung rdu zhing / /
61b1(rgyud): sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de ltar sdom pa 'dzin byed pa/ /kun rdzogs rim par dbang bskur nas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par/ /spyi gtsug don dam lha bsnyen bya/ /de nas nam mkha'i 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /ma lus bdag la bsdu bar bya/ /bdag gi snying ga'i dkyil nyid
61b2(rgyud): du/ /thim pa'i ye shes me 'bar te/ /rnam smin phung po bsregs byas nas/ /slar sos ye shes lus su bya/ /de nas byang chub lnga bsgom pa/ /ji ltar yongs su dag pa yi/ /me long gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yul dang dngos bo'i rig rnams kun/ /ma lus so sor snang ba
61b3(rgyud): bzhin/ /thams cad yongs su dag pa yi/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes la/ /'dris par de la blta bar bya/ /de nas snying rje bskyed bya ba/ /sems can rnams ni mgon skyabs bral/ /dpung gnyen med cing sdug bsngal ba/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi/ /sems can rnams kyi
61b4(rgyud): don dag tu/ /thams cad sdug bsngal las bsgral bsam/ /ji ltar chos rnams stong pa dang / /mnyam pa nyid du rab sbyor bas/ /bdag kyang stong pa bdag med cing / /sems can rnams kyang de 'dra bar/ /chos rnams kun kyang rab tu shes/ /chos la dmigs pa'i snyeng rje yang / /
61b5(rgyud): bdag med rang bzhin rig pa las/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed par bya/ /de nas sngags 'di ched du brjod/ /o a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM/ Ar+ya nuta pan+da twA ta/ sngags 'di tshig tu brjod byas nas/ /sngags pas sngags don bsgoms nas su/ /lhan cig dmigs pa med pa
61b6(rgyud): dang / /gnyis med chos la rab gzung phyir/ /de nyid yul du bya ba'i phyir/ /chos bdag med pa bsgom par bya/ /dmigs med snying rje so sor brtag /de nas snying rje'i rjes 'gro ba/ /gzung 'dzin kun dang yongs bral ba'i/ /ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba'i/ /yan lag kun
61b7(rgyud): dang yongs bral ba'i/ /rang bzhin yongs su dag pa yi/ /chos dbyings rgyu mthun dngos bral don/ /stong nyid ngang la de gnas nas/ /chos dbyings ye shes bsgom par bya/ /de ltar sems can thams cad kyi/ /don byed bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon gyi smon lam dbang thob cing / /sems
62a1(rgyud): kyi rgyun gyi dbang sgyur bas/ /sems can don ni rab rdzogs phyir/ /khams gsum 'byung gnas khyad par gyis/ /don dam kun rdzob mya ngan 'das/ /nan tan ye shes mngon gsal bya/ /de ltar rnam lnga'i ngo bo yi/ /snying rje nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis/ /thams cad rang bzhin med
62a2(rgyud): shes nas/ /'gro ba'i don la 'jug brtson bya/ /de dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de la dngos 'byung gzugs/ /'phrul pa'i tshul kyis nam mkha' las/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba'i/ /skar ma'i tshogs ni rab bsgoms te/ /de las byung ba'i khro phreng tshogs/ /sngon po'i
62a3(rgyud): mdog can 'od zer ni/ /brgya phrag stong gis yongs bskor ba'i/ /hUM zhes grags pa bsgom par bya/ /de las 'od zer rab byung bas/ /'od kyi rtse lnga sangs rgyas sogs/ /rdul snyed grangs ni rab sprul nas/ /sprul pa de dag thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rab gshegs te/ /sems can
62a4(rgyud): khams rnams dag byas shing / /byang chub sems ni rab bskyed dang / /sdom pa gzung dang rjes yi rang / /gsol btab bsgul ba sogs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rab bstan te/ /phyir la hU~M der 'du byas nas/ /hU~M de nyid la zhugs par bsam/ /de las yongs 'gyur kha dog ni/ /
62a5(rgyud): sngon po la sogs drug ldan zhing / /de yi 'od kyis zhing khams drug /khyab par byas nas 'bar ba yis/ /bdud 'jigs mi thub zhal drug pa/ /ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga bsgom/ /ye shes rdo rje'i bum nang du/ /dkar po'i yi ge b+h+rAM bsams te/ /de las gyur pas rin po che'i/ /stong gsum tsam gyi mchod rten
62a6(rgyud): bsgom/ /de nang hrIHyi yi ge las/ /gru gsum chos 'byung bsam par bya/ /de nang yi ge rdzogs pa las/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de las yang ni b+hUM las ni/ /rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas rnam par bsgom/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra rnam bzhis rnam brgyan cing / /dril bu
62a7(rgyud): dar dang 'phan la sogs/ /me tog phreng dang rnga yab klubs/ /grwa rnams dang ni thams cad dang / /sgo rnams dang ni khyams su yang / /rdo rje rin chen rnams dang ni/ /zla gam chun 'phyang rnams kyis brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed bkod pa la/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa'o/ /rdul tshon kha dog rnam
62b1(rgyud): lnga yis/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de dang 'dra ba ru/ /zhugs nas nang gi gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo'i tshogs zhes rab bstan cing //phreng ba bzhi dang ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod pa ni/ /de nas phyi rol dgod par bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor ba/ /ka ba
62b2(rgyud): brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /rdul tshon lnga po nyid kyis ni/ /dra ba dra phyed nyid kyis klubs/ /dkyil 'khor kyi ni phyi rol du/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rtags thams cad/ /khyad par du ni mdor gsungs nas/ /de yi de yis thams cad bya/ /sgo yi mtshams dang twa ra na/ /shin tu gcig nyid mi bya'o/ /
62b3(rgyud): de phyir de yi sgo rnams ni/ /twa ra na rnams gdags pa yin/ /go rims bzhin du lha rnams kyi/ /gdan ni phyi nas dgod par bya/ /de nas dbus su dgod pa nyid/ /gtso bo yi ni gdan yin no/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun tu/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gdan/ /rang gi sa bon
62b4(rgyud): gyis bskyed pa/ /de ni spyor bas rig par bya/ /gdan gyi ngo bo bsam pa ni/ /dbus su saM las seng ge'o/ /haM las shar du glang po che/ /lho ru rta ni i las so/ /rma bya nub tu yi las bsam/ /khaM las mkha' lding byang du bsgom/ /de steng paM las pad+ma dang / /dar gyi glod stan dag dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems
62b5(rgyud): dpa' nas brtsams te/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug par/ /gdan ni a las bskyed pa yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /steng na sems dpa'i stabs su zhugs/ /de ltar bsgom pa'i bya ba ni/ /yid kyi yul te goms par bya/ /de dag ni gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rkyen gyis slong ba ni/ /
62b6(rgyud): de dbus 'khor lo'i bdag po ste/ /pad+ma seng ge'i zla steng du/ /a las bskyed pa'i rtag pa ni/ /gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad che/ /rnam thar bzhir ldan kun du zhal/ /mdog dkar ral pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyar ldan/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis mi bzhugs shing / /'khor lo
62b7(rgyud): bskyed pa rgyu bsgom mo/ /rtag pa'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa ni/ /ting 'dzin 'di ni mchog tu'o/ /de nas snang mdzad chen po yi/ /thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dkyil du yi ge d+hIHdkar las/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rin chen sna tshogs na
63a1(rgyud): bza' can/ /phyag brgyad mnga' ba'i phyag mtshan ni/ /g.yas pa bzhi ni go rims bzhin/ /shes rab kyi ni ral gri bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag bzhi na/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/ /po ti re re bsnams pa'o/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /dang po'i
63a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thugs ka ru/ /shes rab 'khor lo rnam bsgom pa/ /sa mchog bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo lte ba'i rtsibs dang ldan/ /rtsibs rnams lte ba la gnas pa/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung sbyor bas/ /bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa yin/ /'khor lo 'dir ni gyur pa'o/ /de yang 'khor lo
63a3(rgyud): bsgom bya ba/ /yi ge a las yongs bskyed pa'i/ /lce drug kha dog drug dang ldan/ /mu khyud bzhi yis bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo de yi dbus nyid du/ /yi ge a dkar bsam bya ste/ /de nyid 'phros pas phyogs bcu yi/ /don byas slar 'dus gzhi la thim/ /thim pa'i byin brlabs las bsam pa/ /
63a4(rgyud): bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs 'khor lo yi/ /mu khyud bzhi la gsal bar bsgom/ /dang bo'i mu khyud la bsam pa/ /oM sarba d+har+m+ma a b+ha ba swa b+ha ba/ bi shud+d+ha badzra a A saM aH/ de yi phyi rim mu khyud ni/ /gnyis pa la ni bsam bya ba/ /sa mchog
63a5(rgyud): bcu gnyis rdzogs rtags su/ /sgra yig bcu gnyis dgod pa ni/ /a A i yI u U e ai o au aM aH/ 'khor lo lce la bsam pa ni/ /dang po lce nas bsam byas te/ /sngags ni ji tsam bkod pa ni/ /rigs kyi mdog dang sbyar bar bya/ /dang po lce la bsam bya ba/ /oM badzra tIk+Sha ya te
63a6(rgyud): na maH/ gnyis pa la ni dgod bya ba/ /oM duHkhats+tshe da ya te na maH/ gsum pa nges par dgod pa ni/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na rmUr+t+ta ye ta na maH/bzhi pa rtag tu rig bya ba/ /oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na maH/ lnga pa la ni nges bsgom pa/ /oM bA gI shwa ra ya te na maH/ drug la mtha' ste bsam pa ni/ /oM a ra
63a7(rgyud): pa tsa na ya te na maH/ 'khor lo mu khyud gsum pa la/ /bcom ldan bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes sems dpa' sku yi sngags/ /phreng ba dgod pa 'di dag go/ /a A sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hU~M hrIHb+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA pA tsa/ sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+ma ga
63b1(rgyud): ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /yi ge ka sogs ha yi mthar/ /thug pa'i yi ge rnams bkod pa/ /'khor lo sngags kyi rim pa'o/ /'khor lo de dag thams cad kyang / /bri'am bsam pa byas na ni/ /nyes par mi 'gyur legs pa 'thob/ /de ni
63b2(rgyud): shes rab 'khor lo'o/ /shes rab kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas 'khor lo de dbus su/ /a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa/ /ston ka'i zla ba ltar gsal zhing / /in+d+ra nI la'i gtsug phud can/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dras bskor/ /zhi ba'i ngang
63b3(rgyud): tshul dang ldan zhing / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /ut+pal dmar po g.yas pa ni/ /g.yon pa na ni sngon po nyid/ ut+pal de gnyis steng nyid na/ /shes rab po tis mdzes pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba bsam/ /de dbus thams cad kun ngo bo/ /yi ge a ni gsal bkod de/ /de nas
63b4(rgyud): 'khor lo la gnas sngags/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i kha dog dang / /de bzhin ldan par rnam bsam ste/ /mi shes ri 'joms 'od dang ldan/ /'od des rang gi lus nyid la/ /snang ba byed pa bsgom par bya/ /snang bar gyur ma thag tu ni/ /zhal bzhi'i sgo nas dbyung bya ste/ /'jig rten khams kun
63b5(rgyud): snang bar byas/ /de nas rdo rje sgo drug nas/ /kha dog drug ldan 'od phyung ste/ /nam mkha'i khams kun khyab byas nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams gsal bar 'gyur/ /las gnyis byas nas slar 'dus pas/ /ye shes rdo rje de nyid la/ /lan gsum bskor nas khar zhugs te/ /shes rab
63b6(rgyud): ye shes de bkug nas/ /bdag med ma la rab bcug nas/ /snying ga zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /sngags dang gcig tu 'dres gyur nas/ /de nyid brtan par bdag gis bsgom/ /de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /ye shes sku yi rnam pa dang / /zla ba'i sgo nas gzugs bsams nas/ /a yi rnam
63b7(rgyud): pas gzugs bsgom pa/ /gsum pa sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku/ /ring por mi thogs 'dul dbang gis/ /nye bar bzung nas mngon snang ngo / /de dag gis ni byang chub pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rigs kyi 'khor lo drug /rim pa bzhin du bshad byas te/ /
64a1(rgyud): gtso bo'i gnas su hrIHlas ni/ /mtha' yas dmar po'i mdog ldan pa/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /de yi snying gar dang po yi/ /sangs rgyas gong dang mthun par bsgom/ /de'i thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /lce brgyad mu khyud bzhir ldan pa/ /sngags dang ldan
64a2(rgyud): par bsgom par bya/ /brgyad dang ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /oM badzra tIk+Sha ya te na maHzhes pa'i sngags ni dgod byas nas/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus nyid du/ /yi ge d+hIHlas yongs gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje rnon po mdog dmar po/ /gtsug phud lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /gzhon pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi/ /
64a3(rgyud): sna tshogs dar gyi gos dang ldan/ /g.yas na shes rab ral gri bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yon na pad+ma 'dzin/ /de'i snying ga zla stengs na/ /yi ge d+hIHni rnam bsgoms te/ /spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor de dbus su/ /hUM gi yi ge las bskyed pa'i/ /mi bskyod sa gnon
64a4(rgyud): phyag rgya can/ /sngon po'i mdog can de bzhin bsgom/ /de yi snying gar dang po yi/ /sangs rgyas bsgom pa sngon bzhin bya/ /de yi snying gar sngon bzhin du/ /lce brgyad pa yi 'khor lo bsgom/ /sngon bzhin de bzhin sngags dgod bya/ /rim pa bzhin du lce la bsgom/ /oM duHkhats+tshe
64a5(rgyud): da ya na maH/ zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod bya ste/ /lte ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba/ /yi ge hUM las bskyed bya ba/ /rdo rje ral gri zhes kyang bya/ /sngon po gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga la cod pan can/ /g.yas g.yon rdo rje ral gri 'dzin/ /de yi snying ga zla steng na/ /yi ge hUM bsgom
64a6(rgyud): sngon bzhin du/ /spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya/ /de nas sngon gyi sbyor ldan pas/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i dbus nyid du/ /a las bskyed pa'i rnam snang mdzad/ /dkar po'i mdog ldan phyag rgya ni/ /byang chub mchog dang rab ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo bsgoms te de snying gar/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas
64a7(rgyud): bsgom bya ste/ /snying gar lce bcur ldan par bsam/ /oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ya na maH/ zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod byas te/ /de yi lte ba la bsgom pa/ /yi ge a las yongs gyur pa'i/ /bcom ldan shes rab ye shes can/ /mdog dkar sngon gyi cha lugs can/ /g.yon na 'khor lo rab 'dzin cing / /
64b1(rgyud): g.yas na ral gri de bzhin no/ /de yi snying gang zla dkyil bsgom/ /de steng yi ge a bsgoms te/ /spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du/ /yi ge a las rab byung ba/ /mdog ljang don grub mi 'jigs pa/ /phyag rgyar ldan pa bsgom byas te/ /de yi snying gar dang
64b2(rgyud): po yi/ /sangs rgyas bsgom pa sngon bzhin te/ /de yi thugs kar lce brgyad pa'i/ /'khor lo bsgom pa sngon bzhin bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar dgod bya yis/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag go /oM dz+nyA na kA ya ya te na maH/ zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod bya ste/ /'khor lo lte ba'i dbus nyid du/ /
64b3(rgyud): a las gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /ye shes sku can mdog ljang ba/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can zur phud ni/ /lnga pas rab brgyan dar gyis klubs/ /g.yon gyis sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yas kyis shes rab ral gri 'dzin/ /de yi thugs kar zla ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su
64b4(rgyud): ni/ /yi ge a ni rnam bsgoms te/ /sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu ba bya/ /de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus u i las byung ba yi/ /rin chen 'byung ldan mdog ser po/ /mchod sbyin phyag rgya ldan par bsgom/ /de yi thugs kar dang bo yi/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin bsgom
64b5(rgyud): byas te/ /sngon bzhin lce brgyad rnams la ni/ /sngags dang ldan par rnam bsgom pa/ /oM bA gI shwa ra ya te na maH/ zhes pa'i sngags rnams dgod byas te/ /'khor lo de yi lte ba la/ /oM las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /ngag gi dbang phyug ces bya ba/ /sku mdog ser po rgyan dang ldan/ /
64b6(rgyud): zud phud lnga pa sna tshogs kyi/ /na bza' rnams kyis rab klubs pa/ /g.yon gyi phyag na rin po che/ /g.yas na shes rab ral gri 'dzin/ /de bzhin de yi thugs ka ru/ /zla ba'i steng na yi ge oM/ /zhes ni bya ba bsgom byas te/ /'jo sgeg ldan par rab mdzes pa/ /yi ge 'bru dang ldan pa de/ /sngon
64b7(rgyud): bzhin spro dang bsdu ba'o/ /de nas sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus nas yi ge las gyur pa/ /skye med pa byung a bsgoms te/ /de las gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /byang sems rdo rje zhes grags pa/ /sku mdog dkar po gzhon tshul can/ /rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dag dang ldan/ /rgyan ni
65a1(rgyud): sku dang rab ldan zhing / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /de yi snying gar bcom ldan 'das/ /dang po sangs rgyas bsgom byas te/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /lce brgyad pa ni bsgom par bya/ /sngags dgu gcig la gnyis dgod bya/ /oM
65a2(rgyud): a ra pa tsa na ya te na maH/ zhes pa'i sngags ni dgod byas te/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus nyid du/ /a las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /a ra pa tsa zhes bya ba/ /mdog dkar byis pa'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /zur phud lnga dang rab ldan zhing / /sna tshogs dar gyi na bzas brgyan/ /g.yas dang g.yon
65a3(rgyud): na bsnams pa ni/ /bo ti dang ni ral gri bsnams/ /de yi snying gar bsam bya ba/ /zla ba'i steng na yi ge a/ /sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas te/ /gnas su brtan par der 'gyur nas/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa gtang bar bya/ /rigs phye ba'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// //de dag ni rigs kyi
65a4(rgyud): dbang gis 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa yin no/ /de nas da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha dag gi ngo bo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas de dag gi rim pa bskyed par bya ste/ dang po'i sangs rgyas bstan pa yi/ /bdag nyid gsal ba'i thugs ka ru/ /ye shes zla steng a gnas las/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i bye brag gis/ /
65a5(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni ched brjod bya/ /a A sar+b+ha ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ o hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pA tsa/ sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na/ a ma la/ su pa ri/ shud+d+hA d+har+m+mA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ zhes pa'i gsang sngags brjod byas pas/ /so so'i sku rnams gsal bar bsgom/ /
65a6(rgyud): gsang sngags de yi 'og nyid du/ a yi 'phro 'du gnas skabs su/ /bcu gnyis mdzad pa rdzogs byas te/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs nas su/ /slar log yi ge'i mtshan ma kun/ /rang gi mdog ltar gsal 'gyur te/ /so so'i gnas su bkod pa las/ /zla ba la gnas cho ga gsum/ /sku
65a7(rgyud): rdzogs shar la sogs pa ru/ /go rims bzhin du bzhugs par bsgom/ /de dag ni lha bsgom zhing 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas lha rnams so so yi/ /mtshan ma'i bye brag bstan par bya/ /dang po shar gyi 'khor lo yi/ /lce la zla gnas de nyid du/ /yi ge hUM las gyur pa yi/ /mi bskyod pa ni
65b1(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ /rab tu dkar ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /'jigs byed bdud gnon skyil krung bzhugs/ /lho ru trAM las yongs bskyed pa'i //rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /shin tu ser ba margata 'dra//cod pan dang ldan mchog sbyin mdzad/ /nub tu hrIHlas bskyed pa yi/ /bskyed pa bde gshegs
65b2(rgyud): snang mtha' yas/ /rA ga'i mdog 'dra ting 'dzin rgyal/ /dbu rgyan dang ldan ye shes ldan/ /byang du mtshan rdzogs don yod grub/ /nI la'i mdog 'dra skyabs dang ldan/ /dbu rgyan mnyam pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang / /spyi dang khyad par rgyan rnams kun/ /'khor
65b3(rgyud): lo'i skabs las shes par bya/ /shar lho zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /sems ma rdo rje zhes pa dkar/ /a las byung ste rdo rje'o/ /lho nub zla steng bsam bya ba/ /a las bskyed pa'i rin chen ma/ /sngo bsangs mdzes ma'i thabs tshul can/ /rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin/ /nub byang zla dkyil
65b4(rgyud): steng bsgom pa/ /mos pa i las byung ba ste/ /dmar po'i mdog ldan pad+ma 'dzin/ /brjod pa'i tshul can bsgom par bya/ /byang shar zla steng bsgom bya ba/ /las mchog ma ste mdog ljang mo/ /gsal ba'i bdag nyid chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /sems ma rdo rje la sogs kyang / /
65b5(rgyud): rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma yis/ /dbu rgyan sku la sna tshogs pa'i/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa po/ /de yi phyi rim 'khor lo ni/ /lca steng zla ba bsgom bya ba/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bye brag las/ /so so'i sems dpa' bcu drug bskyed/ /dang po'i 'khor lo nas brtsams te/ /de la thug
65b6(rgyud): pa'i zla stengs su/ /rigs kyi sems dpar chen po ni/ /rigs las skyes te rim bzhin brtag /dang po'i 'dod pa sems dpa' che/ /gnyis pa rgyal po bde ba che/ /gsum pa chags pa dga' ba che/ /bzhi pa legs la mgu ba che/ /yi ge d+hIHlas de dag bskyed/ /a A i I/
65b7(rgyud): stong bzhi bdag nyid chen pos 'joms/ /rim bzhin rdo rje mda' gzhu dang / /lcags kyu tog par ldan pa ste/ /'gying dang ldan zhing rigs kyis brgyan/ /shar steng zla ba la gnas bsgom/ /lho yi 'khor lo'i steng bsam pa/ /gzugs che lus che rin chen dpal/ /kha dog che gsal nyi ma'i
66a1(rgyud): dpal/ /ming yang che la tog gi dpal/ /dkyil yangs rdo rje bzhad pa'i dpal/ /gsal de don ldan 'di las skyes/ /u U e ai/ de ltar stong ldan dpal mchog rnams/ /rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan tshems/ /rim bzhin thogs nas gtso la blta/ /nub kyi
66a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i steng nyid du/ /sems dpa' rim bzhin bsam bya ba/ /shes rab mtshon can ma chags chos/ /nyon mongs che ba sems dpa' gcod/ /grags ldan sems dpa' kun gyi rgyud/ /snang gsal sems dpa' gsal bar smra/ /'dod ldan tshogs pa de dag kyang /chags pa 'joms
66a3(rgyud): rnams 'di las skyes/ /o au aM aH/ bdag nyid de dag stong pa'i dpal/ /'dzin tshul pad+ma ral gri dang / /'khor lo lce dag so so yi /phyag char 'dzin pa zur la blta/ /byang phyogs 'khor lo'i steng bsgom pa/ /sgyu ma mkhas pa rdo rje las/ /don grub pa ni sems dpa' bsrung / /dga' ba
66a4(rgyud): la dga' gnod sbyin te/ /mi 'phrul kun ldan sdud pa po/ /rim bzhin gsang sngags 'di las skyes/ /a A e ai/ 'di las rim bzhin bskyed pa ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje go cha dang / /mche ba khu tshur rnam bzung nas/ /las dag yin te gtso la 'dud/ /de dag ma lus sems dpa' yang / /ji
66a5(rgyud): ltar gsung rab las byung ba/ /a la byung ste mtshan gyi sngags/ /tshig dang yan lag kun ldan nas/ /'khor lo de yi byi nyid du/ /mchod pa'i tshogs dag bsgom bya ba/ /sbyin pa tshim byed rdo rje 'gying / /sdom pa srung ba tshul khrims phreng / /bzod pa 'dzin pa dbyangs len ma/ /dge ba la
66a6(rgyud): brtson gar mdzad ma/ /lha mo'i tshul ni 'di bzhi yang / /ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed/ /lA mA gIr dang nI ra las te/ /'gying dang phreng thogs 'dzin pa dang / /dbyangs dang gar dag byed pa yi/ /tshul dang ldan te byis pa'i tshul/ /de 'og phyi yi lha mo bzhi/ /rim par 'thon te gzhung tshig ldan/ /shes
66a7(rgyud): rab lus can bdug pa ma/ /bsam gtan dang can me tog 'dzin/ /smon lam ldan pa gsal ba me/ /thabs ldan lha mo dag pa'i chu/ /ye shes stobs dang ldan pa yi/ /dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin ldan/ /'di yang ming las bskyed par bya/ /spos dang me tog gzhong pa dang / /
66b1(rgyud): gsal byed dag pa'i chu 'dzin pa'i/ /tshul ldan 'gying mdzes bsgom par bya/ /de yi phyi rim bsgom bya ba/ /byams pa 'jam dpal spos glang po/ /ye shes tog zhes grags pa bzhi/ /byams pa dpag med snying rje che/ /shes rab che zhing thabs che ba/ /so so'i rigs las skyes pa ste/ /
66b2(rgyud): rim bzhin yi ge a las skye/ /phyi lta nang lta sems dpa'i stabs/ /de nas de 'og bsgom bya ba/ /bzang skyong blo yi rgya mtsho dang / /blo gros mi zad spobs pa brtsegs/ /rim pa 'di bzhin bsgom par bya/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs dang shugs dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs kyis gnon/ /
66b3(rgyud): 'di dag kyang ni a las te/ /rim pas rgyan yod sems dpa'i gzhung / /de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba/ /mthu chen thob dang ngan song 'dren/ /mya ngan 'joms pa dra ba'i 'od/ /rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /phung po 'joms shing nyon mongs 'dren/ /khro bo'i tshul ston drag shul
66b4(rgyud): che/ /lha chen 'jigs byed la sogs pa'o/ /a las de dag rim bzhin bskyed/ /'jo sgeg khro tshul ldan pa'o/ /de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba/ /zla 'od gzhon nu 'od dpag med/ /nam mkha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel/ /rim bzhin a las bskyed par bya/ /de dag bye brag rigs
66b5(rgyud): kyi mdog / sngags chen theg pa'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa kun gyi nang na mchog /lha byed la sogs ldan pa'i mchog /rim gyis rta babs khyams nang du/ /mkhas pas rtag par rim bzhin bsgom/ /sgo nas sngags pas dgod bya ba/ /'gugs dang 'dren pa 'ching ba dang / /mnyes
66b6(rgyud): pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /rim bzhin thogs nas tshad med ldan/ /a las bskyed de sgo bzhir gnas/ /de dag ni rgyal ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin no// //de nas las kyi khyad par yang / /bskyed pa'i zhar la byung bas te/ /sgra
66b7(rgyud): las 'phel te rgyas bshad pas/ /'di ru bdag gis ma bshad do/ /las kyi khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas spos kyi chu dag la/ /sngags bzlas pa yis bsangs byas te/ /phung po bsdus pa'i mchod pa lngas/ /rim bzhin byin rlabs mdun gzhag nas/ /'di dag rim
67a1(rgyud): pa'i go rims kyis/ /se gol rim par ldan byas pas/ /rim bzhin bsdu ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHldan byas te/ /mdun na mngon sum bzhin mthong nas/ /sa mA dzaHzhes brjod bya zhing / /'khor lo'i tshogs mchog de dag la/ /mnyam med la sogs bstod
67a2(rgyud): pa bya/ /de nas gtso bo'i sngags rings la/ /dr-i sh+ya zhes kyang brjod bya zhing / /a haM zhes dang ldan pa ni/ /bzhi yis rgyas btab don mchog 'grub/ /de nas mchod pa'i bye brag gis/ /mchod nas phyag bzhi bya ba ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i/ /gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /
67a3(rgyud): de dag ni sngon du bya ba'i cho ga'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rang dga'i gnas nyid du/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sa de gzhung bzhin sbyong ba dang / /gzhung dang ldan par gzhung bzhin du/ /bya ba'i bye brag gzhan na'o// //de nas mchod pa'i bye brag rnams/ /sngon du bstan pa bzhin byas
67a4(rgyud): te/ /spro ba'i sems ni rab bskyed de/ /tshig ldan phyag byas spos thogs la/ /tshig tu brjod pa'i sngags ldan pas/ /bstod de langs la 'gying bcas pas/ /bgegs bsal don du rab tu bskor/ /de nas phur bus gdab par bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi bkug la/ /mchod de sbyin
67a5(rgyud): sreg ming rus la/ /bzlas te bya ba bstan pa yin/ /de la gzugs brnyan bshad pa ni/ /'khor lo rim gsum ldan pa la/ /snam bu mu khyud rnams kyis brgyan/ /rta babs dang ni twa ra na/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /ba dan gdugs dang rnga mas brgyan/ /dril bu ras 'phen
67a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan tshogs/ /de la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams ni/ /shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa'o/ /zhes pa la sogs rgyan mchog ni/ /'di yi skabs su rim pas bstan/ /de dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan yang sbyin sreg byed pa na/ /las bshad de dag gzhan du med/ /bdag
67a7(rgyud): gi las dang gzhan dag ste/ /gshin dang gson pa'i las su bstan/ /de la bdag gis las bstan pa/ /shin tu dge ba'i shing bu ni/ /tsan+dan shug pa la sogs te/ /dri zhim ngad ldan mdzes pa'i shing / /khru gang khru do zhi ba la/ /rgyas dang dbang dang dgug pa dang / /drag shul spyod pa
67b1(rgyud): la sogs kyi/ /shing ni rim pas shes par bya/ /zlum pa'i dbyibs su brtsigs byas la/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas de yi thugs ka ru/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gtso/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /thugs la gnas te zla steng bsam/ /de yi
67b2(rgyud): thugs kyi zla ba la/ /a las byung ba'i 'od 'phros pas/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa btul byas te/ /slar bsdus bdag nyid bsreg byas la/ /zhu ba de las bskyed pa ni/ /thabs shes rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs/ /kha dog las dang mthun pa la/ /shin tu rid pa brang rus can/ /
67b3(rgyud): dbu la ye shes sems dpas brgyan/ /de yi thugs kar zla steng du/ /a las bskyed pa'i yi ge b+h+rU~M/ /shin tu legs pa'i gzhal yas khang / /gong du bstan dang mthun pa la/ /shin tu legs pa sgo bzhi pa/ /shar phyogs gre ba'i sgo yin te/ /de dbus gsum las lha rnams
67b4(rgyud): bskyed/ /de la a yis byin rlabs te/ /sku gsung thugs dang ldan par bstan/ /de la sreg blugs dbul ba ni/ /mar dang til dang yam shing dang / /mngar gsum lde gu dkar gsum ni/ /zhi ba'i rdzas la bshad pa'o/ /rgyas dang dbang dang drag dang dgug /'di las gsungs pa'i rdzas
67b5(rgyud): rnams ni/ /'di las ma gsungs gzhan dag la/ /rgyas par bstan te der shes bya/ /de nas gang dag zhi 'dod la/ /spyi bor zla stengs a bsgoms te/ /de nyid zhu bar gyur pa la/ /bya ba de nyid zhu 'gyur la/ /slar sos gzhon nu'i gzugs byas la/ /de la lhag par gnas par bya/ /
67b6(rgyud): de ni bdag gi don bya ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan don bya ba'i rim pa yang / /na dang shi ba gnyis yin te/ /de la na ba'i las bya na/ /gang dag yid ni mi dran pa'i/ /bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod pa na/ /ting 'dzin 'di dag dran par bya/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag bsgoms te/ /de'i
67b7(rgyud): snying la zla ba bsam/ /de stengs a dang muM dang raM/ /de las gyur te rab 'phros pas/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa kun btul te/ /mdzad pa'i las ni dran par byas/ /slar log bzhi yi gnas su thim/ /thim pas ye shes me 'bar te/ /gnod pa'i bgegs ni dran pa las/ /yungs
68a1(rgyud): kar brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg / des kyang sos par ma gyur na/ /srin bus zos pa'i shing bu la/ /'bar ba'i me ni bus byas te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du mar las ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum mam stong du bya/ /des ni nad las thar bar 'gyur/ /na ba las thar pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
68a2(rgyud): 'dzin to/ /de nas shi la phan gdags na/ /dang por gnod pa'i bgegs bsal nas//ro la phan pa'i cho ga ni/ /a yig kun khyab spyi steng bsam/ /lhar gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /a las ye shes lnga yis gang / /phan pa'i gnod sbyin chus btab pas/ /dang por bkru ba'i
68a3(rgyud): las yin no/ /de nas a yi 'phro 'du bya/ /de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas gnas pa'i cho ga bshad/ /shi ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste/ /zhag gsum slob dpon smyung gnas la/ /bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni/ /'khor los lha rnams mdun bsam ste/ /phyag
68a4(rgyud): 'tshal spro bskyed la sogs bya/ /de nas tshig 'di ched brjod bya/ /tshe 'di dang por 'bras bu ni/ /bdag gi gson 'di 'bras bur gcig /dam tshig lha dang mnyam par ni/ /bdag nyid gyur par som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig par/ /phyir mi ldog par bdag 'gyur
68a5(rgyud): te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye bar the tshom med/ /'di ni bdag nyid dam pa ste/ /mchod sbyin 'di ni bla na med/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pas/ /ding 'di bdag 'dus mchog yin no/ /de nas phyag byas spros thogs la/ /spyan drang tshig 'di
68a6(rgyud): brjod par bya/ /kye dbang ni nges te bla na med/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /'di la phan gdags don ched du/ /gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /
68a7(rgyud): de nas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /rgyal mchog la sogs bsgom byas te/ /sgo dbye la sogs gnas 'dir bshad/ /de rjes gsang sngags 'di brjod bya/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM byAHb+ha ga bAn/ dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA pA tsa/ sarba d+har+m+ma ga ga na/
68b1(rgyud): a ma la su pa ri shud+ha d+han+d+ra d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ zhes ni brjod pa'i sngags bzlas so/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang / /ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /tshigs bcad 'di yis bstod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun la bstod bya ba/ /rang la bstod de nges pa'i mchog /'bras bu
68b2(rgyud): 'byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /shi la phan gdags don ched du/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas
68b3(rgyud): 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /med pa las
68b4(rgyud): byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la
68b5(rgyud): 'dud/ /de nas gsol ba btab byas nas/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' la/ /mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom/ /de nas gang shi de nyid la/ /dmigs la a A zhes bkod de/ /de la phyogs bcu rgyal ba dang / /dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /nam
68b6(rgyud): mkha' gang bar 'dir gshegs pa/ /deng 'dir 'dus par bde gshegs te/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas rnam rgyal chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pas bkrus te bgegs bskrad la/ /de nas de la bsrung bar bya/ /de nas til gyis de la ni/ /bskor te sbyin sreg
68b7(rgyud): dbul bar bya/ /shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rnams ni spyad par bya/ /dang po'i cho ga rim pa nas/ /'khor lo'i rim pa 'di gsungs te/ /phyi rol byung ste gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs/ /ma
69a1(rgyud): lus par ni 'dir bshad do/ /de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas/ /sngags pas chas gos ldan pa yi/ /shin tu 'gying bas brgyan byas te/ /zhag bdun nang par sbyin sreg bya/ /mi nyid shi ba'i gnas byas te/ /shi la phan pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /gzhal yas khang pa de
69a2(rgyud): 'dra ba/ /'di las gsungs te gzhan du min/ /'di ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga ni/ /bdag gis rang bzor byas min te/ /'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang / /cho ga 'dus pa'i rgyud las te/ /de nas 'dir ni 'os pa yin/ /'di ni shi ba'i cho ga'o/ /shi ba la phan gdags pa'i ting nge 'dzin
69a3(rgyud): to/ / //de nas de la lam bstan bya/ /tshogs bsags dge ba'i don la sbyor/ /de mthar de nyid rtag bsgom dang / /de nyid mnyam shes ci mi tshugs/ /de la rtag gnas bde ldan te/ /rim pas a yi ngang nyid do/ /de yang bdag lus as khyab ste/ /de nyid a yis byin
69a4(rgyud): brlabs pas/ /a nyid dbyings kyi ngang nyid du/ /thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra'o/ /rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// //de nas 'khor lo bstan par bya/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can/ /zhes pa 'di yi don bshad
69a5(rgyud): na/ /lus la 'khor lo bzhi gnas te/ /lte bar shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan pa la/ /a A aM AHrim bzhin dgod/ /dbus na yi ge a mchog go/ /snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan/ /de la sngags rnams dgod pa ni/ /
69a6(rgyud): a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ a~M aHzhes pa 'di dag rim bzhin du/ /'khor lo'i lce la dgod par bya/ /mgrin par shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /bcu gnyis ldan pa'i rtsibs ldan la/ /oM a ra pa tsa na/ bA gI shwa ra pradz+nyA na maHzhes pa rnams/ /rim bzhin yang dag dgod par
69a7(rgyud): bya/ /de nas mtshog mar bsam pa ni/ /bcu gnyis ldan pa'i lce can la/ /sku yi sngags kyi phreng ba dgod/ /oM A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na mUr+t+ti bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pA tsa sarba d+har+m+mA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+mA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ zhes pa'i sngags
69b1(rgyud): kyi phreng ba 'di/ /shes rab 'khor lo grags pa yin/ /'di ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa/ /gzhon nu gzugs can bde ba 'thob/ /grags 'dzin lus dang bde ldan lus/ /de dag spangs nas gzhan don du/ /rab dga'i lus su bskyed par nges/ /de ni bcu gnyis sa rdzogs te/ /kun tu
69b2(rgyud): 'od kyi sa chen po/ /de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra/ /bdud rtsi 'od ni gnyis pa ste/ /shin tu 'od gsal zla ba 'dra/ /nam mkha'i 'od ni gsum pa ste/ /nam mkha'i bzhi bzhin so sor gsal/ /rdo rje'i 'od ni bzhi pa ste/ /sa de nyid ni bzhi pa'o/ /bsam pa nang gi brtan spyor bas/ /
69b3(rgyud): rdo rje zhes ni yongs su brtag /lnga pa rin chen 'od ces pas/ /dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas/ /pad+ma'i 'od ni drug pa ste/ /pad+ma bzhin du rab tu skye/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid phyir/ /dri ma med pas yongs su bzung / /bdun pa las kyi 'od ces pas/ /sangs rgyas 'phrin
69b4(rgyud): las byed par 'dod/ /brgyad pa dpe med byed pa ni/ /de la dpe ni yod ma yin/ /dpe ldan zhes pa dgu pa ste/ /thams cad dpe ni so sor gcig /bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pas/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/ /bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /sa chen rab tu 'od gsal
69b5(rgyud): ba/ /bcu gnyis so so rang rig pa/ /rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu rdzogs/ /zhes pa 'di ni rang rig pa'o/ /'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas 'dir dbang dam pa gsungs/ /dbang bskur med na 'grub pa med/ /
69b6(rgyud): yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /de la dbang byin yon tan grub/ /dang por khrus gsol brgyan pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i cha lugs 'dra ba dang / /bud med lta bu'i tshul ldan pa/ /slob dpon bla mar gyur pa la/ /dbang rnams nod pa rab tu gsungs/ /dang por sdig pa bsreg byas
69b7(rgyud): nas/ /de la dbang dang dral bar bya/ /de dag kun gyi rim pa yang / /rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar/ /'dir yang de dag bya ba yin/ /mchod pa'i las dang sbyin pa dang //rim par ldan pas dbang bskur te/ /de nas de la chu dbang bskur/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya'i dbang dang ni/ /
70a1(rgyud): cod pan dar dpyad rdo rje dang / /bdag po'i ming la sogs pa dang / /dbang rnams rdzogs par sbyin pa dang / /gsang ba'i dbang dang nges pa'i dbang / /rim pa bzhin du rab tu bskur/ /de nas bkra shis gdon bya zhing / /rgyal po bzhin du 'gying bcas pas/ /g.yog dang ldan
70a2(rgyud): pa'i slob dpon la/ /lan gsum bskor ba tshigs bcad kyis/ /bla ma de ni gzengs bstod bya/ /kye bdag ci rim pas dbugs phyung ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la dgod/ /sa la nges pa'i dbang bskur te/ /shin tu gzi ldan bkra shis mchog /ces ni brjod la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas
70a3(rgyud): rang yang khyim du 'gro/ /khyim du phyin nas 'khor dag la/ /slob dpon 'dis ni dam tshig pas/ /bdag kyang dam tshig mchog dang ldan/ /'di la rim gro phun sum tshogs/ /rta dang glang po nor dang 'bru/ /rin po che dang ci bzhed pa/ /khyed kyis nga la ma 'dri bar/ /slob dpon 'di la de phyir dbul/ /
70a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang thabs cig pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas la/ /rim pas gsungs pa'i bka' lung ni/ /mtshan brjod pa yi gsung rab 'di/ /shin tu rtogs dka' mngon sum min/ /rang rgyud tsam gyi rim pa dang / /theg pa chen po mngon
70a5(rgyud): rtogs pa'i/ /kun la thugs rje ma ldan pas/ /brtse bar ldan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /yengs med gus pa'i sems kyis bris/ /'jam mgon dpal ldan ye shes sems dpa'i gnas/ /thugs rje ldan pa sku gsung thugs ldan pa/ /bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud dang ldan pa ni/ /mi dbye
70a6(rgyud): dad gtsug sems dang ldan par shog / 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i gsang ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab
70a7(rgyud): pa'o/ / //thams cad 'di las byung ba'i phyir/ /gzhi yi sangs rgyas skye ba bzhes/ /mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /smra ba'i seng ge skye ba bzhes/ /thugs rje gnas nas 'dren mdzad pas/ /don yod pa yi skye ba bzhes/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer spro ba'i phyir/ /'od
70b1(rgyud): dpag med pa'i skye ba bzhes/ /skye rgas chu las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skye ba bzhes/ /gang gis gong du ma chod pas/ /dang po sangs rgyas skye ba bzhes/ /sangs rgyas kun kyi thugs yin pas/ /ye shes sems dpa'i skye ba bzhes/ /shes rab gang la thogs med pas/ /
70b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal rnon po'i skye ba bzhes/ /zhi ba'i ngang la legs gnas pas/ /a ra pa tsa'i skye ba bzhes// //[ ]@##/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i bsgom khog pa zhugs/ /@#/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsgom pa 'di ni slob dpon gyi man ngag
70b3(rgyud): tu byas pa yin te/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dang por 'jug pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste/ de la zhugs te 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' mngon sum du byas nas kyang / sems can skyabs dang dpung gnyen med pa srid par
70b4(rgyud): lhung zhing ma grol ba rnams kyi don bya bar bsam mo/ /de ltar sems can gyi don bya ba'i thabs kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis byas te de ni mdo sde'o/ /de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bcu bsgoms te/ phyag btsal ba dang / mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes
70b5(rgyud): su yi rang ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / /lam bstan pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bcu bsgom mo/ /de la phyag btsal ba ni rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a dkar po bsgom/ /a de las 'od zer phyogs bcur
70b6(rgyud): 'phros pas phyogs bcu nas sngon lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen mo dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol la/ rang gi rdo rje slob dpon gang yin yang de dag dang lhan cig tu
70b7(rgyud): zhugs par bsams la/ de dag gi mdun du thal mo sbyar la phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/ /de ltar phyag btsal nas mchod pa dbul te/ rnal 'byor pa dag gi thugs kar yi ge a bsgoms la de las kyang 'od zer spros te/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga me tog gi gdugs dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang phreng ba
71a1(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / spos kyang rang bzhin gyis dri zhim por sbyar ba'i dri mar gyur pa'i dri dang spos rgya dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / dri chab dang lha bshos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa nam mkha'i sprin phung tsam rgya mtsho ltar gtibs pas mchod par bsgom/
71a2(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags te/ dus gsum du bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang / gzhan byed du stsal pa dang / byed pa la dga' bar sbyor ba dang / dngos gzhi dang 'jug pa dang bcas pa thams cad bshags te/ dran pa ni khas blangs ma dran pa ni bsdus te/ 'gyod pa
71a3(rgyud): skyes nas phyis mi bya bar sdom pa blangs nas bshags pa'o/ /de yang bshags pa'i gnas 'phags pa dang / bshags bya dang / bshags pa po rnams mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
71a4(rgyud): dang / rnal 'byor pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gsum gyis ma 'dres pa la/ phrag dog med pa'i dga' ba dang / spro ba ni rjes su yi rang bar bsgom pa'o/ /de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba ni/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bgyis pa'i bsod nams kyis sems can
71a5(rgyud): thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig par bsngos la bsgom mo/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom ste/ sangs rgyas ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsnyen te skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom mo/ /chos ni chos bsgom pa bdag med pa'i chos la brten cing bsgoms
71a6(rgyud): la skyabs su 'gro'o/ /dge 'dun yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun la skyabs su mi 'gro ste/ sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la brten cing bsgoms te skyabs su 'gro ba bsgom mo/ /de la lam bstan pa ni/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas grub pa'i lam rdo rje theg pa'i
71a7(rgyud): don 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom zhing mtshan brjod pa ni lam bstan pa'o/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i don du sangs rgyas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o bar bsgom par bya'o/ /sangs
71b1(rgyud): rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang / /dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs yan lag bcu bsgoms nas
71b2(rgyud): gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes bya'o/ /de nas dam bca' bar bya ste/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems de ring phyin chad bskyed par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon rnams
71b3(rgyud): kyis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa bzhin/ /de bzhin bla med byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /bslab pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don gyi tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por so sor gzung / /de nas
71b4(rgyud): rigs lnga'i sdom pa bzung ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sdom pa sangs rgyas sbyor bskyed pa/ /'di ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs kyi sdom pa gzung / /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gsum/ /bdag
71b5(rgyud): gis mi gtong gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin po che'i sdom pa gzung / /sbyin pa rnam bzhi dus drug tu/ /brtan po nyid du sbyin par bya/ /pad+ma rigs kyi sdom pa gzung / /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs kyi
71b6(rgyud): sdom pa gzung / /bdag gis mi gtong gzung bar bgyi/ /gong du ma byung ba'i lhag ma kun 'di sems can gyi don bya ba dang / mi dge ba bcu spang ba dang / /'khor ba mi spang ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang du mi len pa dang / theg pa chung ba dang 'jigs pa'i sa spangs pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin
71b7(rgyud): dang / gdon la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mi smad pa dang / de ring phan chad bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du gzung bar bya'o zhes dam bca'o// //de nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ /ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang / /ma grol ba rnams grol ba dang / /dbugs
72a1(rgyud): ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes sems bskyed do/ /de yan chod bsod nams kyi tshogs bsgom pa'o/ /don dam pa byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs bsgom pa ni/ /dang po mngon par
72a2(rgyud): byang chub pa lnga bsgom pa yin la/ de ni ye shes lnga bsgom pa yin te/ dang po chos thams cad mi dmigs la mi rtog pa/ rang bzhin med pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba tha snyad tsam du yod la/ don dam par rang bzhin med pa de bzhin nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar bsgom/ de nas me long lta bu'i ye
72a3(rgyud): shes bsgom ste/ dper na me long g.ya' dag pa'i nang du/ gzugs brnyan snang zhing gsal ba ltar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ de las chos kyi dbyings rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par smin pa'i ye shes de las/ 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi sems can gyi gang zag phung po dang / chos
72a4(rgyud): thams cad ji ltar yin pa'i chos nyid kyi ngang de la phyin ci ma log par snang ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa log rtog glo bur gyi dri ma dang 'dra bas bsgribs pa tsam yin la/ sems can gyi sems chos kyi rang bzhin du gsal bar bsgom mo/ /sems can gyis de ltar mi rtogs te/ 'gro ba
72a5(rgyud): las mi thar ba la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ 'gro ba las thar par bya'o zhes bsgom mo/ /de nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom ste/ chos ni phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la bya/ mu stegs pas brtags pa'i gang zag tu lta ba med/ nyan thos pa'i
72a6(rgyud): chos rdul tsam du yod par lta ba'i bdag med par lta ba dang / sems tsam pa'i sems yod par lta ba de yang bdag med par lta/ chos thams cad la bdag med par bsgom/ de yang bdag tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / gzhan med pa dang / bdag gzhan med pa dang / chos thams cad
72a7(rgyud): bdag med par mnyam pa'o/ /mdor na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du bsgom mo/ /oM a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+har+m+mA NA~M Ad+ya nut+pan+da twAta/ ces pas byin gyis brlab po/ /de la a ni a a nut+pan+na twAta/ ces pa ste/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa stong pa nyid ces bya ste/ bdag
72b1(rgyud): gzhan stong pa nyid du mnyam par bsgom mo/ /de'i 'og tu so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes bsgom ste/ de ni bdag dang gzhan du phye ste/ gang zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa'i mi rtog pa'i ngang las bdag dang gzhan du yang dag pa'i kun rdzob tu phye ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid du bdag don bya ba'i
72b2(rgyud): gnas sems can gzhan mtshan ma med pa'i sgo nas/ so sor phye zhing brtag par byas te bsgoms nas/ spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam par mtshan ma med par shes pa'i so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /de'i ngang las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsgom ste/ gzung ba dang
72b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa las 'das pa gcig dang du ma dang shin tu bral ba rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes stong pa nyid bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin nam/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i rang gi ngo bo mi dmigs par bsgom mo/ /de'i ngang las smon lam dang thugs rje'i dbang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' dang /
72b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes bsgom ste/ dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i rgyu bdag dang gzhan mtshan ma med bzhin du so sor dmigs nas/ mi dmigs pa'i snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don bya bar dran te/ sprul pa sna
72b5(rgyud): tshogs pas sprul cing spros nas sems can srid pa las bsgral te/ 'od zer gyis ngan song gsum la khyab nas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byas nas/ sems can rnam par grol nas lha dang mi la bkod de/ de nas so so'i dbang po rim pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ theg pa
72b6(rgyud): gsum gyi chos kyis grol bar byas nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba dang / nyan thos rnams sems can gyi don la bcug nas/ theg pa chen po la bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams srid pa la chags pa la stong pa nyid kyi don bstan nas sangs rgyas par bya'o bar bsgom pa ni
72b7(rgyud): bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems dang / smon pa byang chub sems kun rdzob ste/ /des ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / /don dam byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis bsgom pa bstan nas/ /da ni dag pa
73a1(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i ye shes bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms te/ bdag gi sems gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i ye shes las/ khro bo'i sa bon hUM sngo nag sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug khyab pa tsam cig bsgom mo/ /de'i 'phro 'dus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab nas sems can gyi don
73a2(rgyud): byas te/ slar hUM la thim pa las khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing drug khyab pa ste/ de ni nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten pa de 'dul ba'i don du bum pa la khro bo zhal drug ste/ shar gyi dbu sngo/ g.yas g.yon dkar/ lho ser nub dmar byang ljang gu'o/ /rtse mo lnga yar lta ba ye shes
73a3(rgyud): lnga/ mar lta ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i dra ba'i sbubs su gyur pa nang stong par bsgom mo/ /de'i nang du b+h+rUM dkar po las rin po che'i mchod rten kha dog bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khyab pa cig bsgom mo/ /de'i bum
73a4(rgyud): pa'i nang du yi ge hri las chos kyi 'byung gnas dbyibs zur gsum du bsgom mo/ /de'i nang du yi ge a las kha dog sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram bsgom mo/ de'i dbus su yi ge b+h+rUM dkar po las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa twa ra Na dang bcas par bsgom mo/ /de yang sangs rgyas dang sems
73a5(rgyud): can chos nyid du mnyam pas gru bzhi'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis shar gyi sgo'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i don gyis lho'i sgo'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i don gyis nub kyi sgo'o/ /dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin gyis byang gi sgo'o/ /stobs lnga'i rang bzhin gyis
73a6(rgyud): sgo srung bzhi'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gdugs dang me tog gi phreng ba'o/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis me long dang rin po che'o/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyis sems can rnams
73a7(rgyud): chos ston pas/ 'dul bas 'dul ba'i rang bzhin dril bu dang dar gyi cod pan no/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bsams pas sum brtsegs su gyur pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi dbu rtse'i gtsug tor tu gyur pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin gyis twa ra Na'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
73b1(rgyud): mu ma chod pa bsgoms pas mu khyud ma chad pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags rdo rje phreng ba'o/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od lnga'i kha dog gis brgyan pa'o/ /de'i nang du re mig dgu snam bu dang ldan pa la dbus su seng ge'i khri mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rang bzhin no/ /stobs bcu dang ldan
73b2(rgyud): pa'i rtags su shar du glang po che'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis lhor rta'o/ /dbang bcu'i rang bzhin gyis nub tu rma bya'o/ /phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis byang du nam mkha' lding gi khri'o/ /de dag gi steng du rin po che'i khri dang pad+ma'i gdan dang zla ba'i gdan
73b3(rgyud): brtsegs pa'o/ /de dag gi phyogs bzhi thams cad dang / mtshams kyi re mig dang snam bu dang gru chad la zla ba'i gdan bsgom mo/ /de la pad+ma ni thabs sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/ /zla ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi myu gu bskyed pa'o/ /de nas dbus su seng ge dang zla ba'i
73b4(rgyud): gdan la bdag gi sems gzung 'dzin dag pa'i ye shes de nyid yi ge a dkar po cig tu bsgoms la/ de'i 'phro 'du las rnam par snang mdzad chen po byang chub sems dang rang bzhin gcig pa/ zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa zhal phyogs bzhir gzigs pa/ rgyan mi mnga' ba zhi ba'i rang bzhin
73b5(rgyud): dbu la ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang dbyer med pa'i don sku mdog dkar po chos nyid la nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags/ phyag brgyad thugs ka na byang chub kyi mchog gi phyag rgya bcas pa la snying rje dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo/ /de'i
73b6(rgyud): thugs kar yi ge hrIHlas dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa dbu lnga la gtsug gi dbu rta mgo dkar po ste/ khams gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'am dbang du sdud pa'i rang bzhin no/ /zhal shar phyogs su gzigs pa sngo/ /lho ser nub dmar/ byang
73b7(rgyud): ljang ba rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no/ /phyag g.yas pa bzhi na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon pa bzhi na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa dum pa re re bsnams pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i rtags ral gri dam pa'i chos ston pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pas po ti bsnams pa/ chos kyi sku'i
74a1(rgyud): rang bzhin yin pas sku mdog dkar po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs kyi na bzas brgyan pa/ phud bu lnga dang ldan par bsgom/ de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom/ /rtsibs drug la shar gyi rtsibs ni sngo g.yas g.yon ni dkar lho ser nub dmar/ byang
74a2(rgyud): ljang / mu khyud bzhi yang dkar/ rigs drug gi rang bzhin yin pas rtsibs drug go/ /rten cing 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin pas 'khor lo mu khyud dang po la/ oM sarba d+har+m+ma a b+ha sa swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM aH/ zhes pa bsgom mo/ /gnyis pa las sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis kyi sa bon/
74a3(rgyud): a A i I u A e ai o au aM aH/ bcu gnyis dgod/ rtsibs drug la shar gyi rtsibs la/ oM duHkhats+tshe dA ya te na maH/ lho'i rtsibs la oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na maH nub kyi rtsibs la oM badzra tIk+Sh+NA ya te na maH/ byang gi rtsibs la oM dz+nyA na kA yA te na maH shar stod kyi
74a4(rgyud): rtsibs la/ oM pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mUt+ta ye na maH/ shar smad du/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH/ de'i phyi rol rtsibs mchan gyi mu khyud la sngags kyi phreng ba/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya zhes pa dgod/ mu khyud phyi ma la ka kha sum cu rtsa gnyis dgod/ /des mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sa bon
74a5(rgyud): yin no/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge AHlas bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig /phyag gnyis pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa
74a6(rgyud): phyag gnyis na ut+pa la bsnams pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i don to/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a dkar po bsgoms te/ thams cad mkhyen pa dang lam mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
74a7(rgyud): gsum gyi rang bzhin can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsgom pa'o/ /a de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas/ dang por bskyed pa'i rim pa las phyir 'phros pa'i
74b1(rgyud): mchod rten gyi bum pa'i nang nas phyir 'phros pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can nyon mongs pa lnga dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs pa dag par byas te/ sangs rgyas par byas nas/ de las kyang phyir 'phros nas rdo rje khro bo'i zhal nas byung ste/ phyogs bcu'i
74b2(rgyud): 'jig rten du khyab nas sems can gyi don byas te slar 'dus pas rim par yi ge a la thim par byas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi lha rnams su sprul la/ sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / sems can gyi don byas nas/ yang slar 'dus pas sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa bzhi ni dbus kyi gtso bo la bskor/ rigs
74b3(rgyud): lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni gtso bo la thim par bya'o/ /rigs bzhi ni glang po che'i khri la mi bskyod pa la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba/ rta'i khri la rin chen 'byung ldan la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor ba/ rma bya'i khri la snang ba mtha' yas la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis
74b4(rgyud): bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding gi khri la don yod grub pa la 'khor sems dpa' bzhis bskor bar bsgom mo/ /mtshams kyi re mig bzhi la sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /snam bu la mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go/ /sgo bzhi'i gnas su sgo ba bzhis
74b5(rgyud): bskor bar bsgoms la/ de nas/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /zhes pa nas/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /ces pa yan chad bklag par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan gyi yig 'bru 'od zer dkar po spros te 'od zer gyis sems can gyi nyon mongs pa gti mug la sogs pa dag par byas
74b6(rgyud): nas yang dag pa'i don dang ldan par byas te/ slar 'dus pas mtshan gyi sngags brgyad cu rtsa drug yod pa rigs lngar phyes te phyogs bzhi nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad chen po mi snang bar byas nas/ dbus kyi gdan la yi ge a las rnam par snang mdzad sku
74b7(rgyud): mdog dkar po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbu la ral pa gyen du 'khyil ba rgyan mi mnga' ba phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyar mdzad pa bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge d+hIHlas dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dkar la phyag mtshan gong dang mthun
75a1(rgyud): pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa la mu khyud bzhi lte ba dang bcas par bsgom mo/ /rtsibs dkar po bcu la/ oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mur+t+tA ya te na maH/ zhes pa rim par dgod do/ /gzhan ma gong ma dang mthun no/ /dbus kyi lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi
75a2(rgyud): ge a las 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ye shes spyi gzugs zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dkar po phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon na 'khor lo bsnams pa zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu rgyun gyis brgyan par bsgom mo/ /de'i
75a3(rgyud): thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge a dkar po bsgom/ de la 'od 'phros pas gong ma'i rim pa dang 'dra ba rnam par snang mdzad 'phros pas sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i gti mug dag par byas te/ slar rim par 'dus pas yi ge a la thim ste/ mtshan gyi sngags ni sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/
75a4(rgyud): zhes pa nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /zhes pa'i bar du bklag par bya'o/ /de nas sngags brjod pa tsam na sngags las 'od zer dkar po 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang po spros pas sems can kun de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su sangs rgyas par byas te/ slar 'dus pa las
75a5(rgyud): mtshan gyi sngags brgyad cu rtsa gcig yod pa rigs lngar phye ste/ sum cu rtsa bdun de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la thim/ rigs bzhi'i sku phyag rgya sum cu rtsa drug thim par bya'o/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad bsdus te shar du bkod nas/ dbus kyi yi ge hUM las mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po zhal
75a6(rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan mi mnga' ba ral pa'i dbu rgyan can phyag g.yas pas sa gnon pa bdud dang bgegs kyis mi bskyod pa'i rtags/ phyag g.yon thugs kar ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge d+hIHlas dang po'i sangs rgyas sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
75a7(rgyud): gong ma dang mthun/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo/ /de'i rtsibs brgyad la kha dog sngon po mu khyud ni dkar po/ rtsibs brgyad la/ oM duHkhats+tshe dA ya te na maH zhes pa'i yig 'bru re re dgod/ phyi ma gong ma dang mthun par bya/ dbus kyi lte ba'i yi ge hUM las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems
75b1(rgyud): dpa' sdug bsngal gcod pa zhes bya ba sku mdog sngon po rgyan gong dang 'dra ba/ phyag g.yas ral gri/ g.yon rdo rje bsnams pa/ thugs kar zla ba la hUM sngon po bsgom mo/ /de las 'od zer rim par phyir 'phros pas mi bskyod pa khro bo'i rigs kyi 'od 'phros te/ sems can thams cad kyi zhe sdang dag par
75b2(rgyud): byas te/ slar 'dus pa las yi ge hUM la thim par byas la mtshan gyi sngags ni/ rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces pa nas/ sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /ces pa'i bar du bklag par bya'o/ /'od zer sngon po khro bor spros nas sems can gyi don byas/ slar 'dus pa las mtshan
75b3(rgyud): gyi sngags bdun cu rtsa gnyis yod pa rigs lngar bsgoms la/ phyogs bzhi nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o/ /de nas mi bskyod pa slar bsdus te/ rang gi gdan la bkod nas rnam par snang mdzad nub kyi gdan la bkod de/ dbus kyi gtso bo la hrIHlas snang ba mtha' yas bskyed/ /
75b4(rgyud): sku mdog dmar po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin las mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bsgom mo/ /de'i thugs kar d+hIHlas dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom/ /de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa kha dog dmar po/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+NA ya te na maH yig 'bru
75b5(rgyud): brgyad dkod/ gzhan 'dra/ dbus su zla ba'i gdan la yi ge hrIHlas 'jam dpal rdo rje rnon po/ sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas na ral gri 'phyar ba/ g.yon pad+ma thugs kar bsnams pa/ thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la hrIHbsgom/ de las 'od zer snang ba mtha' yas spro/ sems can gyi
75b6(rgyud): 'dod chags zhi bar byas te/ slar 'dus pas yi ge hrIHla thim par byas/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /ces pa nas/ ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal/ /yan chad brjod/ 'od zer dmar po spro bar bya'o/ /slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags ni nyis brgya bdun cu rtsa lngar bgos
75b7(rgyud): la/ /dkyil 'khor la thim par byas te/ de nas snang ba mtha' yas rang gi gnas la bzhugs nas/ rnam snang lhor bkod de/ dbus kyi gtso bo yi ge a las bskyed pa rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po phyag rgyan mchog sbyin mdzad par bsgom/ /de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/
76a1(rgyud): de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ oM bA gI shwa rA ya te na maHyi ge 'bru brgyad dgod/ gzhan gong ma dang mthun/ de'i lte ba la zla ba'i steng du yi ge oM las 'jam dpal ngag gi dbang phyug sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon rin po che thugs kar bsnams pa/
76a2(rgyud): g.yas pa ral gri 'phyar ba/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge oM/ de las rin chen 'byung ldan spro/ /slar 'dus yi ge oM la thim/ /mtshan gyi sngags/ 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /zhes pa nas/ nor bu chen po rin chen tog /ces pa'i bar gyis sngags brjod
76a3(rgyud): nas/ 'od zer ser po 'phros te sems can gyi don byas/ slar 'dus pas mtshan gyi sngags brgya rtsa lnga rigs lngar bgos te/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la thim par bya'o/ /de nas rin chen 'byung ldan rang gi gnas su bkod nas/ rnam par snang mdzad byang gi gdan la bkod de/ dbus su
76a4(rgyud): gtso bo yi ge a las bskyed pa/ don yod grub pa sku mdog sna tshogs te ljang gu/ phyag gnyis skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de'i thugs kar dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo ljang gu rtsibs brgyad pa/ oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na maHzhes 'bru brgyad dgod do/ /
76a5(rgyud): gzhan gong dang mthun/ de'i dbus su zla ba'i steng du gdan la yi ge a las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes kyi spyi gtsug ces bya ba/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon pa na rdo rje rgya gram/ g.yas ral gri thugs kar 'phyar ba/ de'i thugs ka na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge a de las don yod
76a6(rgyud): grub pa spro sems can gyi don byas/ slar rim par 'dus pas yi ge a la thim par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan gyi sngags/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba/ /zhes pa nas/ 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /ces pa yan chad bklag go/ /yig 'bru las 'od ljang gu 'phros pas sems
76a7(rgyud): can gyi don byas slar 'dus pa las mtshan gyi sngags dgu bcu rtsa lnga rigs lngar bgos te/ dkyil 'khor la thim par bya'o/ /de nas don yod grub pa rang gi gnas su bkod de/ rnam par snang mdzad mi snang bar gyur nas/ dbus kyi gtso bo yi ge a las byang sems rdo rje bskyed de/ sku mdog
76b1(rgyud): dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa/ rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can bsgom/ de'i thugs kar gong ma bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas/ de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa/ oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maHyi ge 'bru re re dgod do/ /mu khyud gong ma dang mthun no/ /lte ba'i zla ba'i gdan la yi ge a
76b2(rgyud): las bskyed pa'i 'jam dpal a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba/ sku mdog dkar po g.yon pas glegs bam bsnams nas thugs kar bzhag pa/ g.yas pa ral gri 'phyar ba/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge a bsgoms nas/ de las rdo rje sems dpa' spro bar bya/ sems can
76b3(rgyud): gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byas te/ slar 'dus pas thugs ka'i a la thim par byas nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshigs bcad brjod pa yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang rnam par snang mdzad chen po dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ni spyi'i rnal 'byor yin pas 'di ltar brjod
76b4(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rigs drug lha rang gi yi dam byed pa'i tshe bsgoms nas brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bklag pa'i bsgom khog /slob dpon dpal ldan byang chub mchog gis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI
76b5(rgyud): nA ma saM gI ti nA ma ho ma kra ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi rim pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas shing dri med gzi brjid ldan pa yi/ /tshul mchog dam
76b6(rgyud): pa rim pa bzhir ldan rnal 'byor pa/ rim gnyis tshul gyis sbyin sreg cho ga bshad par bya/ /da ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sngags kyis dbang gis 'dir gsungs pa na ba'i don du zhi ba'i las bya'o/ /'byor pa'i don du rgyas pa'i las bya'o/ /dbang ni dgug pa'o/ /drag po ni
76b7(rgyud): tshar gcod pa'o/ /de'i don rgyas par bshad par bya ste/ snying rje dang dga' bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ dbang bskur ba'i thog mar zhi ba'o/ /de nas rgyas pa'o/ /de nas
77a1(rgyud): dbang dang drag po'o/ /tha mar las thams cad pa'o/ /thab dang phyag rgya dgod pa dang / /dus dang kha lta mchod rdzas dang / /bzhag thabs dang ni 'dug stangs dang / /yam shing bud shing gzar bu dang / /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin rim pa dang / /ku sha me dang sreg rdzas dang / /spyan
77a2(rgyud): drangs de la mchod pa dang / /rdzas dbul bstod de phyag bya ba/ /lhar bsgoms spyan drangs bzhugs gsol dang / /rgyas 'debs bzhi yis rgyas gdab cing / /mchod bstod dgang gzar gyis dbul bya/ /phyi ma rim gyis gong ltar dbul/ /de nas bstod pa phyag bya dang / /tha mar
77a3(rgyud): gshegs su gsol ba dang / /de nas me lha de dang ni/ /gong ma'i rim pa ji bzhin pas/ /lhag ma'i rdzas kyis mchod bya ste/ /tha mar gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /de nas gsungs te rjes su ni/ /yi rang dbul zhing rdzas dag gis/ /rim bzhin rnal 'byor gang ldan pas/ /tshul bzhin
77a4(rgyud): du ni dbul bar bya/ /de la dang po thab kyi rim pa bstan te/ /zhi ba'i thab kyi dbyibs kyang gnyis te zlum por bya ba dang / pad+ma lta bur bya'o/ /de yang kha khyer ni sor bzhi pa'o/ /zheng dang dpangs su yang de nyid do/ /thur du yang khru gang ngo / /srid du yang khru gang ngo / /de'i phyi rol du sor bzhi bor la
77a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i phreng ba'o/ /kha khyer la ni rdo rje phreng ba gtang bar bya'o/ /de yang phyi ni khru bzhi la/ /rgyar ni khru lnga'o/ /dbus su 'jim pa la 'bur du brkos la/ gtso bo'i phyag mtshan shar du rdo rje/ /lhor 'khor lo'o/ /nub du pad+ma'o/ /byang du sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /kha dog dkar po sa dkar gyi chus bsku
77a6(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i thab kyang de dang 'dra bar mthun par shes par bya'o/ /zhi ba'i thab kyi rim pa'o/ /rgyas pa'i thab kyi dbyibs gru bzhi la rgyar gru bzhir gtang ngo / /dpangs su yang khru gang la/ gting du yang khru gang brko bar bya'o/ /sor bzhi ni phyir dgyed par bya'o/ /kha khyer yang zhi ba dang mthun
77a7(rgyud): par sor bzhi'o/ /de zhing du yang sor bzhir mnyam par bya'o/ /de'i phyi rim dag tu ni pad+ma'i phreng ba gtang bar bya'o/ /kha khyer la yang gong du smos pa ltar rdo rje phreng ba gtang bar bya'o/ /de'i nang du yang gtso bo'i mtshan ma 'jim pa la dkyus su sor brgyad/ dpangs su sor gcig go/ /rgyas pa'i thab kyi
77b1(rgyud): rim pa'o/ /dbang gi thab ni rgyar khru gsum la dbyibs zla gam dang gzhu lta bu'o/ /rgya la ni sor bzhi bcu'o/ /drag po la ni sor nyi shu tham pa gtang ngo / /gting zabs ni sor bcu'o/ /kha khyer la ni sor phyed dang gsum mo/ /zheng dang dpangs mnyam par shes par bya'o/ /kha khyer la ni rdo rje phreng ba'o/ /
77b2(rgyud): de'i phyi rol du me ri 'bar ba'i 'od gtang bar bya'o/ /kha dog ni tsan+dan nam btsag yug sman gyis bsku bar bya'o/ /dbus su ni gtso bo'i phyag mtshan pad+ma la bzhugs pa mtshan ma gong ma ltar 'bur du brkos la gzhag go/ /phyi ma ni zhi ba'i thab kyi skabs dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /dbang gi thab
77b3(rgyud): kyi rim pa'o/ / //drag po'i thab kyi rim pa ni/ thab khung dbyibs gru gsum pa/ dgra bsad pa lta bu la rgyar ni sor nyi shu'o/ /zabs su ni bcu'o/ /kha khyer ni sor gsum pa zheng du yang de nyid do/ /phyi rol du gtang ba sor gsum mo/ kha khyer la rdo rje rtse mo gsum pa'o/ /
77b4(rgyud): de'i phyi rol du ni ral gri la sogs pa drag po'i mtshan ma sna tshogs pa'o/ /dbus su yang gtso bo'i mtshan ma la ral gris mtshan pa 'jim pa la 'bur du brkos pa gong du bstan pa dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /drag po'i thab dang mtshan ma'i rim pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu des ji tsam na
77b5(rgyud): bya ba'i zhi ba la snga dro'o/ /rgyas pa la nyi ma phyed na'o/ /dbang la nyi ma bsnyur na'o/ /drag po la ni nam phyed na bya'o/ /zhi ba la nam langs na'o/ /rgyas pa la ni tho rangs bya'o/ /dbang la ni dgongs ka ste srod la bya'o/ /drag po la nam phyed na bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni dbyar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni
77b6(rgyud): ston gyi dus su bya'o/ /dbang ni dpyid kyi dus su bya'o/ /drag po ni dgun gyi dus su ste dus kyi rim pa'o/ /mchod pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor pa sngags pa'i g.yon du ni dri chab kyi chu me tog nang du blugs pa'i dung phor ram dngul phor ro/ /yon chab ni gser la sogs pas bkang ba'i chu
77b7(rgyud): dag gzhag go/ /rnal 'byor pa'i g.yas su ni zangs gzhong lta bu'i nang dris bkang la ku sha yang der bcug /bsang gtor gyi snod gzhag go/ /las kyi bum pa yang g.yon du gzhag go /mchod pa'i rim pa'o// //rdzas kyi rim pa yang zhi ba la ni til lo/ /rgyas pa la ni zho'o/ /
78a1(rgyud): dbang la ni ut+pa la'o/ /drag po la ni tsher ma can nam khab rtse gsum pa ste/ 'di ni khyad par gyi rdzas so/ /de yang thun mong gi rdzas ni mar gyi snying po dang dUr ba dang chag pa med pa'i 'bras dang zho zan dang ku sha dang 'bras thug dang mngar gsum dang / dkar gsum dang 'bras sa ba dang / nas dang
78a2(rgyud): sran ma ma sha dang / gro dang u dum+WA ra dang / a shwat+tha dang pa la sha dang / n+ya gro d+ha dang a mra dang / de yang thams cad du mi lcogs na/ mar dang til ni zhi ba'i dus su bya'o/ /mar dang zho ni rgyas pa'i dus su bya'o/ /mar dang ut+pal ni dbang gi dus su bya'o/ /mar dang mi rus kyi phye ma'am tsher ma can gyi shing
78a3(rgyud): ni drag po'i dus su bya'o/ /de yang thams cad du ni til zhes gsungs so/ /rdzas kyi rim pa'o// //bzhag pa'i rim pa ni sngags pa'i mdun du ni mi ro til dang zho dang ut+pa la dang / mi rus kyi phye ma ni g.yas su bzhag go/ /dUr ba la sogs pa thun mong gi rdzas thams cad ni g.yon du'o/ /'bras
78a4(rgyud): so ba dang nas dang sran ma sha dang / gro dang u dum+WA ra dang / a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro d+ha dang / a mra rnams g.yas su'o/ /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar ni mdun du'o/ /rdzas bzhag pa'i rim pa'o// //rnal 'byor pa'i 'dug stangs zhi ba la ni mnyam pa'i skyil krung du stan ras bal gyi steng du'o/ /rgyas pa
78a5(rgyud): la ni g.yas rkyang gis te sems dpa'i 'dug stangs so/ /dbang la ni pad+ma'i 'dug stangs te rkang pa'i mthil sprad la 'dug go /drag po la ni g.yas brkyang dang / g.yon brkyang gis stan med par mig bzlog ste gnas par bya'o/ /'dug stangs kyi rim pa'o// //gzar bu'i rim pa ni/ /zhi ba
78a6(rgyud): la ni dngul lam rgya shug gi shing la srid du khru gang sboms su yu ba la mthe bo'i tshad do/ /sor bzhi ni zheng ngo / /sor gnyis ni dpangs su'o/ /khu ba 'dzag pa'i bu ga sor gcig yod pa rtse mo la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa/ /dkyil du ni las dang mthun pa'i thab kyi skabs su smos pa'i phyag rgyab rko
78a7(rgyud): ba'am/ 'bur du byas pa khal yaM raM bkod de/ /yu ba la rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa ni dgang gzar gyi tshad dang rim pa'o// //blugs gzar yang yu ba ni gong dang mthun la dbyibs ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba la sor gcig /gting du brko ba byas pa sor gnyis zheng du bcal ba'i blugs gzar te/ phyi
78b1(rgyud): ma ni dgang gzar dang mthun no/ /rgyas pa la ni gser ram a sho ka'i shing la byas te/ phyi ma ni gong ma dang mthun par shes par bya'o/ /dbang ni zangs ma dang tsan+dan la bya'o/ /drag po ni lcags sam tsher ma can gyi shing la drag po'i las la shis pa rnams la bya'o/ /tshad dang dbyibs ni so so'i bye brag dang
78b2(rgyud): mthun pa la zhi ba la yang shes par bya zhing / de la ltos pas ma bris so/ /gzar bu'i rim pa'o// //sngags pa kha lta phyogs kyang / zhi ba la ni sngags pa kha shar du blta'o/ /rgyas pa'i dus su sngags pa kha byang du blta'o/ /dbang gi dus su sngags pa kha nub tu blta'o/ /drag po'i dus su sngags pa
78b3(rgyud): kha lhor blta'o/ /sngags pa kha lta ba'i rim pa'o// //rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa yang / dang po zhi ba la gnas te/ /thams cad stong pa'i ting 'dzin bya/ /zhes bdag gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du raM las ye shes kyi me bsams te/ /sgyu ma'i phung po bsreg par bya/ /de la slar sos ye shes lus/ /
78b4(rgyud): de 'og rnam pa lnga po bsgom/ /yongs su dag pa'i me long la/ /dngos po snang ba 'di dag yul/ /ma lus so sor snang ba bzhin/ /ma lus yongs su dag pa yi/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes la/ /goms par bya ste bsam par bya/ /de 'og snying rje'i sems ldan pas/ /mgon med skyabs bral
78b5(rgyud): sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor rab tu bying / /de dag kun gyi don du ni/ /sdug bsngal thams cad las gdon phyir/ /stong pa'i chos la mnyam sbyor bas/ /ma lus kun kyang de ltar bsgom/ /dam chos de la dmigs pa yi/ /bdag tu ma grub de rtogs pas/ /mnyam nyid
78b6(rgyud): ye shes bskyed par bya/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NAM A d+ya nu t+pan na twA ta/ sngags de ched du brjod par bya/ /sngags don 'di rtsom rnal 'byor pas/ /dmigs med chos la rab gzung phyir/ yul du de nyid byas te bdag /dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje yis/ /so sor brtags te gnas par bya/ /de nas snying rje'i
78b7(rgyud): rjes 'gro bas/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa kun bral ba'i/ /ngo bo nyid kyi 'od gsal ba'i/ /yan lag med cing yongs dag pa/ /chos dbyings rgyu mthun ngo bo med/ /de don stong nyid la gnas pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsgom/ /de ltar sems can thams cad kyi/ /don dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /
79a1(rgyud): sngon gyi smon lam rjes dran cing / /sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang thob nas/ /sems can don ni rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /srid gsum 'byung ba'i khyad par gyis/ /don dam kun rdzob mya ngan 'das/ /bya ba nan tan dran par bya'o/ /de ltar rnam pa lnga po bsgom/ /yongs su dag
79a2(rgyud): pa'i bsam gtan 'di/ /rnal 'byor ba la rab 'jug pas/ /dngos po gnyis la khyad par byas/ /yongs su dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// //de nas mngon par byang chub pa/ /rnam pa lnga po bsgoms nas ni/ /yi ge phreng ba'i khyad par gyis/ /'byung 'jug don la rab gnas pa/ /hUM zhes pa ni
79a3(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ /hUM las 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /'od kyi rtse las lha yi tshogs/ /grangs ni rdul snyed rab sprul nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing du khyab byas nas/ /sems can ma lus kun la khyab/ /de ltar slar ni 'dus pa las/ /sems bskyed sdom pa gzung ba dang / /rjes su yi rang gsol ba
79a4(rgyud): gdab/ /skyabs su mchi zhing sdig pa bshags/ /bdag dbul la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /de nas hUM gi byin brlabs las/ /khro gtum mi thub zhal drug pa/ /zhing drug 'od kyis rab khyab ste/ /'dus pas ye shes rtse lnga pa/ /rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya/ /de yi bum pa'i dkyil nyid du/ /yi ge
79a5(rgyud): mdog dkar b+h+rUM bsam bya/ /de 'phros gyur pas rin po che/ /mchod rten lta bu rab tu bsgom/ /de nas hrIHyi yi ge las/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa/ /de las sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /de 'og hrIHlas bsam bya ba/ /ma lus rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /bsgom par bya ba 'di lta ste/ /dang po'i sangs
79a6(rgyud): rgyas bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas de yi snying ga ru/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid de/ /gtso bo ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /'jam dpal snying gi zla steng bsam/ /de yi snying ga'i zla ba la/ /a ni yig 'bru mchog bsgom bya/ /de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don byas te/ /'dug pas bdag
79a7(rgyud): gi phung po bsreg / de nyid zhu las bskyed pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /me yi lha ni bsgom par bya/ /shin tu rid pa brang rus can/ /dbu la ye shes sems dpas brgyan/ /phyag bzhi thor tshugs rgyan gyis brgyan so so'i las dang mthun pa yi/ /kha dog ming gi rnam grangs kyang / /bsdus
79b1(rgyud): na rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus/ /zhi ba'i me lha b+ha ba ka /rgyas pa la ni ma na ste/ /dbang la dmar ser du yang bstan/ /drag po la ni mngon spyod do/ /de yi snying gar zla ba bsam/ /de yi steng du yi ge a/ /de gyur b+huM legs bsgom par bya/ /shin tu mdzes pa de las ni/ /khyad par che ba'i gzhal yas khang / /
79b2(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /twa ra na bzhis legs mdzes pa/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rnga ma dril bu 'phan la sogs/ /de sogs glang seng rnams dang ldan/ /shin tu legs pa'i gzhal yas khang / /shar ni gre ba'i sgo ru ste/ /de las gsum yang shes par bya/ /de dbus
79b3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rim pa ni/ /gsum mam bzhi'am drug tu bshad/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha yi tshogs/ /a yi byin brlabs dag pa ste/ /so so sku gsung thugs ldan bya/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /lha rnams 'khor lo rab ldan pas/ /bzhugs dang spyan drang la sogs dang / /
79b4(rgyud): rgyas gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /ma lus pa ni sngags pas bya/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa'o// //de nas ku sha'i rim pa yang / /ku sha la so so'i sngags bzla zhing / me thab kyi tha ma thams cad du yang rtse mos rtsa ba non par byas la bskor/ rnal 'byor pa'i gdan du yang gding / mgo dang
79b5(rgyud): lus dang yan lag thams cad du yang gzugs par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha la ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha/ sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes brjod de pro k+Sha NaM bya'o/ /ku sha'i rim pa'o// //de nas me'i rim pa yang zhi ba'i me ni rgyal bo dang bram ze'i khyim nas blang ngo / /rgyas pa'i me ni rje rigs kyi
79b6(rgyud): khyim nas blang ngo / /dbang gi me ni smad 'tshong ma'i khyim nas blang ngo / /drag po'i me ni yugs sa mo'am gdol ba'i khyim nas blang ngo / /yang na zhi ba'i me ni shel las so/ /rgyas pa'i me ni gtsubs pa las so/ /dbang gi me ni thang shing so sor sdud pa las so/ /drag po'i me ni lcags nag las so/ /de dag
79b7(rgyud): kyang rlung yab kyis dz+wa la dz+wa la zhes pa'i sngags kyis sbar ro/ /zhi ba la shar nas gzhug go/ /rgyas pa la lho nas gzhug go/ /dbang ni nub nas gzhug go/ /drag po ni byang nas so/ /de yang rgyal rigs sam/ /bram ze'i rigs kyis zhi ba'i me gzhug go/ /rje rigs kyis rgyas pa'i me gzhug go/ /smad
80a1(rgyud): 'tshong ma'i bu'i 'am dmangs kyi dbang gis me gzhug go/ /yugs sa mo'am gdol pa mos drag po'i me gzhug go/ /me'i rim pa'o// //sreg rdzas kyi rim pa yang dang por mar las dgang blugs bdun dbul/ de'i 'og tu mchod pa'i bye brag gis mchod/ de nas rgyas gdab
80a2(rgyud): de nas pro k+Sha NaM bya/ de nas phyag byas la phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas bstim mo/ /de nas ye shes gnas pa'i lha rnams gnyis su med par byas la/ de nas dril bu'i sgras mnyes par byas la/ de nas gzar bu gnyis kyi nang du a bsams te/ de las bdud rtsir gyur par bsams la lag pa'i gung
