138b1(rgyud): pa dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / rin chen 'byung ldan rnams 'khor dang bcas par gyur par bsam/ /lha re re'i spyi bo na yang a dkar po re re yod par bsam pa de'i phyir/ a yis kun khyab spyi steng bsam/ /lhar gyur lha ni sngon bzhin bsam/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas
138b2(rgyud): rang rang gi spyi bo'i a las 'od 'phros pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi bcud bsdus te kha dog lnga dang ldan par byas te/ rang rang gi spyi bor thim pa las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan par byas te/ lus thams cad ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gnas
138b3(rgyud): pa'o/ /de'i phyir/ a las ye shes lngas gang nas/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /phan pa'i gnod sbyin chus btab la/ /zhes pa ni chu gtsang la oM badzra yak+Sha hUM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ phung po lnga'i rnam par rtog pa sbyang ba'i phyir sngon du gsungs pa'i lha tshogs la sku
138b4(rgyud): khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir/ dang po bkru ba las yin te/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas a yi 'phro 'du las/ /zhes pa ni bdag gi thugs kar a dkar po bsam/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas 'gro drug gi bag chags sbyangs/ tshe las 'das pa'i shes pa bkug
138b5(rgyud): la/ ro la bcug la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la thim par bsam mo/ /de ni sngon gyi cho ga'o zhes pa ni de ltar gong du gsungs nas ni ro'i sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga yin no zhes pa'o/ /de nas zhes pa ni gong du 'gro ba byas pa'i de ma thag pa nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga 'di bshad
138b6(rgyud): do zhes pa'i don to/ /shi ba dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag ste/ /zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i ro de maN+Dal gyi dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la gzhag go/ /zhag gsum slob dpon smyung gnas pa/ /zhes pa/ zhag gsum kha zas kyi tshod bzung la/ dkar
138b7(rgyud): gsum la sogs pa bza' zhing / nyin re la thun gsum gsum lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /bgegs bskrad la sogs byas nas ni/ /zhes pa/ thun re re la lho sgo'i cho ga re re la'o/ /de yang rgyud nyid las/ sems can kun gyi ngan song gsum/ /sbyong bar byed pa'i
139a1(rgyud): 'dzum bstan nas/ /zhes pa dang / /ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog /ces gsungs so/ /'khor lo lha rnams mdun bsam ste/ /zhes pa ni de ltar zhag gsum du byas pa'i nang par 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM many+dzu
139a2(rgyud): shrI badzra tsakra hUM zhes brjod pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsams la/ de la mchod pa'i phyir/ phyag btsal rdo rje bskyed sogs bya/ /zhes pa bcu yongs su dag pa dang sdom pa gzung bar byas la de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i/ tshe 'dir dang por 'bras bu
139a3(rgyud): yod/ /ces pa nas/ 'di la dbang ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes pa yan chad brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bya'o/ /de nas sgo dbye ba bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rab tu
139a4(rgyud): brkyang / /mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel/ /sgo dbye ba yi phyag rgya ste/ /oM many+dzu shrI badzra d+ha rong+g+ha Ta ya hUM phaT ces brjod de/ gzhal yas khang sgo dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rjer sgrub pa dang / tshogs bsags pa yan chad 'dir shes par bya'o/ /de nas sngags rings kyis lha thams
139a5(rgyud): cad gsal bar byas la/ thun gsum gyi rnal 'byor zhag bzhi ru bya'o/ /de nas gang zhig de nyid la/ /zhes pa nas/ shi ba sta gon la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes pa yan chad kyis don la gnas par bya ste/ dkyus nyid gsal lo/ /de nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'dri ba'i
139a6(rgyud): tshe/ /dang po sangs rgyas nga rgyal dang / /zhes pa nas/ mngon sum 'dra bar gang bar bsgom/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis gsol ba gdab pa ste/ dkyus gsal lo/ /de nas bri ba bstan pa'i phyir/ /shi la phan gdags dkyil 'khor ldan/ /zhes gsungs te/ de'i don ni rdo rje dbyings
139a7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor lta bu la dbus kyi pho brang me thab tu byas la/ gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba/ /zhes pa ro sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor yin no zhes pa'i don to/ /'di las gsungs te gzhan du zhes pa ni gong du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de lta bu ni ro sbyong ba'i don du yin gyi dbang bskur ba la
139b1(rgyud): sogs pa'i don du ni ma yin no zhes pa'i don to/ /zhag bdun nang par sbyin sreg bya/ /zhes pa ni/ de ltar ro la bsnyen pa zhag bdun du byas nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i tshe sbyin sreg bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /de yang ji ltar bya zhe na/ de nas phyi yi rim ldan pas/ /zhes
139b2(rgyud): gsungs te/ phyi'i rim ldan ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bgegs bskrad pa dang / gar la sogs pa'i rol mos mchod pa dang phung po la sogs pa drang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /de yang ji ltar zhe na/ sngags pa chas gos ldan pa yis/ /shin tu bsgyings pa ldan byas te/ /
139b3(rgyud): zhes gsungs te/ chas gos ldan pa ni dbu rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / mgul rgyan dang / do shal dang / mgur chu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / sor gdub dang / rkang rgyan dang / gos ni stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs so/ /ldan pa ni de rnams 'dzom
139b4(rgyud): pa'o/ /bsgyings pa ni shin tu 'gying bag dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor bar bya zhes pa'i don to/ /de nas sngon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga rnams ni dpyad par bya/ /dang po'i cho ga'i rim pa nas/ /'khor lo'i rim pa 'di gsungs te/ /zhes pa ni/ lce lag
139b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa nas/ gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad bya ste/ de nas gzod ro de me thab tu bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog dang / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa yan chad byas te/ gzod me sbar bar bya'o/ /de yang ji ltar sbar
139b6(rgyud): zhe na/ sngon du zhi ba'i skabs su ji ltar 'dir yang rgyas par byas la gzod bsreg pa'i las byas te/ de la yang gsum ste/ ro mchod gnas su bsreg pa dang / ro ltar bsreg pa dang / ro sreg rdzas su bsreg pa dang gsum du shes par byas la bsreg go/ /rdzas dbul la sogs
139b7(rgyud): pa'i rim pa sngon du shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir/ me nyid shi ba'i gnas sbyangs te/ /zhes gsungs pa kho na'o/ /de nas khrus byas mchod pa'i tshogs/ /zhes pa ni/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi chus bsangs la/ me tog la sogs pa lnga dang lha mo brgyad dang / de las
140a1(rgyud): gzhan pa'i mchod pa dang / mchod pa nyi shu pas kyang mchod pa /bstod pa rnams kyis bstod do/ /de'i phyir/ ma lus par ni 'dir bshad do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs pa ltar phyogs skyong la gtor ma sbyin no/ /
140a2(rgyud): de nas de la lam bstan bya/ /tshogs bsag dge ba'i don la sbyar/ /zhes pa'i don ni lho sgro'i cho ga las shes par bya'o/ /de mthar bdag nyid rtogs sgom dang / /zhes pa ni de ltar byas pa'i rjes la bdag nyid mi dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /de nyid mnyam shes pa
140a3(rgyud): ni bdag nyid yang dag pa'i thugs dang / tshe las 'das pa'i shes pa gnyis mnyam zhing dbyer med par shes par bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /cis mi tshugs zhes pa ni de ltar rtogs na nyon mongs pa gang gis kyang mi tshugs so zhes pa'i don to/ /de la rtag gnas bde ldan dang /
140a4(rgyud): zhes pa ni/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi don de la rtag par gnas na yang dag pa'i ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i don bde ba dang ldan no zhes pa'i don to/ /de ltar bsgom pa'i don bstan nas skabs 'dir ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste/
140a5(rgyud): sngon du bsnyen pa'i skabs su ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba ni rim pas/ a'i dang nyid du zhes gsungs te/ rim pa ni ye shes kyi rdo rje mchod rten la thim/ mchod rten chos 'byung la thim/ /rdo rje rgya gram la de gzhal yas khang
140a6(rgyud): la/ de lha tshogs la/ de gzhi'i sangs rgyas la/ de dang po'i sangs rgyas la/ de shes rab 'khor lo la/ de ye shes sems dpa' la/ de zla ba la/ de a la thim mo/ /de nyid la a'i ngang nyid du/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar bdag gi ngo bo yi ge a dkar po'i ngang nyid du gnas
140a7(rgyud): pas/ de yang bdag lus as khyab pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de nas a de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi shes pa 'od du zhu nas thig le byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i ngang du rtogs te/ nye ba'i dpes mtshon na 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gnas te/ de kho na
140b1(rgyud): la/ de nyid a yi byin rlabs la/ /a nyid dbyings kyi ngang nyid du/ /thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar gsungs pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor ba'o/ /de yan chad shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o// //de nas 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi'i don bstan
140b2(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ de nas 'khor lo bstan pa zhes pa'i don ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di nyid yin no/ /de yang / bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /zhes gsungs te/ lus la 'khor lo bzhi gnas te/ /lte ba shes rab
140b3(rgyud): 'khor lo ste/ /rtsibs ni bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/ /dang po'i rtsibs nas brtsams te dgod pa ni/ a A aM AHa A aM AHa A aM AHgnas so/ /rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o/ /pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte ba la mi bskyod pa/ de nas rdo rje sems
140b4(rgyud): dpa'/ rgyal po chags pa legs pa/ sems ma rdo rje ma sgeg mo dang / bdug spos ma dang / sgo ba lcags kyu dang / byams pa 'jam dpal/ spos kyi glang po ye shes tog dang bcu gnyis so/ /lte bar shes rab 'khor lo grags/ /snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ni bcu
140b5(rgyud): gnyis rtsibs dang ldan pa la/ rim pa bzhin du dang por a gdod/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aHdgod par bya'o/ /rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o/ /pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan/ rdo rje rin chen/ nyi ma/
140b6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan/ bzhad pa/ rin chen sems ma dang / me tog ma dang / phreng ba ma dang / sgo ba zhags pa/ bzang skyong / blo gros rgya mtsho/ blo gros mi zad pa/ spobs pa brtsegs pa dang bcu gnyis so/ /'di ni snying ga'i shes rab 'khor lo'o/ /mgrin pa shes rab
140b7(rgyud): 'khor lo ni/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan/ /rim bzhin rtsibs gcig pa la a/ /a ra pa tsa na/ wA gI shwa ra pradz+nyA na maHdgod/ rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o/ /pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni/ /lte ba la snang ba mtha' yas/ rdo rje chos rgyu/ smra ba/ rnon po
141a1(rgyud): chos kyi sems ma dang / glu ma/ mar me ma/ sgo ba lcags sgrog /mthu chen thob dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan 'joms dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang bcu gnyis so/ /mgrin pa shes rab 'khor lor grags/ /spyi bo shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /bcu
141a2(rgyud): gnyis rtsibs dang yang dag ldan/ /rtsibs dang por ha ra ha ra/ ta thA ga ta/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mU rti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA wA tsa sarba d+ha rma ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH rtag pa shes rab yig 'bru'i 'khor lo'o/ /pho brang lha'i 'khor lo ni lte ba la don yod grub pa/
141a3(rgyud): rdo rje las dang / srung ba dang / gnod sbyin khu tshur/ las kyi sems ma/ gar ma dri chab ma/ sgo ba dril bu/ zla 'od/ 'od dpag med/ nam mkha' mdzod/ sgrib pa sel ba/ mtshog ma shes rab 'khor lor grags/ /ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal/ /zhes pa bzhu
141a4(rgyud): btul ni 'khor lo'i gdams ngag bla ma las shes par bya'o/ /de ni pho brang lha'i dkyil 'khor dang / lus gnas rtsa'i 'khor lo dang / lhag pa shes rab kyi 'khor lo dang gsum gsal bar bstan to/ /de ltar bsgoms pas 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ de ltar rtag tu gang bsgom pa/ /zhes pa ni/ rigs
141a5(rgyud): kyi bu gang la la zhig gis de ltar bsgoms na 'og nas 'byung ba'i gzhon nu'i gzugs can bde ba thob ces gsungs pa ste/ gzhon nu ni 'jam dpal lo/ /gzugs can ni de'i sku la mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /bde ba thob pa ni de'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes thob
141a6(rgyud): pa'o/ /drag 'dzin lus ni ngan 'gro'o/ /de dag spangs nas zhes pa ni/ /gong du gsungs pa'i don de ltar bsgoms pas khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i gzhan gyi don phyin ci ma log pa yang grub ste/ rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs su skye bas
141a7(rgyud): na/ /rang dga'i lus su skye bar nges/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas/ des sa bcu la bgrod par bstan pa ni/ dkyus nyid gsal lo/ /de ni shes rab 'khor lo bsgom pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma de dbang bskur bar bya ba'i phyir/ de nas/
141b1(rgyud): 'di ni dbang bskur dam par gsungs/ /zhes pa ni/ sngon du lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma de 'dir dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /de ma bskur na cir 'gyur zhe na/ dbang bskur med na dngos grub med/ /ces gsungs te/ de nas slob dpon gyis bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir/
141b2(rgyud): yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa zhes gsungs te/ yon tan ldan pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i sngon du slob dpon nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/ dbang blang ba la sogs pa byas la/ gzod slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /des cir
141b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhe na/ de la dbang byin yon tan grub/ /ces gsungs te/ de nas slob ma gzhug par bstan pa'i phyir/ dang po khrus byas rgyan gon te/ zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te slob dpon du 'os pa'i bla mas las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la rdo rje sems dpar
141b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs gyon la/ oM badzra tI kaSh+Na hUM phaT ces bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs dmar po bcings la/ yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su blangs te/
141b5(rgyud): de'i snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa bon gyi rnam par bkod la phyogs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byed du bcug la/ de nas sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes pa'i
141b6(rgyud): sngags kyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'dzin du gzhug cing de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bsgo ba bya ste/ skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu/ /khyod ni ci dang ci la dga'/ /'dod don gang yin khyod kyis smros/ /de nas
141b7(rgyud): slob mas 'di skad ces/ /bdag ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rab tu blta bar bgyi ba dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu/ /bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal lags so/ /de rjes slob dpon dam pas kyang / /'di skad ces ni brjod par bya/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba
142a1(rgyud): rnams kyis gsungs/ /gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i/ /yang gsang dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /bdag gis bu khyod gzhug par bgyi/ /grong khyer la yang grong khyer de/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong mchog tu/ /bu khyod rab tu gnas par bgyi/ /skal dang /
142a2(rgyud): ldan pa khyod kyis kyang / /lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshol la/ /sdig pa ma lus sbyang byas nas/ /sdom pa rnams ni legs par zung / /mchog tu sems kyang bskyed par gyis/ /ces brjod do/ /de nas don dang ldan pa'i slob ma 'khor dang bcas pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la phyag byas la/
142a3(rgyud): bcu yongs su dag pa nas sdom pa gzung ba yan chad byed du gzhug go/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo'o/ /ding khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/
142a4(rgyud): de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par byas kyis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig /dam tshig nyam par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig
142a5(rgyud): gis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig phyag rgya 'di nyid dang mna' chu'i snying pos sngags la slob mas 'thung du gzhug go/ /de'i mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ hUM rdo rje dam tshig deng khyod nyid/ /snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis/ /gal
142a6(rgyud): te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzra u da ka ThaH/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /gal te dkyil 'khor
142a7(rgyud): ma mthong smras/ /skye bo'i tshogs na 'dug pa'am/ /dad pa med la bstan mi bya/ /de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo'o/ /deng phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis pa la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde
142b1(rgyud): ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur zhes smos shig par bsgo'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur ba nyid du rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya
142b2(rgyud): bcings la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /oM badzra A be+e sha aHzhes brjod do/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas de'i snying gar zhugs te rdo rje sems dpa'
142b3(rgyud): 'bab par gyur par bsams na 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yang ho a ha zhes bya ba yang rang gi snying ga la bkod la/ se'u'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi snying gar nges par byung la/ /badzra ban+d+ha trata ces pas de'i snying ga phye la der bcug ste rdo rje
142b4(rgyud): dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bar gyur par bsams na yang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gis bdun nam brgyad rdzogs pas kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya/ /yig
142b5(rgyud): brgya phyed pas mnyam gzhag brtan byas nas/ /bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo phye zhing / /snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta/ /sngags kyi bdag po yi ge a dmar gsungs/ /brjod pas yang dag chags pas g.yo bar blta/ /slob ma'i lus 'di sgo ni dbye byas
142b6(rgyud): par/ /zhugs nas rdo rje byas pa'i snying la gnas/ /ma lus lus pa kun du bkang nas su/ /rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas ni/ /sngags pas slob ma'i snying ga de la dbab/ /kun du dril bu'i sgra ni yang dag dkrol/ /lag pa pad+ma 'dab ma'i phyag rgya byas/ /mi
142b7(rgyud): bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams/ /rang gi phyogs phyogs nas byon 'od phab pas/ /legs babs gyur pas rang gi bu la blta/ /gang zhig des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ /lag pa g.yas par til gyi sa bon gzhag/ /dbus su yi ge hUM yang rnam bkod de/ /
143a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'od 'bar ba ni rnam par bsam/ /g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub phyag rgyar byas pa yis/ /blang bar byas la me la sbyin sreg bya/ /lus ni thal bar byas la rnam dag pa'i/ /bsod nams lus la'ang sngags kyi 'od kyis dgang / /ye shes bab ba nyid du bsams nas ni/ /rdzas
143a2(rgyud): bzhin 'bab pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /la la dag gis legs par bshad pa na/ /mche ba'i myu gu cung zad gtsigs pa yis/ /rtse mo 'od dkar g.yo zhing dgod pa'i zhal/ /smin ma gdengs pas phyogs bcu ma lus pa/ /'brug sgra lta bu hUM ni 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /sangs rgyas me tog chun
143a3(rgyud): phreng gnyis btags pa/ /'od chen sna tshogs ldan par rang gi lus bsgoms la/ /sngags pas rang gi bu yi mig phye ste/ /'khor lo 'di dag ma lus bstan par bya/ /gang tshe der ni ci yang ma mthong na/ /rang las byung ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis/ /de yi snying la snang bar byas la de nas ni/ /
143a4(rgyud): 'di ni nyis 'gyur mig tu 'gyur bar bsam/ /de yi 'od kyis mig gnyis bskul bas na/ /de tshe cung zad nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /des kyang de bzhin mtshan ma ma mthong na/ /rjes mthun gnas pas bden pa'i byin rlabs bya/ /'gro ba'i don la chags bral ma mdzad ces/ /brtul
143a5(rgyud): zhugs can gyis der sogs kyis bskul zhing / /pus mo gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas ni/ /gzugs mthong phyir ni mchod pa dbul bar bya/ /de babs te/ babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur zhing / ye shes des ni pha rol sems su 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba
143a6(rgyud): la sogs pa rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying ga'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod par bya'o/ /'di ltar bdag gi slob ma 'di/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug nas/ /lha yi
143a7(rgyud): rigs kyi rim pa dag / 'di yi bsod nams ci 'dra las/ /de bzhin du ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /'di ni dngos grub gang grub pa/ /rigs ni gang gi snod gyur dang / /bsod nams mthu ni gang yod pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /de nas/ sangs
143b1(rgyud): rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/ /'gro la phan pa'i gtso chen gyis/ /sman par dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ /hUM pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor ro/ /de nas dngos grub rab 'bring me tog 'bab
143b2(rgyud): pa las brtag par bya ste/ lha rnams kyi khyad par dang gnas kyi khyad par las brtags te/ gang tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /dbu la me tog 'bab 'gyur na/ /de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur bas gdon mi za/ /spyan la sogs pa rnams kyang ni/ /zhal du babs
143b3(rgyud): par gyur pa na/ /stod du babs na mchog rnams grub/ /rked du babs na 'bring rnams grub/ /ro smad phyogs su babs na ni/ /dngos grub tha ma rnams 'grub 'gyur/ /bar gyi sku la babs na ni/ /snying po la sogs grub par 'gyur/ /smad du babs par gyur na ni/ /mngag gzhug la sogs
143b4(rgyud): grub par 'gyur/ /rim pa de dag thams cad ni/ /rim bzhin rnam par shes par bya/ /de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang / /dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /gal te lha yi gzugs dag la/ /me tog ring du lhung gyur na/ /de yi dngos grub yun rings 'grub/ /nye na dngos
143b5(rgyud): grub myur du 'grub/ /gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag /gang du bkram pa'i tshul can ni/ /de yi sa ris de yin te/ /me tog der lhung de yi rigs/ /lha gnyis kyi ni bar dag tu/ /gal te nges par babs gyur na/ /gang du nye ba de yi rigs/ /gal te la la'i me tog ni/ /
143b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mang po 'das nas bab/ /de la dngos grub mi 'grub cing / /bsod nams dad pa rab tu chung / /gal te me tog dor ba dag /ra ba'i ri mo la bab na/ /zhi ba byas nas de dag gdod/ /nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug /de ste the tshom gyur na ni/ /mkhas pas
143b7(rgyud): bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug / de ni gang yang nye med pas/ /des ni dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa na/ /don med phyi rol lhung na ni/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /de nas me tog dor du gzhug /snying por me tog babs pa ni/ /rtag tu don med mi
144a1(rgyud): 'gyur bshad/ /srad bu dag ni cho ga bzhin/ /de yi nye 'khor shes par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis/ /me tog rnams ni dor ba las/ /bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ba/ /de la zhi ba brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas/ /de ni
144a2(rgyud): slar yang dor du gzhug / lan gsum spogs te 'dor na yang / /gal te legs par ma bab na/ /re thag bcad de slar gtang bya/ /de nas me tog babs pa las/ /lha yang dag par shes byas nas/ /phreng ba blangs te sngags 'di brjod/ /oM pra ti gr-i h+Na rwa mi satwa ma hA
144a3(rgyud): ba la zhes brjod la de'i mgo la bcing ngo ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan ma nye bar mtshon nas/ /de la mig gis ji ltar mthong zhes dri'o/ /des ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gal te kha dog snang bar mthong na/ /de la dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes
144a4(rgyud): bslab par bya'o zhes rgya cher sbyar ro/ /de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol te/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /mig gi ling tog bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /badzra tsak+Shu he badzra pA sha zhes brjod do/ /de nas gdong
144a5(rgyud): g.yogs dkrol nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya/ /de nas bla ma dga' 'gyur nas/ /slob ma de la 'di skad bsgo/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang rigs pas byin gyis
144a6(rgyud): brlabs/ /'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang / /thams cad khyod la mngon du gyur/ /dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na bshad par bya ste/ mi mnyam med pas zur bzhir snyoms/ /dran dang
144a7(rgyud): dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan rta babs rnam pa bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya/ /khyams la brten pa rdo rje'i gdan/ /gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa yi/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /gdul bya
144b1(rgyud): bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yis/ /me long ye shes rtag mi rtog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog /nyi ma zla bar yang dag ldan/ /kun grub mi zad bde ba ste/ /bde ba chen po zhes grags so/ /de yi nang gi dkyil
144b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi/ /ka ba dkyil 'khor dra ba ni/ /dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i/ /rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ /mdo sde'i 'khor lo bskor bas na/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs btab cing / /thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs/ /gang du 'jug pa de tsam
144b3(rgyud): gyis/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi log pa/ /bde ba chen po rab grub phyir/ /de dag dbang por yang dag 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya dang snying po yang bshad par bya ste/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te/ mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi bar du bstan par bya'o/ /de nas me long bstan par bya ste/
144b4(rgyud): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung / /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos 'di shes nas su/ /sems can don ni mnyan par byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su
144b5(rgyud): skyes/ /zhes sgyu ma lta bur bstan to/ /de nas bla ma de la yon gyi mchog phul te/ gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ 'di zhes bgyi ba rdo rje can/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgom pa/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni phyag kyang 'tshal/ /slob dpon rab tu
144b6(rgyud): rmad byung ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis dbang bskur nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob byed pa/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis hoHzhes bya bas gzhu byin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de/
144b7(rgyud): phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phen du gzhug cing / steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur bar bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs pad+ma bris la gang yang rung ba'i skur bskyed de/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la/
145a1(rgyud): g.yas logs su dar dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dkar po la gtsug tor gdugs dkar bzlas la dbub po/ /g.yon du dar tshon sna tshogs pa bkram pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la oM yongs su bzlas pa legs par bzhag la/ /me tog la
145a2(rgyud): sogs pas mchod la sgra sna tshogs pas bsgrags so/ /bkra shis kyi glu len cing phyi nang gi gar sna tshogs pa yang bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'bebs ba'i bum pa la sogs pa thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te byin gyis brlabs la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ /che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs shing / /
145a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i chu yis rab bkang ba/ /rnam par dag pa'i bum pa 'dis/ /bu khyod la ni dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod do/ /slob ma rnams kyi spyi bor bzhag pas me long lta bu'i ye shes la mi bskyod pa ngo bor gyur to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bstan te/ thog mtha' med
145a4(rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po thams cad bdag/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /ces bya ba/ 'di ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas chos bstan te/ srid pa'i rang
145a5(rgyud): bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa'i mchog ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po zhi bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam
145a6(rgyud): pa'i thabs/ /de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /
145a7(rgyud): de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /sems can don ni ston par byed/ /yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /
145b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dam tshig yin par grags/ /gang gi lus kun bstan pas na/ /des na phyag rgya yin par grags/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod pa'i chags bral bar/ /khyed kyis nam
145b2(rgyud): yang ma byed cig / ces bya'o/ /de nas/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /theg pa chen po rtog pa yi/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod/ /ces bya'o/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur pa/ /rdo rje'i
145b3(rgyud): 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskor zhes brjod do/ /de nas dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs su bcas pa byin gyis rlobs la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga
145b4(rgyud): yi ngo bo nyid/ /rin po che yi dbu rgyan dang / /dar dpyangs dag gis dbang bskur ro/ /oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod pas/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las/ /rdo rje rin po cher gyur to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bstan/ nyi ma 'di ni mchog yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
145b5(rgyud): thams cad mthong / /nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad rab grub pas/ /don 'di bsam 'grub bla na med/ /de yang 'dod par rab grub phyir/ /'dod dang thar pa'i bde
145b6(rgyud): chen po/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bsgrags te/ sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod dang bde ba thams
145b7(rgyud): cad dang / /mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing / /bdag nyid kyang ni pha rol gyi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis/ /de nas/ rin chen khyed la gsol ba ni/ /nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol/ /rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod/ /ces brjod de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten
146a1(rgyud): thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ci ste sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod
146a2(rgyud): do/ /de nas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs la/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang / /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir/ /bu khyod la ni bskur bar bya/ /badzra a d+hi pa ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes brjod pas/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las rdo rje chos kyi sems dpar gyur to/ /de nas de kho
146a3(rgyud): na nyid bstan par bya ste/ 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /'dul ba thabs kyis mdzad pa ni/ /dag pa'i rol mor rab tu 'jug /ces brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas ma gos
146a4(rgyud): ltar/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa 'dis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bstan te/ cho ga 'di dag gang gang gis/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'dul 'gyur ba/ /pad+ma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag/ /de dag der ni sbyor bar bya/ /zhes brjod do/ /
146a5(rgyud): de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ /rgyal ba rnams la de phul la/ /sems can don du sbyin med mchog /bsten na bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba ni/ /rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas ni/ /chos kyi
146a6(rgyud): 'khor lo dam pa 'di/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ /rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar
146a7(rgyud): gyur cig / pad+ma rigs kyi bdag po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas dril bu byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di ni shes rab nyid kyi dngos/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba'i/ /de ring khyod la 'dir dbang bskur/ /oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA d+harma a zhes brjod/ bya ba grub
146b1(rgyud): pa'i ye shes las sna tshogs rdo rje can du gyur par bsams la de kho na nyid bstan te/ rtag tu 'dod chags las byung 'gro/ /rdo rje me yi phung po'i gzugs/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni kun du 'bar/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ chos rnams
146b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /'di kun myur du 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bstan te/ thams cad nam mkha' sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas
146b3(rgyud): rgyas btab la/ /khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni/ /sems can thams cad gsad na yang / /de ni sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /mgon po khyod la
146b4(rgyud): gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing / /sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod/ /ces brjod do/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /las kyi 'khor

146b6(rgyud): rdo rje che ge mo zhes pa/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa la sogs pa brjod pas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bor gyur to/ /de la de kho na nyid bstan te/ /de nyid du ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems/ /lta ngan
146b7(rgyud): rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das 'di ston par mdzod/ /sna tshogs 'dul bar brtson pa yi/ /brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can/ /srid pa shin tu gnas mchog tu/ /go cha la sogs nges par gon/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs/ /dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs/ /
147a1(rgyud): srid pa shin tu legs par bsgrub/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dpal byed mchog /ces brjod do/ /de nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan te/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor bas/ /kun mchog
147a2(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci bde bar ni bsten bzhin du/ /dkon mchog gsum yang mchod par bgyi/ /rang nyid dang ni brten par bya'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba bsgrags te/ ji lta ji ltar
147a3(rgyud): sems can rnams/ /'dul 'gyur de lta de lta bur/ /chags la sogs pa yun rings su/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams kyis/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
147a4(rgyud): bskor/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor
147a5(rgyud): lo bskor cig ces brjod de tha ma de rnams ni rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma
147a6(rgyud): ya tiSh+Tha e Sha staM d+ha ra ya mi/ badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ /zhes brjod la/ dril bu sbyin no/ /de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis
147a7(rgyud): kyi bar du bzhag la/ dung lag pa g.yas par sbyin te 'di skad brjod do/ /deng nas brtsams te dbang bskur ba tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /chos kyi dung bus shig /'jig rten kun la zab mo'i chos kyi sgra sgrogs shig /de nas gzengs bstod de/ 'di ltar snang ba'i
147b1(rgyud): dngos po kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs par khyod gyur to/ /de nas lung bstan te/ nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas dngos yin gyis/ /som nyi
147b2(rgyud): yid gnyis ma za cig / de nas dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /mthong ba'am ni zhugs pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /khyod ni deng nyid gnas yin te/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs
147b3(rgyud): dga' bar gyis/ /khyod ni mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi mchod pas mchod de bkra shis brjod do/ /slob ma'i tshogs rnams dang sgra'i rnam pa mang pos sna drangs la dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor ba bya'o/ /de nas slob ma'i spyi bo nas gdugs
147b4(rgyud): dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa rnams dkyil 'khor la phul te 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la
147b5(rgyud): snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar gyis/ /sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang / /sems can kun la mi phan pa/ /nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ /de nas slob ma re re'i lag pa
147b6(rgyud): g.yon pas g.yas pa'i mthe chung nas bzung nas zhi ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bzod par gsol ba bya ste ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol/ bskyed pa'i mtshan tsho bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la/ rdul tshon phyags te chu
147b7(rgyud): bo chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas de yang dri sna tshogs kyi chus legs par byug par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma dam pa des/ /ci bzhed yon rnams phul nas su/ /gsang dbang nod phyir 'di skad zhu/ /bla ma dam pa bde gshegs gtso/ /khro bo 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /
148a1(rgyud): lus ngag yid kyis bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gsang gsum dam pa'i dbang mchog 'di/ /di ring bdag la gnang bar stsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bla ma dam pa des/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtsam bya ste/ /shin tu dben pa'i gnas rnams su/ /maN+Dal dri
148a2(rgyud): zhim bdud rtsis byugs/ /me tog bkram ste stan bzangs bting / /de rjes slob mas shes rab ma/ /mchog dang rab dang 'bring dang mtha'/ /bla ma la phul 'di skad brjod/ /khyod ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis bde ba mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis/ /
148a3(rgyud): yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa/ /ji ltar ji bzhin bdud rtsi yis/ /mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni sel bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog /ma rig nges par rab rib rnams/ /gang zhig byang chub bla med pa/ /de
148a4(rgyud): ring bdag gis thob par mdzod/ /ces brjod do/ /de nas bla mas shes rab ma/ /mdangs ldan ma ni rab bskyed la/ /cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab byin rlobs la/ /thugs las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas bsdu/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang bstim par bya/ /chags pa
148a5(rgyud): bskyed phyir sngags 'di brjod/ /oM many+dzu shrI sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA wa A t+ma kou0f85haM zhes brjod de/ bsrub pa dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pas bde bar gshegs pa 'od du zhu ste/ byang chub kyi sems su phab pas nor bu'i nang du bde ba rnyed pa thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo bkag ste/ slob m
148a6(rgyud): a'i kha ru dbab par bya'o/ /de la 'di skad brjod de/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje 'di/ /sems kyi sdug bsngal rnam bcom ste/ /gsang ba'i gnas dang dam par bcas/ /de ring khyod la dbab par bya'o/ /zhes brjod de slob ma'i kha ru'o/ /slob ma des kyang tshul rnam pa bzhis bdud
148a7(rgyud): rtsi sbyang bar bya'o/ /des ni ngag gnyis pa dang rnam par rtog pa dag par byed pas gsung gi dbang zhes bya'o/ /de la lung bstan par bya ste/ bla mas chos gos gyon la lag pa g.yon pas chos gos kyi mtha' ma chag par bcug ste/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya bcas te/
148b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gsal bar byas la/ sngon 'jam pa'i rdo rjes lung bstan pa bzhin du mgrin gcig tu lung ston par bsams la 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos grub mchog tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /
148b2(rgyud): srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /many+dzu shrI na maHsarba ta thA ga ta hri si d+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do/ /de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni khams gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa dang / bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa las
148b3(rgyud): rgyal ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa ste/ 'di nyid las thob par gyur cig /the tshom dang yid gnyis la sogs pa ma byed cig /gzhan yang bla ma dam pas dbang bskur ba tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa ltar slob ma rnams kyis grub par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /de ni slob ma
148b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste/ dbang rnams rdzogs pas rim par sbyin/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang zhes gsungs pa la de skad ces bshad do/ /de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i phyir/ nges pa'i dbang rim pa bzhin du bskur bar bya zhes gsungs pa'i don ni 'di yin te/
148b5(rgyud): de ltar gsang ba'i dbang thob pa'i slob ma des kyang bla ma la 'di skad zhu ste/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /ji ltar mkhyen cing thugs chud pa/ /de ltar rjes su bdag dad na/ /de ring bdag la dbang bskur stsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bla ma des shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang
148b6(rgyud): bskur ba brtsam ste/ de yang dang la shes rab kyi dbang ni bu mo rigs ldan mtshan rtags can/ bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad nyi shu lon pa bla ma la phul la bsam gtan gyi don drug dang ldan par bya ste/ bla ma des shes rab ma byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba
148b7(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang / /shes rab 'di la brten par 'grub/ /rigs kyi bu mchog khyod kyis kyang / /shes rab spang du mi rung ste/ /ye shes skye ba'i thabs yin pas/ /khyod kyis 'dod chags ma spang zhig /ces brjod do/ /de nas bla mas dri ba 'di yang gsung ngo / /bu tshur
149a1(rgyud): shog cig rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chu za nus sam/ /rak+ta ga pur tha nus sam/ /bud med dad pas bsten nus sam/ /pad+mar 'o byed mi rtog gam/ /snod ldan smros shig ngang tshul can/ /de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /shes rab dad pas bdag bsten to/ /dri
149a2(rgyud): chen dri chu la sogs bdud rtsi lnga/ /rtag tu dad pas ston par bgyid/ /pad+mar bdag ni 'o bgyid do/ /de nas bla ma dam pa des/ /shes rab ma gcer bur phyung la/ /lus dri zhim po'i chus bkrus la/ me tog gi phreng bas mgo bcings la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /ston pa'i rang
149a3(rgyud): bzhin snying rje'i bdag / khyod kyis sems can don rnams gyis/ /mkha' klong pad+ma bsten par gyis/ /bu 'di bde ba bskyed par gyis/ /zhes bskul lo/ /de nas shes rab dam pa des lag pa gnyis dril bu bzung nas pad+ma kha phye ste 'di skad brjod do/ /rmad byung nga yi pad+ma la/ /bde ba thams
149a4(rgyud): cad 'di la rnyed/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kun/ /rtag tu 'di dag mi 'bral lo/ /pad+ma 'di ni chos dbyings yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las byung / /sems can thams cad 'di ru grol/ /nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la/ /pad+ma zhes su rab tu gsungs/ /pad+ma'i nang gi nam
149a5(rgyud): mkha' la/ /'byung ba lnga po rang bzhin gnas/ /lte ba la ni ge sar te/ /pad+ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ze 'bru'i dbus nas 'byung ba yin/ /de nyid bdud rtsi dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas bla mas slob ma'i lag pa g.yas pa dang / shes
149a6(rgyud): rab ma'i g.yon pa 'og tu bzhag nas 'di skad brjod do/ /shes rab dam pa 'di yin te/ /khyed kyi ye shes skyed par byed/ /'di dang khyed nyid ma bral bar/ /dad pas rtag tu rol mo gyis/ /zhes brjod la/ shes rab ma'i lus la dkyil 'khor bkod la slob ma la sbyin no/ /
149a7(rgyud): slob ma yol ba nang du shes rab ma dang 'dug nas ye shes kyi dbang nod par bya'o/ /de nas shes rab ma dang slob mas glo g.yas pa phab la nyal lo/ /dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs bya'o/ /gnas dgu ru ni sen mo gdab/ /g.yon pa glang po'i sna rtse yis/ /pad+ma bye'u mgo 'dra ba
149b1(rgyud): la/ /tshod zin bya ste brud par bya/ /lce yis kyang ni rol mo bya'o/ /des ni pad+ma rgyas par 'gyur/ /gzod nyi ma dang zla ba mnyam par bya ste/ dal nas dal nas bskyod pa las/ /'byung ba bzhi'i rkyen gyis bde ba chen po'i dbus na byang chub sems gnas pa la ye shes kyi mes bzhu
149b2(rgyud): nas 'khor lo bzhi nas rim par 'bab ste/ bol+la'i rtsa bar phyin pa ni dga' ba'o/ /dbus su phyin pa ni mchog dga'o/ /nor bu'i rtse mor sleb pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /de ji tsam gnas kyi bar du bsgoms pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye ste/ dper na rus sbal lta bu'o/ /
149b3(rgyud): gal te bsdams pas ma thems na 'jig rten pa'i gnas su gshegs te bral ba'i dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /don dang bral ba ni bral ba'o/ /gong ma mtshon pas dga' ba'o/ /byang sems de yi rang bzhin ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin pas/ /dung dang nya phyis dag gis min/ /
149b4(rgyud): lag pas kyang ni mi blang ngo / /bdud rtsi lce yis blang bar bya'o/ /de zos ye shes dbab mchog thob/ /de yi don la rgyun goms pas/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun/ /skad cig gcig la gnyis med pa'o/ /brjod pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral/ /nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa'i/ /ye shes
149b5(rgyud): snang ba lam me ba/ /mthar phyin gdams ngag ces kyang bya/ /de nas dam par gyur pa de la ni/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhir bsgrag par bya'o/ /de nas bkra shis gdon pa'i don ni 'jam dpal gyi sku gzugs spyi bo'i thog tu bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab yan
149b6(rgyud): lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems kyi 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dbang bskur/ /rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor
149b7(rgyud): la 'jug cing / /srid pa'i snying por rnam rol sgeg mo la sogs pas/ /bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul phyung ma lus pas/ /sems can bde gshegs rtag mdzad
150a1(rgyud): bcom ldan dbang bskur la/ dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal mchog
150a2(rgyud): rgyal por dbang bskur bas/ /lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang / /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na pad+mo yis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rin chen bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags rnam
150a3(rgyud): dag legs gsungs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /mkha' snying nor bu rin chen 'byor pas nyams dga' zhing / /don rnams kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la/ /dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis gang / /
150a4(rgyud): des ni khyed la dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'khor los sgyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu blangs pas/ /bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa/ /des na kun gson 'byor ba'i dbang bskur chen po la/ /'jam dpal grags pas 'jig rten/
150a5(rgyud): rnam par legs gyur cig /ces brjod do/ /de nas spyod lam bya ba dang / bla mas gzengs bstod pa dang / bkra shis kyis gshegs su gsol bar bya ba dang / bla ma la yon dbul ba rnams ni dkyus nyid gsal lo/ /bla ma dam pa sU R+Ya sid+d+ha shAn+tiM gar+b+ha ni/ dam pa chos kyi mdzod du
150a6(rgyud): gyur pa la/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i tshogs kyi spyan snga ru/ /don dam zab mo dbang bskur zhal gyi bdud rtsi 'thungs pa yis/ /blo gros bzang po dran pa'i ye shes kyis/ /skye bo blo ngan mun pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /drug stong la sogs rgyud kyi don bsdus nas/ /nor bu gling ba'i sgrub
150a7(rgyud): thabs don dang sbyar te bris pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams rgyas pa thob bsdus pas/ /gang des 'gro kun sdig las rgyal gyur zhing / /'jam dpal chos kyi sku nyid thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i
150b1(rgyud): 'grel pa ye shes gsal ba zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rtis mdzad cing de nyid kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /thig ga dab pa'i rim pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i thig skud kyis/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi
150b2(rgyud): la/ /tshangs thig zur thig logs thig rnams/ /gzhan dang mthun par gdab byas nas/ /phyi dang nang du dbye bar bya/ /phyi la drug drug bcu gnyis te/ /nang du brgyad brgyad bcu drug gdab/ /cha chen nyi shu brgyad du 'gyur/ /so so'i cha ni dbye bar bya/ /nang gi brgyad po gnyis po yang /
150b3(rgyud): re re'ang bzhi bzhir bgo bya zhing / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig la ni/ /dang po khyams su gzhag par bya/ /gnyis pa gsum pa bzhi pa dang / /lnga po rnams ni bzhi bzhir bgo /drug pa la ni gnyis su bya/ /drug po gzhan yang de bzhin bgo /'di la/ /phreng ba re yang re'u mig
150b4(rgyud): ni/ /brgya dang cha chung gnyis su 'gyur/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi ngos gnyis las/ /gsum pa de bzhin lnga pa dang / /bcu bdun pa dang nyi shu pa/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gsum pa/ /cha lngar nang du bgo bar bya/ /phyi yi gsum pa lnga pa rnams/ /de bzhin du ni bgo bar bya/ /gnyis
150b5(rgyud): pa lnga pa brgyad pa rnams/ /cha chung lnga lngar gdab par bya/ /phyi sgo sum chas che bar dbyi/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ru/ /ya phugs bcas pa dbus su dbyi/ /rta babs ya phubs dag la ni/ /cha gcig dor ba'i cha chen tshad/ /sgro yi mtshams dang twa ra Na/ /shin tu gcig
150b6(rgyud): nyid mi bya'o/ /de steng 'khor lo rdzogs par bya/ /tshangs nas cha chung brgyad la ni/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad thig tu gdab/ /lte ba cha gsum mu khyud gcig /de nas rtsibs brgyad cha phran bzhi/ /man ngag thig la tshod kyis bskor/ /de rgyab cha chung gcig la ni/ /nang gi mu khyud legs par bya/ /
150b7(rgyud): cha chung gcig la lte bar bya/ /de brten cha chung lnga la ni/ /rtsibs ni bcu drug 'khor lo bya/ /de rgyab cha chung mu khyud 'gyur/ /de rgyab nang sgo cha chen bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khyams dag la/ /rtsibs bcu drug tu gdab par bya/ /de rjes cha chen bzhi po la/ /phyi yi sgo ni rdzogs par gzhag/ /
151a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid gong ma bzhin du dbye/ /phyi rol rdo rje phreng gsal ba/ /cha chen gyi ni phyed kyi tshad/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'ang de yi tshad/ /sgrub thabs gsang ba dang ldan pa'i thig gi cho ga /paN+Di ta smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
151a2(rgyud): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ne trod+g+ha Ta bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ spyan dbye ba'i cho ga /ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma 'ongs rnams la phan slad du/ /zab cing rgya che'i mtshan bstan pa'i/ /sku gzugs la sogs rab gnas pa/ /rung bar bya phyir bdag gis
151a3(rgyud): bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /phyag rgya sngags dang 'dug stangs dang / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg mchod pa dang / /las la sbyar dang slar bsdu rnams/ /slob dpon de nyid bcu shes pas/ /cho ga rnams ni bshad par bya/ /lha khang mchod rten lugs ma dang / /dam chos
151a4(rgyud): glegs bam ras ris rnams/ /zin cing thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /bde ba'i yon tan kun bskyed cing / /bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rab tu gnas par byed par 'os/ /sku gzugs la sogs zin nas ni/ /yun rings gnas kyang ma mchod na/ /ji srid
151a5(rgyud): mchod gnas ma gyur pas/ /de la mi shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de la bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i/ /gzhung bzhin bya ba rdzogs bya ste/ /rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud dag la/ /'bras chan la sogs kyis sbyang bya/ /chu bdun gyis ni bkru byas shing / /rnam lnga 'dag chal gyis kyang
151a6(rgyud): bkru/ /dUR+Was kyang ni brud par bya/ /de nas gang yin lhar bskyed de/ /spyan drangs bstims la mchod pa bya/ /bcug ste dbang rnams bskur ba ni/ /rig pa'i dbang ni bskur bya ste/ /'khor ba ma stongs bar dag tu/ /sems can don mdzod ces pa brjod/ /na bza' dri zhim
151a7(rgyud): rgyan rnams dbul/ /mchod pa'i bye brag rnams kyis mchod/ /thur ma phyag rgyas spyan yang dbye/ /snyan 'bru zhal dbye dbu bshad cing / /phyag zhabs sen mo dreg cing sgu phyi'o/ /me long dbul zhing mchod pa kun gyis mchod/ /de nas bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang
151b1(rgyud): lha rnams dang / /de sras tshangs la sogs pa kun/ /gang zhig cho ga'i bya ba ni/ /nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs/ /sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang / /bde legs chen po kun mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /gang 'di
151b2(rgyud): sku gzugs bskal pa'am/ /bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas shing / /sa dang chu dang me dang ni/ /rlung las lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa dang / /bu dang tsha bo rnams bsrungs te/ /rang dga' yid bder gyur nas ni/ /rab gnas bzang po dag tu bzhed/ /
151b3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor dag gi lha/ /gshegs gsol gzhung bzhin bya ba'o/ /bdag gis cho ga 'di byas pas/ /'gro ba kun gyi rgyud tshim shog /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga paN+Da Ti smra tis bsgrigs nas sgra rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/
151b4(rgyud): Ar+ya many+dzu shrI sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spros bral bde ba chen po'i dang / /rtog pa'i rlabs dang bral ba las/ /sems can don du gzugs skur snang / /cir yang snang
151b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje che zhing don mdzad pa/ /'gro ba kun la khyab pa'i mgon/ /de yi bsgrub la dga' ba la/ /gtso bo dad pas bshad par bya/ /dbang thob dam tshig gnas pa dang / /gtong la dga' zhing 'dzin pa med/ /srog phyir rnal 'byor ngang du byed/ /gsong
151b6(rgyud): por smra zhing rtse dang bral/ /'du 'dzi spangs shing gcig po dga'/ /zla bo med cing dad ldan pas/ /nyams dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas par bya/ /lha yi nga rgyal gnas pa yis/ /sa gzhi dra ba ra bar bslab/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT ces brjod pas/
151b7(rgyud): rgyang grags gcig tsam bgegs tshar gcad/ /de nas shin tu brtser ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas la sogs mdun bsams la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pas sdig pa sbyang / /yi rang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bya/ /dge ba bsngo ba bstod pa gus par bya/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog
152a1(rgyud): khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mtha' gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la
152a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la
152a3(rgyud): 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
152a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams/ /ji tsam dus nas bzung nas ni/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /nam zhig byang chub snying po la/ /yongs su gnas pa'i bar dag tu/ /bdag gis byang chub mchog gi sems/ /ma lus par ni bskyed par bgyi/ /de nas sangs rgyas la sogs rnams/ /
152a5(rgyud): ma lus bdag gi thugs la bsdu/ /thim zhu ye shes me 'bar bas/ /nyon mongs phung po bsreg par bsam/ /slar gsos ye shes lus su byas/ /byang chub lnga bdag bsgom pa ni/ /yongs dag me long gsal ba dkyil 'khor la/ /yul dngos rigs kun ma lus so sor snang / /
152a6(rgyud): thams cad yongs dag me long ye shes la/ /'dris par de la yang dag blta bar bya/ /sems can rnams la snying rje bskyed/ /mgon skyabs dpung gnyen dang bral bas/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba rgya mtshor bying / /sems can don du sdug bsngal bral/ /stong pa mnyam pa nyid du sbyar/ /bdag
152a7(rgyud): stong sems can de 'dra yang / /chos rnams kun kyang rab tu shes/ /chos la dmigs pa'i snying rje yang / /bdag med rang bzhin rigs pa las/ /mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed par bya/ /de nas gsang sngags brjod pa ni/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha r+m+mA NAM A d+ya nu twa n+na twatA/ sngags don
152b1(rgyud): stong par bsgoms nas ni/ /lhan cig gnyis med chos rab gzung / /de nyid yul du byas pa yis/ /chos bdag med par bsgom par bya/ /dmigs med snying rje so sor brtag /snying rje'i rjes 'gro gzung 'dzin yongs dang bral/ /ngo bo 'od gsal yan lag kun bral ba/ /rang bzhin
152b2(rgyud): yongs dag chos nyid rgyu mthun pas/ /dngos bral don stong ngang las de gnas pas/ /chos dbyings ye shes bsgom pa'o/ /de ltar sems can don byed ma bral ba'i/ /rnal 'byor sngon gyi smon lam dbang thob pas/ /sems can kun gyi dbang bsgyur bas/ /sems kyi don ni rab rdzogs phyir/ /khams
152b3(rgyud): gsum 'byung gnas khyab par gyis/ /don dam kun rdzob mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir nan tan ye shes bsgom/ /de las dngos po gzugs su byung / /sprul ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' la/ /a las zla ba'i gzugs bsam pa/ /de 'og pad dkar pad+ma ste/ /sna tshogs 'dab brgyad mdzes pa'o/ /
152b4(rgyud): de steng d+hIHser gur gum mdog /spro dang bsdu las mtshan ma bsam/ /de las d+hIHmtshan 'phro 'du las/ /sku gser mdog las ldem bag can/ /bde gshegs dbu rgyan zur phud ldan/ /rin chen rnam brgyan gzhon nu'i tshul/ /lo brgyad rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs/ /phyag g.yas ral gri pu ste
152b5(rgyud): g.yon/ /bzhin mdzes 'ja' tshon lta bur bsgom/ /gsal bas tha ma la phung po spong / /thugs kar zla steng d+hIHdkar bsam/ /de las dang po'i sangs rgyas te/ /zhal lnga byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rin chen sna tshogs na bza' can/ /zla dkar mdog las skyil krung bzhugs/ /
152b6(rgyud): phyag g.yas shes rab ral gri bsnams/ /g.yon bzhi shes rab po ti bsnams/ /gsal ba dag tu shes par bya/ /de yi thugs la shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /gsal bar yi ge a las bskyed/ /lte dbus rtsibs drug mu khyud bzhi/ /lte bar yi ge a dkar bsam/ /rtsibs la
152b7(rgyud): yi ge sngags drug dgod/ /oM badzra tI k+Sh+ThA ya te na maH oM druHkhats+tshe dA ya te na maH oM pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mU rtA ya te na maH oM dz+nyA na kA yA ya te na maH oM wA gI shwa rA ya te na maH oM a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH dmar sngo dkar dang ljang gu dang / /ser dang dkar te rim bzhin bsam/ /'khor lo
153a1(rgyud): rtsibs kyi rim bzhin no/ /mu khyud dang po dag la ni/ /oM sarba d+har+m+mA b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he badzra/ a A aM aHmu khyud gnyis po dag la ni/ /a A i I u U e ai o au aM aHmu khyud gsum po dag ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' sku yi sngags/ /
153a2(rgyud): a A sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mUrti bA gI shwa ra ma hA bA tsa/ sarba d+har+m+ma ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHphyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /yi ge ka sogs ha yi mthar/ /thub pa'i yi ge rnam bkod pa/ /'khor lo sngags kyi rim pa'o/ /de nas 'khor
153a3(rgyud): lo'i lte dbus kyi/ /a dkar yongs su gyur pa las/ /bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /zhal drug ston ka'i zla ltar dkar/ /in+d+ra nI la'i gtsug phud mdzes/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis mdzes/ /zhi ba'i tshul 'chad rin chen brgyan/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa ste/ /g.yas
153a4(rgyud): g.yon ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /steng na shes rab po ti bsnams/ /mdzes pa gsal bar dmigs pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru/ /zla mchog gsal bar bsam par bya/ /de yi thugs mchog ngo bo ste/ /de steng yi ge rnams ngo bo/ /a mchog a dkar bsam par
153a5(rgyud): bya/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas de las byung / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung yin no/ /de ltar 'khor lo drug brtsegs la/ /oM aHhUM gi yi ge mchog/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHdang ldan pas/ /spyan drangs mdun du gsal bar dmigs/ /mchod pa la sogs dbul bar bya/ /thams cad de
153a6(rgyud): nyid gsum ldan pas/ /e hA bi ra hUM pu Sh+pe swA hA/ d+hU pe swA hA/ gan+d+he swA hA/ A lo ke swA hA/ nai bi bye swA hA/ ba liM kha kha/ khA hi khA hi swA hA/ s+pha ra Na khaM swA hA/ yon chab me tog bdug spos dang / /dri chab lha bshos gtor ma dang / /sgra la sogs pa rim bzhin dbul/ /
153a7(rgyud): 'dud la sogs pas bstod par bya/ /dzaHhUM ba hoHsa bstim pa'o/ /yang na 'od kyis lha mo bkug la dbang bskur bar bya/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ba ste/ /yi ge sbrul mtha' ldan pas na/ /lnga po ya ste na ma bor/ /yi ge tsheg bcad sum cu la/ /ma yengs gtad la bzlas pa gsal/ /
153b1(rgyud): ngag gi dngos grub dri ma bral/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyang de la dgyes/ /grangs ni brgya pa dag par bya/ /shes rab 'khor lo goms pa'o/ /de nas mtshan ni brjod par bya/ /yi ge a la sems gtad la/ /ngag gi mtshan ni gsal brjod pa'o/ /de yang rang bzhin med shes bya/ /shes nas
153b2(rgyud): rtog pa rnams dang bral/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i lha rnams kun/ /ma lus thams cad dgyes nas su/ /yon tan thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /dus gsum dag tu brjod pa dang / /yang na dus drug dag tu brjod/ /yang na dus kyi nges med
153b3(rgyud): bas/ /nus tshad dag tu brjod pa'o/ /mtshan ni brjod pas skyo ba na/ /shes rab 'khor lo sngags drug las/ /sngags dang mthun pa'i 'od byung nas/ /lus snang thams cad gsal bar byas/ /mi shes ri bo thams cad bcom/ /phyi rol dag tu 'phros pa las/ /nam mkha'i
153b4(rgyud): khams kun khyab par gnas/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams gsal gyur nas/ /chos sku ye shes thob pa'i don/ /byas nas slar ni bzlas pa las/ /snying gar zla stengs a la thim/ /brtan pas yang dang yang du bsgom/ /de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /ye shes bsgoms na sprul sku
153b5(rgyud): dang / /zla ba'i sgo nas longs sku dang / /a yi sgo nas chos sku dang / /ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ba/ /brtan pas yang dang yang du bsgom/ /de ltar spyod pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis sems can la/ /nye bar bzung bar mngon snang ba'o/ /de nas stong nyid la
153b6(rgyud): gnas bya/ /a nyid thig le byang chub ste/ /byang sems thams cad de la 'dus/ /bde ba thams cad der gnas na/ /'ja' tshon lta bu'i thig le ste/ /shes pa bying rgod med pa yis/ /gsal ba 'bad pas dad par bya/ /sems nyid de rang yin zhe na/ /chos nyid ngang la gnas
153b7(rgyud): zhes bya/ /thig le je phra shes pa phra/ /rang bzhin med pas gnas pa'o/ /sems nyid btang snyoms gsal ba la/ /gsal ba mi rtog thob pa'o/ /de la brten nas gsal ba de/ /snang la rang bzhin med pa thob/ /'bras bu chos su thob pa'o/ /de nas skyo ba byung ba ni/ /
154a1(rgyud): oM AHhUM muHgshegs su gsol/ /thams cad bsdus nas lha nyid gnas/ /ngag tu bzlas pa nus tshad bzlas/ /zhi la gnas shing snying rje bskyed/ /sems can don la dga' sems bskyed/ /gtor ma rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /stan la gcig pu 'dug nas su/ /
154a2(rgyud): lam lnga nyams su myang bar bya/ /tshogs lam bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /sbyor lam bzlas par byed pa na/ /mthong lam mtshan nyid brjod pa ste/ /bsgom lam 'phro 'du dag la gnas/ /mthar phyin stong nyid sems dpa'o/ /dge mas brtsams pa'i sgrub thabs la/ /'gal 'khrul mchis
154a3(rgyud): na mkhas bzod mdzod/ /brtsams pa'i dge rtsa yod srid na/ /sems can mos dang phrad par shog /dge bsnyen ma snyan grags dge mas mdzad pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI rat+na no bi ka /
154a4(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i cho ga /rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa dang ldan 'dzin bral ba/ /'jam dpal yang dag kun mkhyen pa/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngang gnas pa/ /smra ba'i seng ge phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la gus pas 'dud pa yi/ /dus ni
154a5(rgyud): rtag tu bsgom pa dang / /mos pa byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi don du bshad par bya/ /stong pa la dga' dbang thob pa/ /dam tshig ldan zhing bsgom pa dga'/ /rnal 'byor srog gtong dad pa che/ /sems can don byed byas la drin/ /rtag tu mtshan brjod bzlas la brtson/ /de ltar
154a6(rgyud): yon tan bcu ldan pas/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas par bya/ /tha ma la yi dam dran pa la/ /snying gar yi ge muM ser dgod/ /kha dog lnga yi 'od 'phros nas/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras bla ma ni/ /spyan drangs mdun du bsams pa la/ /phyag
154a7(rgyud): 'tshal mchod pa sdig pa sbyang / /yi rang skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la/ /dge bsngo 'dud la sogs pas bstod/ /de nas stong nyid bsam pa ni/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha r+m+mA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan na ta twA swA hA/ sngags don dngos po med pa la/ /yun rings ngang la blo gnas pas/ /
154b1(rgyud): de nyid la ni gnas par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' stong pa la/ /dngos po thams cad paM du gnas/ /de steng yi ge saM dkar las/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge gsal/ /de steng a las zla bar gsal/ /gdan steng yi ge muM ser las/ /ut+pal sngon po mdzes par bsgom/ /
154b2(rgyud): de las 'phro 'du bya ba ste/ /smra ba'i seng ge bsgom par bya/ /ser po gser btso 'dra ba la/ /g.yas na ut+pal pu stis mtshan/ /g.yon pa gzhan la sbyin pa gtong / /dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dzum dang ldan/ /thugs rje che bas nyon mongs spong / /rin chen rnams kyis
154b3(rgyud): lus la brgyan/ /dbu la thor tshugs rnams kyis mdzes/ /dbu skra gtsug phud 'khyil pa dang / /stod g.yogs ser po rnams kyis mdzes/ /smad g.yogs dar dpyangs dpyangs pa'o/ /rmugs pa'i rnam pa ma yin pas/ /gsal ba rtag tu bsgom pa'o/ /de nas
154b4(rgyud): spyan drangs mchod pa'o/ /oM wA gI shwa ra dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AHhUM gis mchod yon dbul/ oM badzra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe A hUMH/ oM badzra dI pe AHhUM/ oM badzra nai bi h+ye AHhUM/ ba liM ta kha kha/ khA hi khA hi AHhUM/ mchog sbyin rdo rje'i
154b5(rgyud): mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas
154b6(rgyud): rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /
154b7(rgyud): nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ /zhes bya bas bstod do/ /gnyis med bdag
155a1(rgyud): la bsdu ba'o/ /snying gar pad+ma'i zla ba la/ /steng na ye shes sems dpa' ste/ /tshon gang dang 'dra gsal bar bsgom/ /yi ge a mchog zla ba la/ /thugs kar bsam par bya ba yin/ /ye shes sngags phreng bskor bar bya/ /oM sarba d+ha r+m+mA b+hA ba/
155a2(rgyud): swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha/ badzra tsak+Shu a A/ aM aHpra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+mA ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na kA ya many+dzu shrI pa ri shud+d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ta/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga tA hr-I da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hIMHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mUrti bA gI shwa ra ma hA wA tsa/ sarba d+har+m+ma ga ga nA ma
155a3(rgyud): la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+mA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH gsang bar phreng ba sngags la gtad/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas mtshan rnams brjod pa la/ /ye shes sems dpa' dag la ni/ /dmigs pa brtan pa gtad nas su/ /yon tan dag tu brjod pa'o/ /de yang
155a4(rgyud): gal te ma brtan na/ /g.yeng bar gyur na nus pa chung / /de la brtan par gyur pa na/ /ye shes gnyis med skye yang srid/ /yon tan dag tu brjod pa yang / /theg pa mtha' chos ston mdzad pas/ /thams cad ngo bo yin shes las/ /thams cad de dang ldan par ston/ /
155a5(rgyud): de ltar byas shing bstod gyur na/ /chos sku mtha' dag thob par 'gyur/ /bsam pa ci 'dod de las 'byung / /lha srin sde brgyad dga' 'gyur nas/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba'o/ /de nas 'bad pas mtshan brjod 'don/ /skyo bar mi 'gyur gus par bya/ /skyo ba dag ni byung pa na/ /
155a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gnyis su med par bya/ /a las stong pa tsam par bya/ /gsal bar rtog med bsgom par bya/ /de nas a ni zhu ba las/ /thig le dkar po je chung las/ /ye shes stong pa nyid gsal ba/ /bying rgod med par gsal ba'o/ /yang dang yang du gtad la bsgom/ /
155a7(rgyud): snang ba rang bzhin med mthong 'gyur/ /yang na shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/ /zhes gsungs pa las/ bcu drug phyed brgyad de phyed de/ /bzhi ni gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo
155b1(rgyud): yi/ /lte ba shes rab 'khor lo ste/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs can 'khor lo la/ /sngags kyi rnam par dgod pa ni/ /a A aM A rim par dgod/ /de nas yang dang yang du dgod/ /dbus su a mchog bsam par bya/ /de nas/ snying gar shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs
155b2(rgyud): bcu gnyis dang ldan pa la/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aH dbyangs yig bcu gnyis g.yas na bskor nas bkod par bya/ /lte ba la ni a mchog gnas/ /mgrin par shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs mchan gnas pa la/ /
155b3(rgyud): lte ba a bsgom rtsibs rnams la/ /a ra pa tsa na/ wA gI shwa ra/ pradz+nyA na mar rim pas dgod par bya'o/ /de nas spyi bo'i 'khor lo la/ /bcu gnyis rtsibs la dgod par bya ba ni/ /sku'i phreng sngags te las sngags so/ /a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra oM
155b4(rgyud): hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mU r+t+ti/ wA gI shwa ra ma hA wA tsa/ sarba d+ha rma ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shud+d+hu/ d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AHdbus su a dkar chen po gnas/ /'og nas haM dkar bzlog nas bsam/ /dbus na yi ge yod pa ste/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse
155b5(rgyud): mo de la bya/ /'khor lo nang stong 'od ltar 'dug /yi ge rdul thig gang ltar bsam/ /dbus kyi thig le'i rang bzhin yin/ /dga' ba du ma yod pas blta/ /'khor lo bzhi la shes rab ste/ /thig le a wa d+hU tI thabs/ /nor bu'i rtse nas hUM la thug /dkar bo 'od du 'dug
155b6(rgyud): pa'o/ /de nas byang chub rgyu ba'o/ /nor gnas tsaN+Da lI gnas pas/ /de la gtad de bsam pa'o/ /'khor lo de ltar gnas pa ni/ /yan lag bya ba de yin no/ /med pa rtsis las 'das pa ste/ /tshad med bsam gtan byed pa'o/ /de yang tsaN+Da lI la gtad pas so/ /
155b7(rgyud): me 'bar drod las brten nas byung / /a wa d+hU tA+e lam zhugs nas/ /lte bar me 'bar thams cad bsregs/ /de ltar 'khor lo bzhi ka yi/ /spyi bo'i bde ba ngang gis zhu/ /'o ma ltar dkar thams cad gang / /nor bu phebs nas lte gnas 'dren/ /rlung dang bstun nas
156a1(rgyud): yang yang 'dren/ /de stengs lus gso bde ba 'byung / /snang ba dga' ba ba skye ba'o/ /bcu drug log po lta bu 'byung / /tha mal zag med ye shes skye/ /skyo'am bsam gtan gtong 'dod na/ /spyi bor bsdu bar 'dod pa yi/ /dga' bral song yang nyes
156a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ /tha mal thabs las ma byung bas/ /nyes pa chen po 'ong mi 'gyur/ /de yang rlung gi brtan thob pa/ /bya ba rung gi gzhan nas min/ /tha mal zag med thob pa la/ /med pa'i tshig 'das de yin no/ /tha mal gshegs su gsol ba dang / /lha yi nga rgyal gnas
156a3(rgyud): par bya/ /spyod pa dge ba gang mos bya/ /dad yod khro med sbyin par bya/ /lus ngag yid kyi bya ba kun/ /bde ba che la ngang gnas bya/ /ma brjed pa yi bsam gtan bsten/ /de ltar byas na bla med 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i sku 'chang thob par 'gyur/ /tshe 'di dag la bde
156a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /bdag gis bsags pa'i cho ga yis/ /'gal ba ma mchis lha la bshags/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yid 'ong kun/ /thams cad 'jam dpal thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i sgrub thabs/ dge bsnyen ma grags sbyin mas mdzad pa/
156a5(rgyud): smr-i ti dz+nyA na kI rtis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ho d+har+m+ma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor
156a6(rgyud): thams cad bsdus par gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don thams cad sgrub pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i don gyi dgongs ba sbas pa phyin ci ma log pa'i man ngag las brgyud pa
156a7(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ de nas yang dag bshad bgyi ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo
156b1(rgyud): khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras bar ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po/ /de yi rim pa'i nang bzhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi/ /thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis par/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /
156b2(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ sna tshogs pad+ma yid 'ong ba/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas/ /dag pa thams cad rab tu gnas/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil
156b3(rgyud): 'khor 'dra/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa che/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra mchog chen po mthon ka'i rtse/ /sangs rgyas rin chen cod pan ldan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /
156b4(rgyud): sna tshogs na bza' yang dag bsnams/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag spung / /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /dpe byad brgyad cus yang dag brgyan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ches/ /phyag gnyis dag ni rnam par brgyan/ /ral gri mda' dang rdo rje yis/ /
156b5(rgyud): g.yas pa'i phyag mchog rnam par mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dang gzhu/ /rdo rje dril mchog g.yon pa na/ /dri med dpe bral bsam mi khyab/ /shes rab ye shes dri ma med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /dkyil 'khor mdun gyi gtso gyur la/ /
156b6(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni nges par dgod/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma thams cad la/ /seng ge'i gdan gyi stengs bzhugs shing / /thams cad rin chen bdun bskor bar/ /'khor lo can ni brgyad bri'o/ /gtsug tor chen po yi ge bdag /shar gyi 'dab mar yang dag
156b7(rgyud): bri/ /gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dag /nub kyi 'dab mar dgod par bya/ /gzi brjid phung po lho phyogs su/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal byang phyogs su/ /rnam par 'thor ba dbang ldan phyogs/ /me yi phyogs su gyen 'byung dgod/ /gyen 'byung chen po bden bral phyogs/ /rgyal
157a1(rgyud): ba rlung gi phyogs su dgod/ /sngags rnams kun la'ang sgrub pa po/ /'khor lo can ni de dag bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po dag tu ni/ /mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
157a2(rgyud): pa'ang / /sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ /go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /de nyid kyi ni mtshams kyi char/ /spyan dang de bzhin mA ma kI/ /gos dkar de bzhin sgrol ma ni/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /sgo rnams su yang sgo srung ni/ /rang gi mtshan mas phyag brgyan pa/ /rdo
157a3(rgyud): rje slob dpon blo ldan pas/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis byung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni gnyis pa ru/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo srung rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /dag pa'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /der ni cho ga bzhin bri bya/ /shar phyogs su ni sa rnams bri/ /de
157a4(rgyud): bzhin lho ni rab 'bar ba'i/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad bri/ /nub tu dbang rnams bcu po ste/ /byang du gzungs ni thams cad bri/ /de bzhin mtshams su sgeg mo sogs/ /dngos grub bde ba kun sogs pa/ /gsang sngags don dang ldan par bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis byung nas su/ /dkyil 'khor
157a5(rgyud): dam pa gsum par ni/ /bskal ba bzang po thams cad dang / /de bzhin sgo srung rnams kyang bri/ /rdo rje me tog la sogs pa'ang / /go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya/ /de yi pho brang phyi rol bri/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi gnas/ /zlum zhing kun du bzang ba dang / /sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par yang / /der ni
157a6(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa/ /chung ma la sogs tshogs kyis brgyan/ /rgyan dang rang gi mtshan mar ldan/ /kun du rim bzhin legs par bri/ /phyi sgo'i shar gyi cha la ni/ /gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya che/ /thams cad bsrungs la rab brtson pa/ /rnam pa kun du legs par gzhag /g.yon
157a7(rgyud): brkyang bas ni legs bzhugs shing / /phyag g.yas dbyug pa 'phyar mdzad la/ /phyag g.yon thugs kar sdigs mdzub bsgreng / /rab tu drag por bri bar bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che/ /phyag rgya chen po lho phyogs su/ /khro bo chen po rta mgrin gyi/ /phyag rgya chen po nub phyogs su/ /rdo
157b1(rgyud): rje 'jigs byed spyan gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po byang phyogs su/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni thams cad dgod/ /de yi phyi rol khor yug dang / /khor yug chen po de bzhin bri/ /blo ldan yang dag kun rdzogs par/ /sngags zhes pas ni legs par bri/ /da ni sku mdog la
157b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i nges pa bshad par bya ste/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni zla ba nya ba'i mdangs can gyi sku la/ rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i cod pan gyi steng du/ sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po che'i rtse bran can du byas te lhag ma ni gsal bas
157b3(rgyud): go bar zad do/ /'khor los sgyur ba brgyad ni kun kyang gser gyi mdog can/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo bstod de bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gyis gdan la mnyes pas brten par mdzad pa'o/ /zhe sdang chen po bcom ldan 'das mi
157b4(rgyud): bskyod pa ni/ /ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis glang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa/ zhal g.yas pa gdangs shing drag po/ zhal g.yon pa tshems kyi sgros gnon pa/ zhal rgyab ma mchog tu
157b5(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad skrag par mdzad pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams na ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams ni sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang / dril bu dang / gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser gyi mdog can rin po
157b6(rgyud): che'i dbu rgyan mnga' ba/ zhal ser po dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / dmar po dang ldan pa phyag brgyad pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis rta'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mda' dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan
157b7(rgyud): dang / dril bu dang / gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa ni sku mdog dmar po rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis rma bya'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dmar po dang nag po dang /
158a1(rgyud): dkar po dang / ser po mnga' ba/ phyag g.yas rnams ni rdo rje dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma dang / gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa ni sku mdog nag po rin po che'i dbu
158a2(rgyud): rgyan can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis nam mkha' lding gi khri la bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po mche ba gtsigs pa/ kha dog nag po g.yas pa zhi ba/ kha dog dkar po rgyab sgeg pa/ kha dog dmar po/ /g.yon pa zhi ba'i tshul can mdog dkar po/ phyag g.yas pa rnams ral
158a3(rgyud): gri dang rdo rje dang / /mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na dril bu dang / /gzhu dang sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang / zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ rang gi gdan gyi steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems
158a4(rgyud): dpa' la sogs pa'ang sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba/ dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni/ go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya/ zhes bya ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po/ phyag
158a5(rgyud): g.yas kyis rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa/ g.yon bsnyems pas dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan dang / skyil mo krung dang / dbu rgyan gyi nges pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa
158a6(rgyud): dang / thun mong yin la khyad par rnams ni bri bar bya ste/ rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dren zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chags pa sku mdog dmar po mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje legs pa margad kyi mdog can phyag gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba stsol ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rin
158a7(rgyud): chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su/ phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po/ phyag gnyis kyis rang gi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje
158b1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ phyag gnyis yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ni sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ltar dkar ba/ so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis pa bsnams pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje chos
158b2(rgyud): sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon pa bsnyems pas pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g.yas pas pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o/ /rdo rje rnon po ni 'dir sku mdog gur gum lta bu phyag g.yas kyis ral gri 'phyar ba/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam
158b3(rgyud): bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyu sku mdog gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje smra ba sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yas pa lce'i phyag dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yon pas dung bsnams pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje las sku mdog ljang
