158b4(rgyud): gu phyag gnyis na rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams nas spyi bor 'jog cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i don du gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje srung ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po phyag gnyis kyis mche ba gnyis rang gi zhal du 'dzin cing gdug pa thams
158b5(rgyud): cad 'jigs par mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bsdams nas bzhugs pa'o/ /mtshams rnams su spyan ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra'o/ /mA ma kI ni mi bskyod pa dang 'dra'o/ /gos dkar mo ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra'o/ /sgrol ma ni don yod par grub pa dong
158b6(rgyud): 'dra'o/ /sems ma bcu drug ni kun du bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang / dga' la chags ma dang legs ldan ma ste rdo rje rigs kyi'o/ /rin po che'i gtso mo dang / rat+na'i sgrol ma dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan dang / bkod pa dang ldan ma dang bzhi ni rat+na'i rigs kyi'o/ /rdo rje
158b7(rgyud): sa mo dang kun du 'khor lo ma dang rlan 'dzin ma dang / stong du zlos ma bzhi pad+mo rigs kyi'o/ /dngos grub kyi rtse mo dang / thams cad bsrung ma dang / mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya rnams dang bzhi ni las kyi rigs kyi'o/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan sems dpa' bcu drug dang mthun no/ /
159a1(rgyud): 'di'i lugs kyis spyan ma la rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpas bskor/ mA ma kI la rin po che'i rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bskor/ gzhan gnyis po yang rigs mthun pas bskor ba'o/ /'dir rdo rje thig gi nang logs su ri mo zur bzhi pa byas pa'i brgyad cha'i sgo ste rta
159a2(rgyud): babs med pa'o/ /lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /lho'i sgor rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams pa g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor
159a3(rgyud): rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsnams pa sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'bebs pa sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa zlum po'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya ste nang gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /
159a4(rgyud): gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur te gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /gnyis pa der yang shar phyogs su sa bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste/ kun kyang sna tshogs pad+ma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na rang gi mtshan ma
159a5(rgyud): bsnams pa'o/ /de la mos pas spyod pa'i sa ni sku mdog pad+ma ltar dmar ba phyag g.yon na pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa ni rin po che pad+ma rI ga'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa'o/ /dri ma med pa'i sa ni nor bu tshon shel gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyis thams cad
159a6(rgyud): dag par so sor rtog pa'i pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /'od byed pa'i sa ni nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /'od 'phro ba'i sa ni margad lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon na ut+pa la bsnams pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs
159a7(rgyud): dka' ba'i sa ni sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon pa pang bar bkan nas bzhag pas nor bu markata bsnams pa'o/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa ni gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon gyis pad+ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /ring du song ba'i
159b1(rgyud): sa ni nam mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs phyag g.yon gyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ mi g.yo ba'i sa ni ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yon pa bsnyems pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du rdo rje lnga pa mdog dmar po ste/ pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin pa'o/ /
159b2(rgyud): legs pa'i blo gros kyi ni sku mdog dmar skya phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /chos kyi sprin gyi ni gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon gyis chos kyi sprin gyis yongs su bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi kun du 'od ni nyi ma
159b3(rgyud): gung gi mdog can phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gnyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan sna tshogs 'chang
159b4(rgyud): ba/ gzhon zhing dar la bab pa zhal gyi pad+ma sgeg pa'i nyams kyis rgyas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pas spras pa'i gser gyi gdu bus lag ngar bkang ba/ rin po che'i rgyan dang / rtse bran mnga' ba/ /phyag g.yas pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir yid
159b5(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pad+ma dmar po ltar sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sku
159b6(rgyud): mdog dmar skya/ /phyag g.yon pas 'bru dang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yon pas a shwa ka'i me tog gi mgo lcogs 'dab ma dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag
159b7(rgyud): g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa markata kyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pal bsnams pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
160a1(rgyud): tu phyin pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pri yang ku ltar sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dkar
160a2(rgyud): po'i steng du rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes
160a3(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon pas rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag g.yon pas sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs su dbang bcu pad+ma dang
160a4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa mnga' ba/ gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ zhal gyi pad+ma cung zad 'dzum pa dang / spyan ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra ba/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i rin po
160a5(rgyud): che'i dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma bsnams pa/ g.yon na bsnyems pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de la tshe la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'dab ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa ting nge 'dzin
160a6(rgyud): la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i sku bsnams pa'o/ /sems la dbang ba zla ba'i mdog can phyag g.yon gyis me tog ban+du ka ltar dmar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o/ /yo byad la dbang ba sku mdog ser po phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /las la
160a7(rgyud): dbang ba markata lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /skye ba la dbang ba sku mdog sna tshogs pa/ phyag g.yon kha dog sna tshogs pa dzA ti'i yal ga bsnams pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil
160b1(rgyud): 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /mos pa la dbang ba pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar mdog dkar ba/ phyag g.yon na me tog pri yang ku'i snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /smon lam la dbang ba gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes la dbang ba mthon ka chen po'i mdog can/ /phyag g.yon na ut+pa la sngon
160b2(rgyud): po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /chos la dbang ba sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du bum pa bzang po bsnams pa'o/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i tshon shel gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yas na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon na rin po che'i shing gi yal ga bsnams pa'o/ /sangs
160b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi byang chub gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yas na pad+ma ser po'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /'di gnyis kyi gdan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i dbang rnams dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs
160b4(rgyud): su gzugs bcu gnyis sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyi rtse bran can/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gyis dkur brten pas rang gi mtshan ma bsnams par rim
160b5(rgyud): bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la nor ldan gyi gzungs ni gser gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yon na 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /rin chen sgrol ma'i gzungs ni pad+ma rA ga'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs ni sku mdog
160b6(rgyud): dkar po/ phyag g.yon na nor bu chu shes kyi bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /'od zer can gyi gzungs ni sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag g.yon na khab dang skud pa bsnams pa'o/ /ri khrod lo ma can gyi gzungs ni/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na lo ma sbom pa bsnams pa'o/ /dug sel ma'i gzungs ni sku mdog
160b7(rgyud): dkar po phyag g.yon na dug gi me tog gi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs ni sku mdog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma dmar po'i steng du mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /sku la byed ma'i gzungs ni ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon na phreng
161a1(rgyud): ba 'phyang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /shes rab 'phel ba'i gzungs ni ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu'i mdog can phyag g.yon na ut+pal sngon po'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs ni nor bu ma rkang lta bu'i mdog can/ phyag g.yon pa
161a2(rgyud): na rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dmar skya bsnams pa'o/ /ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs ni/ sku mdog dmar po phyag g.yon na rin po che'i za ma tog bsnams pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod dang ldan pa'i gzungs ni gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g.yon na kha dog
161a3(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i sgrom bu bsnams pa'o/ /gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog dmar skya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
161a4(rgyud): pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor don so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog markata lta bu phyag na rin po che'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog dmar skya/
161a5(rgyud): phyag na mtha' gnyis su pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog bsnams pa/ gdan dang rgyan la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa sku mdog markata ltar ljang gu/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu bsnams pa ste lhag ma rnams
161a6(rgyud): ni snga ma bzhin no/ /shar lho'i mtshams su lha mo sgeg mo gser gyi mdog can rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis ka rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang ba'o/ /lho nub mtshams su phreng ba ma sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na rin po che'i phreng ba bsnams pa/
161a7(rgyud): bzhugs tshul la sogs ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o/ /nub byang mtshams su glu ma sku mdog dmar po pi wang brdung ba la brtson pa ste/ lhag ma ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /byang shar mtshams su gar ma sku mdog ljang gu/ phyag gis mchog gi rtsed mo dang gar mdzad pa ste lhag ma ni sgeg mo dang 'dra'o/ /nang gi
161b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srungs rnams ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do/ /dkyil 'khor bar ma ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo srung rnams ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i rang bzhin yin no/ /rim pa gsum pa'i shar phyogs su kun du bzang po gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis
161b2(rgyud): brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan can phyag g.yas kyis mchog stsol ba/ phyag g.yon gyis ut+pa la'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /
161b3(rgyud): phyag g.yon gyis chos ston pa'i tshul gyis pad+ma bsnams pa ste/ rgyan dang / bzhugs tshul la sogs pa ni kun du bzang po dang 'dra'o/ sa'i snying po gser btso ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas kyis sa gnon/ phyag g.yon pad+ma'i steng na dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa'o/ /nam mkha'i snying po
161b4(rgyud): sku mdog markata ltar ljang ser phyag g.yas kyis rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa/ phyag g.yon na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa'o/ /phyag g.yon na bum pa bzang po las
161b5(rgyud): 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing bsnams pa/ phyag na rin po che sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yas pa rin po che sbyin pa la brtson pa/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma'i steng du byang chub kyi zla ba bsnams pa'o/ /rgya mtsho'i blo gros ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na dung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na ral gri
161b6(rgyud): bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po sku mdog ut+pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu phyag g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na sa bcu ston pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can phyag g.yas kyis dam pa
161b7(rgyud): sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /mthu chen po thob pa gser gyi mdog can/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /zla ba'i 'od pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje'i 'khor lo bsnams pa/ /phyag g.yon gyis
162a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa/ dra ba can gyi 'od sku mdog dmar skya phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs su 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba/ phyag g.yas na sna tshogs rdo rje
162a2(rgyud): bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /spobs pa brtsegs pa gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas kyis se gol brdebs par brtson pa phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i steng du ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros gur gum gyi mdog can phyag g.yas
162a3(rgyud): na 'od 'phro ba mang po 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na mdung thung bsnams pa'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog can phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ba dan bsnams pa bri bar bya ste/ de dag
162a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bzhugs tshul dang / rgyan dang na bza' dang / dbu rgyan rnams ni kun du bzang po dang 'dre bar shes par bya ste/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can te khyad par ni de yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de nyid kyi byang shar mtshams su khams
162a5(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgyal ba ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa ste/ dmar ba g.yas pa/ drag po g.yon pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ rgyab dpa' bo'i zhal dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu dang ldan pa ste/ de gnyis
162a6(rgyud): kyi thugs kar hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang lcags kyu dang / mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na gzhu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang bar bzhugs pa'i zhabs g.yon pas dbang phyug chen po'i spyi bor gnon pa/ zhabs g.yas pas
162a7(rgyud): u ma'i nu ma rgyas pa mnan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi me tog gi phreng ba brgyus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / na bza' sna tshogs mnga' ba/ gdug pa can thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i phyir nges par gzhag par bya'o/ /shar lho mtshams su khro bo rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba char sprin gyi mdog can 'od can gyi phreng ba
162b1(rgyud): 'bar bas kun du 'khrug pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / mda' dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams ni dril bu dang / zhags pa dang /
162b2(rgyud): gzhu dang / kha T+wAM ga btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs pa bsnams pa/ me ser skya 'bar ba'i sgra'i tshogs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ sbrul chen po'i gdu bu dang / dbu rgyan dang ska rags dang / zhabs gdub dang / mgur chu dang / rna rgyan dang / cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ sgyu 'phrul chen po'i 'khor lo dgod pa
162b3(rgyud): la mkhas pa las/ g.yon brkyang bas khyab 'jug chung ma dang bcas pa gnon pa bri bar bya'o/ /lho nub mtshams su khro bo chen po rdo rje khrag 'thung sku mdog mthing shun ltar sngo ba/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po drag po/ zhal g.yas pa rab tu rmongs pa rnams sems rmongs par byed pa/ zhal g.yon
162b4(rgyud): pa sgeg pa dang ldan pa/ zhal rgyab baM za bar byed pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar ba bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon dril bu dang ba dan dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa dang gar mdzad pa/ yang gnyis kyis 'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa rlon pa rlung gi gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas
162b5(rgyud): bsnams pa/ yang gnyis na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yas na ma hA rak+tas yongs su bkang ba'i ka pA la'i thod tshal tsa sha ka bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yon na snying gi pad+ma'i nang na ma hA mAM sas bkang ba'i ka pA la bsnams pa/ sangs rgyas lngas mtshan pa'i thod pa lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis
162b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi nor bu can cod pan mnga' ba/ 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin mnga' ba/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po mnga' ba/ g.yon brkyang bas tshangs pa chung ma dang bcas pa mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o/ /nub byang mtshams
162b7(rgyud): su rta mchog sku mdog ljang gu zhal bzhi pa zhabs bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal g.yas drag po/ zhal g.yon tshangs pa'i gdong dang ldan pa/ spyi bo'i zhal ljang gu mchu dang spyi bo'i gtsug nas gyen du 'degs pa/
163a1(rgyud): phyag g.yas kyis ba dan gsum pa lta bu'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pas 'degs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa/ phyag g.yon na kha T+wAM ga sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa lta bus gyen du slong ba'i tshul du mdzad pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i gnyis
163a2(rgyud): pa na mdung thung bsnams pa/ yang phyag g.yas kyi gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na dbyug pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa gcig gis dbang po dang dbang mo mnan pa/ gnyis pas dga' ba mo dang mgu ba mo mnan pa/
163a3(rgyud): g.yon gyi dang pos brgya byin dang khyab 'jug mnan pa/ gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang 'dod pa'i lha mnan nas bzhugs par bri'o/ /de nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed char sprin gyi mdog can/ zhal drug pa phyag drug pa zhabs drug pa/ zhal drug po sgeg pa dang / dpa'
163a4(rgyud): ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / zhi ba dang / drag po dang rngam pa ste/ nyams rnam pa sna tshogs pas yongs su khyab cing rgyas pa/ phyag g.yas na lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas thugs kar sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ yang
163a5(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na gzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can sbrul gyis brgyan pa stag gi pags pa bsnams pas/ ma he'i steng du rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi
163a6(rgyud): sgor shes rab mthar byed ge sar ser po lta bu'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po sgeg pa/ zhal g.yas pa gdangs shing 'jigs su rung ba/ zhal g.yon pa zhi ba/ zhal rgyab ma shin tu drag cing gtum pa/ phyag g.yas na gzhug par byed pa'i zhags pa
163a7(rgyud): bsnams pa/ de las gzhan pas rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pas thugs ka'i phyogs su lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba la brtson pa de las gzhan par dril bu dang mdung thung dang gzhu bsnams pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ mi bskyod
163b1(rgyud): pa'i cod pan can/ rol pa'i stang stabs kyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma mthar byed sku mdog dmar po/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa zhal dang po dang / g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dang / rgyab ma ste bzhi po grangs ji lta ba bzhin du sgeg pa dang / drag po dang
163b2(rgyud): zhi ba dang / dgod pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ klu'i rgyal pos brgyan cing stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ sangs
163b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi byang chub la brtan par chags shing / 'ching ba dang / pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du rol pa'i stang stabs kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor khro bo bgegs mthar byed sprin sngon po'i mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/
163b4(rgyud): phyag g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis rdo rje bcings pas dril bu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon rnams na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang / gzhu dang dril bu bsnams pa/ sku la sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas
163b5(rgyud): kyi cod pan can g.yon brkyang bas tshogs kyi bdag po mnan nas bzhugs pa bri'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su ri mo bris la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams dgod par bya ste/ me'i phyogs su me tog ma sku mdog ser ba phyag gnyis me tog gis bkang ba'o/ /bden
163b6(rgyud): bral gyi phyogs su bdug pa ma sku mdog sngo ba/ phyag na spos khang bsnams pa'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su mar me ma sku mdog dmar ba phyag na mar me'i sdong bu bsnams pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su byug pa ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dung chos bsnams pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi
163b7(rgyud): sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje gzugs ma sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas na me long bsnams pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje sgrol ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ phyag na rdo rje pi wang bsnams pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje dri sku mdog ljang gu phyag na dri'i snod bsnams
164a1(rgyud): pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgo'i mtshams su rdo rje ro sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag na ro'i snod bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis byung la phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ yongs su bskor bar tshangs pa la sogs pa go rims ji lta ba
164a2(rgyud): bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de la byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan mdog dkar po ral pa dang cod pan yod pa/ kha T+wAM ga rtse gsum pa thod pa 'dzin pa/ lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar nas mgor bzhag pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lha mo/
164a3(rgyud): u ma dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bri'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mos 'dud par byed pa la mchog tu gzhol ba/ dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par bri'o/ /de la 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad ni phyogs dang mtshams rnams
164a4(rgyud): su bri bar bya ste/ shar du brgya byin mdog ser po rdo rje thogs pa/ glang po che dkar po la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /shar lhor me lha mdog dmar po lag pa bzhi pa/ g.yas gnyis na blugs gzar dang dbyug pa thogs pa/ g.yon gnyis phreng ba dang gun+d+he
164a5(rgyud): thogs par skyes la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo ni thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pas so sor ma smras so/ /lhor gshin rje mdog nag mo dbyug pa dang mdung thung thogs pa/ ma he la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho nub tu srin
164a6(rgyud): po'i bdag po mdog sngon po lag na ral gri dang phub thogs pa/ mi ro la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub tu chu lha mdog dkar po g.yas dang g.yon gnyis na dung dang sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa/ chu srin la zhon pa gdengs ka bdun pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub byang
164a7(rgyud): du rlung lha nam mkha'i mdog can lag pa gnyis na ba dan thogs pa ri dgas la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa bri'o/ /byang du lus ngan po gser gyi mdog can g.yas na lcags kyu thogs pa/ g.yon na dbyug ba thogs pa mi la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas par bri'o/ /'di dag gi chung
164b1(rgyud): ma rnams kyi mdog la sogs pa ni de rang rang gi khyo dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /dbang ldan dang nye bar tshangs pa mdog ser po gdong bzhi pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gnyis na pad+ma dang phreng ba thogs nas phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te/ 'jog pa de las gzhan pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa
164b2(rgyud): dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ ngang pa la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu khyab 'jug mdog nag mo lag pa bzhi pa g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis 'khor lo dang mdung thogs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te 'jog pa/ de las gzhan pa gnyis kyis sha ra'i gzhu dang
164b3(rgyud): dbyug pa 'dzin pa nam mkha' lding la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bri'o/ /dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar po lag pa gnyis na thod pa dang / rtse gsum thogs te thal mo sbyar ba zla ba'i rtse bran thogs pa khyu mchog la zhon pa chung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pas yongs su bskor
164b4(rgyud): bar bri'o/ /gzhon nu kArti ka mdog dmar po byis pa'i gzugs can gdong drug pa/ lag pa drug pa lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas la/ yang lag pa gnyis na mdung thung dang rdo rje thogs pa/ yang gnyis na khyim bya dang / dril bu thogs pa rma bya la zhon par bri'o/ /nag
164b5(rgyud): po chen po mdog nag po mdung rtse gsum pa dang thod pa thogs pa'o/ /dga' byed dbang phyug ni mdog nag po rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa rdza rnga la zhon pa'o/ /nyi ma ni mdog dmar po lag pa gnyis na pad+ma la gnas pa/ nyi ma'i kyis 'khor thogs pa rtas drangs pa'i shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /
164b6(rgyud): zla ba ni mdog dkar po lag pa gnyis na pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thogs pa ngang pa la zhon pa'o/ /mig dmar ni mdog dmar po la lag pa g.yas pa na chu gri thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na mi mgo za bar byed pa glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /gza' lag ni mdog ser po lag na mda'
164b7(rgyud): gzhu thogs pa pad+ma la 'dug pa'o/ /phur bu mdog dkar po lag na phreng ba dang spyi blugs thogs pa pad+ma la gnas pa'o/ /pa ba bsangs mdog dkar po phreng ba dang gu n+d+he thogs pa bum pa la 'dug pa'o/ /spen pa mdog nag po dbyug pa thogs pa rus sbal la zhon pa'o/ /sgra gcan
165a1(rgyud): mdog dmar nag lag na nyi zla thogs pa'o/ /mjug rings mdog nag po ral gri dang sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'o/ /stobs bzang mdog nag po ral gri dang gshol thogs pa glang po che la zhon pa'o/ /rgyal bar byed pa mdog ljang gu me tog gi phreng ba dang / mda' dang gzhu
165a2(rgyud): dang kham phor thogs pa/ ko ki la'i shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa mdog dkar po lag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang gzhu dang kham phor thogs pa ne tsho'i khri la zhon pa'o/ /dpyid kyi lha mdog dkar po lag na mda' dang gzhu dang / kham phor dang ral gri thogs pa
165a3(rgyud): sprin la zhon pa'o/ /mtha' yas dang nor rgyas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dung skyong dang / rigs ldan te klu'i rgyal po brgyad de gdengs ka bdun bdun dang ldan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba byas pa bri'o/ /de la mtha' yas dang / rigs ldan gnyis ni bram
165a4(rgyud): ze'i rigs te mdog dmar po me lha'i bu'o/ /nor rgyas dang dung skyong gnyis ni rgyal rigs te/ mdog ser po brgya byin gyi bu'o/ /'dzog po dang pad+ma chen po gnyis ni dmangs rigs te mdog nag po rlung lha'i bu'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma gnyis ni rje'u rigs te/ mdog dkar po chu lha'i bu'o/ /de dag kyang
165a5(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/ /thags bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang / rab dga' dang / rnam par snang byed la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni mdog nag po ral gri dang phub la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs pa lag na go cha gon zhing chas pa 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nam mkha'
165a6(rgyud): lding gi dbang po rnams ni gshog rgyang ring ba kha dog sna tshogs pa pus mo'i lha nga'i bar du kha ba ltar dkar ba/ de'i steng du lte ba'i khung bu la thug gi bar du gser gyi mdog can/ de nas lkog ma'i bar du nyi ma 'char mdog can/ de nas klad pa'i steng gi mthar thug par ma lus par any+dzA
165a7(rgyud): na bcag pa lta bu'i mdog can/ nam mkha' lding du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ni mdog dmar skya/ lag na pi wang thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa
165b1(rgyud): ni gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dri za'i rgyal po du mas yongs su bskor bar bri'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po don thams cad grub pa ni gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po du mas yongs su
165b2(rgyud): bskor bar bri'o/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyang lag na pany+tsa pu ra dang ne'u le thogs pa'o/ /de la gang ba bzang po ni mdog sngon po/ nor bu bzang po ni mdog ser po/ nor sbyin ni mdog dmar po/ rnam thos sras ni mdog ser po pi tsi guN+Da li mdog dmar po ki li mi li mdog ljang gu/
165b3(rgyud): sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po/ spyod pa'i dbang po mdog ser po/ 'phrog ma gser gyi mdog can de la bu dang bcas pa'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o/ /tha skar sku mdog dkar po/ bra nye mdog ljang gu/ smin drug mdog ljang ser/ snar ma mdog dmar skya/ mgo mdog
165b4(rgyud): nag po/ lag mdog dkar po/ nab so mdog dkar po/ rgyal mdog ljang gu/ skag mdog dkar po/ mchu mdog dkar po/ bre mdog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser/ dbo mdog ljang gu/ me bzhi mdog dkar po/ nag pa mdog ljang gu/ sa ri mdog dkar po/ sa ga mdog nag po/ lha mtshams
165b5(rgyud): mdog ljang gu/ smron mdog dkar po/ snrubs mdog dkar po/ chu stod mdog nag po/ chu smad mdog skya bo/ /gro bzhin mdog dmar skya/ byi bzhin mdog ljang gu/ mon gru mdog nag po/ mon gri mdog ser po/ khrums stong mdog ljang gu/ khrums smad mdog ser po/ nam gru mdog ser skya ste/ rgyu skar nyi shu
165b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad po de dag thams cad kyang rgyan dang ldan zhing gos gyon pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ bud med kyi gzugs su bri'o/ /tshangs pa ma ni tshangs pa dang 'dra bar bri'o/ /drag po ma ni drag po lta bu'o/ /khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug lta bu'o/ /gzhon nu ma ni kArti ka lta bu'o/ /dbang po ma ni brgya byin lta bu'o/ /phag mo ni mdog
165b7(rgyud): nag po ste/ yi dags la zhon pa/ nya rlon pa dang / thod pa lag na thogs pa'o/ /dga' byed ma ni mdog dmar po yi dags la zhon pa/ kA ti ra dang thod pa lag na thogs pa'o/ /de dang nye ba nyid du bri b+h+r-ing+gi ri ti bri ste/ ma mo bdun b+h+r-i ng+gi ri ti dang bcas par bri bar bya'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa/
166a1(rgyud): glang po che'i mdog can lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa na la du dang la phug thogs pa/ de las gzhan pa gnyis na mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta thogs pa/ sbrul ser mkhar thogs pa/ byi la la zhon pa/ tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o/ /lha gzhan dag kyang gzhal yas khang na
166a2(rgyud): gnas par bri'o/ /'dir yang sgo srung rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa de dag nyid yin no/ /de ltar na nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub ma lus shing / ma tshang ba med par bsgrub pa la
166a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sngar nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings
166a4(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis gang gi tshe/ slob mas lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'di ltar yid la bya ste/ ngas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis bsdu bas sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya'o/ /'di la
166a5(rgyud): yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bya'o zhes bsam mo/ /de nas slob ma de la che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par 'dod dam zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te bdag 'tshal lo zhes zer na/ des kyang
166a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad tshogs sam/ 'on te ma yin zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te cung zad ni chogs so zer na/ de nas de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pa'i yi ge hUM bsam pa dang / snying gar yang las kyi sgrib pa'i ngo bo yi ge ka nag
166a7(rgyud): por bsams la yi ge hUM gi 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gyen du 'byin par byed cing sna bug g.yas pa nas nges par 'byung ba ni gcer bu gzugs mi sdug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa byung ba dang / yi ge hUM yang snying gar phyin pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi sna khung de nyid nas byung nas
166b1(rgyud): gsang sngags de za bar gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha khA da ya khA da ya/ sarba pA paM A ba ra Na A s+ya hUM phaT/ yang na hUM las byung ba'i ro stod khro bo'i gzugs la ro smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su gnas pa'i phur bus gsang sngags 'di dang de nyid du phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /
166b2(rgyud): oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+hAM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas slob ma de saM las byung ba'i kun du bzang po'i gzugs su bsams la/ de'i spyi bor haM phyung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya ste/ de ltar byas na nang gi bdag nyid can gyi bgegs rnams 'byung bar
166b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro/ /yo byad ma tshogs pa rnams kyang bde blag tu tshang bar 'gyur ro/ /slob ma yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas grog mkhar gyis dang / skra dang phub ma la sogs pa las rang rang gi phyogs skyong gi gzugs brnyan bya ste/ dkyil 'khor
166b4(rgyud): gyi bgegs byed pa rnams sngags 'dis bkug la bcug ste/ bcings la phur bus legs par btab ste/ hUM bzhi ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun la gzhag par bya'o/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar ba byas la mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog lta bur mdud de/ mdzub
166b5(rgyud): mo g.yas pa lcags kyur byas la bzhag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste sngags la/ oM badzra aM gu sha ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma yaM hUM dzaH/ de nyid dang mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad nas zhags pa dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la oM badzra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha
166b6(rgyud): ya sarba sa ma ya hUM hUM/ de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar mdud pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrig gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ oM badzra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM baM/ de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcing sa la de rnams kyi mgo la yi ge hUM bkod de/ snga ma bzhin du rdo rje phur bu bskyed la/ rkang pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du phur
166b7(rgyud): bus gdab par bsams te/ bka' bsgo ba'i tshul gyis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nam ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas badzra kI li kI la ru Ta ma Ta/ zhes bya ba lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar yi ge hUM 'bar ba lta bus brdeg par bya ste/ cho ga 'di ni ji srid dkyil 'khor zhag gi bar du nyin re zhing nyi ma gung la bya'o/ /pha rol gyi bgegs
167a1(rgyud): gzhom pa'i cho ga'o/ / //de nas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su spos chu la sogs pas nye bar byugs shing me tog sil ma gtor la bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug pa dang / ci snyed pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa dag tu stan nang tshangs can 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ sngags 'di dag
167a2(rgyud): gis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /oM sarba pA paM ka pi ka pi ka pi ci ka ma na so b+hA taM rA ga de sha mo ha mA da ma na a b+hiSh+Thi na ya r+k+ri taM tre kA li kaM /hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA pa spo Ta yA mi swA hA/ oM sarba pA paM pra ti de sha mi swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta naM/ a t+ma b+ha ba na nir+yA ta
167a3(rgyud): yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta pra ti grih+Nan tu maM swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ye dz+nya na saM b+ha raM a nu mo de yA mi swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badzra sa ma ya ma hA bo d+hi tsi t+to t+pA ta mut+pa da ya mi swA hA/ de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta shwan si ta sarba sa ta d+hA naM/ sarba sid+d+ha ya saM pa na byan taM sarba ta thA ga ta sh+tsa
167a4(rgyud): ad+hi Sh+Tha nA taM/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+ha rmAHswA b+hA ba shu d+d+hou0f85haM/ zhes bya bas phyi deng nang gi chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsgom pa'i sems nyid nam m
167a5(rgyud): kha'i ngos kyi dbus su chud pa 'od kyi dra ba chen po dang ldan pa'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa la de'i steng du shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can gyi yi ge mu kha dog dmar skya/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /de yongs su gyur pa las rje
167a6(rgyud): btsun 'jam dpal zla ba lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang / mda' bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i glegs bam dang gzhu bsnams pa nyid de/ shes
167a7(rgyud): rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can mnga' ba/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / khro bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig pa'i lha mo thams cad spro ba dang / bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can du bdag nyid
167b1(rgyud): rnam par bsams la/ snying ga dang smin mtshams dang / lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag la rdo rje sems ma dang / rin chen sems ma dang / chos kyi sems ma dang / las kyi sems ma'i ngo bo nyid de/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par
167b2(rgyud): bdag nyid rnam par bsams la/ sa ma ya s+t+waM haM/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas mdun du yi ge hrIHlas pad+ma a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug la bcings te/ dbang du bya ba nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
167b3(rgyud): me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ lta ba nyid du byas nas de bzhin du mchod cing dbang bskur la rang gi lus la gzhug par bya ste/ ye shes sems dpa' de bltas nas rang gi lus la rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas
167b4(rgyud): gcig tu gyur pas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
167b5(rgyud): dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bdag nyid shes nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gan rkyal du khar bzhag ste/ thams cad bskor la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o/ /oM badzra tsa kra hUM phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis
167b6(rgyud): lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa mngon sum bzhin du yang dag par bltas la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis legs par mchod de/ rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa thun bzhi'i rim
167b7(rgyud): gyis ji srid du mthong bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya ba'am/ mtshan ma byung ba'am/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir rmi lam mthong gi bar du/ oM badzra tI k+Sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am/ gsang sngags gzhan dag bzla ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa spro ba dang
168a1(rgyud): bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can skad cig ma'i ye shes las byung ba'i rje btsun 'jam dpal du bdag nyid bsams la/ dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid sems tsam gyi sprul pa khong du chud pas sems kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang dag par bltas la ji srid
168a2(rgyud): mtshan ma byung bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu nyin re'am/ zla ba re'am/ lo re nyid du ji ltar mngon par dga' bar bsgrub cing zla ba yar gyi ngo la cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /
168a3(rgyud): de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am/ khru lnga bcu'o/ /blon po'am blon po chen po rnams kyis ni khru lnga bcu'am/ nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /ded dpon nam/ tshong dpon chen po rnams kyis ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/ de'i phyed do/ /sgrub pa po rnams kyis ni khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru drug pa'am/ ci nus par bya'o/ /
168a4(rgyud): de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad yang dag par ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs mngon par bsal la/ bdag dang slob ma la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sa sbyang
168a5(rgyud): bar bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam mam khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos la dri zhim po'i chus gtor ba'i sas slar bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste/ kun du brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis
168a6(rgyud): mdzes par byas la/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung dra ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba la mtha' ma rnams su legs par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan bzang po gzugs pa dang / bla re dam pa bre ba dang / sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris kyis nye bar
168a7(rgyud): mdzes par byas pa ba'i lci bas yang dag par sbyangs shing dris nye bar byugs pa dang / mtshams bzhir spos khang bzhag pa dang / me tog dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la/ /lag pa sa la bzhag ste/ hUM bzhi pa dang / yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par
168b1(rgyud): bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas shing dris byugs la gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs dang / ze'u ka bcings la me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang / rna rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par brgyan te/ zla ba nya ba nas brtsams nas/ phyi ma'i
168b2(rgyud): nya'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las byas pa'am/ yar gyi ngo la tshes gcig nas brtsams pa'am/ de bzhin nyid tshes brgyad dang / tshes dgu dang / tshes bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams la brtsams nas nya'i bar du'am/ snga dro'i dus su brtsams nas bya'o/ /de la dang
168b3(rgyud): por dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya ste/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ de nyid kyis na rdo rje gzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla/ /de ltar
168b4(rgyud): mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te/ rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa ni/ /dam tshig chen po gsum zhes bya/ /rgya 'di
168b5(rgyud): gsang sngags bsgrub pa'o/ /dngos grub cho ga thams cad la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o/ /de yang dang po sa'i lha mo yi ge paM las byung ba lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la/ 'dod
168b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal pos bkug ste/ me tog la sogs pas mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de la phyag rgya dang sngags 'di yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la mdzub mo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis mdud pa bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas
168b7(rgyud): 'di skad brjod do/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde/ /bcom par byas te dkyil 'khor
169a1(rgyud): bri/ /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas de nyid du thim par gyur par bsams la/ de'i steng du rdo rje bcing ga ba thur du bstan te bcings la bzhag ste/ oM badzrI b+ha ba hUM/ zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje bcing ba las byung ba'i hUM 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi sa gzhi
169a2(rgyud): gtan pa la thug gi bar du rdo rjer gyur par rnam par bsams la 'di skad do/ /dr-i D+ha badzra tiSh+Tha/ de nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
169a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs su 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang na gnas nas mngon par byang chub mngon sum du byed cing / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs par rim pa 'dis bsam par bya ste/ yang dag par rdzogs
169a4(rgyud): pa'i byang chub ces bya ba'am/ phyin ci ma log par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying por
169a5(rgyud): bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du bya ba rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs par dka' ba spyad pa
169a6(rgyud): thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / /ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam zhes gsung zhing gan du byon te/ badzrod tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / se go la brdabs pas slong bar mdzad par bsam mo/ /de nas langs nas mchog tu
169a7(rgyud): dad pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badzra pra Na mya na badzra ban+d+ha naM ka ro mi zhes brjod la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis ma 'tshal na de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ de ltar na bsgrub par bgyi/ bka'
169b1(rgyud): stsal du gsol/ de nas rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar bzlas shing bsgrub par gyis shig /ces gsung zhing sems so sor rtogs pa'i man ngag de stsol bar bsam par bya ba ni/ oM tsit+ta pra
169b2(rgyud): ti be d+hi ka ro mi zhes bya ba phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med pa de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa de'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa dang / sems
169b3(rgyud): kyi rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi
169b4(rgyud): snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na/ de lta bur sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po la tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/
169b5(rgyud): slar yang byang chub kyi sems kyi man ngag ston par mdzad par bsam pa ni/ oM bod+hi tsi t+ta ut+pa' da yA mi zhes bya'o/ /de nas shin tu 'od gsal ba'i sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las/ rim gyis nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / zla ba'i dkyil
169b6(rgyud): 'khor yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong zhes bya ba ste/ shin tu rnam par dag cing nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa la spros pa thams cad par bral ba me long lta bur
169b7(rgyud): rnam par gnas so/ /oM dz+nyA na shash+mi pri si dza hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par spros te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs par gang zhing byung ste/ byung ba de rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs nas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
170a1(rgyud): snang bar bya ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bcom ste/ rtogs par byas nas rdo rje chen po'i gzugs gcig tu gyur nas byung ste/ rtse lnga pa spyi bo nas thugs kar bzhugs te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
170a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis de legs par sgrubs shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i
170a3(rgyud): dbyibs su soms shig / oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ yang sngags 'dis spro bar bya'o/ /oM s+phar badzra/ oM saM ha ra badzra/ oM oM dz+nyA na badzra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badzra hUM hUM/ de nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag
170a4(rgyud): gis mthong ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di/ sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o/ /oM badzra At+ma kou0f85hAM/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs r
170a5(rgyud): do rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
170a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong ngo / /sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos la
170a7(rgyud): sgoms shig / oM ya tha sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
170b1(rgyud): kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/ /de nas skad cig de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
170b2(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang
170b3(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin gyis dag go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin
170b4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to/ /de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyang rang rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar 'byung bar bsam par bya ste/ rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid
170b5(rgyud): yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed de/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur
170b6(rgyud): bas dbang bskur/ kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas/ /dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas yongs su bskor te/ lhan cig yang dag par
170b7(rgyud): gnas so/ /de nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin pas byams pa dang snying rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa dang mi shes pa las 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis dkrugs par shes nas bdag 'dir
171a1(rgyud): babs la skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la sogs par sprul pas rjes su gzung bar bya'o zhes yid la nges par byas te/ rim pa 'dis snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed par bya'o/ /hUM yaM hUM/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /hUM baM hUM/ chu'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /hUM raM
171a2(rgyud): hUM/ me'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas nam mkha' las yi ge khaM las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams la/ de'i sku'i yan lag thams cad las chu'i rgyun sbom po byung bas snod thams cad yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgoms la/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du thim
171a3(rgyud): par gyur par rnam par bsams nas/ me dang chu'i bar du hUM laM hUM zhes bya ba rnam par bkod la/ de bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba las sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa las gser gyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom/ de'i steng du hUM suM hUM zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po ri rab bsam
171a4(rgyud): mo/ /de'i steng du khaM las khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsam la/ de'i dbus su sa bon 'di rnams las pad+ma la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i grangs snyed kyi gdan rnam par bsam par bya ste/ yi ge hrIHlas thams cad du pad+ma bsam/ a si a zhes bya ba 'dis
171a5(rgyud): dbus su 'khor lo can gyi seng ge'i gdan shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ hUM gaM hUM/ traM baM traM/ hri maM hri/ a gaM a/ 'di dag las grangs ji lta ba bzhin du glang po che dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdan rnams bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas mi bskyod pa la
171a6(rgyud): sogs pa dang lhan cig babs te/ seng ge'i gdan la legs par 'dug ste/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi glang po che'i gdan la sogs pa nye bar gnas par bsams la/ bdag nyid zhal bzhi pa byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas gnas par bsgom zhing bcom
171a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal te/ 'di ni dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// //rje btsun 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul gyis mngon par sangs rgyas te/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba ni mtshan tsam gyis gzhan du gyur pa yin
171b1(rgyud): pas na log par khong du chud par mi bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang rang gi gnas su 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin
171b2(rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra sa ma yA dza dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod la/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rnams byon pa dang / zhabs la phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas ched du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod ma
171b3(rgyud): thag tu bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi la zhugs par bsam mo/ /de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA ta ban+da naM ka ro mi e ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo
171b4(rgyud): yi/ /dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzes/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas nus pa ma lus pa'i/ /shugs kyis byin gyis brlabs te byung nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing / chu dang 'o
171b5(rgyud): ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas gnas par bsam mo/ /de la ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te/ e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min/ /rdul phran thams cad grangs rnyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor pas
171b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams rang gi las la yang dag par sbyar nas/ de rnams kyi thugs ka'i zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bsams la/ lan bdun nam brgyad kyis bzlas brjod byas nas/ de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid mchod par gyur par bsams pa'am/ de ltar
171b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes mchog tu yang nga rgyal bya ste/ 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thal mo sbyar nas cung zad btud de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
172a1(rgyud): bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par bdag nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'dis brtag par bya'o/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ /bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis/ /theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis/ /tshul
172a2(rgyud): chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi/ /cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas sngags pas yang dag par byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa rang gi snying pos
172a3(rgyud): mchod yon phul la/ lha rnams kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste/ spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas gnas la/ 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /deng ni
172a4(rgyud): bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par/ /gyur par bdag ni som nyi med/ /byang chub sems dang sems gcig las/ /mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni/ /deng bdag skye
172a5(rgyud): bar the tshom med/ /deng bdag nyid ma dam pa ste/ /bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la bdug spos phul te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba
172a6(rgyud): gdab par bya'o/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ rang
172a7(rgyud): gi dam tshig phyag rgyas bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs nas/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo steng du nam mkha' la gzhag ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su a las sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la/ rkang mthil nas yongs
172b1(rgyud): su bzung ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos la/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te bskor la/ sna tshogs rdo rje de dag nyid sa la 'bri zhing bgegs thams cad skrod pa la brtson par 'gro bar bya'o/ /
172b2(rgyud): 'dir bshad pa/ phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/ /kun du rnam par bltas nas ni/ /badzra satwa zhes brjod nas/ /bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor/ /sngags pas rdo rje sems zlos shing / /rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi char/ /nyes ldan
172b3(rgyud): pa yang dag par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlabs la/ g.yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje chen po gsor zhing / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu gsil
172b4(rgyud): nas khro bas 'bar ba'i lus dang / bskor ba lan gsum byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras
172b5(rgyud): bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nga 'dri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dags dang / sha za dang / 'byung bo dang brjed byed dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnon po dang /
172b6(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa rgan po dang / rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /deng 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag nga'i ye shes
172b7(rgyud): kyi rdo rjes mgo bo tshal pa brgyar rnam par 'gas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha la sogs pa de rnams sa de spangs nas song bar bsams la/ rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa ltar byas la/ kha'i steng du kha sbub ste
173a1(rgyud): bzhag la/ mthun pa'i rkang stabs la sogs pas mchongs la/ hUM badzra baM hUM zhes brjod la byis pa gzhon nu bzhin du bdag po lnga'i gnas su yongs su bskor/ de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid bsams la/ bdag po'i gnas su rkang pa gnyis dang / lag pa
173a2(rgyud): gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ shar phyogs su bltas nas snying ga la reg par byas la/ de bzhin du gnas nas lag pa gnyis thad kar brkyang ste/ bdag nyid sna tshogs rdo rje chen po zhig a zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor bcing
173a3(rgyud): ba dang / ra ba dang dra ba rnams bya'o/ /oM badzra dz+wa la a na lA rka hUM zhes brjod la g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas/ g.yas pas rdo rje gsor te bgegs rnams gzhom par bya'o/ /yang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs bsreg pa la sogs
173a4(rgyud): pa bya ste/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+ha ny+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas pa'i sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas la/ mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra ne tri ban+d+ha big+h+nAn zhes bya bas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o/ /
173a5(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste/ mnyam par gzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang bas la bzhag nas 'og phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbaM dwA hA/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar
173a6(rgyud): bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis brkyang la/ mdzub mo gnyis mche bar byas bar byas pa 'di ni phyag rgya'o/ /yang na rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o/ /oM hu lu hUM phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du
173a7(rgyud): bskor te/ mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bzhag pa ni/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje dang ldan pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM druM ban+d+ha hUM/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog ltar mdud de/ mdzub mo
173b1(rgyud): gnyis rtse sprad la yongs su bzlog ste/ spyi bor gzhag go/ /yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra pA sha hrIH/ rdo rje khu tshur mkhrig ma mdud pa bya ba ni zhags pa'o/ /rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra pra taM ke pA taM ki ni ra Ta/ rdo rje bsdams pa
173b2(rgyud): las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bya/ mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar srin lag phye la mthe'u chung ba dan no/ /rdo rje nag mos byang phyogs bsrung bar bya ste/ hri badzra kA li ru Ta ma Ta/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya nyid khar bzhag la brtan par byas pas ni rdo rje nag
173b3(rgyud): mo'o/ /rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste/ oM badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcings la ra ba bya'o/ /hUM badzra karma/ yang rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis ra ba bya ste/ hUM rdo rje bcing
173b4(rgyud): bas rdo rje ra ba bya'o/ /sngags ni badzra ban+d+ha zhes bya ba'o/ /yang hUM a nu rA ga yA mi hUM zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis bya ste/ de la phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bskor
173b5(rgyud): bas/ bskor ba 'di ni dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o/ /khar bskor ba ni mtshams bcing ba'o/ /snying la 'bar ltar zhugs gyur cing / /phyogs kun rdo rje me 'bar bas/ /nga yi'ang khro bo chen po yi/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos
173b6(rgyud): gsungs so/ /oM ma hA badzra tsakra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+h+ya hUM zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pa yang byin gyis brlab bo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra maN+Dal hUM dz+dzaHzhes bya ba 'dis gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor bkug la/ phur
173b7(rgyud): bu gdab bo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis dang / mthe bo rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs shing bsgrub par 'gyur la/ /'jig rten pa rnams kyang zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la phur bu ni 'di yin te sor brgyad pa'i tshad tsam
174a1(rgyud): gyis seng ldeng gi phur bu tsan+dan dmar pos byugs la srad bu dmar po dang / me tog dmar pos bcings la/ stod khro bo'i gzugs la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa hUM las bskyed do/ /oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+naM ban+d+ha hUM phaT ces bya ba
174a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ g.yas pas rdo rje tho ba bzung nas/ des dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir brdung bar bya'o/ /oM ha na ha na/ da ma da ma/ sany+tsU r+NA ya sany+tsU r+NA ya/ badzra badzra mung+ga ra hUM phaT ces bya ba rdo rje tho ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
174a3(rgyud): bzlas te me tog dmar po dang / srad bu dmar pos bcings la/ tsan+dan dmar pos byugs te/ des kun du brdung bar bya'o/ /yang / bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba thams cad la/ /rdo rje go chas go cha bya/ /de nas badzra shi kha re ru Ta
174a4(rgyud): ma Ta zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la gur kum dang / a ka ru dang tsan+dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri dang dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi sngags kyis btab la lha rnams kyi grangs ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o/ /
174a5(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la yid kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags te/ dkyil 'khor de rnams su rnam par snang mdzad chen po yongs su gyur pas rje btsun 'jam dpal du gyur pa la sogs rang gi snying por bzhag la/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag
174a6(rgyud): par mchod do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngags kyis mngon par gdab bo/ /de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ baM las rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa rtsa ba nag nog med pa/ lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba/ kha dgye ba bskyed la/ de'i dbus su hrIHlas
174a7(rgyud): byung ba'i pad+ma de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang gi dam tshig gis gnas pas bzhugs par bsams la/ de las byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi chus yongs su bkang bar bsams la/ sman lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang /
174b1(rgyud): rin po che sna lnga dang ldan pa me tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i gsang ba'i snying po can mgul pa gos gtsang mas dkris la/ a mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bzla zhing / oM badzro da ka hUM hUM zhes bya ba stong rtsa brgyad
174b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya ste/ spos la sogs pas mchod nas dkyil 'khor bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi nyin mo dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor du yang bzlas brjod bya ste/ de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
174b3(rgyud): sang gri bya g+h+r-i krita ka r+Ni ka ha sa de ba ste/ sman rnams kun zhes bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya ste/ 'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u dang / nas dang gro dang til dang lnga/ /'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba ni/ /las rnams kun la 'di dag gsungs/ /byi ru gser ni sa le sbram/ /dung
174b4(rgyud): dang mu tig nor bu ste/ /rin chen kun zhes bya ba la/ /lnga po 'di dag shes par bya/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ las thams cad pa'i bum pa la mngon par bsngags la/ de bzhin du me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgor
174b5(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya hoHb+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ mthe'u chung rtse mo mdud byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng ba dag/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad
174b6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di'o zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya'o/ /gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya ste/ ji srid dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa de srid du 'dir 'dug pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par bzlog tu gsol zhes bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste/ dad cing
174b7(rgyud): gus par phyag 'tshal te/ slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de la re zhig slob ma legs par khrus byas shing / /gos gtsang ma gon la lag na me tog thogs pas slob dpon la phyag bya ste/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston
175a1(rgyud): pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum
175a2(rgyud): dag ni bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar hUM las rdo rje bskyed la/ khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas/ rdo rje de snying gar snying pos bzhag ste/ su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badzra sid+d+ha ya thA su
175a3(rgyud): khaM/ de nas de bzhin du de'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag la rdo rje las kyi snying po brjod nas/ sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas haM badzra rak+Sha zhes bya ba las go cha bskyed la/ rkang pa'i mthar thug gi bar du go cha bskon par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i dris lag par dri sbyin/ me tog gis
175a4(rgyud): me tog gtor zhing / bdug pas bdug pa gtul te/ me mar nye bar bstan la re re zhing 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur pas nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo la bos te/ 'di skad brjod par bya'o/ /khyod ni
175a5(rgyud): tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag /de
175a6(rgyud): dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen dag kyang de
175a7(rgyud): yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni/ /shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon/ /brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob/ /de nas cho ga
175b1(rgyud): 'dis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang
175b2(rgyud): sngags dang rig sngags thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su gyur pa thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang /
175b3(rgyud): gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad bla na med pa'i so sor bshags pas so sor bshags par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus par gtogs pa'i bsod nams thams cad mkhyen cing
175b4(rgyud): rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba de dag la bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir bskul ma 'tshal
175b5(rgyud): lo/ /gang yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la nan tan lhur mdzad pa de la sems can gyi khams ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de skad lan gnyis lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma slob dpon du 'os pa yongs
175b6(rgyud): su bzung la/ khas len par bya ba'i phyir bzhin bzang smos shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /slob mas kyang 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /slob dpon bdag la stsal du gsol/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems
175b7(rgyud): can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brtul zhugs che/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang / /slob dpon nyid ni bdag la stsol/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /slob dpon dag
176a1(rgyud): ni bdag bgyid do/ /rin chen rigs mchog yid 'ong ba'i/ /dam tshig dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa dang / de bzhin las kyi rigs chen la/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /mgon pos bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /de ltar
176a2(rgyud): lan gnyis lan gsum mo/ /de nas sdom pa sbyin par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs
176a3(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas shing mu med pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / mi bskyod pa dang rin chen mchog dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / don yod grub pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
176a4(rgyud): cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges pa yi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs
176a5(rgyud): rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas
176a6(rgyud): brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi gtong ngo / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re
176a7(rgyud): bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhir rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /
176b1(rgyud): yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar
176b2(rgyud): bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das gzhag bgyi/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o/ /de nas gzhan yang / sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /gzhan dag don ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /
176b3(rgyud): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do/ /zhes bya ba 'dis lan gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas la/ 'dis smon lam 'debs su gzhug par bya ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas gyur par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos
176b4(rgyud): rnams ston bgyid cing / /sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las dgrol/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas chos bstan par bya ste/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /khyod rnams 'dir ni dong bas na/ /rang byung skal ba chen po pa/ /'jig rten
176b5(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyi/ /rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa/ /spros pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/ /las
176b6(rgyud): dang bya ba la sogs bral/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yis/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ /de nas badzra ha sa ha sa zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i shing gi rtse mo dris bskus shing me tog gis brgyan pa/ shing mngar po'o ma
176b7(rgyud): can las byung ba/ tshad sor bcu gnyis pa 'cha' ru gzhug par bya'o/ /slob ma shar phyogs kha bltas te/ /mi smra bar ni so shing bca'/ /bcas zin nas ni mi dgos shing / /phan tshun du yang mi dor ro/ /so shing mdun du drang por dor/ /de tshe bdag la blta ba'am/ /rtse mo
177a1(rgyud): gyen du 'greng gyur na/ /des na dngos grub mchog ces bya/ /de bzhin shar du kha bltas na/ /de yi dngos grub 'bring du bshad/ /mtshams dang byang du kha bltas na/ /'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'grub/ /so shing dor ba brgya zhig las/ /gal te thur du
177a2(rgyud): kha bltas na/ /des ni nges par sa 'og gi /dngos grub 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas oM badzra NaM zhes bya ba'i glu'i rdo rje yongs su bzlas pa'i chus 'thor 'thung bya ba'i phyir byin la/ yang oM hrIHbi shud+d+ha sarba pA pa ni sh+tsA s+ya sho d+ha ya/ sarba bi ka la ba na a ba na ya hUM zhes bya ba mngon
177a3(rgyud): par bzlas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug pa'i phyir sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha gcig la oM badzra tI k+Sh+Na d+haM zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas pa byin la 'di ltar mgo bo'i gnas su zhog cig ces bsgo'o/ /yang ku sha gzhan dag rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags mngon par bzlas pa
177a4(rgyud): stan du bya ba'i phyir/ sbyin par bya'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mngon par bzlas pa'i srung skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan pa la yang yi ge brgya pa yang bzlas brjod bya ste/ dpung pa g.yon pa la bsrung ba bya ba'i phyir dang / brtan par bya ba'i phyir bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha zhes bya
177a5(rgyud): bas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su toSh+yo me b+ha wa/ su poSh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba kar+m+ma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra
177a6(rgyud): mA me muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya sa twa AHzhes bya ba ni yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so/ /de nas bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig /sang gi nyin mo khyed rnams kyis thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ /ji ltar mthong ba'i rmi lam rnams
177a7(rgyud): kyang smos shig ces brjod la slar btang ngo / /de nang par mtshan mo'i mthar rmi lam gang dag mthong ba dri bar bya'o/ /dri ba thos nas rmi lam bzang po'am/ /ngan pa 'dzem pa med par brjod par bya'o/ /rmi lam sangs rgyas mthong ba ni/ /yon tan rgya mtsho mngon sum bzhin/ /mchod
177b1(rgyud): rten dang ni sku gzugs mthong / /de la mchod pa rtsom pa dang / /dge slong dag la chos nyan tam/ /yang na gzhan las nyan yang rung / /chos ni rnam par dpyad pa dang / /de bzhin glegs bam klog pa dang / /rmi lam dge 'dun mthong ba dang / /yang na dge slob gcig po mthong / /de dang
177b2(rgyud): 'grogs shing gtam zer dang / /yang na dge slong dngos por gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dag mthong ba dang / /de bzhin dge slong ma dag mthong / /rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang / /de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang / /mdza' bo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rmi lam du ni mthong na
177b3(rgyud): shis/ /rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob/ /de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / /kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang / /ri dang glang po che dag kyang / /mthong na yang ni bzang bar bsgrags/ /rgyal po dag ni mthong na shis/ /bde gshegs spyod dang
177b4(rgyud): mthun pa yi/ /dka' thub can dang bram ze dang / /phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang / /ba dang rta dang ngang pa dang / /seng ge dang ni ri dgas rnams/ /rmi lam du ni mthong na shis/ /bkra shis pa yi bya rnams dang / /gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang / /rin po che dang dngul dag
177b5(rgyud): dang / /nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang / /mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang / /'bras bu rnams dang me tog dang / /rgyan ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang / /byis pa dag ni gzhon nu dang / /bud med gzugs ni
177b6(rgyud): bzang po dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang / /yang na thob cing reg smra dang / /rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang / /rgyal por gyur cing 'byor ba dang / /dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang / /g.yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang / /gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang / /lha rnams
177b7(rgyud): kyang ni mthong ba dang / /theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon/ /de bzhin ri dang yang thog 'dzegs/ /ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag /rmi lam du ni mthong na dge/ /yam shing me lha sbyin sreg byed/ /bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug /chu la rkyal zhing rong las rgal/ /rkun po dag ni tshar gcod
178a1(rgyud): dang / /stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang / /gyad stangs rdob cing 'gying ba dang / /rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang / /de bzhin rtsal dang spungs byed dang / /bkra shis dag ni thams cad kyang / /mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad/ /gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang / /
