197a7(rgyud): srid rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar du dbang bskur ro/ /de nas de'i mgor yang 'jam pa'i sku gzugs de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bzung la/ oM ma hA su kha badzra satwaM dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /shes rab
197b1(rgyud): yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs byang chub de dbang bskur/ /rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems tshogs dkyil
197b2(rgyud): 'khor la 'jug cing / /srid pa'i snying por rnam rol sgeg mo la sogs pas/ /bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /shin tu zhi ba'i mdzad pa phul byung ma lus pas/ /sems can bde gshegs rtogs
197b3(rgyud): mdzad bcom ldan dbang bskur la/ /dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang / /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor rab mchog la/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por rgyal mchog
197b4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba/ /lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang / /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na pad+mo yis/ /rdzogs sangs rin chen cod pan bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags
197b5(rgyud): rnams legs pa yi bkra shis gang / /des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /nam mkha'i snying po nor bu rin chen 'byor pas nyams dga' zhing / /don rnams kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la/ /dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis
197b6(rgyud): gang / /des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis shog /'khor los sgyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis glu blangs las/ /bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa/ /des ni kun son 'byor ba'i dbang bskur chen po la/ /'jam dpal grags bcas 'jig rten
197b7(rgyud): rnam par dag gyur cig / de nas gos la sogs pas brgyan te/ sangs rgyas kyi cod pan dang dar dpyangs la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ thog
198a1(rgyud): mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po thams cad bdag/ /rdo rje'i snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ /ces bya ba ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de/ ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas hi
198a2(rgyud): zhes brjod la de bzhin du bdag po nyid du dbang bskur ro/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nu t+pa n+na twA ta ces brjod la dril bu byin te chos bstan par bya'o/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /dam
198a3(rgyud): pa'i dngos po byed par 'gyur/ /de nas yi ge d+hIHbrjod la/ /ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la/ dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal mang po zhi bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /de bas dam
198a4(rgyud): tshig bsrung bar gyis/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can
198a5(rgyud): don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /sems can don ni ston par byed/ /ces bya ba dang / yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya dam tshig yin
198a6(rgyud): par grags/ /gang gis lus kun brtan pas na/ /phyag rgya yin par rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas shrI brjod par bya'o/ /de nas spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par
198a7(rgyud): bya'o/ /slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /rjes su gnad pa'i sbyin brtson pas/ /slob ma rdzogs par shes nas ni/ /go 'phang 'di ni thob par bya/ /shin tu gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyid/ /rdo rje slob mas gsol byas te/ /de nyid la ni yon gyi
198b1(rgyud): mchog / dam pa phul nas gsol ba gdab/ /'di zhes bya ba'i rdo rje can/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi pad+mo la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba 'tshal/ /slob dpon rab tu rmad byung ba/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang bskur nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang
198b2(rgyud): chub thob byed pa/ /skal ba chen pos bdag la stsol/ /gang gis sems can thams cad kyi/ /rnyog med don ni bdag bgyid cing / /brtul zhugs bzang khyod drin gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun don mdzad pa'ang bgyid/ /slob dpon phan par 'dod pa yis/ /dbang bskur
198b3(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje che/ /khams gsum kun gyis byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che/ /khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas shing / /khams gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i
198b4(rgyud): khams/ /yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom/ /phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gi /sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje bsgom/ /dam tshig mchog gi bum pa yang / /'dzin par mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /rdo
198b5(rgyud): rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis/ /de tshe de la dbang bskur ba/ /rdzogs sangs rdo rje lha mo rnams/ /rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoHma hA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi She ka s+t+waM/
198b6(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sarba badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha pa sid+d+h+ya na maHte b+ha ga wAn ma hA badzra ha ra su ra ta s+t+waM/ ma hA badzra swA hA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHzhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de sngags brjod par bya'o/ /me
198b7(rgyud): tog ma'i gzugs can gyis me tog gis gtor la/ deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ces pas mchod na khyod mchod pa'i yan lag brtsams kyis/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan pa byas pa'i skur mthong bar
199a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la 'jug par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mar me
199a2(rgyud): ma'i gzugs su mar me nye bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yang dag par 'bar bas/ ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang bas snang bar byed par 'gyur
199a3(rgyud): ro/ /de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun
199a4(rgyud): ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs can gyis me tog cig sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'phangs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ deng nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa thams cad 'dod pas mchod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa
199a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i rol pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rol bar gyis shig / de nas lha mo phreng ba ma'i gzugs can gyis phreng ba bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang
199a6(rgyud): bcas pa 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng bas rgyun du mchod pa la skyo ba med par gyis shig 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng brgyan rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin no/ /de nas lha mo glu
199a7(rgyud): ma'i gzugs can dang / oM badzra satwa su saM gra hata ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / glu blangs la 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ deng nas brtsams te chos thams cad sgrogs shing / ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par
199b1(rgyud): sdud pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha mo gar mkhan ma'i gzugs kyi gar gyi lag pas sad par byas la 'di skad ces brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar la rab tu 'jug cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gar gyi rjes su dgyes par gyis shig
199b2(rgyud): de nas rin po che'am gser gyi thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /de nas mig tu pra bkod la me long
199b3(rgyud): blangs nas/ chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun du byung / /ngo bo nyid med gnas med par/ /de ltar chos rnams shes nas su/ /sems can
199b4(rgyud): don ni mnyam med byos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye/ /de nas hoH zhes bya bas gzhu byin la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod do/ /phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phan du gzhug cing / steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go/ /de nas
199b5(rgyud): sha d+ha ban dz+dza ka byin la 'dis dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad sprul la nye bar longs spyod cing / gzhan dag la yang byin cig /de nas rgyal mtshan byin la 'dis ni dgra thams cad dang 'thab pa las nye bar rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /de nas
199b6(rgyud): rdo rje snyems ma'i phyag rgya byin la/ 'dis ma rungs pa thams cad sgrubs shig ces brjod do/ /gzhan yang a badzra satwa zhes bya bas me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas/ /
199b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin/ /zhes bya ba dang / 'di skad ces kyang bsgo ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ni 'di nyid yin par rtogs shing / de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing / dung yang
200a1(rgyud): lag pa g.yas par byin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la 'di skad ces brjod de/ deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /de ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa rnams kyi
200a2(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dung ni bla med pas/ /kun du ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /dogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la/ /phan
200a3(rgyud): 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang / /kun du khyod la srung bar byed/ /rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral ba
200a4(rgyud): khyod kyis kyang ni ma byed cig / gsang ba bsgrags nas thal mo dang bcas pas dang por 'di skad brjod do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje mgon po rab sgrub mdzad/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po/ /
200a5(rgyud): dpal kun gyi ni rgyal po mchog /spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las dang rdung ba che/ /gnod sbyin gtum po gdon chen po/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
200a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don kun gyi ni de nyid don/ /sems can don chen kun rig pa/ /kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de/ /kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog /rdo rje
200a7(rgyud): brtson rab rdo rje 'chang / /dam tshig chen po'i de nyid don/ /sems can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che/ /rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po/ /rdo rje 'od dang 'od chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje dgu/ /rig mchog
200b1(rgyud): mchog dang mi yi mchog / rdo rje dam pa mchog chen po/ /rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dbyings dang gsal ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba rang gsang 'chang / /rdo rje phreng ba bsam gtan che/ /rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog
200b2(rgyud): gsang rdo rje mchog / sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che/ /sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchog pa/ /thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che/ /rdo rje grub khyod phyag
200b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /ta thA ga ta'i glu chen po/ /ta thA ga ta'i gsung dbyangs te/ /ta thA ga ta sems chen po/ /rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal khyod/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/ /sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes/ /rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab/ /
200b4(rgyud): zhi khro ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta thA ga ta de nyid che/ /yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul/ /pha rol phyin pa'i kun mkhyen pa/ /don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun du bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ /kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid
200b5(rgyud): mkhyen/ /kun du 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas hUM ste hUM zhes pa/ /rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba'o/ /phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag rgya brjod cing brjod pa dang / /rim gror ta thA ga tas khyab/ /gang phyir rdo rje sems bstan pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya khyod/
200b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ /kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/ /'byung po dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /ta thA ga ta khyod kyis bsgrubs/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /glu blangs gang zhig stod byed cing / /de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /mgon po khyod la gsol
200b7(rgyud): ba ni/ /sems can don kun mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ /mgon po khyod la bstod bgyis pas/ /theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod/ /de nas/ 'jig rten kun la phan
201a1(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje
201a2(rgyud): rin chen du bsgoms nas/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin du chus dbang bskur la/ /rin po che'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rin po che'i rdo rje khu tshur mnyam par bcings la mthe bo dang
201a3(rgyud): mdzub mo rtse sbyar ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che byin la/ de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ nyi ma 'di ni mchog yin te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong / /nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o/ /hri de nas bdag po nyid du dbang
201a4(rgyud): bskur te/ de bzhin du a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM zhes bya bas dril bu byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ bsam pa thams cad grub pas na/ /don gyi bsam grub bla na med/ /de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir/ /'dod dang thar ba'i bde chen po/ /d+hIH de nas ming gi dbang bskur
201a5(rgyud): ba byin la/ de bzhin du bzhag nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ 'dod dang bde ba thams cad dang / /mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya zhing / /bdag nyid dang ni pha rol gyi/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis/ /shI/ de nas de bzhin du/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoHma hA su kha
201a6(rgyud): badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka s+t+waM/ a b+he Shi ny+tsA mi/ sarba rat+na a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ /sid+d+ha na ma te/ b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA rat+na sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM badzra rat+na/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHzhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis kyis rin po che byin la/ de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ rang gi
201a7(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang nye bar bstan nas/ sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas don la sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur zhes/ /gsang ba brjod nas de
201b1(rgyud): bzhin du/ /rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni/ /nor gyi tshogs ni bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /
201b2(rgyud): zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag po rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje chos su rnam par bsams la/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin du chus dbang bskur la dam pa'i
201b3(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dar dpyangs cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bskur te pad+ma byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste/ /gdul ba'i
201b4(rgyud): thabs kyi mdzad pa ni/ /dga' ba'i rol mor rab tu 'jug /hriHde nas bdag po'i dbang bskur ba/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM Ad+ya nu t+pan+na twAta/ ces bya bas dril bu byin nas chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni/ /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos ltar/ /
201b5(rgyud): de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /d+hIHde nas ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ba byin la/ de bzhin gzhan nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ cho ga dag ni gang dag gis/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'dul 'gyur ba/ /pad+ma dag par sbyor ba'i
201b6(rgyud): bdag / de dang des ni sbyar bar bya/ /shrI de nas de bzhin du oM dzaHhUM baM hoHma hA su khaM pad+ma ma hA a b+hi She ka s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shi ny+tsA mi/ sarba pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya ra ha me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na ma te b+ha ga wAn ma hA pad+ma su ra ta s+t+waM/ a haM badzra pad+ma oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHzhes bya bas lag pa gnyis
201b7(rgyud): kyis pad+ma byin la/ de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la/ /'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ /rgyal ba rnams la de phul la/ /sems can don phyir gzhan chung ma/ /bsten na bsod
202a1(rgyud): nams thob par 'gyur/ /zhes gsang ba brjod la/ de nas 'di skad ces brjod do/ /dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba ni/ /rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig
202a2(rgyud): rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag po yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig /ces brjod do/ /de
202a3(rgyud): la sna tshogs rdo rje can du rnam par bsams la/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la de bzhin du chus dbang bskur te/ las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje cod ban gyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ sna tshogs rdo rje byin la de kho na
202a4(rgyud): nyid bstan par bya ste/ rtag pa'i 'dod chags las byung khro/ /rdo rje me yi phung po'i gzugs/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje sbyor ba che/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni kun du 'bar/ /hrIHde nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur la/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas dril bu byin nas
202a5(rgyud): chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste/ chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /'di kun myur du 'dzin par 'gyur/ /d+hIHde nas ming gi dbang bskur ba byin la/ de bzhin du bzhag nas dam
202a6(rgyud): tshig bstan par bya ste/ thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab la/ /khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya/ /shrI de nas de bzhin du/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoHma hA su kha badzra kar+m+ma a b+hi She ka ta s+t+waM/ a b+hi
202a7(rgyud): Shiny+tsA mi/ sarba badzra kar+m+ma a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ sid+d+ha na ma te b+ha ga wAn ma hA badzra bishwa/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ a haM/ badzra kar+m+ma oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHzhes bya ba 'dis lag pa gnyis kyis las kyi rdo rje byin la de bzhin du mchod nas rang gi ming brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de/ dam tshig gi
202b1(rgyud): phyag rgya nye bar bstan la/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don du ni/ /sems can thams cad bsad na yang / /de yi sdig pas gos mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsang ba brjod la de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /mgon po khyod la gsol
202b2(rgyud): ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbang byed cing / /sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /las kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /
202b3(rgyud): zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /las kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod do/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas/ slob ma rnam par snang mdzad du rnam par bsams la/ de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin du chus dbang bskur
202b4(rgyud): bas dbang bskur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje byin nas de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ de nyid du
202b5(rgyud): ni bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems/ /lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'das 'di ston par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'dul bar ston pa ni/ /brtan zhing nges pa'i chos nyid can/ /srid pa shin tu gnas mchog pa'i/ /cho ga la sogs
202b6(rgyud): nges par dgos/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs la sogs/ /dkon mchog gsum po nyid du rtogs/ /srid pa shin tu legs par grub/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dpa' byed mchog /d+hIHde nas bdag po nyid du dbang bskur la/ a kA ro mu khaM zhes bya ba la sogs
202b7(rgyud): pas dril bu byin te/ chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /d+hIHde nas ming gi dbang bskur bas
203a1(rgyud): bskur ba byas la/ de bzhin du gzhan nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci 'dod par ni bstan bzhin du/ /dkon mchog gsum mchog mchod pa ni/ /bgyi'o zhes ni rab tu bsam/ /shrI de nas de bzhin du/
203a2(rgyud): oM dzaHhUM baM hoH ma hA su khaM badzra d+hA tu a b+hi She ka ta s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi pa ti dr-i me b+ha ba sid+d+ha na ma te b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA bai ro tsa na su ra ta s+t+waM/ a haM/ badzra d+hA tu oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHzhes bya bas lag pa gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje byin la/ de bzhin
203a3(rgyud): du yang dag par mchod de/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya nye bar bstan la/ ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams/ /'dul gyur de lta de lta bur/ /chags la sogs pas yun ring du/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i don rnams kyis/ /zhes gsang ba
203a4(rgyud): brjod la/ de nas/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas/ mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar
203a5(rgyud): 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod la/ rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig ces brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni rjes su gnang zhing dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //
203a6(rgyud): de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la/ de bzhin bzhag ste/ gzengs bstod pas ni dngos po kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to/ /oM nga yis 'di ltar khyod lung bstan/ /rdo rje sems
203a7(rgyud): dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos po mchog tu 'grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ /sid+d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ de la gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag /
203b1(rgyud): la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bya ste/ 'dis phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga lung bstan par bya ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad rang gi dam
203b2(rgyud): tshig slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'di nyid kyis gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchog tu gsang ba'i dngos grub mchog grub pa'i byin rlabs dang / gsang ba 'di'i
203b3(rgyud): stobs la dad par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
203b4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su mnyes par drangs te/ 'dir zhugs nas dbang du byas te/ sgrub pa dang rjes su sgrub pas/ rdo rje dbyings thams cad kyi brtan pas brtan par gyur cig /chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang mnyam par byung
203b5(rgyud): la nam mkha'i khams thams cad ltar yangs pa chen po 'dir gnas shing rab tu gnas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon la rag lus shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbus su dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs
203b6(rgyud): thams cad dang / rang gi slob dpon nyid kyis da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do zhes byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang mnyam par mgrin gcig tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad do zhes dad par gyis
203b7(rgyud): shig/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs pa yis/ /srid pa kun las rnam grol bar/ /khyod ni deng nyid gnas pa yin/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar khyod 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi
204a1(rgyud): 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung
204a2(rgyud): bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o/ /gang 'di skyes pa tsam gyis su/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs pa med/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing / /
204a3(rgyud): nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis/ /tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o/ /bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su/ /dka' thub can gyis ma gdungs shig /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung / /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag
204a4(rgyud): rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su mi gtong zhing / /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi/ /slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas smad pas na/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang
204a5(rgyud): dug dang dbyig dug nang / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtso bo dang / /gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems dmyal ltung bar 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa/ /nam yang smad
204a6(rgyud): par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing dbyung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang / /rang srog gis rtag bstan bya na/ /longs spyod g.yo
204a7(rgyud): bas smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir bskal ba bye ba ni/ /grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /
204b1(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams mchog dag gis/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te/ /gang 'dir legs par gnas pas na/ /dam
204b2(rgyud): tshig lha rnams kun dang mnyam/ /rang byung du yang der skyes so/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog tu
204b3(rgyud): rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /deng nyid thob par the tshom med/ /aHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba phul du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dpal rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma
204b4(rgyud): mchog rnams la/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig /mchog tu rtag pa yin par khong du chud par bya'o/ /de la gtan tshig ci yod ce na/ gang khyod kyis thams cad kyi bdag nyid du de bzhin gshegs
204b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin la/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis na/ nges pa'i phung po la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas
204b6(rgyud): yin la/ dus gsum ni mnyam pa nyid yin pas na/ de ltar byung ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba ste/ rdo rje
204b7(rgyud): sems dpar bdag sbyor zhing / /thams cad sbyor ba rjes sbyar ldan/ /sangs rgyas nyid du shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas dam pa rtag pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi bdag nyid thams cad du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rang gi dam
205a1(rgyud): tshig yongs su gzung ba ni don yod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid du mngon par rtogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dang ldan pa'i
205a2(rgyud): dam tshig rjes su bsgrubs pas mchog tu grub pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du shes par bya'o/ /de bas na dus thams cad dang / gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams kyi len pas khyed rnams kyis rtag
205a3(rgyud): pa nyid du rjes su bsrung bar bya zhing zhig par mi bya'o/ /ji snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig sbyor bas legs par mchod la bde bar gzung bar bya zhing
205a4(rgyud): yang dag par gso bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang rig par sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang gis na khyod pha rol mu stegs kyi gzhung gis log pa'i lta ba can du mi 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad du ltung ba la
205a5(rgyud): sogs pa dang / lus 'di shin tu yang mi smra ba nyid dang / sems shin tu yang 'gog par mi 'gyur bar gang gis sku gsung thugs rdo rje thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gis bla na med pa'i dngos grub
205a6(rgyud): mchog tu rtag par 'gyur bar yang gyis shig / yang smras pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa med kyis mi 'jigs shig /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
205a7(rgyud): bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mchog tu gsang ba 'di bka' stsal ba yin no/ /yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rdo rje yis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde la
205b1(rgyud): brten/ /bde ba'i bde ba chung la sangs rgyas ni/ /kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod gyur to/ /slob mas gus par bla ma yi/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag bya ste/ /de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun/ /rjes su bsgrub par khas blang ngo / /de ltar dam bca' byas nas ni/ /
205b2(rgyud): cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni/ /blangs nas kyang ni de la sbyin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma
205b3(rgyud): ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM/ d+ha ra ya mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod de/ de nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs/ /zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no/ /de ltar dbang bskur
205b4(rgyud): byas nas ni/ /de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon/ /me tog dri la sogs pas mchod/ /mchod phyir gdu bu bcas par bya/ /de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis/ /de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung / /thal mo sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du
205b5(rgyud): gzhug / gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su/ /spyi bor 'dud de phyag 'tshal gzhug /slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags/ /gsang sngags rgyud ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /mkhan pos de skad smras nas su/ /gdugs bzhag nas ni slob ma de/ /lag pas legs par
205b6(rgyud): blangs nas su/ /de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya/ /da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /khyod kyis
205b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /nan tan bskyed de bri bar bgyi/ /sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor/ /khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang / /sems can rnams la mi phan pa/ /nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o/ de nas slob ma re re yis/ /lag pa g.yon pas
206a1(rgyud): g.yas pa yi/ /mthe bo nas ni bzung nas su/ /zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /slob ma gus dang ldan pa dang / /rang gi rigs dang mtshams pa yis/ /sdig pa thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas nas bdag bsrung
206a2(rgyud): ste/ /sngags pas slob ma las yon blang / /slob ma yis kyang de nyid ni/ /ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar bya/ /de nas slob mas 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad do zhes ming du byas la/ bskor ba lan gsum bya ste/ phyag byas nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya zhing / /mchod pa
206a3(rgyud): chen pos mchod par bya'o/ /shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang / /khyad par can ni de dang de/ /de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis/ /de dang de ni bla ma sbyin/ /de ni bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /yang na de ni dgar 'gyur ba/ /de ltar yang dag spyad par bya/ /de ltar
206a4(rgyud): yang dag dbang bskur ba/ /slob dpon zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams/ /grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis mchod de/ oM badzra satwa su saM gra haM/ oM badzra rat+na ma nut+ta raM/ oM badzra d+har+m+ma gA ya ne/ oM badzra
206a5(rgyud): karma ka ro d+d+ha ba/ zhes bya ba rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis phyi dang nang gi mchod pa byas la/ thams cad ci nus pa dang / ci 'byor ba dang / rjes su mthun par mchod pa rnams dang / slob ma rnams mchod pa byed du gzhug go/ /de'i 'og tu bza' ba dang btung
206a6(rgyud): ba dang / glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan dga' bar mchod cing ci 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa rnams bya'o/ /de nas thams cad su la yang ma smra shig /ces mna'i snying po byin la ji ltar zhugs pa rnams gtang bar bya'o/ /de
206a7(rgyud): nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gang bcing bzod pa gsol la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gyen du bkrol te/ snying po 'di brjod par
206b1(rgyud): bya'o/ /oM kr-i to ba sarba satwA r+tha/ /sid+d+ha ma dat+tA yA nu ga /gats+tsha twAM bud+d+hA bi Sha yaM/ /pu na ra ga ma na ya ts+tsha badzra sa twa muH/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rnams ni/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes bya bas rang gi lus la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas snying gnas byung
206b2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na 'dug pas dbang bskur la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing ba dang / go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba mu dra me dr-i D+ha ku ru bar ka ba tse na baM/ go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba bkrol
206b3(rgyud): la thal mo sbyar te bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dgyes pa'i snying po 'di bya'o/ /oM badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ yi ge brgya pa brjod la rdo rje dga' ba legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las
206b4(rgyud): ni khyod legs so/ /theg pa chen po bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /oM badzra kI li kI li ya/ sarba bi g+h+nAM/ badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya/ hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT ces bya bas phur bu bton la 'o mas
206b5(rgyud): bkru'o/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+mA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta ces bya ba 'dis tsho rtse rnams bsdus la 'bad pas chu klung chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas gnas kyang ba lang gi lci bas nye bar byugs la/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams/ /ci dga' bar ni sbyin par bya/ /khyi dang bya
206b6(rgyud): rog la sogs la/ /cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no/ /yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni/ /slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni/ /bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya/ /slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar
206b7(rgyud): bshad/ /gal te slob mas spyad na ni/ /dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na/ /de yi cho ga'i rim 'di'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du/ /de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul/ /gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs/ /sangs rgyas nyid
207a1(rgyud): la dbul bar bya/ /ba dan gdug spos dri la sogs/ /dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya/ /gos dang yo byad snod la sogs/ /dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya/ /de dag las ni slob ma yis/ /cung zad tsam yang mi bskur ro/ /dge 'dun med na dge slong
207a2(rgyud): sbyin/ /yang na dge slong ma la sbyin/ /gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na/ /bsnyen bkur dag la sbyin par bya/ /de nas de yi phyi de nyin/ /nyes byas lhag ma zhi ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa yis ni zhi ba yi/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /slob mas dag zhi bya'i phyir/ /spyan la
207a3(rgyud): sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang / /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byams pa chen po'ang bsgom par bya/ /nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /de nas zhi ba chen po bya'o/ /dad med dman la 'jug la min/ /'dod la chags dang khro bo'i dbang bskur dang / /slob
207a4(rgyud): ma bu min blo gros dman rnams la/ /cho ga'i bsgrub pa 'di ni sbyin mi bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob nas de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya ste/ dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob pas dus
207a5(rgyud): mtshams gsum mam bzhir byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur nas dngos grub dang rdo rje blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su bcad pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus par mngon sum bzhin bltas la mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i srid mtshan ma mthong gi bar du tshig
207a6(rgyud): gzhan mi smra bar bklag par bya'o/ /de nas dpyid zla ra ba'i zla ba nya ba la dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs las bshad pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor bris la der bzhugs te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la/ skyil mo krung ma bshig par ji srid nyi ma shar ba'i dus su rje btsun
207a7(rgyud): 'jam dpal las 'od zer rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor snang bar byas te/ sgrub pa po'i spyi bor nub par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i skra zlum por 'khyil ba/ lus la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa
207b1(rgyud): lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis bzhugs pa/ rje btsun 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bag med pas de grub par ma gyur na/ de tshe dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nya la dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas nas de bzhin du sgrub pa la zhugs na/ de ltar 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /der yang ma
207b2(rgyud): grub na ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya ba la de bzhin du sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /sgrub pa bdun pa la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /dngos grub mchog ni sangs
207b3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o/ /dngos grub 'bring ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / bum pa bzang po dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o/ /de dag kyang de la lhag par mos pas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa klog cing de'i sgrub
207b4(rgyud): pa'i cho gas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub tha ma ni gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / rgyas pa'i longs spyod dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams te/ /de dag kyang de dang de la mos pas bklags na
207b5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub mchog sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis gal te dngos grub mchog ma grub kyang 'bring ngam tha ma 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub 'bring sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang de ma grub kyang tha ma grub par 'gyur gyi/ tha ma la sgrub par zhugs
207b6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi mchog dang 'bring ni ma yin no/ /de bas dngos grub mchog gi phyir 'bad par bya ste/ dngos grub 'bring dang tha ma rnams ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags gzhan dag bsgrubs na mtshan gyi don gang yang rung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi lha'i gzugs
207b7(rgyud): kyi rnal 'byor gyis bya ste/ de bas ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi sgo nas dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ rje btsun 'jam dpal
208a1(rgyud): gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yin no/ /de bas na 'di ltar gang ci yang rung ba ma brtags pa dag la sngon dang phyi ma'i don brtag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o/ /ji ltar na mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang
208a2(rgyud): phyag rgya dang lha rnams rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi nges par bstan pa bshad pa ni med kyi rang bzor brtags pa lta bur shes so zhe na 'di ltar bshad par bya ste/ thams cad ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid du gnas la de bzhin du bshad pa yin gyi rang
208a3(rgyud): bzor byas pa ni ma yin te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal ba'i 'od zer 'gyed pa'i snang bas dngos po rnams shin tu gsal bar mngon yang / dmus long dang mig med pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo / /de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i blo gros kyi mig ma tshang bas gal te
208a4(rgyud): rtsod dus zin kyang de'i tshe nyes pa yod pa ma yin no/ /de lta mod kyi blo gros dman pa rnams kyis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste/ sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed/ /gtsug tor chen po rmad byung
208a5(rgyud): gtsug / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni/ gtsug tor brgyad bshad pa yin no/ /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ /zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
208a6(rgyud): bshad pa yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug rnams bstan pa yin no/ /'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /zhes bya bas ni sgo srung rnams kyang
208a7(rgyud): gsungs pa yin no/ /che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang / /zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa bzhi bshad pa yin no/ /gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor du yang / /mgon pos sa bcu dbang phyug ste/ /sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas/ /zhes bya bas ni sa
208b1(rgyud): rnams bshad pa yin no/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ /zhes bya bas ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so/ /rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ /zhes bya bas ni dbang rnams so/ /de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang / /zhes bya bas ni don gyi gzungs dang tshig gi gzungs dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i
208b2(rgyud): gzungs dang / sngags kyi gzungs te dran pa zhes bya ba ni gzungs la bya'o/ /dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' chen rol mo chen po ste/ /zhes bya bas ni dga' ba'i mchod pa ste/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa yang bshad pa yin no/ /de bzhin du rim pa
208b3(rgyud): gsum pa las/ kun du bzang po blo gros bzang / /sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas/ kun du bzang po la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bshad pa yin no/ /sgor ni/ gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /don yod zhags pa rnam
208b4(rgyud): par rgyal/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas ni/ gshin rje mthar byed dang / pad+ma mthar byed dang / bgegs mthar byed rnams de bzhin du bshad pa yin no/ /mtshams rnams rdo rje hUM ste hUM/ zhes sgrogs zhes bya bas ni khams gsum
208b5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba mig ni bzad/ /ces bya bas ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /ces bya bas ni rdo rje khrag 'thung ngo / /hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /ces bya ba ni rta mchog go /bdug pa ma la sogs rnams
208b6(rgyud): kyang / /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang yang dag par spros nas sbyar zhing bshad zin pas/ 'dir zhib tu ma smos so/ /phyi rol du rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du yang tshangs pa dang drag po dang / sred med
208b7(rgyud): kyi bu la sogs pa rnams kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba yin pas/ 'khor nyid du bstan pa yin no/ /ji ltar na nang du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas mnan la phyi rol du gzhag ce na/ 'di la brtsad par mi bya ste/ dregs pa bsal bar mdzad nas
209a1(rgyud): sprul pa'i gzugs kyis mchod pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag pa yin pas mi mthun pa'i 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no/ /gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rnams ci phyir bzhag /ces zer na/ gsang sngags thams cad skyed pa
209a2(rgyud): po/ /zhes gsungs pas na/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dgos pa'i khyad par nyid yongs su shes pas na thams cad rjes su mthun par sbyar ba yin no/ /gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/ /gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/ /zhes gsungs pa na/ dkyil
209a3(rgyud): 'khor dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / /rig sngags dang / dngos grub sgrub pa la sogs pa las rab 'byam thams cad rje btsun 'jam dpal gyis sbyor bas thams cad nas thams cad du sbyor bar bya'o/ /de bas na bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba la
209a4(rgyud): yang 'gal ba yod pa ma yin te/ don dam par de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa/ /zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya las tha dad pa'i phyag rgya med pas 'di nyid du thams cad bstan
209a5(rgyud): pa yin te/ ji ltar bdag gis sbyar ba de bzhin du sngags dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la mkhas pa rnams kyis nges par brtag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dus dang sgrub pa'i dus su sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya dgos te/ gsang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub la/ sbyin sreg
209a6(rgyud): ma byas 'bras mi 'byin/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sbyin sreg med par las rnams la/ /dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ /de bas sbyin sreg las rnams la/ /sngags pas 'bad pa chen po bya/ /de la sbyin
209a7(rgyud): sreg gi thab khung ni/ sems can gyi dbye bas ni mtha' yas so/ /rigs kyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa lnga'am/ bzhi thab khung rnam par dbye ste/ 'di ni thab khung gtan la dbab pa'o/ /rgya cher rdo rje khro bo snyoms par 'jug pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud las thab khung gi rnam pa brgya
209b1(rgyud): rtsa bcur gsungs so/ /las kyi dbye bas 'di lta ste/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bskrad pa dang / bcing ba dang / gsad pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / tshe 'phel ba dang / nor dang 'bru dgug pa dang / 'dod pa'i
209b2(rgyud): gzugs nyid dang / mi snang ba dang / bka' bzhin byed pa dang / sdig par rab tu gzhig pa dang / rig pa rjes su chags par bya ba dang / nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / rig sngags gzi byin bskyed pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa'o/ /de la zhi ba la kun nas zlum po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni zur bzhi'o/ /
209b3(rgyud): mngon spyod la ni gru gsum mo/ /dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje lta bu'o/ /nor dang 'bru dgug pa la ni rin po che lta bu'o/ /'dod pa'i gzugs kyi ni mtshan lta bu'o/ /mi snang bar bya ba ni mda' gzhu lta bu'o/ /bka'
209b4(rgyud): bzhin byed pa ni ral gri lta bu'o/ /sdig pa rab tu gzhig pa ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i rtsig pa'am 'obs lta bu'o/ /rig pa rjes su chags par bya ba ni rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya lta bu'o/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/ /rig sngags kyi gzi
209b5(rgyud): byin bskyed pa la ni rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa ni 'khor lo lta bu ji lta ba nyid dam/ de'i dkyil 'khor rnams lta bu yin no/ /de bzhin du thun mong gi brko ba'i cho ga las/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga thams cad la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhi pa dang /
209b6(rgyud): sgo bzhi par thig btab la shar phyogs su rdo rjes spras pa dang / lhor rin po ches spras pa dang / nub tu pad+mas spras pa dang / byang du pad+ma rdo rjes spras par byas la/ der shar phyogs su pad+ma dang / nags kyi lcug ma dang / bgrang phreng dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / rigs kyi
209b7(rgyud): pags pa ste phyag rgya lnga bri'o/ /lho phyogs su mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zla ba kham pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / thor tshugs dang mig ste phyag rgya lnga bri'o/ /nub phyogs su 'khor lo dang / dung dang / be con dang / ral gri dang phub ste phyag rgya lnga bri'o/ /byang phyogs su mdung thung
210a1(rgyud): dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / rma bya dang / ra skyes te phyag rgya lnga bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thab khung brkos la thab kyi nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya'am/ dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'i sbyor bas dgod par
210a2(rgyud): bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du bsrung ba la sogs pa thams cad byas nas/ sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyi khyad par gyi las dang rjes su mthun par tshim par byas la/ rang nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhi ba la oM
210a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba du kho ba sha mi ne swA hA zhes bya ba dang / yungs kar la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rgyas pa la oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang 'bras la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM A na ya hoHb+ha
210a4(rgyud): ga wAn bid+yA rA dza mA ra ya hUM phaT ces bya ba dang / mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sdig pa rab tu gzhil ba la/ oM sar+b+ba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang / til la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /nor dang 'bru la sogs pa dgug pa la ni/ oM sarba A kaR+Sha ya/ d+ha na d+ha
210a5(rgyud): na/ di kaM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA zhes bya ba dang / 'bras la sogs pa'o/ /bsrung ba'i don du ni/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzA ya swA hA zhes bya ba dang / ku sha'i myu gu til mar la btags pa'i 'o/ /tshe 'phel ba la ni/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA zhes bya ba dang / dUr wa'i myu gu la sogs pa'i 'o/ /
210a6(rgyud): dgug pa la ni/ oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya swA hA zhes bya ba dang / kub tsa ka'i tsher ma la sogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bcing ba la ni hUM badzra b+han+d+ha ya baM zhes bya ba dang / lcags kyi phye ma la sogs pa'i 'o/ /gsad pa la ni/ oM badzra mA ra ya hUM zhes bya ba dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba la
210a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni/ oM badzra ba shi ku ru ye swA hA zhes bya ba dang / me tog dmar po la sogs pa'i 'o/ /'dod pa'i gzugs la ni/ oM badzra kA ma rU pe ni aM zhes bya ba dang / shing dregs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i 'o/ /chags par bya ba la ni oM badzra
210b1(rgyud): A rA ga Na ya ho zhes bya ba dang / me skyur po la sogs pa'o/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba la ni/ /oM khe tsa ri Ni ha ha ha zhes bya ba dang / man+dA ra ba'i me tog la sogs pa'i 'o/ /bka' bzhin bsgrub pa la ni/ hUM badzra A dz+nyA pa ya ti hUM zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje can gyi me tog la
210b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'o/ /mi snang bar bya ba la ni/ oM badzra A daR+sha na yA aM zhes bya ba dang / 'bras bu mi snang ba la sogs pa'i 'o/ /rig sngags gzi brjid bskyed pa la/ oM badzra r+tha sid+d+ha ye swA hA zhes bya ba dang / mar la sogs pa'i 'o/ /don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga la ni/
210b3(rgyud): oM sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ye swA hA/ yungs kar la sogs pa'i 'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa la ni/ oM maN+Da la a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM maN+Da la sid+d+hi ye swA hA/ oM b+h+ra swA hA/ oM b+hu b+ha swA hA/ oM swa swA hA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHswA hA/ oM swa sti swA hA zhes bya ba dang / swa sti ka'i me
210b4(rgyud): tog la sogs pa'i 'o/ /sbyin sreg bya ste/ shin tu rgya cher che ba ni ma yin no/ /mdor bsdus na ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha rnam pa bcu gnyis su bstan te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ ye shes me nyid dang po ste/ de ni dbang chen zhes su bsgrags/ /kha dog ser po'i
210b5(rgyud): mdog can la/ /mdog dang rgyas dang stobs kyang ster/ /'bar ba'i phreng chen ting 'dzin gnas/ /ye shes rdzogs byed shes par bya/ /gnyis pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam/ /dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po gon/ /bgrang phreng dang
210b6(rgyud): ni gun+d+he thogs/ /gsum pa rlung zhes bya ba ste/ /kha dog nag po rtsub pa'o/ /bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste/ /nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmar thag 'dra/ /lnga pa mi 'da' zhes bya ba/ /spun la kha dog dam pa ste/ /mgrin pa ring la gzi brjid che/ /thams cad la ni phan
210b7(rgyud): 'dogs pa'o/ /drug pa khro bo zhes bya ste/ /mi g.yon dud pa'i kha dog can/ /gyen du skra brdzes sgra chen 'byin/ /mche ba bzhi pa stobs po che/ /bdun pa lto ba zhes bya ste/ /rno la kha dog kun dang ldan/ /brgyad pa zad byed ces bya ste/ /glog 'gyu ba yi 'od 'dra
211a1(rgyud): ba/ /dgug pa yid las skyes zhes bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che/ /bcu pa 'jig rten 'byin pa ste/ /sha za'i mi ni de las gzhan/ /bcu gcig bar ni shes par bya/ /'dod med dbang gi las can no/ /rmugs byed ces pa bcu
211a2(rgyud): gnyis pa/ /sems can rmongs par byed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las skyes/ /las kyi rjes mthun gsang sngags dang / /phyag rgya'i sbyor bar ldan pa yi/ /kun dang las don sgrub byed pa'o/ /de nas shin tu bsdus pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhi ru yongs bsgrags pa/ /
211a3(rgyud): sems can mos pa'i dbang gis ni/ /cho ga 'di ni bsdus pa yin/ /thab dang lha yi grangs dang ni/ /mdor bsdus 'bring dang rgyas pa ru/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin/ /de las shin tu bsdus pa zlum po la sogs pa bshad
211a4(rgyud): par bya ste/ zlum po dang / zur bzhi dang / gru gsum dang / zla ba phyed pa lta bu la khru gcig pa dang / khru do pa dang / khru bzhi dang / khru drug pa dang / khru brgyad pa dang / khru bcu pa dang / sor bcu drug pa dang / mtho gang tsam ste/ las dang rdzas dang rjes su mthun par thab kyi tshad byas
211a5(rgyud): pa yin no/ /'dir thab khung rnam pa bzhir rdzas dang las kyi dbye ba las so sor nges pa yin gyi las thams cad pa'i thab khung ni mi snang ngo / /ci ltar zhe na/ zhi ba la zlum po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o/ /dbang ba la ni gru gsum mo/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum zla ba phyed pa dang
211a6(rgyud): ldan pa'o/ /de la gdon dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang / rims dang bgegs kyis zin pa zha bar bya ba'i phyir dang / mngon par shes pa dang / thar pa bsgrub pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pas na/ zhi ba'i las zhes bshad do/ /ral gri dang / 'khor
211a7(rgyud): lo dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / gter chen po dang / rgyal srid dang / bcud kyis len dang / gser 'gyur gyi rtsi la sogs pa grub pa ni rgyas pa'o/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi'am ci dang / skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa dang rgyal po bran g.yog
211b1(rgyud): dang bcas pa dbang du byed pas na dbang ngo / /gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs par byas pa dang / yan lag bcad pa ni mngon spyod do/ /las kyi tshogs de dag nges par shes par byas la/ /las thams cad dgug pa'i thab khung du thams
211b2(rgyud): cad bya'o/ /de nas yang rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang / 'khor los dbus su mtshan pas na/las thams cad pa zhes zer mod kyi de ni mi rigs te/ phyag rgya gang yin pa lha yin la/ lha gang yin pa de nyid phyag rgya yin pas na/ rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa dang /
211b3(rgyud): mA ma kI'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rin po che ni rin chen 'byung dang / rin chen sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do/ /pad+ma ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang / gos dkar mo'i ngo bo nyid do/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ni don yod grub pa dang / sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do/ /'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / sangs
211b4(rgyud): rgyas spyan gyi ngo bo nyid do/ /rigs pa 'dis na las thams cad pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyid las/ las thams cad pa 'di ci zhig rigs zhes la la dag zer ro/ /de yang rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyu las ni/ thab gru bzhi pa de nyid las thams cad
211b5(rgyud): pa'i thab khung yin par bshad de/ de nyid dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las bkag ste/ rdzing bu'i dbyibs lta bur glu dang gsang ba rnams kyi lus bsreg pa dang / yan lag gzhig pa'i don du ji ltar 'gyur/ /thab khung gru bzhi pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las/ bcom ldan
211b6(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub pas rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o zhes gsungs te/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ zur bzhi pa la khru gang tsam/ zabs su de'i phyed tsam brkos te/ thab khung gi steng du sor bzhi tsam dor bar dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kun du mnyam pa'i kha khyer
211b7(rgyud): la/ phyogs rnams su lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu dang / mtshams su zla ba kham pa dang / rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes mtshan la thab kyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa thab bas cung zad dma' ba 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje brgyad lte ba'i ge sar la rdo rje rtse lnga pa
212a1(rgyud): phyed nub phyed bgreng ba ste/ 'di dag ni rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o/ /thab khung de nyid rje btsun rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa rgyud chen po dang dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po dang / kun
212a2(rgyud): nas dbang bskur bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang / phyag na rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las gsungs pa ni/ rdo rje brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /dbus su rdo rje chen po bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po
212a3(rgyud): las/ /dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag /ces gsungs pas/ thab khung de nyid las thams cad yin par bshad do/ /dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las ni pad+ma lta bu'i dbyibs can gyi thab khung las thams cad pa yin par bshad do/ /bud med dang rgyal po'i bu mo dang / grong dang /
212a4(rgyud): grong khyer thob pa dang / don thams cad ni pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /dpal phyag na pad+mos kyang / pad+ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las pad+ma'i dbyibs can thab khung de nyid las thams
212a5(rgyud): cad pa yin par gsungs te/ thab khung 'di ni zlum po la kho ra khor yug khru gang tsam la 'og tu khru phyed par brkos pa dbus kyi 'dab ma la pad+ma brgyad kyis bskor ba/ thab kyi steng du sor bzhi dor ba dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa thab khung nas byung ba'i pad+ma kha bye ba lta bu'i
212a6(rgyud): kha khyer la/ /kha khyer gyi rgyab tu pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor ba/ thab kyi dbus kyi phyogs kyi pad+ma rnams la rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya dgod par bya'o/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma la mig gnyis dang rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / pad+ma dang ut+pal dgod do/ /dbus kyi pad+ma
212a7(rgyud): la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dgod do/ /thab khung gi nang gi tha mar rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'i thab khung ni las thams cad pa'i thab bo/ /gzhan dag gis thams cad pa'i thab khung gzhan dag tu yang 'chad do/ /rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ /
212b1(rgyud): 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni don thams cad rdzogs pa yin par bshad de/ zhal bzhi pa dang / phyag brgyad pa dang / sku mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rten dang brten pa po'i ngo bo
212b2(rgyud): nyid yin no/ /de la shar phyogs kyi zhal ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid de dkar po zhi bar mdzad pa'o/ /lho'i zhal ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid de/ ser po rgyas pa 'phel bar mdzad pa'o/ /nub kyi zhal
212b3(rgyud): ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ dmar po 'gro ba rnams dbang du mdzad pa'o/ /byang gi zhal ni bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ nag po nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams dang / bdud kyi dgra bo thams cad zad par mdzad pa ste
212b4(rgyud): mngon spyod do/ /de ltar zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod kyi las rnams rdzogs par byed pas na/ /thab gcig la las thams cad pa'i thab khung du bshad do/ /de lta na ni thab kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba la don med de/ thab gcig tu las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe
212b5(rgyud): na/ don med pa ma yin te/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis legs par las byed pas na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad zhi ba'i las la bskur zhing bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas zhi zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / mngon spyod bya ste/ de bas na mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am/ dgongs
212b6(rgyud): pa'i dbang gis nye bar gzung ba yin no/ /thab khung so so'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ de la zhi ba la ni sa gzhi dkar po la rgyar khru gang tsam brkos la zabs su sor bcu gnyis pa de'i dbus su pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa thab kyi steng bar du sor bzhi dor ba dpangs dang
212b7(rgyud): rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba la mtshams rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa/ thab de sa gzhi dkar po dang ba'i lci bas byugs la/ yang de gnyis dri dkar pos nye bar byug cing me tog dkar pos gtor ba dus gsum bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni sa gzhi ser po la rgyar
213a1(rgyud): khru do zabs su khru gang zur bzhi pa'am/ rin po che zur brgyad pa dang 'dra bar brkos la de'i steng du sor brgyad pa'i kha khyer dbyibs de dang 'dra bar bskor la khung bur 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte ba rdo rje rin po che sor drug pas mtshan pa/ sa ser po dang dri ser pos
213a2(rgyud): thab dang sa gzhi de byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni rtsub cing gas pa dang / shin tu gnag pa'i sa gzhi la gru gsum pa zla gam gnyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa sor nyi shu pa zabs su sor bcu pa/ thab kyi mgo byang du blta ba/ 'og tu rtse gsum pa'i
213a3(rgyud): steng du khro bo'i rdo rje sor brgyad pas mtshan pa/ de'i steng du sor gsum dor bar dpangs dang rgyar sor gsum dor ba/ kha phyir bltas pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba/ sa nag po dang ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang / bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa la sogs pa ci snyed pas byugs la/ dri mi zhim
213a4(rgyud): pa'i dri dang me tog sngon po'am/ dmar po'am/ phub mas gtor ro/ /dbang la ni sa gzhi dmar po la thab kyi dbyibs b+ha ga lta bu rdo rje dang pad+mas mtshan pa'o/ /dgug pa la ni rdo rje rtse gcig lta bus dbus su rdo rje dang rin po ches mtshan pa'o/ /de dang 'dra ba'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor bas
213a5(rgyud): dmar po dang dri dmar pos byugs pa/ me tog dmar pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o/ /'di gnyis kyi zabs dang rgya'i tshad la sogs pa ni zhi ba'i thab khung dang 'dra ba las thams cad pa'i thab khung kyang de bzhin te 'on kyang kha khyer ni pad+ma kha bye ba lta bu la rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba dbus
213a6(rgyud): su rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su 'khor lo dang ldan pas mtshan pa'o zhes pa la la dag brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor ram lha'i khang pa'i shar phyogs su zhi ba'i thab khung / lhor rgyas pa/ nub tu dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa/ byang du mngon spyod kyi thab khung bya
213a7(rgyud): zhing / tshon rtsi rnams kyang las dang rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o/ /thab kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de nas thab khung gi gnas rab tu shis pa'i chu shing lo ma'am/ mtshan dang ldan zhing shin tu sar pa'i gos dang / sA lu'am/ pad+ma'i 'dab mas thab kyi mthar thug par g.yogs
213b1(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha dgram par bya ste/ rtsa ba nas bton zhing ma nyams pa 'bus ma zos pa shin tu gsar zhing sngo ba'i ku shas g.yogs par bya'o/ /dang po shar du rtse bstan gzhag /gnyis pa lho phyogs kha bltas pa'o/ /gsum pa'i rtse mo nub tu ste/ /bzhi pa rtse mo byang du'o/ /
213b2(rgyud): don kun bsgrub pa'i ku sha yis/ /thab kyi shar nas dang por g.yogs/ /'dir ku sha blang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ i ngaM ku sha shu b+ha d+hi b+h+ya pU ta prah+ma bi ba tren/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+mA saM g+ha ti pr-i th+wi sany+dza ta gar+b+ha a big+h+nAn ma ma shAn+niM kurban+du swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ku sha la lan bdun bzlas
213b3(rgyud): la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas dgram par bya'o/ /'dab dang ku sha'i tshogs dgram pa'i cho ga'o/ /zhib la ni pa la sha dang u dum wA ra dang / a mra dang / a shwad+tha dang / p+lak+sha dang / smi d+ya dang / sha mi dang / n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa shing 'o ma can las byung ba/ 'dab ma dang bcas pa
213b4(rgyud): mnyam por bcad pa/ rtse mo'i cha las byung ba'i mtho gang tsam gyi yam shing la sbrang rtsi dang mar la rtse mo gnyis btags la/ dri dkar po'i spos chus bkrus pa rtse mo 'dab ma gnyis dang bcas pa ste/ rtse gcig pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rnying pa dang lo ma med pa dang / khong stong
213b5(rgyud): dang / chag pa dang / shun lpags med pa dang / thung ngu dang yon po dang / rtse mo gas pa dang / ha cang phra ba dang / ha cang sbom pa dang / ring po dang / 'bus zos pa dang / srog chags dang bcas pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni nas dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
213b6(rgyud): mar dang / zho dang / 'bras dang / 'bras yos dang / ku sha sngon po dang / dUr wa sngon po dang / amra'i lo ma dang / tsan+dan dang / pri yang ku'i me tog dang / sA lu'i chan dang / me tog dkar po dang / ge sar dang thang chu dri zhim pa ci snyed pa las sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rgyas pa
213b7(rgyud): la ni yam shing de rnams de nyid las sboms su chag gang la srid du khru gang tsam 'o ma dang zho dang / mar la btags te dri zhim po'i spos chu la sbyangs la/ mngar gsum la btags pa'i 'bras chan bzang po'i bshos dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pa'i til
214a1(rgyud): nag po dang / zho dang 'bras chan mar dang bcas pa dang / sha ta puSh+pa dang / bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / 'bras sha li dang / nA ga ge sar dang / kar+Ni ka'i me tog dang / 'bru rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang / seng ldeng dang / ko bi da ra
214a2(rgyud): dang / ba la ta ka dang / ma da na'am/ de las gzhan pa'i shing kha ba dang tsher ma can dang / rob bsregs pa'i thal ba can dang / mgal dum gyi yam shing rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba gas pa sor bcu'i tshad tsam/ dug dang khrag dang yungs ma la btags pa'i rtse mo gnyi ga rno ba
214a3(rgyud): dang / yungs nag dang / yungs mar dang / khrag dang / lan tshwa dang / skye tshe dang / nim+ba'i lo ma dang / ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang / rkang rjes kyi sa dang / bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang / khyim bya'i zhag dang / bya rog la sogs pa'i gshog pa dang / gcin dang / rtug pa dang /
214a4(rgyud): tsher ma dang / mi rus kyi phye ma dang / sbrang rtsi la sogs pa dang / ci rnyed pa'am/ rdzas re re zhing dug dang / khrag dang / lan tshwa dang / skye tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba la btags pa'i rdzas de rnams thal ba dang / sol ba'am phub ma las dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la/
214a5(rgyud): gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dbang gi las la ni tsam pa ka dang / a shwad+tha dang / ba ku la dang / pri yang ku dang / la ku tsa la sogs pa'i yam shing sor lnga pa la 'dab ma dang bcas pa dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog skyur po rnams dang / gzhan yang rang gi
214a6(rgyud): rtog pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni de nyid dang tsher ma lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /u dum wA ra pa la sha/ /p+lak+sha dang ni n+ya gro d+ha/ /seng ldeng dang ni a rka dang / /a mra be ta ka ta dang / /a ma d+ya dang sha mi dang / /a pa marka las
214a7(rgyud): byung dang / /a shwad+tha dang bcas pa ni/ /yam sreg shing ni bcu gnyis bstan/ /gsar zhing drang la mtho gang tsam/ /rtse gnyis dri zhim legs par btags/ /yam shing dag ni rtse gcig tu/ /las rnams kun la bsreg par bya/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gang cung zad/ /
214b1(rgyud): gang yang rgyas pa'i bsreg bya dang / /bdag gi zangs te de dag kun/ /nyin re swA hA'i mthar bcas dbul/ /mar la btags pa'i gu gul dang / /sA la'i thang chu la sogs pa/ /gsang sngags lha yi bye brag gis/ /sbyin sreg la ni dbul bar bya/ /dri dang me tog
214b2(rgyud): sogs mchod pa/ /las thun rang sngags ji bzhin bzla/ /rdzas rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid do/ /zhi ba la ni mchod sbyin gyi shing srog chags med pa rnams la thab khung las cung zad dma' ba'am/ dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i bud shing bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni dgon pa'i ba lang gi
214b3(rgyud): lci ba ma gtogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i bud shing rnams 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/ /mngon spyod la ni kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / dri mi zhim pa'i bud shing dang dur khrod kyi shing ngam/ bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa'am/ shing shin tu skams pa'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni ni m+ba dang /
214b4(rgyud): a mra'i shing dang gzhan yang me tog dang bcas pa'i shing ngo / /dgug pa la ni tsher ma dang bcas pa'o/ /las thams cad pa la ni las dang rjes su mthun pa'i bud shing gis bya'o/ /bud shing gi mtshan nyid do/ /gser ram dngul lam rdo'am shing ngam/ sa'i rdul las byas
214b5(rgyud): pa'am/ dung chos sam/ nya phyis sam/ shel las byas pa'i snod legs par bkrus pa dri zhim pa'i spos kyis legs par bdugs pa'i mchod yon gyi snod du chu bo'am/ lteng ka'am/ rdzing bu'am/ chu mig gam/ khron pa'am/ g.ya' chu'am/ bkod ma la sogs pa'i chu ngogs
214b6(rgyud): gtsang ma skye bo mang pos bsten pa ma yin pa/ rgyal po dang nye ba ma yin pa/ ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ra lug dang / rta dang / ma he dang glang po che rnams kyis smos par ma byas pa'i chu ngogs las/ chu shin tu dang ba/ snod gzhan gyis ma reg pa/ rigs ngan dang / /sme sha
214b7(rgyud): can dang bcas pas bsten pa'am/ ngan cing dman pa la 'jug pa dang / mi'u thung dang / zhar ba dang / /long ba dang / mdze can dang / sha bkra la sogs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyis ma mthong zhing ma reg pa'i chus mchod yon gyi snod bkang la/ tsan+dan dang /
215a1(rgyud): ga phur gyis bsgos shing / /dzA ti dang ma li ka la sogs pa'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa'i mchod yon legs par brdungs pa'i gser gyi gdu bu dang / gsang byed la sogs pa btags pa'i lag pa dang / rang gi lha'i sngags
215a2(rgyud): sam/ /rang gi rtog pa las bshad pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la g.yon phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /zhi ba la ni dri dkar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu rang gi lha'i sngags swA hA'i mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni ser po la sogs pa dang sbyar
215a3(rgyud): ba'i chu til dang zho ru bcas pa oM gyi mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni dri nag po dang sbyar ba'i chu khrag dang / ko tra pa dang / ba gcin dang bcas pa la phaT kyi mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /dbang la ni dri dmar po la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu bo'i
215a4(rgyud): mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni dza'i mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /thams cad du yang dri la sogs pa ni las dang rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o/ /mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid do/ /de nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje gnod
215a5(rgyud): sbyin dang / rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi sngags kyis las thams cad pa'i chu'i snod dang / mchod yon gyi snod la bzlas la rang gi g.yon phyogs su bzhag nas de dag nyid bzlas pa'i chus bsangs pa'i bud shing la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi rdzas rnams rang gi g.yas phyogs su gzhag par
215a6(rgyud): bya'o/ /gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang / rnam par dbye ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la ni bsad pa dang / dgod pa go bzlog ste bya'o/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gi rtse mo gnyis mche bar bya ste/ khar gzhag pa 'di
215a7(rgyud): ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri 'degs par bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdzas gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /zhi ba la ni rang gi lha'i chos kyi yi ge las thab khung bskyed la de'i dbus su yi ge raM sum mdo
215b1(rgyud): ris mtshan dang bcas pas oM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du gnas pa'i i las byung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa dung dang / kun+da lta bu'i pa pa kI me mig gsum pa ral pa dang cod pan du ldan pa lag pa bzhi g.yas pas dbyug
215b2(rgyud): pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ /g.yon na gun+d+he dang phreng ba thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang / mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po dang ldan pa/ lus kyi yan lag thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer dkar po 'phro bar bsam par bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du
215b3(rgyud): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i dbus na rgyas pa'i me dbang chen zhes bya ba ral pa dang cod pan thogs pa mig gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas na dbyug pa thogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa g.yon na phreng ba dang gun+d+he thogs pa rgyan
215b4(rgyud): dang gos dang / mchod phyir thogs ser por ldan pa/ 'od zer ser po gtong ba'i tshogs kyis sems can ma lus pa'i khams kyi stobs dang / kha dog dang / dpal rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi me bsam par bya'o/ /dbang du bya ba la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i
215b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi nang na me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng kha dog dmar zhing nyi ma 'char ka lta bur 'od zer dmar po rab tu 'gyed pa/ lag pa bzhi pa g.yas na dbyug pa dang / lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang gun+d+he thogs pa/ rgyan dang gos dang phreng ba dang / dri dang
215b6(rgyud): byug pa dang / mchod phyir thogs pa dmar po dang ldan pa mig gsum pa/ ral pa'i tshogs dang / cod pan dang ldan pa'i dbang gi me dbang gi las la bsgom par bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng
215b7(rgyud): du hUM las byung ba'i mig gsum pa/ lag pa bzhi pa du ba'i mdog can mi g.yo ba/ g.yas na ral gri dang dbyug pa thogs pa/ g.yon na zhags pa dang gun+d+he thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du 'bar ba shas cher khro zhing mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa
216a1(rgyud): bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ khros shing shas cher 'jigs su rung ba rgyan dang gos dang / mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa nag po dang ldan pa/ 'od zer nag po'i phreng ba rnams kyis srid pa gsum khyed par byed pa'i rlung zhes bya ba'i me gsad pa la sogs pa'i
216a2(rgyud): gdug pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o/ /de la zhi ba la ni 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me'am rgyun bzhag gi me'am/ bram ze tha mal pa'i mes bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni rgyal po'am/ rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i me'am/ dgon pa'i me'am nags
216a3(rgyud): mched pa'i mes bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni dur khrod kyi me'am/ rus pa'am rdo las byung ba'i me'am/ gdol pa'i khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o/ /dbang la ni smad 'tshong ma'am/ rje'u rigs kyi khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang rol
216a4(rgyud): mo pa'am/ lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o/ /me'i mtshan nyid do/ /dgang gzar ni gser ram dngul gyi rgyu las byas pa'am/ mchod sbyin gyi shing las byas pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs lta bu de'i yu ba skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i mthe bo sor sum cu rtsa bzhi rdo rje khu tshur
216a5(rgyud): la sogs pas gzung du rung ba/ de'i rtse mo'i char sor bzhi pa/ kha zur sor bzhi pa/ zabs su sor gnyis pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa/ khu ba byung ba'i bu ga sor gcig tsam de'i mchu sor bzhi pa la rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa/ yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin
216a6(rgyud): po che sor drug pa bya'o/ /blugs gzar ni yu ba khru gang tsam pad+ma'i dbyibs lta bu la kha'i rgyar sor gnyis pa/ zabs su sor gcig pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po che bya'o/ /dgang gzar med na sor mo lnga gzhibs nas dgang
216a7(rgyud): blugs byas la/ srin lag dang gung mo dang mthe bo gzhibs pas ni sreg blugs cig shos bya'o/ /dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do/ /de nas legs par khrus byas shing yan lag dris bsgos la ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyan dang / gos la sogs pa
216b1(rgyud): dang ldan pas zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / dbye ba dang / bskrad pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg gi las bya ba dang ldan zhing rang gi lha'i sbyar ba dang ldan pas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid kyis 'jigs pa med par sems can thams
216b2(rgyud): cad la phan par brtson pas ji skad du gsungs pa thams cad bya'o/ /de la zhi ba la ni gos dang cod pan dang / rgyan dkar po dang ldan zhing gsang byed dang bcas pa gdu bu dang bcas pas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod bya zhing byams pa chen po dang ldan
216b3(rgyud): pas mi smra bar 'jam zhing bde pa'i stan nang tshangs can la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug nas/ lag pa'i pad+ma gnyis kyi gru mo'i mthar thug gi bar du dri zhim pos legs par byugs la/ phyi dro'i dus su shar du bltas/ blos bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas yar gyi ngo'i tshes
216b4(rgyud): gcig nas brtsams te/ ji srid bdag gam gzhan zhi bar mngon par 'dod pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid du zhi ba'i las bya'o/ /rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du phreng ba dang / byug pa dang gos ser po dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang yid rab tu
216b5(rgyud): dga' bas zla ba nya nas brtsams te/ phyi ma'i nya'i bar du ji srid du mngon par 'dod pa rgyas par gyur pa de srid du byang du kha bltas te/ dga' ba dang ldan pas snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni khros shing rgyan dang gos sngon po'am/ khrag gis sbags pa'i gos
216b6(rgyud): bgos la stan sra ba la lho phyogs su kha bltas te/ bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi brang la mnan pa'am/ stan med par rkang pas rkang pa mnan zhing / sos so 'cha' ba dang / mig mi 'gul ba dang / gdong gnyer ma bsnyer ba dang / snying rje chen pos dkon
216b7(rgyud): mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa'i bdud dang dgra rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ zla ba mar ngo'i nyin zhag gang yang rung ba la khro bo nyid tshad mar bya ste/ nyi ma gung ngam mtshan phyed la mngon spyod kyi las bya'o/ /dbang la ni khro ba med pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal
217a1(rgyud): med par sems can ma lus pa gdon pa la chags pas gos rgyan dmar po dang ldan pas stan bde ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ kha nub bam byang du bltas la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol
217a2(rgyud): gyi sprul pa'i me lha la bod par bya ste/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs la de bzlas pa'i chu ku sha'i rtse mos blangs bas skor phyogs su lan gsum bsangs la gtsang zhing skam pa'i rtswa dang bcas pa'i bud shing btsug la rlung yab kyis rlung dang / oM dz+wa la hUM
217a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis sbar la/ dam tshig sems dpa' thab kyi dbus su bsams nas/ phyag rgya 'di sngags dang bcas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la/ mthe bo'i rtse mo srin lag gi tshigs
217a4(rgyud): kyi rtsa bar bzhag la dgug pa'i tshul gyis yang dang yang du bskyod la mngon par 'dod pa'i me'i sngags 'don zhing spyan drang bar bya'o/ /e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dI dza sa ta ma/ gr-i hi twA hu ti ma hA ra smin san+ni hi to b+ha bA/ oM pA pa ka ag+na ye swA hA zhi ba la'o/ /rgyas pa la
217a5(rgyud): ni de bzhin du/ oM ma he n+d+ra ag+na ye swA hA/ dbang la ni/ oM ka ma ag+na ye swA hA/ mngon spyod la ni/ oM kro d+ha ag+na ye dza hi tro tra ya hUM/ che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ me lha 'ongs pa dang / sngar bshad pa'i bsang gtor gyi cho gas bsangs la mchod yon dbul lo/ /i yaM a r+g+haM
217a6(rgyud): mA yaM da t+taM gr-i h+Na sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha swA hA zhes brjod la lag pa gnyis kyis mdun du mchod yon phul la/ zhabs la zhabs bsil dbul lo/ /spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ rigs thams
217a7(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po nyid du gyur pas/ rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi snying po lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis nye bar gsal bar sbar la/ de'i lce dang dgang gzar dang blug gzar gyi kha la de nyid kyi sa bon rnam par bkod de/ brla dang / pus mo gnyis kyi bar du lag
217b1(rgyud): pa bcug la dang por blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs gsum zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa'i las la zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo/ /mngon spyod la shin tu gdangs par dug dang bcas pa'i yungs mar dbul lo/ /gnas skabs
