217b2(rgyud): 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa/ la la ni spyan gnyis la dbul bar bya ste/ bltas pa tsam nyid kyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /la la ni dpral bar ro/ /la la ni mgo la'o/ /la la ni thugs kar ro/ /
217b3(rgyud): la la ni lte ba'i gnas su'o/ /la la ni mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes sna tshogs par rtog par byed pa'i gnas rab tu dgag par bya ba'i phyir/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las gnas kyi
217b4(rgyud): nges pa mdzad pa yin te/ de las gsungs pa/ zas ni zos par gyur pa yis/ /yid dga' ba la sogs par 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad pa chen po yis/ /sbyin sreg las ni nges par bya/ /zhes gsungs te/ de bas na zas kyi bya ba byed par bsam par bya'o/ /
217b5(rgyud): de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po ni rin po che bdun gyi rgyu las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du kha dog dang dri dang ro rnams dang ldan pa phan zhing bde bar rnam par 'ju ba'i zas la spyod par byed do/ /de bzhin du gsang sngags
217b6(rgyud): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i gling chen po bzhir gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mdzad pa/ byang chub kyi
217b7(rgyud): yan lag bdun gyi rin po che'i snod du gsang sngags kyi yi ge thams cad dang ldan pa dri nga ba thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri dang ldan pa zhi ba dang / drag po la sogs pa'i ro thams cad dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar rnam par
218a1(rgyud): smin pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ /snod rnams ni las dang rjes su mthun par bya ste/ de la snod kyi nges pa'i rim pa 'di yin no/ /zhi ba la ni dngul gyi snod do/ /rgyas pa la ni gser gyi snod do/ /dbang la ni zangs kyi snod do/ /
218a2(rgyud): mngon spyod la ni khar ba'i snod dam lcags kyi snod kyi phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga la brtag par bya'o/ /nang gi sbyin sreg gi rim pa ni 'di yin no/ /'di ltar phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la las dang rjes su mthun par snod rnams bsams la lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang /
218a3(rgyud): mthe'u chung lcags sgrog tu sprel pas/ blugs gzar bzung la sor mo lhag ma rnams yu ba'i steng du bzhag la/ shin tu sbyangs shing legs par bzhu ba'i mar gyi dgang blugs phul la dge ba dang mi dge pa'i mtshan ma brtag par bya'o/ /dbyibs dang mdog dang mdog dang dri dag
218a4(rgyud): las/ /dge dang mi dge yongs brtags la/ /dang po byas nas shes byas la/ /mtshan ma ngan pa zhi bya'i phyir/ /zhi ba yi ni cho ga yis/ /mnyam par bzhag la sbyin sreg bya/ /nyes pa'i dogs pa las 'das na/ /phyi nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /dbyibs
218a5(rgyud): ni glang po che dang / rta dang / khyu mchog dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / pad+ma dang / nya dang / dpal be'u dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bum pa dang / g.yung drung dang / /dgang gzar dang / blugs gzar lta bu bsngags so/ /mdog ni mthon ka dang /
218a6(rgyud): dkar po dang / byi ru bcag pa lta bu dang / lham bu chu gsher dang / le brgan rtsi dang / bai DUr+ya dang / gser zhun ma lta bu dang / nyi ma 'bar ba dang / g.yas su 'khyil zhing shin tu snum pa bsngags so/ /sgra ni char sprin gyi 'brug sgra dang / rgya mtsho dang / dung dang / pi
218a7(rgyud): wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga rings dang / khyu mchog dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ka la ping+ka dang / ngang pa dang rma bya la sogs pa lta bur yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag bsngags so/ /dri ni pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu ta dang / dri bzangs dang /
218b1(rgyud): tsam pa ka dang / ba ku la dang / ma la ti dang / pa la ya dang / gur kum dang / gla rtsi la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i dri bsngags so/ /de dag las bzlog pa ni bsngags pa ma yin te/ dbyibs ni mdung rtse lta bu dang / zhib ma lta bu dang / ba lang gi mgo lta bu la sogs
218b2(rgyud): pa ni mi shis shing smad par bya ba yin no/ /mdog ni kha dog ngan pa dang / /ljang ba dang / sngon po dang / nag po dang / dud ka dang / til mar dang / rtsub pa dang / pa la sha la sogs pa'i mdog ni mi shis so/ /dri ni mi ro'i dri dang / dri ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i smad pa'i rdul dang /
218b3(rgyud): byi la dang / ma he dang / khyi dang / sbrul dang / nya'i zhag la sogs pa'i dri ni smad pa yin no/ /sgra ni bong bu dang / khyi dang ce sbyang la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing 'ur 'ur po dang / sim sim zer ba'i sgra ni mi shis pa yin no/ /du ba mang ba dang / rnam par 'phro ba dang / rim gyis
218b4(rgyud): ldang ba dang / cung zad cung zad 'bar ba dang / me lce 'chad pa dang / gzi brjid med pa dang / rtsub cing gnag pa sprin dang / pa la sha'i mdog can ni smad par bya ba yin no/ /de ltar bgegs dang bcas shes nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas bsang zhing
218b5(rgyud): rnam par sbyangs la yang dag par gsungs te/ mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang rang gi sngags kyis bsangs la/ dang por blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum mam/ bdun me'i rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg byas la/ blugs gzar
218b6(rgyud): la sogs pas mar la sogs pa'i dgang blugs gsum mam/ bdun dbul bar bya'o/ /'dir rim pa ni yam shing gis me 'bar ba byas pa la mar dang / de nas til/ de'i 'og tu 'bras chan la sogs pa de nas zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal du bya'o/ /yam shing dang mi rus
218b7(rgyud): kyi phye ma la sogs pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /zho dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang / 'thor 'thung dang til la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o/ /dri ni thugs kar ro/ /me tog ni dbu la'o/ /bdug spos ni 'od 'bar ba la'o/ /zhabs bsil ni zhabs la'o/ /mchod
219a1(rgyud): yon dang mar me mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes la la dag zer ro/ /de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor la sogs pa byas la/ me lha thab khung du 'bar ba'i rnam pa'am/ rang gi gzugs kyis me'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /'di la log par
219a2(rgyud): bsgrub pa dag yod de/ la la ni thab kyi phyi rol du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do/ /la la ni gshegs su gsol ba dag byed do/ /la la ni thab khung de nyid kyi nang du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do/ /de las thab kyi phyi rol du 'jog pa dang gshegs su gsol ba ni
219a3(rgyud): mi rigs te/ lha rnams zhal ni me yin te/ /sbyin sreg de nyid me la gnas/ /sbyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas/ /dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas mes stong par sbyin sreg byed pa ni mi ro'i khar zan stobs pa dang 'dra bar don med par 'gyur
219a4(rgyud): ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / me yi gnas ni mi shes par/ /gang zhig sbyin sreg las byed pa/ /de ni sbyin sreg las byas min/ /las kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ma yin/ /zhes gsungs so/ /thab khung gi phyogs gcig tu bkod pa dang / 'bar ba'i rnam par
219a5(rgyud): yongs su gyur par byas pa la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha mi snang bar 'gyur bas mi rigs so/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi me lce yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
219a6(rgyud): ngo bo nyid las ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang / pad+ma'i steng du rang gi lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma las byung ba'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan dang kha dog la sogs pa bsams la/
219a7(rgyud): yang dag par mchod cing 'thor 'thung sngon du 'gro bas dgang blugs la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /mchod yon dbul ba dang / me gnas kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de la zhi ba la ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg gi yo byad rnams bsangs la/ me thab kyi dbus su sku
219b1(rgyud): mdog dkar zhing zhi ba/ na bza' dkar po bsnams pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dkar po la bzhugs par oM badzra d+hA tu swA hA zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcas pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /
219b2(rgyud): rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan zhal dgyes shing mgu ba/ na bza' ser po bsnams shing pad+ma ser po la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du gshin rje gshed du 'dug pa rgyan dang / na bza' nag po dang ldan zhing
219b3(rgyud): khros pa yi ge hUM las byung ba sngar bshad pa'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /dbang la ni ho las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pa rgyan dang na bza' dmar po dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /dgug pa la ni de bzhin du yi ge dza las rdo rje rgyal po bsam par bya'o/ /
219b4(rgyud): yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje dang rkang mgyogs
219b5(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud len la sogs pa dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir cho ga 'dis gsang sngags tshim par bya ba dang / gzi byin bskyed pa dang / yang dag par 'bar bar byas la de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /rgya mtshor
219b6(rgyud): 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyis kyi sa las rang gi lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la pad+ma'i sbubs kyi nang du bcug ste/ tshon gyis byugs nas pad+ma'i skud pas dkris la mar dang sbrang rtsis nang bkang ste/ a ka ru dang / tsan+dan dang / pad+ma ge sar phye mar btags
219b7(rgyud): pas gtor la/ ga phur dang bdug pas bdugs te zhag gcig smyung bar gnas la de'i 'og tu zhag gsum gsang sngags 'di dang dri dkar po dang sbyar ba'i chu rgyun phra bas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ oM sarba de ba a tsi ta t+ya a mr-irta d+ha re swA hA/ oM hUM phaT ni swA hA/ rim
220a1(rgyud): gyis thams cad zhugs par gyur pa dang / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la bskyon te bskur bar bya'o/ /de ltar gsang sngags kyi lha tshim par byas na/ dngos grub myur du stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid bskyed pa dang tshim par bya ba ni gsang sngags
220a2(rgyud): 'dis blugs gzar dang mar gyi sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /oM hri khaM swA hA/ de ltar sbyin sreg dang chu la gshegs su gsol ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la bsreg par bya ba ni mar dang til dang / 'bras
220a3(rgyud): dang / zho dang / 'bras chan la sogs pa'o/ /gshegs su gsol ba'i rdzas ni pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / tsam pa ka dang / ma li ka dang / dzA ti'i me tog gi rigs rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /me tog de dag nyid kyis mchod pa dang sreg blugs kyang bya'o/ /de
220a4(rgyud): nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg gi grangs rdzogs pa dang / mtha' mar oM hUM hrIHzhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos mar gyi sreg blugs lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o/ de'i mthar
220a5(rgyud): dgang blugs phul la/ mchod yon dang / zhal bsil dang / 'thor 'thung gsol te/ yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol te/ de nas sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM
220a6(rgyud): muHzhes brjod nas gyen du dkrol te/ oM kr-i to ba sar+b+ba sa twA r+tha/ /sid+d+hi ma dat+tA ya thA nu ga/ /gats+tsha twAM bud+d+hA bi Sha yaM/ /pu na ra ga ma na yats+tsha/ /zhes brjod la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol nas/ sprul pa'i me thab kyi dbus su bsams la yang dag par mchod de/
220a7(rgyud): bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa sbyin la sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma rnams sbyin sreg bya ste/ mthar dgang blugs pa dang 'thor 'thung yang byin nas bsang gtor yang byas la mchod nas mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la/ me lha sngar bshad
220b1(rgyud): pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid bcings la mthe bong bsgreng ste/ ya hi ya hi zhes bya ba dang gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gnas bsrung ba dang bdag bsrung ba byas la/ yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas nas rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang
220b2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la legs par ldang bar bya'o/ /dngos grub ma lus 'byung gnyis mtshor gyur cing / /dpag med bde bskyed sbyin sreg de nyid ni/ /'jam bcas mi gnas grags pa zhes bya ba/ /sems can phan phyir yang dag bshad pa
220b3(rgyud): yin/ /de nyid dam par bshad pa'i kun stong bdag nyid thab khung ni/ /rnam pa kun du thog mtha' med pa'i pad+ma rdo rje ldan/ /nam mkha'i ngos ltar yangs la btags pa tsam gyis sa bon la/ /blo ngan bsregs nas shin tu 'bar la nyon mongs zhir ba zhi/ /bde gshegs
220b4(rgyud): sras bcas sngags kyis 'bar ba'i gzi brjid 'phro bas 'khyud/ /srid pa gsum gyis thab tu 'dus byas dngos po thams cad bsreg /blo gros ngan pa shin tu bsregs pas kun rtog kun las grol/ /nyon mongs gdung bzhi bar bshad pa'i zhi ba'i gdugs su bgyis/ /
220b5(rgyud): nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu rnam rtog dra ba rnams/ /bsreg par bya zhes thub pa'i zla ba dag gis gsungs/ /bgegs dang dngos grub rnams ni rnam par rtog pa tsam/ /gnyid med de nyid du ni rnam par rtog pa'ang stong pa yin/ /phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis/ /rnam pa gnyis su 'dir
220b6(rgyud): bshad pa/ /sbyin sreg cho ga shes pa la/ /rnam pa kun du'ang dga' phyir ro/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par rjes 'gro rab gnas chos/ /de bzhin gshegs pas glegs bam rdo rje dril bu dag /'jig rten don dam mi shes 'di na'ang mgon po yis/ /'jig
220b7(rgyud): rten phan par bzhed pas rab gnas mdzad pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor dang ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / stang stabs dang bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / las la sbyar ba dang / slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la de kho
221a1(rgyud): na bcu yin par gsungs so/ /slob ma de nyid bcu shes shing / /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan/ /sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga shes/ /las rnams kun la shin tu mkhas/ /lha khang mchod rten sku gzugs dang / /dam chos glegs bam ras
221a2(rgyud): ris dag / zin cing thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /bde ba'i yon tan kun bskyed pa/ /shes nas mtshan nyid la mkhas pas/ /rab tu gnas pa byed par 'os/ /bsod nams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gtsug lag khang sogs khyad 'phags bya/ /steng g.yogs mchod rten
221a3(rgyud): gnas rnams dang / /khyim dang lha yi khang par yang / /sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas pa/ /cho ga las gsungs bzhin du bya/ /cho ga nyams par mi bya ste/ /rab gnas rtag tu smod pa dang / /tshe 'dir sdug bsngal chen po dang / /'jig rten gzhan du'ang 'jigs chen
221a4(rgyud): 'byung / /de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyis ni ci nus dang / /de bzhin cho ga gsungs tshul gyis/ /kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya/ /de ltar byas na bsod nams che/ /mthong dang ma mthong skye 'gyur la/ /sngags pa bzang pos sku gzugs ni/ /dgos par
221a5(rgyud): gyur pa de las byung / /gang du sku gzugs zin nas ni/ /yun rings nas kyang ma mchod na/ /ji srid mchod gnas ma gyur pas/ /de nas mi shis skye bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig /rigs dang mtshan nyid med pa dag/ /'jig rten kun gyis bkur mi byed/ /sku
221a6(rgyud): gzugs dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur/ /sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas par/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod 'gyur ba/ /sngags dang bral bas thal bar ni/ /sbyin sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med/ /de bzhin 'dir ni sngags me gnas/ /mchod gnas mchod par byed pa gang / /
221a7(rgyud): las de yi ni rnam smin gyis/ /skye ba kun du mchod mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir rab tu gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la rgyal bas rab tu gnas par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas
221b1(rgyud): kun du gnas gyur kyang / /de ni gang la'ang gnas pa med/ /nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du/ /gnas pa thams cad rab tu brtag /'jig rten kun rdzob la gnas nas/ /rab tu gnas par yongs brtags kyi/ /don dam tshul du gang zhig la/ /gang gis gang du
221b2(rgyud): rab gnas bya/ /gzod nas zhi zhing skye med la/ /'di lta'i rab gnas ji ltar bya/ /sems can dang po'i las can gyi/ /rgyud rnams yang dag sbyang phyir byas/ /de la dang po re re zhig yongs su brtag pa'i gnas nye bar sbyangs par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang /
221b3(rgyud): ba dan rnams bsgrengs la/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang / mchog tu gsol bas gsol ba btab pa'i slob dpon gyi nyi ma shis pa dang skar ma bzang po la slob dpon shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas/ spyan 'byed kyi nang du song na rigs lngar gtogs pa'i sangs
221b4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams la phyag byas te/ de dang 'brel pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin du sa yongs su bzung ba dang / thig gdab cing gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa dang / tshon gyi las la sogs pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la me
221b5(rgyud): tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ mchod yon phul la sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a haM/ zhes bya ba sngags 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums 'jug pa/ /de bzhin gzugs
221b6(rgyud): 'dir khyed bzhugs mdzod/ /'dir zhugs rtag tu mgon por ni/ /gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di/ /byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir/ /che ge mo'i don du bzhes su gsol/ /sku gzugs lhag par gnas byas la/ /de nas dbang bskur brtsam par bya/ /slob ma smyung
221b7(rgyud): bar gnas pa yis/ /bya ba 'di dag thams cad spyad/ /sngags pa gang dag ci sgom dang / /cho ga mchod la sogs pa bya/ /g.yo med pa yis byas gyur na/ /mchod sbyin chen po'i 'bras bu thob/ /spyan drangs gdan la bzhugs gsol dang / /de bzhin mchod yon me tog
222a1(rgyud): dang / /spos dang mar me lha bshos te/ /mchod pa sngags dang ldan par dbul/ /sku gzugs shar du zhal bstan la/ /ras ni ser pos g.yogs par bya/ /sbyang bas legs par bsal bya zhing / /de nas sngags 'dis yungs kar ni/ /chu'am yang na me nang
222a2(rgyud): du/ /lan cig yongs su gtang bar bya/ /oM sar+b+ba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i skur bsams la dbu la yi ge oM/ zhal la yi ge hrIHthugs kar yi ge hUM dgod do/ /yang na gang dang gang gi sa bon gang yin pa de/ de'i
222a3(rgyud): thugs kar dgod par bya'o/ /de nas der ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la bsgrub po/ /de nas til mar dri chen gyis bskus la dUr wa'i pir gyis sbyang zhing bkru'o/ /til mar gyi sngags ni oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha
222a4(rgyud): ne swA hA/ bum pa lnga'am brgyad rin po che lnga dang / 'bru lnga sman lnga dang ldan zhing dri zhim po'i spos chus yongs su gang ba/ mgul pa ras bzang pos bcings la/ a mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa dbang bskur ba'i don du bsngags mngon par bzla bar bya'o/ /oM
222a5(rgyud): bi shud+d+ha badzrod ka hUM/ oM dzin dzi ka swA hA/ oM A ro l-i ka swA hA/ oM badzra d+h+r-ika swA hA/ zhes rigs kyi dbye bas mngon par bzla bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang / de bzhin rig pa sbyang dang ni/ /bkra shis zhes grags yid 'ong ba'i/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya/ /
222a6(rgyud): ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kun gyis khrus gsol ba/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ spyan gyi sngags ni/ oM ru ru s+phu ru tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne/ /sar+b+bA r+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/
222a7(rgyud): lugs ma khrus ni bya bar gsungs/ /ri mo me long dag la bkru/ /ras ris chu ni med bya'am/ /lag pa slar yang bsang gtor bya/ /ga phur gur kum bcas pa yi/ /ras dkar zung gis dgab par bya/ /oM badzra b+ha ba se swA hA/ oM badzra gen+d+ha swA hA/ oM badzra
222b1(rgyud): a b+hir+Na bi b+hu Sha Ne swA hA/ dkyil 'khor dbus su bcug nas ni/ /de nas rang gi dam tshig bsgrags/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rab bskur bas/ /ci rigs par ni dbang bskur bya/ /oM hUM trAM hrIHaH/ de bzhin du ni cod pan dang dar dpyangs bcing ba byas la bzhugs su gsol lo/ /de
222b2(rgyud): yang 'og tu shin tu dud pa dang / de ni mi yo drang por ni/ /sku gzugs yang dag gzhag bya ste/ /de ltar min na nyes bskyed 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /de bzhin mar me na bza' ste/ /de kun gsang sngags ldan par ni/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /
222b3(rgyud): oM badzra puSh+pe hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM/ sngags kyis bsang byas bshos bsngogs te/ gser las byas pa'i thur ma yis/ /spyan ni dbye ba byas nas ni/ /zhal zas de ni mkhas pas bstabs/ /oM badzra tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsa k+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ oM di bya an sa mA
222b4(rgyud): dI d+h+ya na pri Na ye swA hA/ de ltar byas nas de nas yang / /shes rab can gyi slob ma gzhug/ /khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i/ /sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa/ /de ni ngas bcas byed du bcug/ /khyed kyis de ni kun
222b5(rgyud): rdzogs pas/ /ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis/ /de bas dbang bskur dam tshig la gnas par byas nas/ sbyin blugs stong ngam de'i phyed dam de'i phyed phyed kyi mngar gsum dang bsres pa'i 'bru thams cad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bdag nyid dang ni slob ma kun/ /zhi dang
222b6(rgyud): rgyas pa 'phel bya'i phyir/ /thab khung zur ni bzhi pa la/ /'o ma can shing bud shing bya/ /de yi yam shing 'o ma mar/ /bshos kyi lhag ma dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra A yu She swA hA zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga las gsungs pa bzhin zhi ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /gtsug
222b7(rgyud): lag khang ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs par yid kyis sngags 'dis bskyed par bya'o/ /oM hUM hrIHde nas lhag par
223a1(rgyud): gnas dang / mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma byin te/ yang mchod pa byas nas rab tu gnas pa bya'o/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/ oM hUM hrIHb+hu khaM badzrI b+ha ba dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha b+hu khaM zhes bya'o/ /de
223a2(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing legs par rab tu gnas pa bsams la bus pa lnga'am/ brgyad dam bcu drug spos chus yongs su gang zhing / mngon par bsngags pas gtsug
223a3(rgyud): lag khang ma lus par bsang gtor bya'o/ /de'i sngags ni oM badzrod ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas gtsug lag khang skyong du nag po chen po dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang
223a4(rgyud): du bya ba byas la rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya ste/ ji srid gtsug lag khang 'di gnas pa de srid kyi bar du khyod kyis srungs shig/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten
223a5(rgyud): yang lhag par gnas pa dang / mchod yon dang / mchod pa la sogs pa dang por byas la/ yi ge b+h+rUM las rnam par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
223a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa'i lha thams cad spyan drangs te/ bcug la mchod rten du bzhag ste mnyes par byas la khrus dang mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par
223a7(rgyud): mchod de/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hiShe ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ oM hUM hrIHb+hUM tri tra tiSh+Tha zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o/ /lhag ma
223b1(rgyud): ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang / ras ris dang glegs bam dag ni me long nyid la bkru'o/ /lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /shes rab kyi
223b2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam pa yongs su gyur nas/ kun rdzob dang don dam par ston par bsams la/ oM pradz+nye shru te ma rti bi dza ye swA hA zhes pa dang / oM hUM hrIHthaM zhes bya bas kyang rab tu gnas pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sngags ston pa'i glegs bam ni rdo rje chos yi
223b3(rgyud): ge'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi gzugs kyi skus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad par byin gyis brlab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam mo/ /mchod pa dang /
223b4(rgyud): gtor ma la sogs pa ni sku gzugs spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas sil snyan dang rol mo byas la gshegs su gsol lo/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang / /de sras tshangs sogs lha tshogs kun/ /gang zhig cho ga'i bya ba ni/ /nongs gyur de dag bzod
223b5(rgyud): mdzad rigs/ /sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang / /bde legs chen po kun mdzad de/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /gang 'di sku gzugs bskal pa'am/ /bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas shing / /sa dang me dang
223b6(rgyud): chu dang ni/ /rlung las lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs/ /slob dpon slob ma bcas pa dang / /bu dang tsha bo rnams bsrungs te/ /rab dga' yid bder gyur nas ni/ /rab gnas bzang po dag tu bzhud/ /shes rab ye shes dri med pa'i/ /mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /
223b7(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang / /bye brag rnams ni bshad par bya/ /gser sogs las byas rdo rje ni/ /rtse lnga 'od zer bcas pa la/ /chang gzungs cha gsum mdzes pa dang / /ra dang rtse mo'i bye brag can/ /tshad ni sor bzhi dag dang ni/ /brgyad dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dang /
224a1(rgyud): bcu drug de bzhin nyi shu ste/ /de las nyung dang lhag par min/ /rdo rje brgyad po nges pa yi/ /tshad yin par ni bshad pa yin/ /mdzes shing ma chag 'jam pa dang / /brtan zhing ma gas sra bar 'gyur/ /sor bzhi pa yi tshad dag ni/ /de las nyes 'gyur
224a2(rgyud): tha ma yin/ /sum 'gyur rdo rje bar ma ste/ /bzhi 'gyur dag ni mchog yin no/ /chur ni gsum du byas pa yi/ /dbus ma'i cha ni zlum por bya/ /dkyil ma brgyad chas mtho bar bya/ /zlum po ra rtse gsum pa la/ /cha gcig dbus su gnas par bya/ /khro gnyer sna tshogs
224a3(rgyud): ldan pa dang / /rin chen 'dab ma myu gu dang / /pad+ma de bzhin gnyis su bya/ /ra ni cha gsum gnas pa las/ /cha gcig dag ni dkyil du gzhag/ /sor gcig brgyad car bya ba ni/ /dbus ma'i ra yi bar zhes bya/ /gzhan rnams cho ga ji bzhin bya/ /zur bzhi shin tu rno
224a4(rgyud): ba dang / /dkyil sbom rtse mo phra ba la/ /'og dpag gsum dang ldan zhing rdzogs/ /dbus ma lhag bcas mdzes par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs kyi char bzhag pa'i/ /ra gzhan dag ni yan lag bzhi/ /phra zhing dbus su gug pa dang / /dbus ma'i ra la 'dud pa ste/ /rgya ni dbus
224a5(rgyud): ma'i ra yi phyed/ /nas 'bru tsam gyis ma reg pa'o/ /chu srin mche ba gtsigs 'dra ba'i/ /chu srin kha nas dbyung bar bya/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ra/ /pad+ma 'khor lo la gnas pa/ /rno dang mi rno gyes pa dang / /zhi ba dag dang rnam pa bzhi/ /phyi rol ra ni rgyar gyur pa/ /gang
224a6(rgyud): zhig de yi dbus ma mtshungs/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje rdo rje'i dbang / /mtshan nyid dag gi khyad par ni/ /nang gi dbus ma'i ra dag ni/ /bzhi cha yis ni bskyed par bya/ /phyi rol gri gug dbyibs 'dra la/ /rno zhing rtse mo gyes par bya/ /g.yul dang 'thab par 'phen nus pa/ /chu srin
224a7(rgyud): gdong gis zin par bya/ /rdo rje rtse gsum gang yin par/ /mtshams dag tu ni gnas par bya/ /de bzhin sna tshogs par gyur pa/ /rdo rje rgya gram min par bshad/ /de yang dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las/ sgrub pa pos ni nges par 'chang ba yi/ /rdo rje gang yin de ni 'dir
224b1(rgyud): bshad bya/ /sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dang / /mchog gi tshad ni sor yang nyi shu'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni/ /sa ni thob par bya phyir rab tu shis/ /rgyal po'i don du dngul ni mchog yin te/ /zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i glu bskul la/ /
224b2(rgyud): lha min dbang po 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang / /phub tu 'gro ba rdo yi rdo rje'o/ /don kun bsgrub pa la ni lcags gsum gyi/ /gnod sbyin sde 'joms pa la lcags kyi'o/ /don gzhan la ni sed ldeng dpal dang tshe/ /nad med nor rdzas la ni bil ba'o/ /gnod sbyin ma bsgrub pa
224b3(rgyud): la ma d+hu'i shing / /chos kyi don du a shwad las byas shing / /gsal zhing rtse mo dgar rnams zhig pa la/ /mi rnams pa sang pa la ni mi rus kyi/ /shel las byas pa'i mig 'phrul chen po la/ /dbye phyir nim pa las byas rab tu shis/ /bsad cing skam la ba ru ra yi shing / /
224b4(rgyud): sha za bsgrub pa la yang rtag tu shis/ /lha dang gnod sbyin dri za bsgrub pa la/ /sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje'o/ /ji ste rlung ni dbang du byed 'dod na/ /de tshe klu shing rtsa las byed pa'o/ /gzugs bsgyur pa la sa las byas pa'o/ /ro langs bsgrub pa la ni ka dam pa'i/ /bu nan
224b5(rgyud): ga dang ra dza arka dang / /a shwad shing gi rdo rje nor gyi phyir/ /bla ba a mra shri bar+Na ba/ /ardzu la sogs pa las byas pa ni/ /mi rnams g.yul las rgyal bar bya phyir ro/ /yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir/ /tsan+dan dkar po dang ni dmar po ste/ /dbyibs legs
224b6(rgyud): 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'o/ /rdo rje rtse lnga sra ba bcang bar bya/ /dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nas su/ /bzlas brjod zin na myur ba kho nar ni/ /dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis/ /mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba'i zhabs drung gzhag/ /nga yi rigs kyi gsang
224b7(rgyud): sngags sgrub pa pos/ /rdo rje med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na/ /khu tshur bcangs la rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas/ /zhes 'byung / lcags gsum las byas dril bu mthar/ /phyi la pad+ma ba lang kha/ /rdo rje pad+ma bde gshegs rigs/ /
225a1(rgyud): las mchog dgu ni skyed par byed/ /rdo rje la sogs ma ldan dang / /khong stong lce dang bcas pa dang / /gru bzhi mnyam pa'i kha cher dang / /rtse mo mdung gi gnas dang bcas/ /cha bzhi rnam par spangs pa ni/ /bil ba dpal nor rgyas pa thob/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i
225a2(rgyud): dbyibs 'dra zhing / /khong stong rkang pa drug dang ldan/ /ut+pal 'dab ma can gyis kyang / /zhi dang rgyas pa'i don ston te/ /cha gsum yongs su dor bar ni/ /mtshan ma phreng ba ska rags bcas/ /skye med don gyi zab pa dang / /shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gro dbyangs/ /'og pu ska

225a4(rgyud): pa dang ni ldan pa ru/ /blugs pas dngos grub ster bar bshad/ /'di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do/ /nam mkha' dri med dkyil 'khor legs bris pa'i/ /rnam par dkar ba'i dge ba gang yin des/ /'gro kun lta ngan sprin tshogs rnams bsal te/ /phyogs rnams kun du nyi zla ltar

225a7(rgyud): dra ba'i dga' ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba'i rol pa'i nyams ni 'phro mdzad pa/ /'jam pa yi ni mchog la btud de 'gro bas de yi dkyil 'khor mnyes bya rab bshad bya/ /mi brtan mi nyid rnyed dka' de bas kyang / /bshes gnyen mchog phrad dga' ston rab rnyed dka'/ /de phyir
225b1(rgyud): bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul / /srid gsum phan byed lam la brten par kyis/ /sdug bsngal du mas bcom zhing mya ngan gnas/ /'gro ba mgon med bltas nas brtser ldan pas/ /sngags tshul 'di yi don la brten bya ste/ /dam pa rnams la gzhan don las mchog
225b2(rgyud): med/ /rang gi lto ba tsam zhig 'gengs 'dod pa/ /'gro ba kun kyi rang bzhin 'di yin gyi/ /rang lus 'jig na'ang gzhan don 'dod gyur pa/ /sngon med rmad 'di sa steng 'ga' yi yin/ /lus can yid kyi rang dbang dag gis 'jug /'di dag yong ye yid kyi dbang gyur
225b3(rgyud): yin/ /srid dang rnam grol de nyid rnam rol na/ /bcos bla'ang blo gros nor ldan ci phyir thogs/ /phyi rol gnas kyang de nyid ga la 'gro/ /'on te gnas kyang yid ni rnam par grol/ /de ltas don du yongs 'dzin don med de/ /yid nyid kun du bya dang byed pa yin/ /dper na da du ra
225b4(rgyud): yi mthu yis ni/ /'ga' yis sa gzhi gser kyi rang bzhin mthong / /de bzhin yid kyang sngags sogs stobs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs snang ba rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /de la slob dpon theg pa chen po yi/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos ni rtogs pa dang / /de nyid la ni rtag tu mngon
225b5(rgyud): par dga'/ /gsang ba'i de nyid don ni sdud par byed/ /sna tshogs las kyi rlung gis bskyod/ /sdug bsngal dba' klong srid pa'i mtshor/ /'gro kun nub par mthong nas ni/ /sdug bsngal de nyid dag gis gdungs/ /de nyid gdon par rab dad cing / /byang chub tu ni nges
225b6(rgyud): byas la/ /dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul dra ba yis/ /rgyud gsungs dam tshig rab srung byed/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur/ /rnam par mi rtog rnam dag blo/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni ting 'dzin mchog /phyag rgya stang stabs 'dug stangs dang / /bzlas dang sbyin sreg de bzhin
225b7(rgyud): mchod/ /las kyi spyor dang nye bsdu ba'o/ /de ltar de nyid bcu shes shing / /dman pa'i sems ni smod byed pa/ /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas/ /de nyid
226a1(rgyud): bcu ni yongs shes shing / /brtser ldan bstan bcos rnams la mkhas/ /spro ba che zhing snying stobs che/ /rag pa zlos shing shin tu bsdams/ /byams dang snying rje dag pa'i bdag /sems can kun la ser sna med/ /srid pa'i longs spyod la mi chags/ /
226a2(rgyud): sngags kyi tshul la the tshom med/ /rang gi yid ni nyams dga'i gnas/ /phyogs dgar rnam par gnas nas ni/ /sgyu ma rmi lam brag ca dang / /dri za'i grong khyer lta bur ni/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam bsgoms la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu bsgrub/ /ji skad bshad
226a3(rgyud): pa'i yon tan ldan/ /blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nyid slob ma sdud pa dang / /rgyud rnams ston par 'os pa yin/ /de nyid kyis ni sngags byin pa/ /bya bar ldan la rab tu 'grub/ /slob ma'ang yon tan de 'dra ba'am /cung zad dman pas dpal ldan rgyud/ /tshul
226a4(rgyud): gsungs thar rgyal 'bras 'dod pas/ /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /gzhan du slob dpon slob ma dag /nges par nyams pa 'byung 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten gsum gyes dpyas pa dang / /don grub 'bras bu'ang ring bar 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin
226a5(rgyud): gshegs pa kun kyi mchog / dam tshig shes rab can gyis bsrung / /srog gi phyir yang dor mi bya/ /mkhas pas legs par 'thas pa 'am/ /legs par bris pa nyid rung gi/ /bar ma dor gyur dngos pos ni/ /don med par ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /de la slob dpon slob
226a6(rgyud): mas gang gi tshe/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum gsol ba btab na/ de'i tshe bdag gis sems can gyi khams 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po'i gnas la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed la/ khyed kyi dkyil
226a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad tshogs par gyur tam/ 'on te ma yin zhes slob ma la dri bar bya'o/ /gal te cung zad ni tshogs la cung zad ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de'i tshe de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM gi 'od zer rnams kyis snying gar gnas pa'i
226b1(rgyud): yi ge ka~M las byung ba'i sdig pa mdog gnag cing mi sdug pa sha za lta bur sna'i rtse mor phyung ba dang / yi ge hUM de yang snying gar phyin te/ khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa gsus pa 'phyang ba/ sku mdog gnag pa/ thugs kar mche
226b2(rgyud): ba dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ston pa/ phyag g.yas na mche ba bsnams pa bsams la phyung ste/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da/ sar+b+ba pA paM a s+ya hUM phaT ces bya bas des sdig pa thams cad zos nas/ slob ma de yang yi ge saM las kun du bzang po'i skur rnam par bsams la/
226b3(rgyud): 'og nas bshad pa'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi tshul gyis de'i sems kyi bgegs phur bus btab la/ de'i 'od zer 'jigs pa stong phrag gis gdug pa thams cad yang dag par bsregs la/ slob pa'i sems mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ yi ge a las byung ba'i zla ba'i
226b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la dbyangs kyi yi ge tha ma las byung ba'i las kyi rdo rje yang der gnas par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor kyi sngon du bya ba rnams kyi phyir 'bad par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar/ /yang dag brtag par su yis nus/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /
226b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas na/ dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba bya bar bshad do/ /de la dang por re zhig bdud rtsi thab spyor gyi gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas la/ mal nas langs te gdong bkru ba la sogs
226b6(rgyud): pa'i bya ba thams cad byas nas/ snga dro'i dus su g.yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur dang hUM phaT ces bya bas bgegs rnams bskrad la/ lha'i khang par zhugs te/ stan nang tshangs can la sogs par 'dug la/ yi ge a dang hUM gnyis las zla ba dang / rdo rje rim bzhin lag pa gnyis
226b7(rgyud): su bsams la/ gung mo dang mdzub mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang mthe bo rnams su/ oM hUM trAM AHkhaM zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga rim bzhin du bkod la rdo rje thal mo bcings te/ oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta shan sI dA/ sar+b+ba satwa na ma sar+b+ba sid+d+hA ya/ saM pat+t+yan+ta~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga
227a1(rgyud): tash+tsa/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha na haM/ oM swa b+hA wa shud+haHsarba d+har+m+mAHswa b+hA shud+d+hou0f85haM/ /zhes bzhag la rang gi mgor dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyis bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes bsam par bya ste/ gang 'di ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos p
227a2(rgyud): a la bgegs rnams 'byung ba 'di ni gnas med cing skabs med de/ bgegs la sogs pa ni tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te de lta na yang yid mgu bar ma gyur na de'i tshe skad cig gis dpal rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid rnam par
227a3(rgyud): bsams la/ yi ge hUM las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab spyor bgegs ma lus pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ 'bar ba stong phrag gis 'jigs su rung ba/ lte ba man chad rtse gcig pa lta bu la sku stod khro bo'i dbyibs can la 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan dang ldan
227a4(rgyud): par bsams la/ lha'i khang pa'i dbus su sngags 'di gdab par bya'o/ /oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+ThAn phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rA dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya/ bAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ 'og tu sa gzhi'i gtan pa la thug gi
227a5(rgyud): bar du bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun du phur bus btab la/ der gtogs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kun nas sreg par byed pa'i phur bus bgegs rnams bskrad nas/ de'i steng du yi ge aM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od can nyi ma bye
227a6(rgyud): ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa bsams la/ shar dang nub dang byang dang / lho'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams su sngar bshad pa'i phur bu rnam par bsams nas/ dbus ma'i phur bu'i nyi ma'i gzugs las 'od phyung nas/ ngos kyi phur bu rnams la de dag phan tshun du 'od kyi tshogs
227a7(rgyud): rnams 'dres par gyur pas bla re bzhin du stug bor gyur pa/ 'og tu yang de bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /yang na de bzhin du dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas la/ hUM las dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad mdun du 'dug ste/ bka' nod pa sprul la/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha tre zhes bya ba
227b1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo ba dang / de las lha la sogs pa'i bgegs ma lus par bkug par gyur nas/ rang gi phyogs su gnas par rnam par bsams la/ yi ge hUM las byung ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyag na tho ba bsnams nas oM g+ha g+ha zhes bya ba la
227b2(rgyud): sogs pa'i sngags kyis bka' bsgo zhing khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i khro bo'i phur bus spyi bo nas brdungs pa dang / shar phyogs su khyab 'jug dang brgya byin zhes bya ba 'khor lo dang rdo rje thogs pa/ mdog sngon po dang / ser po nam mkha' lding dang / sa srung la zhon pa'i lha
227b3(rgyud): gnyis g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa phur bus btab par bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdud rtsi thab spyor phyag na rdo rje'i tho ba bsnams pa dang / 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyis lhor gshin rje lag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ kha dog gnag pa ma he la zhon pa 'khor dang
227b4(rgyud): bcas pa phur bus btab pa dang / stobs po ches nub tu chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa zla ba lta bu'i mdog can sbrul la zhon pa'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal bos me'i phyogs su me lha gun+d+he dang bgrang phreng thogs pa kha dog dmar po ra skyes la zhon pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bskor
227b5(rgyud): ba'o/ /khro bo pad+ma mthar byed kyis bden bral gyi phyogs su bden bral mdog char sprin ltar nag po/ ral gri thogs pa yi dags la zhon pa/ srin po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /khro bo chen po dbyug sngon gyis rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha du ba'i mdog can rgyal mtshan thogs pa/
227b6(rgyud): ri dgas sngo bsangs la zhon pa'o/ /khro bo mi g.yo bas dbang ldan gyi phyogs su dbang ldan mdog dkar po mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa khyu mchog la zhon pa/ zla ba kham pas dbu rgyan byas pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi steng du tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba la
227b7(rgyud): sogs pa mdog ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / spyi blugs dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da thogs pa'o/ /khro bo rdo rjes 'og gis sa'i 'og tu lha ma yin kyi dbang po thags bzangs ris sku mdog ljang gu lag na ral gri thogs pa shing rta la zhon pa'o/ /khro bo chen
228a1(rgyud): po bgegs mthar byed rang nyid kyi byang du lus ngan po dang / tshogs kyi bdag po mdog dkar po dang / ser po bil ba dang / la du lag na thogs pa mi dang byi la la zhon pa/ gnod sbyin dang / bgegs ma lus pa'i bdag bor gyur pa/ phur bus
228a2(rgyud): btab pa rab tu bsam par bya'o/ /khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang lte ba man chad sku smad kyi cha rdo rje'i rtse mo lta bu sku stod khro bo'i dbyibs can la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pas khyab 'jug la sogs pa bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor dang bcas pa
228a3(rgyud): phur bus btab cing khro bo'i 'od zer rnams kyis lus rnam par bcom par yang bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge ra~M las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis kun nas phyogs bcing ba dang / yi ge la~M las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser pos phyogs kyi nang du mtshams
228a4(rgyud): bcing ba dang / yi ge hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar snang ba gtams pas/ phur bu'i nang du kun nas ra ba bya ba dang yi ge ra~M las byung ba'i rdo rje dra ba rab tu 'bar ba'i me ltar snang zhing 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba kun du 'khrug pa ra ba'i nang du bsam par bya'o/ /de ltar
228a5(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa dang / bar ma dang rgya chen po ste/ bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams las gang du mngon par 'dod pa de nyid bya'o/ /de nas yi ge hrIHlas klog mar pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la/ lce'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje gnas ngan len thams cad dang
228a6(rgyud): bral bas dkar ba bsams te/ badzra dzi hwa zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas ras ris la sogs par bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs thams
228a7(rgyud): cad du dmigs la mchog tu gus pas snying gar thal mo sbyar ba bzhag ste/ pus mo'i lha nga sa la bzhag nas/ phyi'i mchod pa ci 'byor pa rnams dang / oM sar+b+ba bid pU ra pU ra/ a brta ya a brta ya ho zhes bya ba dang / yid kyis mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs pas kyang
228b1(rgyud): yang dag par mchod la dngos po thams cad kyis phyag byas nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung / /ji ltar dus gsum
228b2(rgyud): mgon po dag / byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don ni byed pa gsum/ /bdag gis
228b3(rgyud): brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bkyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung
228b4(rgyud): bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung
228b5(rgyud): las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyi zhing / /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus
228b6(rgyud): gzung / /ma bsgral ba ni bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbyugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la 'gong / /bdag ni dge ba'i las 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni rtogs gyur nas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' med
228b7(rgyud): las/ /'gro ba thams cad gdon par bgyi/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la rang gi sngags dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rang gi lha'i rang bzhin 'od kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa rnam par 'phro ba bkod la/ de nyid yid la zlos shing sems rnam par sbyang bar
229a1(rgyud): bya'o/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas/ /chos rnams med cing chos can med/ /nam mkha' lta bur dmigs med de/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa'o/ /zhes kyang brjod la/ de'i don la lhag par mos pas thog ma med pa'i dus can gyi phyin ci log gi rtog
229a2(rgyud): pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon bsal la/ 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus pa dang / rang gi lus dang rdul phra rab tu rnam par bshig la/ rdul phra rab rnams kyang ji lta ba bzhin du brtags pa las 'das pas dngos po med pas rang bzhin med par rnam par bsgoms la/ oM swa b+hA wa shud+haH
229a3(rgyud): sat+tha d+has+thAHzhes bya ba dang thal mo lan gsum brdabs te/ rang bzhin gyis dag par mos la/ rang gi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa las rnam par grol ba/ de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid rang gi
229a4(rgyud): sngags tsam la yi ge ho dang spel bar bsams la/ oM las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus na bzhugs pa rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ ma lus pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'i nang du
229a5(rgyud): chud pa mdun du bzhugs par bsams nas/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bya d+hI kA ro mi zhes brjod do/ /'di de byang chub bde mchog ste/ /'di las gzhan pa'i bde mchog med/ /de thob par ni 'dod bzhin du/ /de nas dri za'i sems can 'dra/ /nye bar len pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /phra ba'i sbyor ba
229a6(rgyud): nyid 'dzin bzhin/ /rang bdag zhal nas rgya pad+mar/ /skyes pa'i dus su blo yi zhugs/ /'dod chags chen po'i me gzugs su/ /ra ni chu skyes su legs sam/ /de yi 'od kyi mthu yis ni/ /skad cig de las mar bum bzhin/ /byang chub sems zhu nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
229a7(rgyud): sras bcas pa yis gzigs/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sems can bzhin/ /rang gi bdag nyid der dbyer med/ /sdug pa'i snying po dag pa che/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med/ /gnas ngan len ni kun las grol/ /rnam par rtog pa sel ba'i mchog /nyon mongs
229b1(rgyud): dri ma thams cad dag / zla ba lta bur sems tsam pa/ /sems tsam gyur pa'i sems can dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras bcas pa/ /de'i 'od lcags kyus bkug pa yis/ /rang gi sems kyis gcig tu bya/ /'dir sangs rgyas kun yon tan dang / /sa dang pha rol
229b2(rgyud): phyin la sogs/ /a sogs dbyangs yig lta bu ni/ /mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya/ /rgyun ltar rang phyogs nas 'ongs te/ /dkar ba'i tshul gyis rnam par zhugs/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis nus pa nyid/ /sems tsam du ni rnam par bsam/ /'di ltar snying rjes
229b3(rgyud): bskul ba ni/ /sa 'og bar du bsam par bya/ /kye ma sems can 'khor ba la/ /dga' bas sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid bral/ /yun ring dus su yang yang 'khor/ /de rnams rdzogs par byang chub phyir/ /'jam gsung rang nyid gyur par bya/ /oM b+ho
229b4(rgyud): d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs las/ /ka sogs yi ge rgyas pa yis/ /rim gyis nye bar 'phel ba'i sems/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin byed cing / /snying rje rjes chags las byung ba/ /byang chub sems kyi zla dkyil 'khor/ /dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag
229b5(rgyud): rdzogs/ /nyon mongs thams cad des 'joms yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur sogs/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa'i/ /kun du bzang po'i bdag nyid du/ /mthong nas rang la yig gsum dgod/ /spyi bor 'khor lo la gnas pa'i/ /yi ge oM ni kha dog ser/ /
229b6(rgyud): khar ni pad+ma'i lte ba yi/ /dbus nas a ni kha dog dkar/ /snying gar rdo rje de yi ni/ /lte ba la gnas yi ge hUM/ /sngon po 'od zer tshogs rnams ni/ /rnam par 'phro ba dgod par bya/ /rdo rje'i yi ge de rnams las/ /'od kyi sprin rnams spros nas ni/ /sems can khams kun sbyang
229b7(rgyud): la sogs/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul bstan/ /oM las byung ba'i sku rdo rje'i/ /sprin las sku yi rdo rje ni/ /paM byung pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ /dag pa'i shel ltar dri ma med/ /ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa 'joms/ /zhal gsum rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan/ /a las byung
230a1(rgyud): ba'i gsung rdo rje/ /sprin las gsung gi rdo rje'i lcer/ /hUM las byung ba'i thugs rdo rjes/ /sprin las thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /ting 'dzin byin rlabs snying ga yi/ /zla bar rnam par bsam par bya/ /de ltar yig gsum byin rlabs lus/ /snying gar gnas pa'i
230a2(rgyud): zla ba'i thugs/ /der ni ye shes tshogs kyi ni/ /'od 'bar mu~M ni rnam par dgod/ /de las byung ba'i ut+pal ni/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra bsam/ /de dbus ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /dgyes bskyed bya ba la bzhugs pa/ /de las byung ba'i 'od sprin las/ /sangs rgyas
230a3(rgyud): sprin las sngags pas spro/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /bde ba che la nges sbyar bas/ /'jig rten ma lus legs sbyangs te/ /de bsdus nas ni gzhug par bya/ /de kun yongs su gyur pa las/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'od po che/ /mgon po sangs rgyas kun
230a4(rgyud): gyis dngos/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can/ /srid pa sgyu ma ltar mkhyen pas/ /gzhon nu'i sku mdog gur kum 'dra/ /zhal gyi pad+ma cung zad 'dzum/ /sgeg dang bcas pa'i nyams kyis rgyas/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /
230a5(rgyud): sna tshogs rin chen 'dab ma bzang / /pad+ma'i rgyal po gdan du bya/ /sngo dang ser dang dkar po che/ /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /dpa' bo spyan gsum phyag drug pa/ /mchog tu dga' bas shin tu mdzes/ /mchog sbyin ral gri mda' rnams ni/ /g.yas pa'i
230a6(rgyud): phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /g.yon na shes rab pha rol phyin/ /ut+pal sngo dang gzhu nyid do/ /sangs rgyas sprin chen spros pa yis/ /nam mkha'i gtos kun khyab par mdzad/ /sna tshogs me tog gis cher mdzes/ /zur phud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thog ma
230a7(rgyud): dbus dang mtha' las grol/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes/ /byams dang thugs rje sogs rgyu mthun/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /de ltar mkhas pas bdag nyid bsgom/ /de nas ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM zhes bya ba dang / nga
230b1(rgyud): rgyal bskyed la/ rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang / nam mkha' rnams la spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang nam mkha' rdo rje laM maM paM taM aM zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams las rim bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ gzugs dang /
230b2(rgyud): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / don yod grub pa dang / mi bskyod pa b+h+rAM a~M dzrI khaM hUM zhes bya bas so/ /mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
230b3(rgyud): lus dang / yid kyi skye mched rnams la/ k+ShiM dzaM khaM gaM Sh+kaM saM zhes bya ba las sa'i snying po dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po'o/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
230b4(rgyud): ro dang / reg bya dang chos kyi skye mched rnams la/ dzaHhUM baM hoHkhaM raM zhes bya bas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo rnams so/ /sha dang / rkang dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rtsa rgyus rnams la/ aM hUM trAM aMHkhaM zhes bya bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dgod do/ /de nas spyi bor
230b5(rgyud): gnas pa'i oM las byung ba'i sku rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas rnam par rmongs par bsams la/ lus thams cad nas yang dag par spros te/ mdun du phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba sras dang bcas par rnam par bsams la/
230b6(rgyud): oM las spyan spros te/ de'i phyag gi zhags pas drangs la rang gi lus la bcug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhu bar gyur pa dang / de'i bdag nyid can du rang gi lus la sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsams la/ byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM na dzi na dzika ad+hi
230b7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis bsgreng ste/ spyi bor gzhag pa ni sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zhugs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang /mtshan dang dpe byad kyis bdag nyid rnam par brgyan par lhag par mos par
231a1(rgyud): bya'o/ /de bzhin du lkog mar gnas pa'i yi ge AHlas byung ba'i gsung gi rdo rje bsams la/ gos dkar mo yang dag par spros te snga ma bzhin du de zhugs pas rang gi lce gsung rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM A ro l-ika a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nyid
231a2(rgyud): las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste/ g.yas pa bsgreng ba ni gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas zla ba kham pa lta bu chos thams cad kyi gnas su gyur par dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi lce mos par bya'o/ /de bzhin du snying gar
231a3(rgyud): gnas pa'i yi ge hUM las byung ba'i thugs rdo rjer bsams la de bzhin du mA ma kI spro ba sngon du 'gro bas bcug la/ rang gi sems thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM badzra d+h+rika a d+hitiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nyid la mthe bo g.yas pa nang du bcug la/ g.yon pa bsgreng
231a4(rgyud): ba ni thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas hUM las byung ba'i snying gi pad+ma'i zla ba chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa dang bcas pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba kun du 'phro bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas sa ma you0f85haM zhes bya ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snga ma bzhin du snying g
231a5(rgyud): a la sogs par rdo rje la sogs pa bsams te/ de dang sa ma ya satwa a bye tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes bya ba dang byin gyis brlabs la rang gi sngags brjod nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes kyang 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya zhing / many+dzu badzrou0f85haM zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal b
231a6(rgyud): ya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la/ sa ma ya aHzhes brjod de/ mdun du paM las byung ba'i pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM muHaHzhes bya ba las ut+pal rnam par bsams la/ chos bdag med pa'i dam tshig gi nang du zhugs te/ /many+dzu
231a7(rgyud): badzrou0f85haM zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug cing bcug la bcings te dbang du bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni/ mthe
231b1(rgyud): chung las te lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan/ /zhes bya ba dang / oM badzra aM gu sha dzaHhUM/ oM badzra pA sha hUM hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta hUM baM/ oM badzra A we sha hUM hoHzhes bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li big+han+ta ka hUM/ 'di'i
231b2(rgyud): phyag rgya ni bdud rtsi thab spyor gyi sku bsams la/ lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo'i rtse mo gsum pa lta bur brkyang la/ dpung pa'i rtsar khros pas bzhag na/ mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa yang bya ste/ spel ba'i spyor bas phyogs
231b3(rgyud): bcing ba dang / ra ba dang dra ba la sogs kyang bya ste/ spel ba'i sbyor bas phyogs bcing ba dang / ra ba dang dra ba la sogs pa yang bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la paM las byung ba'i pad+ma'i gdan/ oM ka ma la hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bstabs la/
231b4(rgyud): thal mo kha phye ba dang / rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon phul te/ oM pra ba ra sat+ka raM pra tIts+tsha swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags dang / g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe bo dang / mdzub mo sbyar bas me tog blangs la zhabs bsil dbul te/ sor mo lhag ma rnams zlum po'i rnam pas
231b5(rgyud): brkyang pas phyag rgyas kyang zhabs bsil phul la dam tshig bstan par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas/ ut+pa la kha phye ba lta bur bzhag la/ mgon po 'jam pa'i
231b6(rgyud): dbyangs la bskul bar bya zhing 'di bcings la/ rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /oM mu dr-i sh+ya hoHzhes bya ba dang / yang dag par bskul la de nyid la dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod de/ rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba
231b7(rgyud): byas la sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod de/ rgyab tu zla ba bsams la dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM muHzhes lan gsum brjod de ye shes sems dpa' dang / lhan cig gcig tu bsgoms la/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen pos gnas
232a1(rgyud): la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sa ma ya a zhes bya ba dang / ci rigs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi lus la rnam par bkod la/ rang gi snying pos spyi gtsug gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ snying gar mi
232a2(rgyud): bskyod pa/ dpral bar rin chen 'byung ldan/ lkog mar 'od dpag tu med pa/ spyi bor don yod grub pa/ mig gnyis su spyan/ mi bskyod pa'i g.yon logs su mA ma tI/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i g.yon logs su gos dkar mo/ don yod par grub pa'i g.yon logs su sgrol
232a3(rgyud): ma/ mi bskyod pa la g.yas logs su rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhi'o/ /mi bskyod pa'i rgyab tu skul byed ma/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi g.yon logs su rin chen sgrol ma/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i rgyab tu khro gnyer can/ don yod par grub pa'i rgyab tu rdo rje lu gu rgyud/
232a4(rgyud): lte bar gshin rje gshed/ smin mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ khar rta mgrin/ gsang bar bdud rtsi thab spyor/ dpral ba'i steng du 'phags pa mi g.yo ba/ mi bskyod pa'i mdun du 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /dpung pa gnyis la dbyig sngon/ rkang pa gnyis la stobs po
232a5(rgyud): che/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du gnod mdzes rgyal po/ rkang pa gnyis kyi 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad la byams pa la sogs/ spyi gtsug gi steng du 'khor los sgyur ba/ bruM las byung ba rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa pad+ma dang / rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis
232a6(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ zhal dang / sku mdog dang / phyag la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba/ 'od zer lnga pa'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i phreng ba can/ rin po che'i cod pan mnga' ba/ spyan la sogs pa'i lha
232a7(rgyud): mo rin po che dang / mtshan rtags dang / rdo rje dang / ut+pa la rin po che bzhin du bsnams pa/ gnyis gnyis kyis logs gnyis su mdzes par byas par rang gi snying po nyid kyis bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ lag ngar gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te/
232b1(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur byas la/ mthe bo dang / gung mo gnyis kyis se gol brdebs shing dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod la/ rang gi lus la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par yid kyis rnam par bsams pa legs so zhes bya ba'i spyor bas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
232b2(rgyud): bkug nas bcug ste/ bcings la dbang du byas nas oM AHhUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum rnam par bkod pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du rang gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs la/ yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha
232b3(rgyud): dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su poSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wAn sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsaM/ badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH/ de nas snying ga dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo rnams su
232b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis sbyar la/ oM satwa badzri ad+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dbus ma bcag pa ni rin po che ste/ oM rat+na badzri a d+hitiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab
232b5(rgyud): ma ltar bya'o/ /oM d+har+m+ma badzri ad+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ de nyid las gung mo sbyar ba'i rtse mo bcag pa ni ral gri'o/ /oM kar+m+ma badzri ad+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM hUM/ gnas 'di dag tu rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang / ral gri nang du chud pa'i rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams byin gyis brlab
232b6(rgyud): par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yang dbang bskur ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ rdo rje can gyis 'gro bskyab phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba/ /yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar stsal/ /de bzhin deng ni bdag la stsol/ /de nas nam mkha'i khongs thams
232b7(rgyud): cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun du gang ba'i rig pa'i lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa thogs shing mchod pa'i yo byad dang ldan pa rnams byon nas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi sbyor bas rtse bran gyi rtsa bar bzhag pas/ dbang bskur
233a1(rgyud): zhing 'di skad du gsung bar bsam par bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba yi rdo rje che/ /khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /de nas dbang bskur ba de phyag rgya 'di dag gis brtan par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i
233a2(rgyud): thal mo las/ mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pas ni/ /gung mo mnyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /sngags ni oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM/ badzri Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/ /oM badzre badzre Ni hUM/ gung mo gnyis
233a3(rgyud): ni nor bur bya/ /oM rat+na badzri Ni hUM/ pad+ma srin lag mthe'u chung gung / oM d+har+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/ lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang / /oM kar+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di dag kyang spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / rna ba g.yas pa'i ltag
233a4(rgyud): dang mgo'i rgyab dang / rna ba g.yon pa'i ltag gi gnas rnams su rim pa bzhin du sbyar te/ dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub kyi sems dam pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa nyid cod pan du bsam par
233a5(rgyud): bya'o/ /la la ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis dbang bskur bar 'dod do/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdun du mdud pa lta bus bcing bar bya zhing rgyab tu yang de bzhin du mdud la/ bsgyings pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa nas dgrol bas/
233a6(rgyud): rna ba gnyis kyi dar dpyangs 'phyang ba byas la/ mthar thal mo mnyam pas mnyes par bya'o/ /badzra tu hoH/ yang cod pan gyi steng du kaM haM kaM zhes bya ba bkod la/ oM TuM zhes bya bas go bgos te/ rdo rje kha tshur snying gar mdud pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor la/ mgrin pa
233a7(rgyud): dang rgyab dang / yang de bzhin du snying gar ro/ /de nas nu ma'i bar dang yang snying gar ro/ /yang mgrin pa dang / ltag pa dang / mgo bor de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcings pa'i mdud pa'i sbyor ba mtha' ma la sogs pa sor mo thams cad bkrol la/ dar dpyangs
233b1(rgyud): kyi tshul du byas la mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid snying ga la sogs par bkrol bas rang gi snying po ni snying gar dgod par bya'o/ /nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni snying ga'i gong du'o/ /spyi bor bsam pas ni
233b2(rgyud): mgo bor ro/ /spyi gtsug la sogs par bsam pas ni spyi gtsug tu'o/ /go cha la sogs par bsam pas ni nu ma'i bar du'o/ /mtshon cha la sogs par bsam pas ni lag pa g.yas par ro/ /nye ba'i snying po la sogs par bsam pas ni lag pa g.yon du'o/ /
233b3(rgyud): lcags mda' la sogs par bsam pas ni phrag pa g.yas su'o/ /mda'i dra ba la sogs par bsam pas ni phrag pa g.yon du'o/ /mtshon cha thams cad du bsam pas ni lus thams cad du dgod par bya'o/ /de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod
233b4(rgyud): de/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba dang / bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs rnams de'i sngags nyid kyis blang bar bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag gi slob dpon du gyur nas/ thams cad mdzad
233b5(rgyud): do zhes lhag par mos par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /deng khyod bdag ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rab tu grub phyir rdo rje long / /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas rdo rje dril bu dang
233b6(rgyud): bcas par spyi bor bzhag la/ ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur te/ oM badzra satwa s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes bya ba/ de nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs ni/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na gnas/ /
233b7(rgyud): khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM/ d+ha ra mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hi hUM zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig gsum sbyin pa bya ste/ hUM las rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo de bzhin
234a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rnam par bsams la/ de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya ste/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems
234a2(rgyud): pa bdag po'i bdag / dang po'i mchog gi skyes bu ni/ /bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyis ni rdo rje'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas de kun gyi/ /shes rab sgra yis rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed/ /
234a3(rgyud): ces bya ba dang / aH'i sa bon las byung ba dril bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs kyi bdag nyid can/ shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid kyi dril bu yang dag par blangs la/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /ngo bo nyid dag sems
234a4(rgyud): dpa' mchog / srid pa mchog ni byed par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba dang / de dkrol bar bya'o/ /de nas srid pa yongs su dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po rtag tu bsten par bya ste/ srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /
234a5(rgyud): shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu srungs/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug
234a6(rgyud): par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi mda' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs kyis bsgrubs pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /sems can don rnams brtan par byed/ /yid kyi
234a7(rgyud): gzugs ni brtan phyir ro/ /phyag rgya dam tshig yin par bshad/ /gang gis gzugs kun brtan gyur pa/ /des na phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags/ /zhes bya ba dang / dam tshig gis sku la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i bdag nyid can gyi phyag rgyar byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas
234b1(rgyud): dam tshig gsum kyi glu'i mchod pa bya ste/ oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i
234b2(rgyud): lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod/ /'dod chags kun gye rjes su brnyes/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gye mchog /gdod nas grol
234b3(rgyud): ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun du bzang po'i kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis/ /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /de nas
234b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ i swa b+hA ba shud+d+hou0f85haM/ oM sar+b+ba sa mou0f85haM zhes bya ba dang / nga rgyal bskyed la/ rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje at+pa la'i dbus su rang gi sngags rnam par bsams la/ de nyid yid la zlos shing bsam par bya'o/ /
234b5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen pos gnas la g.yon pa'i mig tu Ta las zla ba bya/ g.yas par ma bkod nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /hUM gis mig 'bras bskal pa'i me lta bu/ /yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas par bya'o/ /snod kyi 'jig rten kyi 'og tu yi ge hUM de
234b6(rgyud): las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge baM dbus su bkod pa rdo rje me'i 'od dang mnyam pas dus mtha' rlung gis sbar ba'i bskal pa sreg pa'i gzugs can lta bu'i rdo rje des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad thal bar byas par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha'i phyogs su stong gsum
234b7(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge khaM gnas pa de las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas kun du 'khyud pa byung bas/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis kun du bsreg pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkrus nas/ dba'
235a1(rgyud): rlabs 'khrug pa 'o ma'i rgya mtsho lta bur kun du bkang nas gnas so/ /de nas de'i dbus su yi ge ras rang gi 'od kyis 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bskol ba dang / pad+ma chen po'i gzugs la pad+ma mtha' yas pas yongs su bskor bar bsams nas/ de'i lte bar gser gyi
235a2(rgyud): mdog can gyi ra ba bsams la/ der yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i phyogs nas byon te bzhugs so/ /de nas hUM su~M` hUM zhes bya ba ste/ de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can/ gling dang
235a3(rgyud): gling phran dang / rol mtsho dang / gser gyi ri bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor bar bsams la/ oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarbaM swA hA zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang ste/ sa la bzhag pas byin gyis brlabs la/ de lta bu gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gnas rnam pa
235a4(rgyud): kun du rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nges par bsten pa/ de yang / yi ge hUM las gzhal yas khang / /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dril bu dang ni ba dan sogs/ /sgo khyud kyis ni nye bar mdzes/ /grwa dang mtshams rnams thams
235a5(rgyud): cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen dag gis spras/ /dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma sogs kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs pa yi bla re bres/ /gos dang phreng ba sna tshogs ldan/ /mtshams su zla phyed rin chen mchog /rdo rje mdzes pas rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi yongs su
235a6(rgyud): btab pa dang / /kha khyer kyis ni yongs su bskor/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo gzhan/ /de bzhin de yi dbus su'ang gzhan/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor cing / /rdo rje ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan/ /rtsig pa rin chen sna lnga 'bar/ /ye shes kyis sprul gzhal yas khang / /
235a7(rgyud): nam mkha'i grangs med ltar rgya che/ /'khor lo yongs rdzogs 'di lta bu/ /kha ba can gyi ri ltar dkar/ /mchod rten chen po'i nang du chud/ /thub dbang 'od ni rnam 'phro bas/ /phyogs kyi tshogs rnams khyab gyur pa/ /yid kyi rang bzhin mchod chen 'di/ /khyad
235b1(rgyud): par 'phags pa rnams kyis brgyan/ /de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid sgyu ma lta bu dang / mig yor tsam gyi khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i dbus su yang hUM saM hUM zhes bya ba
235b2(rgyud): las seng ge'i gdan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa der babs nas 'dug ste/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /bzlas brjod byed par 'dod pas rang gi snying ga las bdag po rang gi sngags kyis bton la/ dgug
235b3(rgyud): pa dang / dbang bsgur ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas/ zung du gnas pa'i sbyor ba'am/ gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul gyis bzlas brjod dang gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste/ 'di ni rim pa bar ma'o/ /mdor bsdus
235b4(rgyud): pa'i rim pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa sngon du 'gro ba nyid kyis spros pa shu dang / bsdu ba byas pa las/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan par/ /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/ /sdogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bshad do/ /zhes bya ba yin no/ /yang na rnal 'byor rgya chen
235b5(rgyud): po byed par 'dod na/ de'i tshe lha thams cad kyi gnas su yang paM las sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la/ a dang aM las zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ci rigs par rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du dbus ma'i seng ge'i gdan la dus yun ring po nas goms par byas pa'i thugs rje chen
235b6(rgyud): po mngon du bsgoms la/ 'gro ba ma lus pa 'di dag thabs dang shes rab dang bral bas sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa la blta ste/ thabs 'dis de rnams kyi don bya'o zhes bsams la/ rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dri ma med pa ji srid mdun
235b7(rgyud): du spros la/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kou0f85haM zhes bya bas rjes su mnyes par byas la/ oM badzra ko Sha gu h+ya hUM zhes bya bas bskul ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa de nyid kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byed par dga' bas mchog tu dga' ba t
236a1(rgyud): hob par bdag nyid shes nas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par gang ba'i rang gi byang chub kyi sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid du zhu bar gyur cing / nang
236a2(rgyud): du chud par byas la/ lha'i 'khor lo dbyung bar bya'o/ /yi ge oM las byung ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba/ rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar po chen po
236a3(rgyud): ste/ zhal gsum gyis mdzes pa/ sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas na 'grang phreng dang mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma dang / rdo rje'i gzhu bsnams pa/ lha rnams 'jigs shing skrag
236a4(rgyud): par mdzad pas zhabs kyi pad+ma la phyag 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprin chen po 'phro ba/ oM AHzhes bya ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par spros la/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ma lus par khyab ste/ 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad nas/ sngags 'di nyid kyis bdag nyid la
236a5(rgyud): gzhug pa dang brtan par bya'o/ /hUM las mi bskyod pa sku mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od dang mnyam pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa cung zad bzhad cing sgeg pa/ zhal g.yon dmar ba/ zhal g.yas pa dkar ba/ zhal dbus ma sku dang 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
236a6(rgyud): phyag brgyad pa g.yas kyis ba dan gsum pa'i gung mo'i dbus su rdo rje thugs kar 'degs par brtson pa/ g.yon kyi rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten pas dril bu bsnams pa/ yang g.yas na ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na lha mo'i nu ma dang / zhags
236a7(rgyud): pa dang / gzhu bsnams pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par gyur pa'i mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can rol pa'i stang stabs kyis legs par bzhugs pa/ oM hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis spros la/ snga ma bzhin du 'gro ba'i don byas nas slar byon te/ rang gi sngags nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi re'u cha
236b1(rgyud): la dgod par bya zhing brtan par bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba/ rang rang gi sngags kyis yang dag par spros te/ rang rang gi sngags nyid kyis rang rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya zhing brtan par bya'o/ /zhal gsum gyi dbus ma ni sku dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /taM las rin
236b2(rgyud): chen 'byung ldan spyan gsum pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog dmar po zhal g.yas sngo/ g.yon dkar ba phyag dang po gnyis kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas na rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon na rin po che bsnams pa/ snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs
236b3(rgyud): kyi re'u cha la dgod do/ /AHlas byung ba'i 'od dpag tu med pa 'jig rten dbang phyug sku rnam par byung ba/ ral pa dang thor tshugs 'chang ba/ zhi ba thams cad mkhyen pas dbu rgyan byas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog can/ zhal g.yas sngon po/ g.yon dmar
236b4(rgyud): po/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba bzung nas dkur brten pa/ g.yas pas rang gi thugs kar pad+ma rnam par 'byed pa/ yang g.yas gnyis na bgrang phreng dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na nu ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ lha mo bzhi dang / gdan gcig
236b5(rgyud): pa nub kyi re'u cha la'o/ /khaM las byung ba'i don yod grub pa markata gyi mdog can/ zhal g.yas sngon po/ g.yon dkar po/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcas pa/ yang g.yas dang g.yon gnyis kyis ral gri dang / lcags kyu bsnams pa/
236b6(rgyud): rin po che'i cod pan can byang du'o/ /'di dag ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o/ /oM trAM oM hrIHoM khaM zhes bya bas ni rim bzhin du 'di rnams kyi sngags yin no/ /lAM mAM pAM tAM/ hUM trAM hrIH/ khaM tsuM raM b+h+r-iM hUM zhes bya bas sa bon gyi yi ge 'di rnams las spyan la
236b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo rnams rim bzhin du bskyed la/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod par bya'o/ /de la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su lha mo spyan sku mdog ser ba/ phyag g.yas na mchog sbyin dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / rdo rje dang / mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs
237a1(rgyud): mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa dang / rin po che'i snye ma dang / bgrang phreng dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /me'i phyogs su mA ma kI ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog can khro ba dang bcas pa bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa dang / rdo rje dang mda'
237a2(rgyud): bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su gos dkar can/ zla ba'i mdog can g.yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mdas brgyan pa/ g.yon na pad+ma dang / bgrang phreng dang gzhu bsnams pa/ rol pa'i stang
237a3(rgyud): stabs can no/ /rlung gi phyogs su sgrol ma markata kyi mdog can g.yas na mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang / ut+pa la dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /gsum po 'di dag ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung can no/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis
237a4(rgyud): par shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su rdo rje sems ma dang / rin chen sems ma dang / chos kyi sems ma dang / las kyi sems ma rim bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang / sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa 'dra ba yin mod kyi/ gzhan du na g.yon pa'i
237a5(rgyud): gnyis pas nu ma bsnams pa med pa'i phyir/ ci rigs par sdigs mdzub dang ldan pa'i zhags pa bsnams par shes par bya'o/ /byang shar mtshams su lha mo skul byed ma/ zla ba'i mdog can phyag dang po gnyis kyis 'og nas bshad pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcings pas/
237a6(rgyud): thugs ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas rnams na mi 'jigs pa dang / ral gri dang / rin po che'i chun 'phyang dang / bi dza pU ra dang / mda' dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug pa dang / tho ba dang / lcags kyu dang / rdo rje dang / ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang / bgrang phreng
237a7(rgyud): bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / pad+ma dang / spyi blugs dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / 'khor lo dang / dung dang / sdigs mdzub dang / bum pa bzang po dang / thag mdung dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
237b1(rgyud): phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o/ /shin tu dang ba'i dar la'i zheng chung ngu'i stod g.yogs legs par bgos pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la bab cing skal ba bzang pa/ sgeg pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / drag po dang / dgod
237b2(rgyud): pa dang / rngam pa dang / snying rje dang / rmad du byung ba dang / zhi ba zhes bya ba'i nyams dgu dang ldan pas spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / sgog ma dang / dpung mgo g.yas dang / g.yon dang / thugs ka dang / lte ba dang / pus mo'i lha nga dang / zhabs rnams su de bzhin
237b3(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / don yod zhags pa dang / rang gi gzugs dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / rdo rje sen mo can gyis gnas su byas pa/ 'di'i zhal dang po
237b4(rgyud): cung zad bzhad pa/ sku'i mdog can zhal g.yas pa gdengs pa/ ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog can/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas rnam par brgyan pa/ ljags bskyod pa/ zhal g.yon pa ser po tshem gyis sgos gnon pa'o/ /shar lho mtshams su rin chen sgrol ma sku mdog
237b5(rgyud): ser po/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po che'i thal mo sbyar te 'jog pa/ yang g.yas kyi gnyis pas mi 'jigs pa dang / mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang / lce blugs dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams su khro gnyer
237b6(rgyud): can zla ba'i mdog can g.yas na rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / mda' bsams pa/ g.yon na sdigs mdzub dang / spyi blugs dang / gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /nub byang mtshams su rdo rje lu gu rgyud sku mdog ljang gu/ g.yas na rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon
237b7(rgyud): na sdigs mdzub dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu bsnams pa/ zhal cung zad bzhad pa/ gdug pa thams cad nges par 'dul ba ste/ 'di dag ni rol pa'i stang stabs dang ldan pa yin no/ /spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di dag thams cad ni zla ba'i gdan dang / 'od kyi dkyil
238a1(rgyud): 'khor dmar po dang spyan gsum dang rang gi phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra ba'i zhal gsum dang / rang gi bdag po rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa/ gos dang rgyan tshogs pa mnga' ba yin no/ /oM ga ga na lo tsa ne swA hA/ oM ki ri ki ri mA ma kI hUM/ oM ka Te bi ka Te
238a2(rgyud): ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te ka ro Ta bi bye swA hA/ oM tA re tut+ta re tu re swA hA/ oM satwa badzri hUM/ oM rat+na badzri hUM/ oM d+har+m+ma badzri hUM/ oM kar+m+ma badzri hUM/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+da swA hA/ oM rat+nol ke rat+na dz+wa li ni swA hA/ oM b+h+raM ku Te b+h+r-iM/ oM badzra shri kha la hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di dag ni ci rigs par 'di rnams kyi
